chapter.verse: 'Cheh-dlu: :Yusu' 'Klae 'wluh-a 'i, an-a' 'nyne :wor :dhe dih. :Yusu' no 'Keen :Debe' 'di-a' 'yu, 'de 'Keen :Debe' no 'Eble'hehn 'di-a' 'yu.
'Eble'hehn 'wluh Ase', 'de Ase' 'wluh 'Jekor, 'de 'Jekor 'wluh 'Juda-: :korn or-a'a: 'de-di'-nyor⧾-kpalu⧾-:.
'Juda: or-: 'wluh 'Pehleh-: :korn 'Zila-: :on :korn-a 'de 'dhu-a 'Tama-'. 'Pehleh :wor 'wluh 'Ehzola, 'de 'Ehzola 'wluh 'Wlaa,
'de 'Wlaa 'wluh :Ami'nada, 'de :Ami'nada 'wluh 'Nasorn, 'de 'Nasorn 'wluh 'Samor.
'De 'Samor 'wluh 'Bhoa :or :korn-a 'de 'dhu-a 'Wlea-'. 'Bhoa :wor 'wluh 'Obeh :or :korn-a 'de 'dhu-a :Wluu'-'. 'Obeh :wor 'wluh 'Jehsi.
'De 'Jehsi 'wluh :Debe'. 'De :Debe' 'wluh :Salomor', :or :korn-a 'de 'dhu-a :Yulaya'-a'a: 'nynor :dee'.
:Salomor' or-: 'wluh 'Wleobo'a, 'de 'Wleobo'a 'wluh :Aba'ya, 'de :Aba'ya 'wluh 'Esa.
'Esa :wor 'wluh :Yea'safa, 'de :Yea'safa 'wluh 'Jorla, 'de 'Jorla 'wluh :Yuzaya'.
'De :Yuzaya' 'wluh 'Jotan, 'de 'Jotan 'wluh 'Eya, 'de 'Eya 'wluh 'Ehzekaya'.
'De 'Ehzekaya' 'wluh :Mana'sa. :Mana'sa :wor 'wluh 'Ama, 'de 'Ama 'wluh :Josaya'.
'De :Josaya' 'wluh :Jehkoni'a-: :korn or-a'a: 'de-di'-nyor⧾-kpalu⧾-: ti tuh kpon-uh-a, 'de on kpa-uh-a 'Babe'lor-bluhba ken.
:Yee' :eh 'wluh-a 'o ti on kpa-uh-a 'gegeye-', 'de 'Babe'lor, 'do :wor :Jehkoni'a 'wluh-dih: :Sia'ti, 'de :Sia'ti 'wluh :Zowla'baba.
'De :Zowla'baba 'wluh :Aba'yu, 'de :Aba'yu 'wluh :Ila'yaka, 'de :Ila'yaka 'wluh 'Ezor.
'De 'Ezor 'wluh 'Zalor, 'de 'Zalor 'wluh 'Aken, 'de 'Aken 'wluh 'Ilayu.
'De 'Ilayu 'wluh 'Ehlia'za, 'de 'Ehlia'za 'wluh 'Matan, 'de 'Matan 'wluh 'Jekor.
'De 'Jekor 'wluh 'Joseh :or 'dhu-a :Mehle'-a'a: yibeor-'. :Mehle' :wor 'wluh :Yusu', an 'da-dih-a Nyorsoa-a' 'taan'-yu.

:Yee' 'cheh-dlu⧾-a' klehkpeh 'wluh-a 'de 'Eble'hehn 'di, 'de :eh :yeh-dih:-a :Debe'-a' ti ken, on no 'cheh-dlu⧾-a' :bhue: 'yor :nyieh, :yee' deh tba 'o :Debe'-a' ti bo dih, 'de :eh :yeh-dih:-a ti tuh kpon-uh-a, 'de on 'ye-uh'-a 'Babe'lor-bluhba ken kpa, on no 'cheh-dlu⧾-a' :bhue: 'yor :nyieh, :yee' :eh 'wluh-a 'o ti on 'ye-a' 'gegeye 'wluh-dih: 'de 'Babe'lor, 'de :eh 'ye-a' Nyorsoa-a' 'taan'-yu-a' ti ken :yeh-dih:, on no 'cheh-dlu⧾-a' :bhue: 'yor :nyieh.

'Ka-: :Yusu' 'Klae-a' 'wluhuh'-dhih no :aa mu-a'. :Mehle' :or 'wluh-or, or 'dhu-eh: 'sehn 'dlu 'Joseh 'ye-or' :korn. Jorwor: :yeh on 'ye-a' :dha :due' 'kpa, :yee' Gban 'i :ne :Zulu no-eh, 'de or :ne 'kwli-', 'de nyor⧾ 'di dih 'ma-dih: ka 'di.

Deh no-eh, 'Joseh: :or 'dhu-or 'sehn 'dlu :dee', or no 'yi 'sleh-nyor:, 'de or :se-' 'bhorn or 'ye-eh' dih :wa-dih: 'do :gwlea, 'de or :ne-or' dhen :no-dih:, :yee' or na-dih-eh :gwluhuh' dih, or 'ye-or' dih 'tali: :weheh:.

:Yee' :yeh or 'si-a 'o deh :daa eh-a' :gwluhuh' dih :na-dih: 'da, :yeh or pobo-a 'o, :yee' :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'enjor :due', or-: :yi-dih-or 'dlu bo 'de 'nyinor-', 'de or 'dae: 'de or bo, 'Joseh:, :Debe'-a' 'yu, 'bor :an-a' :ple-' :fano. Kpa :Mehle' 'gbu bo, or 'ye :an-a'a: 'nynor no. Deh no-eh, 'yu :ne-a 'de or 'di, or 'wluh 'de Gban 'i :ne :Zulu bo.
Nyor-kpalu-yu: 'o, or mu 'wluh-:, :yee' :an mu or-a' 'nyne :Yusu' 'da-dih:. Deh no-eh, or mu or-a'a: nyor⧾ 'puh-dih: 'do 'kle 'ye-eh: on :korn on 'ye-a' 'ye :dee', 'do an-a' deh⧾-zon⧾-a' dhih bo.
Deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :daa, en :no-eh:-' 'de :Gwlor :baa'-a' wlu 'ye dhih 'jeh-' 'kpa, :ka or no-a eh-a' :za-a' see, :eh :yi-dih:-a or-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor-', or 'dae:,

:Gbee'e:. 'Nynor-kpao'-yu:, :or se-a nyor-kpalu-dhih yubo:, or-: mu 'kwli-' :ne, 'de or 'ye nyor-kpalu-yu 'wluh. :Yee' an mu or-a' 'nyne :Ima'yoeh 'da-dih:. (:Ima'yoeh-nyne: :daa, en :bleh-dih: 'i, Nyorsoa :ne 'o :a bo.)
:Yeh 'Joseh 'wluh-a 'nyinor-', :yee' or no :ka :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'enjor: :dao' 'da-a 'weh :kpeheh:, :yee' or kpa :Mehle' 'gbu bo 'weh, or 'ye or-a'a: 'nynor no.
Jorwor: or :se-or' deh-' :no-dih: :chio'lo: 'de or :za :gbano, or 'wluh nyor-kpalu-yu, 'de or 'da or-a' :Yusu'-nyne.

:Yee' :yeh :Yusu' 'wluh-a 'de :gwlor an 'da-dih-a 'Behble'hehn 'de :Judi'a-bluhba ken, ti :Hehlo' no-a 'keen 'do 'bluhba: :dao' ken, 'do :wor :toror' :korn-nyor:⧾ :on 'chean'-a 'chuh :dhlaen, mo-: yi :Julu'slehn, on 'wluh-dih: 'de 'yluh-a' 'kwla 'wluh-dih: 'da,

on dhele: nyor⧾ dih, on 'dae:, Dha 'yu :bleheh'eh: :or 'wluh-a :or no-a 'keen 'do :Jueh'-nyor⧾ bo, or :ne :eh? :A 'ye or-a' 'chuh :dhlaen-eh 'de 'yluh-a' 'kwla 'wluh-dih: 'da. Eh-a' dhih, :a 'yle :a 'ye-or' :weheh' :za.
:Yee' :yeh 'Keen :Hehlo' 'worn-a dhih :daa, :yee' or-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a :Julu'slehn-: an-a' :porluh⧾ :gba ya.

'De or 'da Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor:⧾ :klaba'⧾-a' klehkpeh-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ 'tele' :torne-nyor⧾-:. :Yeh on 'kpa-a :dha :due', :yee' or dhele-uh-: dih, or 'dae:, Dha Nyorsoa-a' 'taan'-yu :korn or 'ye 'wluh-dih: :eh?
'De on 'da, 'De 'Behble'hehn: 'o, or :korn or 'ye 'wluh-dih: 'de :Judi'a-bluhba ken. Deh :daa, eh-: 'o, Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor 'chle, or 'dae:,

Jorwor: :mor 'Behble'hehn: :daa :or :ne-a 'de :Judi'a-bluhba ken, :on :se :gwlor-yu: klehkpeh klehkpeh, 'de nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn :gwlor⧾ :klaba'⧾ :daa 'nyne bo. Deh no-eh, 'de :on 'di, 'do :wor nyor⧾ :na-dih-nyor-a mu 'wluh-:, or 'ye 'Ezlea-nyor⧾ 'yli-eh bo 'dhu, :on no-a 'an-a: nyor⧾.
:Yee' :Hehlo' 'da :toror' :korn-nyor:⧾ :dao' 'weh, 'de 'slan :pa ka 'di, or 'ye-uh' dih dhele: ti :yihih :eh 'chuh :dhlaen-eh: :dao', eh 'wluh-dih-uh-a 'i.
'De or dbo-uh 'Behble'hehn, or 'dae:, A mu, a 'ye 'yu :bleheh'eh: :dao' dih 'bhorn deh 'jeh. :Yee' :mor a 'ye-or, :yee' a 'yle, 'de a 'ye 'on :gwluhuh' zela:, 'de 'on 'ye-or' :weheh' :za 'da mu :ke.

:Yee' :yeh on 'worn-a 'keen-a' wlu, :yee' on 'kpa 'i :gwie:, :yee' 'chuh :dhlaen-eh-a' 'jeh :dao', on 'ye-a :dee', :eh 'wluh-a 'de 'yluh-a' 'kwla 'wluh-dih: 'da, eh-: on 'ye :neheh'. :Yee' eh-: mu 'de on ybei' :chio'lo:, 'de eh 'ti-dih: 'do :dha 'yu :bleh-dih:-a 'i.
:Yeh on 'ye-eh, :yee' 'mona 'yi-dih-uh-: dih.

:Yeh on pa-a 'de 'gbu :dao' 'di, :yee' on 'ye 'yu :bleheh'eh 'weh 'do or 'de :Mehle' :gwlii', 'de on bla 'koor-dlu⧾ 'yi glu, on :za or-a' :weheh'. 'De on kan-dih: an-a'a: bhaan-borlor'⧾ 'i, on 'nyi-or 'nyii'-deh⧾, :en 'dhu-a 'goo-: :korn deh⧾ :mor nyor⧾ po-a 'yli, :en po-a 'no 'jeh no, an 'da-dih-a 'flehnkensehn-: 'dekorn: :pofi'orn: an 'da-dih-a 'mina-:.
'De Nyorsoa 'dhu-uh 'slen 'de 'nyinor-', or 'dae:, A-a' :mu-dih:-' 'noror 'Keen :Hehlo' bo deka o. 'De on :mu-dih: :gwie: 'sluh bo, on mu on 'bli.

:Yee' :yeh on mu-a, :yee' :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'enjor :due', or-: :yi-dih: 'Joseh 'dlu bo 'de 'nyinor-', 'de or 'dae:, :Sorn-', 'duo: 'yu-yu-: :korn or 'de-: a 'ye ple, a 'ye 'Iye-bluhba ken mu. 'Do :wor a 'ye dih :dhe :chio'lo:, 'de jorwor: 'on 'ye a 'da. Deh no-eh, 'Keen :Hehlo'-a mu 'yu-yu: :daa 'kwla⧾-' dih 'bhorn-:, or 'ye-or' 'dba.
'De 'Joseh :sorn-' 'mano-'. Or 'duo: 'yu-: :korn or 'de-:-'. 'De on 'kpa 'Iye-bluhba: :gwie ken.

'Do :wor on :dhe dih :chio'lo:, 'de 'Keen :Hehlo' 'meh. :Yee' deh :Gwlor :baa'-a' wlu :za-a-' see, :eh :yi-dih:-a or-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor-', eh 'kpa dhih 'jeh-' 'weh, :eh 'dhu-a, 'De 'Iye-bluhba ken, 'do :wor 'on 'da-dih: 'an-a: 'Yu, or 'ye 'de 'wluh.

:Yee' :yeh 'Keen :Hehlo' yubo-eh 'i, :ka :toror' :korn-nyor:⧾ :dao', on :bo-dih-or dih, :yee' 'chehn 'dba-or', 'de or 'nyi nyor⧾ 'tele', on 'ye nyor⧾-kpalu⧾-nynuu-a' klehkpeh, :eh 'wluh-a zon⧾ 'sororn' bo, :eh yi-a 'bluhbor, 'dba, 'de 'Behble'hehn-: 'dekorn: :gwlor⧾ :nyene'-a' klehkpeh :en :ne-a 'Behble'hehn 'de dih-:. 'De on no-eh. Deh :korn-a dhih :Hehlo' no-eh, :toror' :korn-nyor⧾ zela-or :gwluhuh' 'weh, ti 'chuh :dhlaen-eh 'wluh-dih-uh-a 'i :zai', 'do zon⧾ 'sororn' :en zi-a 'di.
:Yee' Nyorsoa-a' wlu 'kpa-' dhih 'jeh, :ka or-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor: :Jehlimaya' no-a eh-a' :za-a' see, or no-a,
'Viin'-wlu: mo-: 'worn-eh: 'de 'Wlema-gwlor. :Wlechor'-a 'vin-' or-a'a: 'nynuu-a' dhih, 'de or :se-' 'bhorn, nyor 'ye-or' :porluh 'di dih dhe. Deh no-eh, on 'meh-', on :se-' 'ye-eh: i :neheh'.
:Yee' :yeh 'Keen :Hehlo' 'meh-a, :yee' :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'enjor :due', or-: :yi-dih: 'Joseh 'dlu bo 'de 'nyinor-', ti or :ne-a 'de 'Iye-bluhba ken,
or 'dae:, :Sorn-', 'duo: 'yu-yu-: :korn or 'de-: a 'ye 'de 'Ezlea-bluhba ken de mu. Deh no-eh, nyor⧾ :an 'bhorn-a 'yu-a' 'dba-a' :dee', on 'meh-'.
'De 'Joseh :sorn-', or 'duo: 'yu-yu-: :korn or 'de-:-'. 'De on mu 'Ezlea-bluhba ken de.

:Yee' 'Joseh 'worn-ih' :ka 'Akele'ya :sie:-a 'o or :baa' 'Keen :Hehlo'-a' kpala' 'i 'de :Judi'a. :Yeh or 'worn-ih'-a, :yee' :fano-a: no-or, or 'ye 'de mu. :Yee' Nyorsoa 'dhu-or 'slen 'de 'nyinor-', 'de or mu 'de :Galali'i-bluhba ken.
Or 'ti 'o :gwlor an 'da-dih-a 'Nazla. :Yee' :Gwlor :baa'-a' wlu 'kpa-' dhih 'jeh :ka or-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor⧾ no-a eh-a' :za-a' see, on no-a, An mu-or 'Nazla-yu 'da-dih:.
'Do ti-a' 'jeh :dao' 'di, :yee' 'yu :due' an 'da-dih-a nyor⧾ 'ni 'dlu :po :Jororn', or-: mu 'de :Judi'a-a' :bhehneh'-bluhba ken, 'de or po Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu⧾,
or 'dae:, A 'tali: a-a' deh⧾-zon⧾ dih, 'de a 'ye 'de Nyorsoa bo 'bili:. Deh no-eh, Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh 'koan'-: bo.

:Jororn' :daa, or-: :korn dhih :oo', Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor: :Azaya' :za-a-', or 'dae:, Nyor :daa, or 'wor-' 'de :bhehneh'-bluhba ken, or 'dae:, A po :Gwlor :baa'-a' :gwie 'kpa 'do or bo o. A po or-a' :gwie 'kpa, a 'ye-eh' 'i 'sleh-dih:, or 'ye-eh' bo :na.
'Tiei: :Jororn' pa-', :kpuan' ken :soo'-a' 'pibi:, me-: on :no-dih-ih, 'de or bla deh-ku 'gben-'. :Yee' :kpamu'⧾-: duh-ni-: me-: no or-a'a: dii-deh⧾.
'De :gwlor-nyor⧾-a mu 'de or bo, an 'wluh :Julu'slehn-: :korn :Judi'a-bluhba-a' klehkpeh ken dih-:. 'De :noo' 'wluh 'Jorle-ni worn dih.
An za an-a' 'jeh-a' deh⧾-zon⧾ gbor, 'de or po-uh 'ni 'dlu 'do 'Jorle-ni worn.

Jorwor: :yeh or 'ye-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' kpor⧾ an 'da-dih-a :Falasi'i-: 'dekorn: :Sayusi'i-: an-a' nyor⧾ :dhulu', an yi-a 'de or bo, on 'ye-a' 'ni 'dlu :po, :yee' or :wlu-' 'de on bo, or 'dae:, A :mor sane-zon⧾-nynuu: :daa, :or 'dhu a 'slen, a 'ye ple, a 'ye Nyorsoa-a' 'chehn-yuba: :or yi-a 'de, 'zorn 'wluh-dih: :eh?
A no deh⧾, nyor⧾ 'ye a 'ye, :ka a 'tali:-a a-a' deh⧾-zon⧾ dih, 'de a 'bili:-a-' dih 'de Nyorsoa bo.

:Yee' a-a' :na-dih-eh:-' :gwluhuh' dih, :eh :mor a :mor 'Eble'hehn 'di-a' 'nynuu: 'o :dhih 'o, eh-: :korn dhih a mu 'puh-:. A 'nyi 'on zela: a :gwluhuh', Nyorsoa 'beh-dih: sobu'⧾ :kpuan'⧾ :daa en-' no-a' 'weh, en 'ye 'Eble'hehn 'di-a' 'nynuu-' 'dhu-eh:.
:Dhoeh' :dhe-eh: yai' :naa, eh 'ye tu⧾ :en :se-a' 'bi 'jeh :tlo i, en-' glubuh⧾ chehn. Tu⧾-a' klehkpeh :en :se-a' 'bi 'jeh :tlo i, en mu :dba-eh:, 'de en 'ye 'de neh-' :po-eh:.

'An po a 'ni 'dlu 'weh, 'de a 'ye a-a' deh⧾-zon⧾ dih 'tali:, 'de a 'ye 'de Nyorsoa bo 'bili:. Jorwor: nyor :or mu-a 'on ken dih :yi, or-a' dhih 'beh-: 'i, or :zi 'o 'on-'. 'On se deh-' 'dhu-eh: 'on 'ye or-a'a: :buhbuh:⧾ :sloror' kwa 'gba 'do or bo. Jorwor: Gban 'i :ne :Zulu-: 'dekorn: neh-: me-: or mu 'o a 'dlu :po.

Or 'ble or-a'a: 'daba: 'de or 'kwa, or 'ye deh⧾-yor: or sonor:-a, or-a' klehkpeh-' vun. :Yee' :yor or vun-a-', or mu-or :dha :due' :po, 'de or 'bli 'gbu-a' yai'. Jorwor: or-a' fluh⧾, me-: or mu 'yli :po, 'de neh-a' :yeh se-a 'mo-a' :korn.
:Yee' :Yusu' 'wluh 'de :Galali'i-bluhba ken, 'de or mu 'de :Jororn' bo 'Jorle-ni worn 'i, :Jororn' 'ye-or' 'ni 'dlu :po.
Jorwor: :Jororn' 'bhorn or 'ye-or' 'borboa' 'i po, or 'dae:, :Mor :korn :or 'ye 'on 'ni 'dlu :po, :yee' :an yi 'noror 'on bo, 'on 'ye :on 'ni 'dlu :po :e?
:Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' :Yusu' 'dae:, 'Ka-: eh :korn eh 'ye :ne :naa. Deh no-eh, :a :korn :a 'ye deh⧾-a' klehkpeh Nyorsoa 'bhorn-a no. 'De or 'worn-dih-eh ken dih, or :po :Yusu' 'ni 'dlu.

:Yee' 'do :dha :due' 'jeh :dao', :yeh :Jororn' po-a :Yusu' 'ni 'dlu, 'de :Yusu' 'wluh-a 'o 'nior, 'do :wor 'o yao kan-dih: worn, 'de or 'ye Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu:, :on gweh-a pabu', mo-: 'wluh 'de yai', mo-: :dhe 'o or 'dlu dih.
'De wlu 'wluh 'de Nyorsoa 'bli yai', on 'dae:, 'An-a: :dhih :kma-yu: 'o, or-: :dhe dih. 'An :porluh 'pehn-: dih 'do or bo.
:Yee' Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu kpa :Yusu' 'de :bhehneh'-bluhba ken, 'de 'ku 'ye-or' dih 'dhen, or 'ye deh-zon no.
'De :Yusu' pa 'suehn-', 'do zorn-we-a' :kwlaa :nyieh-: :korn glu-we-a' :kwlaa :nyieh-: 'di. :Yee' 'moeh: no-or :blaa'a:.
:Yee' 'ku :on no-a nyor⧾-' dih 'dhen-nyor, mo-: yi 'de or bo, on 'dae:, :Mor :on 'dhu Nyorsoa-a' 'Yu-', :yee' :wlu 'de sobu'⧾ :daa bo, en 'ye 'bhlee: :kpuan'⧾-' :za-dih:.

'De :Yusu' 'da, Eh 'chle-eh:-' 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh 'di, eh 'da, :Gwlor-nyor se dii-deh :due'-a' 'kmo-' :ne-dih-eh 'beh-dih:, jorwor: wlu-a' klehkpeh :on 'wluh-a 'de Nyorsoa 'worn, mo-: or 'beh-dih: 'kmo :ne-dih-eh.
:Yee' 'ku kpa-or 'de :Julu'slehn: :or no-a gban 'i :ne gwlor 'di. 'De on :nyna-dih-or dih 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'sla-a' 'kpehehn 'i.

'De on 'da, :Mor :on 'dhu Nyorsoa-a' 'Yu-', :yee' po :an-a' 'jeh 'zorn. Deh no-eh, eh 'chle-eh:-' 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh 'di, eh 'da, Or mu or-a'a: 'enjor-nyor⧾ 'tele' 'nyi-: 'do :an-a' dhih bo, 'de on 'ye :on 'sa 'de on 'kwa, 'de :an-a' buh :ne-' sobu' 'i kor.
'De :Yusu' 'da, Eh 'chle-eh:-' :neheh', eh 'da, Nyor-a' 'dhen :an-a' :Gwlor :baa' Nyorsoa-' dih.
'De 'ku 'duo-or :neheh', on kpa-or 'de tluh :dhorno' ken. 'De on :torne-or 'bluhba⧾-dlu⧾-a' klehkpeh :en :ne-a dha yao 'zorn-: 'dekorn: en-' 'yi dih :nmor-eh-a' klehkpeh-:.
'De on 'da, Deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :daa, me-: 'an mu :on 'nyi-:, :mor eh 'dhu, :on bla 'koor-dlu⧾ 'yi glu, 'do 'on 'zorn, 'de :on 'ye 'on :weheh' :za.

'De :Yusu' :wlu 'de on bo, or 'dae:, 'Wluh :daa 'on ybei', 'ku. Deh no-eh, eh 'chle-eh:-' 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh 'di, eh 'da, :An-a' :Gwlor :baa' Nyorsoa, or-: :on 'ye :weheh' :za, :yee' or :due', or-: :korn 'bhoi-yu-deh: :on 'ye no.
:Yee' 'ku 'tali-or-: dih, on 'wluh 'o or ybei', 'de 'enjor-nyor⧾ 'yle, on :za-dih-or'.
:Yee' :Yusu' 'worn-ih' :ka on po-a :Jororn' :kasue 'di. 'De or 'wluh :Judi'a-bluhba ken, or mu 'de :Galali'i-bluhba ken.
'Do :wor or :jla-dih: 'Nazla-gwlor-', 'de or mu :Kapa'nior-gwlor: 'ti 'da, :or :ne-a 'de :Galali'i-yobo'-pehnu worn 'i, 'de 'Zehbilor-: 'dekorn: 'Natali-: 'de an-a'a: 'bluhba-a' 'for bo.
Deh :daa, eh :no-eh:-' 'de Nyorsoa-a' wlu 'ye dhih 'jeh-' 'kpa, :ka or-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor: :Azaya' no-a eh-a' :za-a' see, or no-a,

'Zehbilor-bluhba-: 'Natali-bluhba-: 'bluhba-dlu: :or :ne-a 'noror :gwie 'i 'de yobo' worn 'i-: 'bluhba-dlu: :or :ne-a 'de 'Jorle-ni-a' 'yluh-a' 'kwla 'wluh-dih: 'da-: 'dekorn: :Galali'i-bluhba-a' :yor, nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor:⧾, on 'ti-a ken-:
nyor⧾ :daa :on 'ti-a 'de :kule-' :dee', mo-: 'ye zorn-pli: :klaba'. :Yuh :on :dhe-a dih 'de 'meh-a' :kule-', mo-: zorn-pli-a fan-dih ken dih.

:Eh 'wluh-a 'o ti :dao' 'di, :yee' :Yusu'-a po Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu⧾ 'weh, or 'dae:, A 'tali: a-a' deh⧾-zon⧾ dih, 'de a 'ye 'de Nyorsoa bo 'bili:. Deh no-eh, Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh 'koan'-: bo.

:Yee' :Yusu'-a na-dih :Galali'i-yobo'-pehnu worn dih. 'Do :wor or 'ye-dih: 'de-di'-boi' 'sororn', Samor' an 'da-dih-a :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: or-a' dei' Andlu'-: mo-: :an po sor 'do 'ni worn 'i. Deh no-eh, on no zimi: 'dba-nyor:⧾.
:Yeh or :yeh-dih-uh-a ken, :yee' or :wlu-' 'de on bo, or 'dae:, A 'yle. A zi 'o 'on klei'. 'An mu-eh :no, a 'ye nyor⧾ 'de Nyorsoa bo :ya-nyor⧾ no, :eh :zi 'o zimi: :kpon-eh-'.
:Yee' 'do :dha :due' 'jeh :dao', on 'pehn-dih: an-a'a: sor⧾-: dih, 'de on zi 'o or klei'.

:Yeh on 'ken-dih:-a 'o dih :neheh', :yee' or 'ye 'de-di'-boi' 'sororn' :noo', 'Jeen-: 'dekorn: or-a' dei' :Jororn'-: :on no-a :Zehbehli'-a'a: 'nynuu, :yee' on :ne on :baa' :Zehbehli', an 'pa an-a'a: sor⧾ 'de 'blagbe 'di. :Yeh :Yusu' 'ye-uh'-a, :yee' or 'da-uh' on 'ye 'o or klei' zi.
:Yee' 'do :dha :due' 'jeh :dao', on sie 'blagbe-: 'dekorn: on :baa'-: 'weh, 'de on zi 'o or klei'.

:Yee' :Yusu'-a na :Galali'i-bluhba-a' klehkpeh ken dih, 'de or torne nyor⧾ deh⧾, 'de an-a' 'di :gweh-dih-sla⧾ 'zorn dih, 'de or po tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh, :en kor-a Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh 'i, or 'puh-dih nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on 'ble-a puhba-deh:⧾ 'doror: 'dor-: 'dekorn: :nea-nyor:⧾ :on :ne-a nyor⧾ 'nyne bo dih-:.

Eh-: no-eh, 'de or-a' 'nyne gweh 'de 'Silia-bluhba ken-a' klehkpeh 'dlu, 'de an ya 'de or bo nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on 'ble-a puhba-deh:⧾ 'doror: 'dor, nyor⧾ :yuh puhba-deh⧾-a :nee' :nee'-a 'ye-dih-a 'kle-: nyor⧾ :yuh 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh⧾-a 'beh-dih-a 'worn dih-: 'dlu-deh-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: 'tiei-a' 'meheh'-nyor⧾-: 'de or 'puh-dih-uh.

:Gwlor-nyor:⧾ :doru', mo-: 'wluh :Galali'i-bluhba ken-: 'bluhba-a' 'for :or :ne-a Gwlor⧾ :bhue: an 'da-dih-a :Deka'poli 'de dih-: :Julu'slehn-: :Judi'a-bluhba ken-: 'dekorn: 'bluhba-a' 'for :or :ne-a 'de 'Jorle-ni-a' 'yluh-a' 'kwla 'wluh-dih: 'da worn dih-: an-a' klehkpeh :daa, mo-: :an zi 'o or klei'.
:Yee' :yeh :Yusu' 'ye-a :gwlor-nyor:⧾ :doru' :dao', :yee' or mu 'de tluh ken, 'de or :dhe dih. 'De or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾ yi 'o or bo,
'de or 'dhu an-a' deh :torne-eh glu, or 'dae:,
:Bhorlie' 'do nyor⧾ :on se-a an-a' 'jeh-a' 'kpih :gwlii' dhe, 'de :on dhe-a Nyorsoa :gwlii'. Deh no-eh, mo-: Nyorsoa :korn wlu 'ken :naa.
:Bhorlie' 'do nyor⧾ :an 'zlu-a :naa bo. Deh no-eh, an mu :porluh⧾ 'di dih :dhe-eh:.
:Bhorlie' 'do nyor⧾ 'yi 'beh :zulu se-a-' :ne. Deh no-eh, an mu :bhorlie'-a' klehkpeh Nyorsoa 'da-a or mu-a on 'nyi-:, 'ye-:.
:Bhorlie' 'do nyor⧾ :on :korn-a :porluh⧾-a sin-a 'do 'yi 'sleh-deh⧾-a' no-a' bo 'gabaa. Deh no-eh, Nyorsoa-a mu an-a' :porluh⧾ dih 'pehn-dih:, 'do eh-a' dhih bo.
:Bhorlie' 'do :wehlih: :korn-nyor⧾ bo. Deh no-eh, Nyorsoa-a mu an-a' :wehlih 'ye-:.
:Bhorlie' 'do nyor⧾ :on :korn-a :porluh⧾ :gweh-a :vlehehn'-' bo. Deh no-eh, an mu Nyorsoa-a' 'yuba 'ye-:.
:Bhorlie' 'do nyor⧾ :on no-a nyor⧾ 'yi zela-nyor⧾ bo. Deh no-eh, an mu Nyorsoa-a' 'nynuu 'da-dih-eh:.
:Bhorlie' 'do nyor⧾ an 'ye-dih-a 'kle, 'do Nyorsoa-a' 'yi 'sleh-deh⧾-a' dhih bo. Deh no-eh, mo-: Nyorsoa :korn wlu 'ken :naa.
:Bhorlie' 'do a bo, :mor nyor⧾ :taa a 'jle-dih, :mor on :taa a 'kle 'ye-dih, 'de :mor on :taa a 'kulu-dhih-a' 'doror: 'dor ken dih 'dhu-dih, 'do 'an dhih bo.

:Yee' a 'kpa 'mona-', a 'ye :porluh-a' dih 'pehn-eh 'ble. Deh no-eh, geli' :za-dih-deh: 'kawehn:, eh-: a 'ble, 'de Nyorsoa 'bli yai'. 'Ka-: 'o on no Nyorsoa-a' :zai'-wele-eh: :po-nyor⧾-a' 'kle 'ye-dih-eh :ke.

:Yee' a :mor 'dhu 'bluhba-a' 'torn-'. Jorwor: :mor 'torn :gweh worn, :yee' :eh mu-or 'torn-' :no :neheh' :eh? :Yee' deh-beh:, eh-: or :se-' 'dhu-eh: :neheh'. Deh :due' on 'ye-or'-' :no-dih:, eh-: 'dhu, or-a' 'bluhbor: :po-eh, nyor⧾ 'ye-or' ken dih :na.
A :mor 'dhu 'bluhba-a' zorn-pli-'. :Yee' :gwlor :klaba' :ne-a 'o tluh 'dlu, or se 'zile-eh :korn.
'De :mor eh 'dhu, nyor tba 'nape, :yee' or :se-eh' 'de :yabe 'zorn :po i. Jorwor: or dhe-eh :dha eh :korn-a dih, 'de eh 'ye nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a 'de 'gbu, zorn-pli 'nyi.
'Ka-: 'o eh :ne, a 'nyi a-a' zorn-pli fan 'do :gwlor-nyor⧾ ybei', 'de on 'ye a-a' noo-deh:⧾ 'jeh 'ye, 'de on 'ye a :Baa' :or :ne-a 'de yai'-a' 'nyne dhih-a' 'i 'beh-a' 'nyi.

:Yee' a-a' :na-dih-eh' :gwluhuh' dih, :eh :mor 'on yi :Mose'-a' 'tele'-: 'dekorn: Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor⧾-a' nyor⧾ deh :torne-eh-: ya :gba 'da. 'On :se 'de yi 'on 'ye-ih ya gba. Jorwor: 'on yi-: 'de, 'on 'ye-ih 'dlu 'yi-dih:.
Dhih 'jeh, 'an zela a :gwluhuh', 'tele' :daa, eh-a' deh-beh-deh-beh :se-' :zi i, 'de 'bluhba-: yao-: en 'ye 'dlu-' :jla, 'de deh⧾-a' klehkpeh 'ye dhih 'jeh-' 'kpa.

Eh-a' dhih, nyor-beh-nyor-beh: :or wa-a 'tele' :daa, eh-a' deh-beh, 'de :or torne-eh nyor⧾ :noo', on 'ye-a' deh-a' 'jeh :dao' no, :yee' an mu-or 'yu-yu 'da-dih: ti Nyorsoa-a mu-a nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-dih:. Jorwor: nyor-beh: :or mu-a 'o 'tele'-a' klehkpeh :daa dih :dhe, 'de :or mu-eh nyor⧾ :torne:, :yee' an mu-or nyor :klaba' 'da-dih: 'do ti :dao' bo.

Eh-a' dhih, 'an zela a :gwluhuh', a :korn a 'ye 'yi 'sleh-kplen no, a 'ye 'o :Falasi'i-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ 'tele' :torne-nyor⧾-' :zi. :Mor eh 'dhu, a se-eh no, :yee' a 'se 'ba Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh 'zorn pa.

:Yee' :Yusu'-a kpa or-a' wlu 'dlu bo, or 'dae:, A 'worn-eh' :mloror' :zai', :ka on no-a eh-a' :za-a' 'de nyor⧾ bo :dee' see, :eh 'dhu-a, Nyor-a' 'dba-:-' nyor, 'de nyor-beh: :or 'dba-a nyor, :yee' or-a' zabe :korn en 'ye :zi-eh:.

Jorwor: 'an zela a :gwluhuh', nyor-beh-nyor-beh: :or 'kpa-dih:-a or-a' 'de-di' 'chehn-', :yee' or-a' zabe-a mu :zi-eh:. :Yee' :neheh', nyor-beh: :or :gbo-a 'de or-a' 'de-di' 'yli, :or no-a, :An-a' 'yi dih :nmor-deh no 'plo, :yee' nyor :dao', an mu-or 'o :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' zabe: :zi-nyor:⧾ :klaba'⧾ ybei' :kpa. 'De nyor-beh: :or 'da-dih-a or-a' 'de-di' :bobo-nyor, :yee' or na 'de 'ku 'bli-neh-a' :mu-eh 'worn dih.
'Do eh-a' dha, :mor eh 'dhu :on :taa :an-a'a: 'slaa: :za-dih-deh kpa, 'do Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa ken :za-dih-deh ken, 'de :an-a' 'de-di' 'ye :on 'di dih 'ble-dih:, 'de :on 'ye-eh' :gwluhuh' bo :po-dih:,
:yee' sie-eh 'o 'slaa ken :za-dih-deh ybei', 'de :on 'ye 'de or bo mu, a 'ye wlu-' dih 'worn-eh: :zai', 'de :on 'ye de yi, :on 'ye :an-a'a: 'nyii'-deh :to.

:Yee' mor-: 'dekorn: :an-a'a: dhih 'ble-nyor-: a 'woorn-dih: wlu-' dih :dueh'leh: 'do :gwie 'i, :mor or :taa 'de :on 'koti-' kpa, 'de or :ne-' :on 'kwla :za, 'de zabe: :zi-nyor bo, 'de zabe: :zi-nyor :ne-' :on :poli'si-yu 'kwla :za-dih:, 'de or :ne-' :on :kasue 'di po.
Dhih 'jeh, 'an zela a :gwluhuh', :on 'se 'ba 'de :kasue 'di :dao' 'wluh :chio'lo:, :on 'ye :de 'bor-dih-kaba-yor-eh kpa, 'de :on 'ye 'de eh 'di 'wluh.
:Yee' a 'worn-eh' :mloror' :ka on no-a eh-a' :za-a', Nyor-a' :no-' 'nyne :zaan'.
Jorwor: 'an zela a :gwluhuh', :ka nyor-beh: :or pobo:-a 'nynor ken dih :kao', 'de 'bhorn-a' ka 'di, :yee' or 'bhorn-or' klehkpeh 'do or-a' :porluh ken :weh.

:Yee' :mor eh 'dhu, :an-a' :dila-yli-eh no-eh, 'de :on 'ye deh-zon no, :yee' za-eh 'de, :on 'ye-eh' 'kwla po. Eh :nmor-: 'yi :on 'ye deh :due' 'ma-dih: 'do :on 'bhun, :eh :zi 'o :an-a' yau-a' klehkpeh 'ye 'i gba, 'de :on 'ye 'de 'ku 'bli :po-eh:.

:Yee' :mor eh 'dhu, :an-a' :dila-son no-eh, 'de :on 'ye deh-zon no, :yee' chehn-uh 'o, :on 'ye-uh' 'kwla po. Eh :nmor-: 'yi :on 'ye deh :due' 'ma-dih: 'do :on 'bhun, :eh :zi 'o :an-a' yau-a' klehkpeh 'ye 'i gba, 'de on 'ye 'de 'ku 'bli mu.
:Yee' eh :za-eh:-' 'weh see, :ka :mor nyor-beh :taa or-a'a: 'nynor 'kwla za, :yee' or :korn or 'ye-or' 'kwla :za-chlee-deh 'nyi.

Jorwor: 'an zela a :gwluhuh', nyor-beh-nyor-beh: :or mu-a or-a'a: 'nynor 'kwla :za, :mor eh 'dhu, 'nynor se 'nyne :zaan' no 'do or bo, :yee' or no-eh', 'de 'nynor no 'nyne :zaan', :mor or 'ti nyor :noror' 'bli. :Yee' nyor-beh: :or mu-a 'nynor :or :za-eh 'kwla :korn, :yee' or no 'nyne :zaan' :ke.
:Yee' :neheh' a 'worn-eh' :mloror' :zai' :ka on no-a eh-a' :za-a' 'de nyor⧾ bo :dee' see, :eh 'dhu-a, Deh :korn-wlu a po-a :dhama'-', 'do :Gwlor :baa' ybei', a :korn a 'ye-eh' no :gbor :gbor.
Jorwor: 'an zela a :gwluhuh', :mor a po wlu :dhama'-', :yee' a 'bor deh⧾ ken :zlehn-dih-eh klehkpeh klehkpeh, :eh beh 'de Nyorsoa 'bli yai'-: deh no-eh, 'de no Nyorsoa-a' 'keen :kpala',
:eh beh 'noror yao 'zorn-: deh no-eh, 'noror no Nyorsoa-a' buh⧾ ken dih :tba-deh:, :eh beh 'de :Julu'slehn-: deh no-eh, :Julu'slehn no :gwlor :klaba' 'do 'keen :klaba' bo.
'De mor :an-a' :zlehn-dih:-' :an-a' 'dlu ken :ke, deh no-eh, :on se 'mii-eh :due' :sloror'-a' 'jeh :kpe-dih-eh 'beh-dih:, 'de mor :on se eh-a' 'plu-dih-eh 'beh-dih: :ke.
'Do eh-a' dha, a 'nyi a-a' keen' no keen'. :Yee' a 'nyi a-a' 'kei no 'kei. :Mor a :za-dih: 'o deh :neheh', :yee' eh 'wluh 'de 'ku bo.
:Yee' a 'worn-eh' :mloror' :ka eh :za-eh:-', :eh no-a, 'Yli-eh :korn 'de 'yli-eh bo, 'de 'nyne-eh :korn 'de 'nyne-eh bo.
Jorwor: 'an zela a :gwluhuh', a-a' :za-' kpa 'do nyor⧾ :an no-a deh⧾-zon⧾ 'do a bo. Jorwor: :mor nyor tba :an-a' :dila-gea 'kpa, :yee' :to 'o 'for-a' 'sororn' nor :ke.
:Yee' :mor eh 'dhu, nyor-beh 'bhorn or 'ye :on 'koti-' po, 'de or 'ye :an-a'a: 'wla kpa, :yee' 'nyi :an-a'a: 'korlor, or-uh :ke.
:Mor eh 'dhu, nyor :kpa-dih: :on 'kpih, :on 'ye-or' :gwie 'i kpa, :on 'ye-or' :gwie-' 'kplo :due' :na-dih:, :yee' :na-dih-or :gwie-' 'kplo⧾ 'sororn'.
:Mor nyor :zlor deh 'de :on bo, :yee' 'nyi-eh or. :Yee' :mor nyor 'yba-dih: :on deh, or 'ye-eh' de :ya, :yee' :an-a' :no-' 'kei.
:Yee' a 'worn-eh' :ka eh :za-eh:-', :eh no-a, :Ybeh nyor⧾ :on :ne 'ti-a :dha :due', :yee' 'nyeh :yuh :on 'nyeh-a :on-'.
Jorwor: 'an zela a :gwluhuh', a :ybeh nyor⧾ :on 'nyeh-a a-uh'. :Yee' a :wlu 'de Nyorsoa bo, 'do :yuh :an 'ye-dih-a a 'kle, 'do an-a' dhih bo,

'de a 'ye a :Baa' :or :ne-a 'de yai', or-a'a: 'nynuu-' 'dhu-eh:. Deh no-eh, or no-eh' 'de or-a'a: 'yluh-a fan-dih deh⧾-zon:⧾ :no-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ 'jeh-: ken dih. 'De or dbo 'ni, eh dba-dih 'yi 'sleh-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: se 'yi 'sleh-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh-:.
:Mor eh 'dhu, a :ybeh nyor⧾ :on :ybeh-a a-uh', :yee' geli' :za-dih-deh-a' :yeheh a mu 'ye 'de Nyorsoa bo :eh? Eh se :ka 'taa-deh:⧾ :za-nyor:⧾ :sloror'-a' 'jeh-a no-a :ke :e?
:Yee' :mor eh 'dhu, a :gble-dih: a-a' 'de-di'-boi' :ne :due', :yee' deh a no :naa :eh 'ye 'o nyor⧾ :noo' :zi :eh? Eh :se :ka se Nyorsoa yubo-nyor:⧾ :sloror'-a' 'jeh-a no-a :ke :e?
'Do eh-a' dha, a :mor :mloror', a :korn a 'ye 'yi 'sleh-nyor⧾ no, :ka a :Baa' :or :ne-a 'de yai', or :ne-a :ke.

:Yee' :Yusu'-a kpa or-a' wlu 'dlu bo, or 'dae:, A 'wla :gwluhuh' dih, 'de a :ne-' a-a'a: 'yi 'sleh-kplen no, 'do :gwlor-nyor⧾ ybei', 'de on :ne-ih' 'ye. :Mor a no-eh, :yee' a :se-' geli' :za-dih-deh 'ye-: i, 'do a :Baa' :or ne-a 'de yai' bo.

'Do eh-a' dhih, :mor :on :taa se deh-a' :za-da 'ble-nyor deh 'nyi, :an-a' 'dhu-:-' eh-a' :gamu worn 'i, :ka nyor⧾ :an 'ye-a nyor⧾-a' 'yli, an no-a, 'de 'di :gweh-dih-sla⧾ 'zorn dih-: 'kpa :gwie⧾ bo dih-: an 'bhorn-a :ka nyor⧾ 'ye-uh'-a' dhih bo po. Dhih 'jeh, 'an zela a :gwluhuh', on 'ye an-a'a: geli' :za-dih-deh⧾-a' klehkpeh 'weh.
Jorwor: :mor :mloror', :mor :on :taa se deh-a' :za-da 'ble-nyor deh 'nyi, :an-a' kona-son-a' yubo:-' deh :an-a' :dila-son-a no-a,
'de eh 'ye deh :on 'nyi-a se deh-a' :za-da 'ble-nyor, eh 'ye 'slan-' 'dhu-eh:. :Yee' :on :Baa' :or 'ye-a deh⧾ :en :no-eh 'de 'slan-', or-: mu :on geli' :za.

:Yee' :mor a :taa 'de Nyorsoa bo wlu, a-a' :no-' nyor⧾ :an 'ye-a nyor⧾-a' 'yli, an-a' deh. Deh no-eh, mo-: :ybeh-eh on 'ye dih :nyna, 'de on 'ye Nyorsoa bo :wlu 'de 'di :gweh-dih-sla⧾ 'zorn dih :gbor, 'dekorn: 'kpa :gwie⧾-a' 'gbaen' bo dih-: 'de :ka nyor⧾ 'ye-uh'-a' 'ye. Dhih 'jeh, 'an zela a :gwluhuh', on 'ye an-a'a: geli' :za-dih-deh⧾-a' klehkpeh 'weh.

Jorwor: :mor :mloror', :mor :on :taa 'de Nyorsoa bo wlu, pa 'de :on 'bli :chuu 'di, po 'o :an-a' :kpaa', 'de :on 'ye 'de :on :Baa' nyor-a' 'ye-a, bo :wlu. :Yee' :on :Baa' :or 'ye-a deh⧾ :en :no-eh 'de 'slan-', or-: mu :on geli' :za.

:Yee' :mor a :taa 'de Nyorsoa bo wlu, a-a' :po-' :dhlumeh' 'plo :eh se-a deh-' 'dhu-eh: :eh zela deh :ne-a :due' bo :zelaa:, :eh gweh-a :ka se Nyorsoa yubo-nyor⧾, an-a' dhih :ne-a. Deh no-eh, :mor on :taa 'ye, :yee' on 'da Nyorsoa-a mu an-a' wlu⧾ :dhulu' :dao' 'worn-: :deh.
A-a' :gweh-' nyor⧾ :dao'. Deh no-eh, a :Baa' yubo: deh a se-a 'ble 'weh, 'de a mu-or dih dhele-dih:.
'Ka-: a 'ye a-a' Nyorsoa bo :wlu-eh no, :A :Baa' :or :ne-a 'de yai', Deh-' 'ye-eh: 'do :an-a' gban 'i :ne-nyne bo.
'Nyi :an-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh 'yle. :Ka nyor⧾ :ne-a 'de :on 'bli yai' no-a :an-a' 'ton :korn-deh, :yee' 'ka-: eh 'ye :no-eh: dha yao 'zorn.
'Nyi :a 'zean'-we-eh-a' dii-deh.
'Ma-dih: :a-a' deh⧾-zon⧾-a' dhih bo, :ka :a 'ma-dih:-a deh⧾-zon:⧾ :a 'bei' no-a 'do :a 'bhun, en-' dhih bo :ke.

:An-a' :kpa-dih:-' 'de :a dih 'dhen-eh bo. 'De mor :an-a' 'worn-:-' 'ku-a' :no-dih:-' :a deh-'. [ Deh no-eh, :mor no 'keen :or :korn-a nyor⧾ wlu 'ken, 'do 'kpih-: 'dekorn: dhih-a' 'i 'beh-a'-: 'di, :ka ti-a mu-a 'dlu-' :tehn. 'Ka-: eh 'ye :ne.]
:Yee' :mor eh 'dhu, nyor no a deh-zon 'bhun, 'de a 'ye eh-a' dhih bo 'ma-dih:, :yee' a :Baa' :or :ne-a 'de yai', or mu a-a' deh⧾-zon⧾-a' dhih bo 'ma-dih: :ke.
Jorwor: :mor a se deh⧾-zon:⧾ a 'bei' no-a 'do a 'bhun, en-' dhih bo 'ma-dih:, :yee' a :Baa' :se-' a-a' deh⧾-zon⧾-a' dhih bo 'ma-dih: i :ke.

:Yee' :Yusu'-a kpa or-a' wlu 'dlu bo, or 'dae:, :Mor a :taa 'suehn-' pa, :yee' a-a' 'ble-:-' :wehlih-yuba :ka nyor⧾ :an 'ye-a nyor⧾-a' 'yli, an no-a. Deh no-eh, nyor⧾ :dao', :mor on :taa 'suehn-' pa, :yee' an-a' 'slan 'i. An 'bhorn nyor⧾ 'ye-uh' 'ye, :ka an pa-a 'suehn-'. Dhih 'jeh, 'an zela a :gwluhuh', on 'ye an-a'a: geli' :za-dih-deh⧾-a' klehkpeh 'weh.
Jorwor: :mor eh 'dhu, :on :taa 'suehn-' pa, :yee' 'slan 'i, 'de :on 'ye 'chlan 'dlu :po.

'De :ka eh :ne-a' nyor⧾-a' 'yli 'ye ka gweh, :ka :an pa-a 'suehn-'. Jorwor: 'nyi :on :Baa' nyor-a' 'ye-a, :ne :due', or yubo-eh. :Mor eh no :ao', :yee' :on :Baa' :or 'ye-a deh⧾ :en :no-eh 'de 'slan-', or-: mu :on geli' :za.
:Yee' a-a' 'gola:-' a-a'a: bhaan-deh⧾ dih dha yao 'zorn, 'do a-a' 'jeh bo. Dha :wor 'gbomor⧾-: gani'-: en :ne, en 'kor-dih deh⧾. Dha-a' 'jeh :wor 'ylii'-nyor⧾ :ne, an wa 'gbu⧾, an 'yli deh⧾.

Jorwor: a no 'de Nyorsoa 'bli yai', a-a'a: bhaan-deh⧾ dih :dhe 'da, 'do :wor 'gbomor⧾-: gani'-: en se :ne, en 'ye deh 'kor-dih:, 'de mor 'ylii'-nyor⧾ 'i-a' 'jeh se 'de :ne, on 'ye 'gbu⧾ wa, on 'ye deh 'yli.
Deh no-eh, 'do :dha :an-a'a: bhaan-deh⧾ :ne-a, 'do :wor :an-a' :porluh-a mu :ne :ke.
:Yee' 'yli-eh:, eh-: 'dhu yau-a' 'nape-'. :Mor :an-a' 'yli :nmor 'yi dih, :yee' :an-a' yau-a' klehkpeh mu zorn-pli-' dih 'yi-dih:.

Jorwor: :mor eh 'dhu, :an-a' 'yli se 'yi dih :nmor, :yee' :an-a' yau-a' klehkpeh mu :kule-' dih 'yi-dih:. :Yee' :mor eh 'dhu, zorn-pli :ne-a 'de :on 'di, en :za-dih: :kule-', :yee' :kule-a' 'jeh :dao', eh 'beh-: 'i 'gabaa.

:Yee' eh se nyor :korn :or 'ye-a' nyor⧾ :klaba'⧾ 'sororn'-a' 'bhoi-yu no. :Mor or no-eh, :yee' or mu :due'-' 'nyeh-:, 'de or 'ye 'sororn' nor-' :ybeh. :Yee' or mu :due'-a' wlu deh-' 'ye-:, 'de or 'ye 'sororn' nor-a' dhih-' :vlehn. A se 'wlii-: 'dekorn: Nyorsoa-: an-a' :weheh' :za-eh 'beh-dih: 'do :dha :due'.

Eh-a' dhih, 'an zela a :gwluhuh', a-a' :porluh⧾ 'bor a 'worn dih 'beh-dih-eh 'do a-a' 'kmo :ne-eh-a' dhih, 'do deh a 'ye-a' di-: 'dekorn: deh a 'ye-a' 'na-: bo, 'de mor 'do a-a' yau-a' dhih 'do deh a 'ye-a'-' pa bo. Eh :se :febeh'-a' dhih se 'i 'beh, 'do dii-deh⧾ bo ke :e? 'De eh :se yau-a' dhih se 'i 'beh, 'do paa-deh⧾ bo ke :e?

A pobo: neme: :daa ya :en zi-dih-a-' dih 'de yai', :en-' 'dhu-a deh, 'de mor :en-' chehn-a :koo, :en-' 'dhu-a :koo yai'. Jorwor: a :Baa' :or :ne-a 'de yai', or 'nyi-ih dii-deh⧾ 'weh :gbor :gbor. A-a' dhih se 'i 'beh 'gabaa, 'do en ken ke :e?
A-a' nyor :yoror :or :korn :gwluhuh' dih :na-dih-eh-a' 'bleh 'bleh 'beh-dih: :eh 'ye 'o or-a' :febeh' ybei' kpa 'do 'yluh-buh :due' 'di :eh?

:Yee' :eh :korn dhih 'da, 'de a 'beh-dih a-a' 'jeh-a' :porluh⧾ 'worn dih 'do paa-deh⧾-a' dhih bo :eh? A pobo: :peli'-a' 'voma'e: :daa ya, :en :ne-a 'de 'kwla, :ka en no-a ku-a', 'de en-' no-a gle, en-' no-a paa-deh⧾.
Jorwor: 'an zela a :gwluhuh', 'Keen :Salomor'-a' 'jeh, ti or :ne-a 'de or-a' dhih-a' 'i 'beh-a' klehkpeh 'di, or :se-' paa-deh:⧾ :nmaa'e-' pa, en :se 'o :peli'-a' 'voma'e: :daa, en-' :due'-' :zi.

:Yee' :mor eh 'dhu, Nyorsoa :taa 'o 'kwla :peli'-a' deh⧾-' :pa-dih-eh no, :en 'dhu-a 'zean'-: :glaa'e-: deh-', :yee' on po-a 'yli, :yee' dha a mu :na-dih: :eh? :Yee' a :mor, or se deh-' :pa-dih-eh 'beh-dih: :e? A :mor :gwlor-nyor:⧾ :on :korn-a dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh se-a 'i 'beh.
Eh-a' dhih, a 'bor a-a' :porluh⧾-a' 'worn dih 'beh-dih-eh. A-a' :no-', Deh :a mu :di :eh? 'De mor a-a' :no-', Deh :a mu 'na-: :eh? 'De mor a-a' :no-', Deh :a mu-' :pa :eh?
Deh no-eh, deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :daa, me-: se Nyorsoa yubo-nyor⧾-a ple 'de, 'de a :Baa' :or :ne-a 'de yai', or yubo-eh' :ka a :korn-a a 'ye-a en-' klehkpeh 'ble.
Jorwor: a 'bhorn deh⧾ :en :korn-a 'de Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh-: :korn or-a' 'yi 'sleh :gwie-: 'kwla⧾-' dih :zai', :yee' deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :daa, :en :sie:-a 'o, or mu-ih a 'nyi-: :ke.

:Yee' eh-a' dhih, a 'bor a-a' :porluh⧾-a' 'worn dih 'beh-dih-eh 'do :glaa'e-a' dhih bo. Deh no-eh, :glaa'e-a mu eh-a' 'jeh-a' :porluh⧾-a' 'worn dih 'beh-dih-deh:⧾ :dhulu' 'ble-: 'do eh-a' 'jeh bo. 'We-a' klehkpeh, en 'ble en-' 'jeh-a' 'worn dih 'beh-dih-deh:⧾.
:Yee' :Yusu'-a kpa or-a' wlu 'dlu bo :chio'lo:, or 'dae:, A-a' :chehn-' a 'bei'-a' zabe 'i 'suh, 'de Nyorsoa :ne-' a-a' zabe zi :ke.
Deh no-eh, :ka a no-a a 'bei'-a' zabe-a' zi-a', 'ka-: Nyorsoa-a mu a-a' ne-a' zi-a' :no :ke. :Yee' :ka a no-a a 'bei'-a' ne-a' :yba-dih-eh, 'ka-: Nyorsoa-a mu a-a' ne-a' :yba-dih-eh :no :ke.
:Eh no 'de :an 'ye :gbehne-eh-yu :due' :ne-a 'de :an-a' 'de-di' 'yli-e :eh? Jorwor: tu 'kplo :yor :or :ne-a 'de :an-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh 'yli-e, :an-a' 'ye-or' :e?
:Yee' :kaa :on 'beh-dih: :on 'ye 'de or bo :wlu-eh no :eh? :On 'ye :ao', 'An 'de-di', 'yle, 'on 'ye :gbehne-eh 'de :on 'yli-e :za, :mor tu 'kplo :ne 'de :an-a' 'jeh-a' 'yli-e :eh?
:Mor nyor⧾-a' 'yli 'ye-nyor: :daa, :za 'de tu 'kplo :dao' 'de :an-a' 'jeh 'yli-e :zai', :yee' :an mu dih 'ye-: deh 'jeh, 'de :on 'ye :gbehne-eh-yu 'de :on 'be 'yli :za.

A-a' 'nyi-:-' gbe⧾ deh⧾ :en :ne-a gban 'i 'do Nyorsoa bo. :Mor a no-eh, en mu-' dih 'bili: en 'ye a dih :chehn-dih:. A-a' :po-' a-a'a: 'dhama-yor 'do :bee'⧾ ybei' dih. :Mor a no-eh, :yee' en mu-or ken dih :ye-dih:.
A 'yba-dih: Nyorsoa deh, :yee' a mu-eh 'ye-:. A 'bhorn-eh dih, :yee' a mu-eh 'ye-:. :Mor a bla :kpaa', :yee' or mu 'o 'wluh-: 'do a bo.
Deh no-eh, nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :an 'yba-dih-a Nyorsoa deh, an 'ye-eh'. :Yee' nyor :or 'bhorn-a deh dih, or 'ye-eh'. 'De mor nyor :or bla-a :kpaa', or mu 'o 'wluh-: 'do or bo.
'De a 'nyne-', nyor :yor-a' 'jeh, :or :korn 'yu-a mu-or 'bhlee 'yba-dih:, 'de :or 'ye-or' sobu' 'nyi :eh?
'De mor, :mor or-a'a: 'yu 'yba-dih-or zimi-eh, 'de :or 'ye-or' sehn 'nyi :eh?

'De mor :ka a-a' kplen-a' :yeh :nyni 'yi dih, a yubo: 'nyii'-deh:⧾ 'jeh, a 'ye-a' a-a'a: 'nynuu 'nyi 'weh, :yee' a :Baa' :yor :or :ne-a 'de yai', dha or mu :na-dih: 'do nyor⧾ :an 'yba-dih-or deh⧾ 'jeh, an-a' dhih bo :eh?
Deh a 'bhorn-a nyor⧾ 'ye-a' no 'do a bo, eh-a' 'jeh :dao', eh-: a 'ye no 'do nyor⧾ bo :ke. Eh-: :Mose'-a' 'tele'-: 'dekorn: Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor⧾-a' nyor⧾ deh :torne-eh-: en 'dhu-eh:-'.

:Yee' a :yi-dih: 'do gba-dih-gba-a' worn :yor se-a bo dih 'beh ka. Deh no-eh, gba-dih-gba :or 'beh-a 'worn dih, 'de mor :gwie: :eh :ne-a bo dih bhou, eh-a' :sie: 'da, :wor 'dhu gbe :zie: 'da-'. Gba-dih-gba-a' 'jeh :dao', or-: :gwlor-nyor:⧾ :doru'-a yi-dih 'o 'worn.
Jorwor: gba-dih-gba-a' worn, :or se-a bo dih 'beh-: 'dekorn: :gwie: :eh :kma-a 'i 'do kpa 'da-: me-: kpa nyor⧾ 'de 'kmo :sie: :febeh' bo. Eh-a' 'jeh :wor :gwlor-nyor⧾-kpor-a 'ye, 'de an kpa.
:Yee' a 'dhu a-a' 'jeh :dhororn', 'do sih 'tmo :wele-eh: :po-nyor:⧾ :an yi-a 'o a bo, 'de :on pa-a 'blae'⧾-a' ku⧾-', jorwor: :on 'ble-a ji⧾-a' :porluh⧾.
An-a' 'bi an mu-a :tlo, me-: nyor⧾-a mu-uh yubo-dih:. 'Wu⧾-kwla :se-' 'nyoeh' :tlo i, 'de dlan :se-' gwehn :tlo i.
'Ka-: 'o eh :ne, tu⧾-a' klehkpeh :en no-a tu⧾ 'jeh, en tlo 'bi 'jeh, jorwor: tu 'dhu-a tu-zon-', an tlo 'bi-zon:⧾.
Tu 'jeh se 'beh-dih: on 'ye 'bi-zon⧾ :tlo, 'de tu-zon se 'beh-dih: on 'ye 'bi 'jeh :tlo.
'De tu⧾-a' klehkpeh :en :se-a 'bi 'jeh :tlo i, en mu :dba-eh:, 'de en 'ye 'de neh-' :po-eh:.
:Yee' 'do an-a' 'bi an tlo-a bo, 'do :wor a mu-uh yubo-dih:.

:Yee' eh :se nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :an 'da-dih-a 'on, :Gwlor :baa', :Gwlor :baa', mo-: :an mu Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh 'zorn :pa :deh. Jorwor: nyor :dao' :or mu-a 'On-ba: :or :ne-a 'de yai', or-a' 'ton :korn-deh :no, or :due' gbai, or-: mu-eh 'zorn :pa.

:Yee' :mor Nyorsoa-a' zabe: :zi-we-eh nyni 'o, :yee' :gwlor-nyor:⧾ :dhulu'-a mu :aa 'da-:, 'de 'on bo, :Gwlor :baa', :Gwlor :baa', eh :se 'de :an-a' 'nyne 'di, :a se Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh :po-dih: :e? 'De eh :se 'de :an-a' 'nyne 'di, :a se nyor⧾ 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh⧾ 'de :za-dih: :e? 'De eh :se 'de :an-a' 'nyne 'di, :a se deh⧾ :kolu'⧾ :dhulu' :no-dih: :e?
:Mor on 'da :ao', :yee' 'an mu-uh :gwluhuh' zela: deh 'jeh, 'On se a yubo:. A 'wluh 'o 'on ybei', a :mor deh⧾-zon:⧾ :no-nyor:⧾ :daa.
:Yee' nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on 'worn-a 'an wlu :daa, 'de :on 'chean'-a deh⧾ 'an za-a-' en-' no-a', :yee' on gweh :toror' :korn-nyor: :or po-a or-a'a: 'gbu 'do 'soba ken.
:Yee' :yeh 'ni-a dba-a, 'de 'ni 'yi-a, 'de :pobor' :dhulu' :yi-dih-uh-a-', :yee' 'gbu :dao', on :se-' blu. Deh no-eh, on :po-eh: 'o 'soba ken.
Jorwor: nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on 'worn-a 'an wlu :daa, 'de :on se-a deh⧾ 'an za-a-' en-' no-a' 'chean', :yee' on gweh :bobo-nyor: :or po-a or-a'a: 'gbu 'do :bhehneh'-dhu-'.
:Yee' :yeh 'ni-a dba-a, 'de 'ni 'yi-a, 'de :pobor' :dhulu' :yi-dih-uh-a-', :yee' 'gbu :dao', on blu-', 'de on :wa-dih: dih.
:Yee' :yeh :Yusu' jla-a 'do deh⧾ :daa or za-a-' bo, :yee' or-a' nyor⧾ deh :torne-eh :florn-dih: :gwlor-nyor:⧾ :doru' :dao'-: worn.
Deh no-eh, or torne-uh deh, :ka nyor :or 'ble-a 'kpih 'de Nyorsoa-deh 'di, :eh :se-a :ka an-a' nyor⧾ 'tele' :torne-nyor⧾-a no-a.
:Yee' :yeh :Yusu' 'dhle-a, or 'wluh-a 'de tluh ken, :yee' :gwlor-nyor:⧾ :doru', mo-: zi 'o or klei'.

:Yee' 'yu :due', yau-zon-weh kpon-a, or-: mu 'de or bo, :or 'jli dih 'do or 'zorn, :or 'da, :Gwlor :baa', :mor eh 'dhu, :on 'worn-dih-eh ken dih, :yee' :on 'beh-dih: 'an 'puh-dih-eh 'weh, 'de 'on :ne-' :kane' dih :ne :neheh'.
:Yeh or no :ao', :yee' :Yusu' tba-or son ken dih, 'de or 'da, 'On 'worn-dih-eh'. 'Wluh :kane' dih. :Yee' 'do :dha :due' :dao', 'do :wor or-a' yau-zon-weh 'bor-dih:.

'De :Yusu' 'dae: 'de or bo, :An-a' zela:-' deh :daa nyor-beh :gwluhuh' o. Jorwor: mu, :on 'ye :an-a' 'jeh Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor 'i :to-dih:. :Yee' kpa 'slaa: :za-dih-deh :ka :Mose'-a' 'tele' 'da-a, 'de nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh 'ye-eh' yubo: :ka :on 'puh-a.
Eh :korn ti :due', :yeh 'we :zi-dih:-a 'o ken dih, :yee' :Yusu' 'si :Kapa'nior-gwlor-: dih. :Yee' sorye'-a' nyor :klaba' :due', or-: yi 'o or bo, :or bale-or, or 'ye-or'-' :za-dih:,
or 'dae:, :Gwlor :baa', 'an-a: 'bhoi-yu:, or-: :korn 'tiei: 'meh, :or 'pehn dih 'de :gwlor-', :or 'ye or-a' 'jeh worn 'gabaa.
'De :Yusu' 'da, 'An mu :mu, 'on 'ye-or' 'puh-dih:.
Jorwor: sorye'-a' nyor :klaba' :dao', or 'dae:, :Gwlor :baa', 'on se-eh 'i :bleh-dih:, :on 'ye 'de 'an-a: 'gbu 'di pa. Jorwor: dbo wlu 'suh, :yee' or mu 'puh-:.

'An 'jeh :ke, 'mor nyor-kpalu: 'o, :or :ne-a 'o 'tele' 'zorn. 'De 'on 'ble 'kpih 'do sorye' :on :ne-a 'o 'on 'zorn ken. :Mor :yor 'on zela: :gwluhuh', Mu, :yee' :mloror' mu-'. :Yee' :mor :yor 'on 'da, 'Yle, :yee' :mloror' yi-: 'de. :Yee' :mor 'on 'da, 'de 'an-a: 'bhoi-yu bo, No deh :daa, :yee' :mloror' no-eh'.

:Yeh :Yusu' 'worn-a deh :daa, :yee' eh :florn-dih-or-: worn. 'De or :wlu 'de nyor⧾ :an zi-a 'o or klei' bo, or 'dae:, Dhih 'jeh, 'an zela a :gwluhuh', 'on 'see eh-a' nyor 'ye, :or 'ye dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh 'ble deh :dao', dha 'Ezlea-bluhba-a' 'jeh ken.

'An zela a :gwluhuh', :gwlor-nyor:⧾ :dhulu'-a mu 'de 'yluh-a' 'kwla 'wluh-dih: 'da 'wluh-:, 'de :noo' 'ye 'noror 'yluh-a' 'nior: 'kpa 'da 'wluh, 'de on :ne 'Eble'hehn-: Ase'-: 'dekorn: 'Jekor-: on 'ye :dha :due' dih :dhe 'do gor-', 'do :dha Nyorsoa :korn-dih:-a nyor⧾ wlu 'ken.
Jorwor: :yuh :on :korn-a :on 'ye-a' neh 'i :ne-nyor⧾ no, 'do or-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh 'zorn, an mu 'zorn :po-eh: 'de :kule-', 'do :dha 'vin-a'-: 'dekorn: 'nyne 'i :di-dih-eh-: en mu-a :ne.
'De or zela: 'yu :dao' :gwluhuh', or 'dae:, Mu. :Ka :on no eh-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh, 'ka-: eh mu :ne 'do :on bo. :Yee' 'do 'yluh-buh :due' :dao' 'di, 'do :wor 'yu-a' 'bhoi-yu 'puh-dih:.
:Yee' :Yusu' pa 'de :Piteh' 'bli 'gbu 'di, 'de or 'ye :Piteh'-a'a: 'bila-nynor, or-: :chehbe'-a no, :or 'pehn dih.
'De :Yusu' 'tuh or-a' son dih. :Yee' or-a' :chehbe' 'bor-'. 'De or :sorn-', or kpa :Yusu' :bale'-'.
:Yee' 'gwie-yluh bo :dao', nyor⧾ :ya 'de or bo, nyor⧾ :dhulu' 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh:⧾ :ne-a 'o 'de 'weh. 'De or no wlu-a' 'bleh 'bleh, or za-ih 'o on 'de, 'de or 'puh-dih: puhba-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh.

Or no deh :daa 'weh, 'de Nyorsoa-a' wlu 'ye dhih 'jeh-' 'kpa, :ka or-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor: :Azaya' no-a eh-a' :za-a' see, or no-a, Or no-eh', 'de :a-a' :nea-deh⧾-: 'dekorn: :a-a' puhba-deh⧾-: en 'bor.
:Yee' :yeh :Yusu' 'ye-a :gwlor-nyor:⧾ :doru' :dao', :on 'gbo-dih-or 'dlu dih, :yee' or 'nyi or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾ 'tele', on 'ye 'dhan, on 'ye 'de :Galali'i-yobo'-pehnu 'de 'kpa.
:Yee' nyor⧾ 'tele' :torne-nyor :due', or-: yi 'de or bo, or 'dae:, Nyor⧾ deh :torne-nyor:, 'an mu 'o :on klei' :zi, :dha klehkpeh :an mu-a :mu.

'De :Yusu' :wlu 'de or bo, or 'dae:, :Tolo'-gbe⧾ 'ble 'bi, me-: en pa 'di dih. 'De neme: :en zi-dih-a-' dih 'de yai', en 'ble 'dle⧾, me-: en pa 'di dih. Jorwor: 'yu an 'da-dih-a Nyor-kpalu-a' 'yu, or se 'dlu-a' 'pehn-dih-da: :sloror'-a' 'jeh 'ble.
:Yee' 'yu :noror' :or no-a or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾-a' nyor :due', or 'dae:, :Gwlor :baa', 'nyi 'on mu, 'on 'ye 'on-ba dih nma-dih: kele'a: o.
Jorwor: :Yusu' zela-or-: :gwluhuh', or 'dae:, Zi 'o 'on klei'. 'Nyi 'meheh'-nyor⧾ nma-dih: an-a' 'jeh-a'a: 'meheh'-nyor⧾ dih.
:Yee' :Yusu' 'kpa 'de 'blagbe 'di, 'de or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾ zi 'o or klei'.
:Yeh an mu-a, :yee' 'ga yai' dih :pobor' :dhulu', or-: :yi-dih-uh 'de 'ni ken, 'de eh 'bhorn eh 'ye 'blagbe 'ni 'zorn :pa-dih:. Jorwor: :Yusu'-a 'mo-'.
'De on mu, on za-or 'nyinor-', on 'dae:, :Gwlor :baa', 'puh-dih: :a-uh. 'Ni-a kpa :a 'weh o.

:Yeh on 'da :ao', :yee' or :wlu-' 'de on bo, or 'dae:, A :mor :gwlor-nyor:⧾ :on :korn-a dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh se-a 'i 'beh. :Eh no-dih a :fano :eh? :Yee' or :sorn-' 'weh. 'De or po 'ni-: 'dekorn: :pobor'-: 'borboa' 'i. 'De yobo'-pehnu-a' 'duh⧾ no 'dhuan.
:Yeh eh no :ao', :yee' eh :florn-dih-uh-: worn, 'de on 'da, Deh 'i-deh-nyor: 'o, :or :dhe dih :eh, :or :korn wlu yobo'-pehnu-a' 'duh⧾-: 'dekorn: :pobor' :sloror'-: en dhe 'o dih :eh?

:Yee' :yeh :Yusu' mu-a, 'de or 'si-a dih 'de :Galali'i-yobo'-pehnu 'de, 'do :Galala'a-nyor⧾-a' 'bluhba ken, :yee' nyor⧾ 'sororn' 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh⧾ :ne-a 'o 'de, mo-: 'wluh 'de nma-dih-deh⧾ 'klu-', 'de on 'ya-dih-or 'i. On :ne-' :fano: 'gabaa. Eh-: no-eh, 'de nyor⧾ se 'beh-dih: on 'ye 'o :gwie: :dao' 'i :yi-dih:.
:Yeh on 'ye-or, :yee' 'do :dha :due' :dao', an po 'geh⧾, an no, Nyorsoa-a' 'Yu. Deh :an 'bhorn :on 'ye :a-uh' :no-dih: :eh? :On yi-: 'noror :on 'ye :a 'kle 'ye-dih: 'de ti 'ye 'o nyni :e?
:Yee' 'do :dha on :ne-a, :bee'⧾ :dhulu', me-: wa dih, 'de en se 'o on bo dih :tehn-dih:.
'De 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh⧾ bale: :Yusu', en 'dae:, :Mor eh 'dhu, :mor 'si-dih: :a 'zorn, :yee' dbo 'de :a :bee'⧾ 'di.

:Yee' or 'dae: 'de en bo, A mu. 'De en 'wluh 'o on 'de, en mu, en pa 'de :bee'⧾ 'di. :Yee' 'do :dha :due' :dao', :bee'⧾-a' klehkpeh :dao', en jla :jiin'-: glu, 'de en :za 'noror tluh :gbehn-eh 'i ple-a', en 'kpa 'o yobo'-pehnu worn, 'de en 'meh 'do 'nior.

:Yee' nyor⧾ :an 'dhu-a :bee'⧾ :dao' 'yli-eh bo, on ple, on mu-' :gwlor. 'De an zela nyor⧾ :gwluhuh' 'do deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :en :no-eh-: :korn mor deh :eh :no-eh 'do nyor⧾ 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh⧾ :ne-a 'o 'de, an-a' dhih.
:Yee' gwlor-a' klehkpeh :gweh glu, on mu :Yusu' 'yi 'ya-dih: 'da. :Yeh on 'ye-or, :yee' an bale-or', or 'ye 'o 'do on 'bli-bluhba ken 'wluh.
:Yee' :Yusu' 'kpa 'de 'blagbe 'di, or 'dhan 'ni, or mu 'de or 'bli :Kapa'nior-gwlor:-' de.

:Yeh or 'si-a dih, :yee' nyor⧾ :noo', mo-: :ya 'de or bo 'tiei-a' 'meheh'-yu :due', :or 'pehn-a dih 'do or-a'a: ken 'pehn-deh ken. :Yee' :yeh :Yusu' 'ye-a an-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh: :eh :ne-a 'de on 'di, 'de or :wlu 'de or bo, or 'dae:, 'An 'yu, :ku-dih: :porluh dih. :An-a' deh⧾-zon⧾-a' dhih 'ma-dih-eh: bo 'weh.
:Yee' :yeh nyor⧾ 'tele' :torne-nyor⧾-a' nyor⧾ :noo', on 'worn-ih'-a, :yee' on 'da 'do an-a' 'jeh :gwlii', 'Yu :daa, or 'kor-dih Nyorsoa-a' 'nyne 'weh.
Jorwor: :Yusu' yubo: deh an za-a-' 'do an-a' 'jeh :gwlii' 'weh, 'de or 'da, :Eh no 'de a na-dih deh⧾-zon⧾ :gwluhuh' dih 'suh :eh?
Eh :kma 'i nyor 'ye :ao' 'da, 'de 'tiei-a' 'meheh'-nyor bo, :eh :mor, :Sorn-', mu yai', :na, :on 'ye mu, :eh :zi 'o, :An-a' deh⧾-zon⧾-a' dhih 'ma-dih-eh: bo.

Jorwor: 'an mu-eh a :torne:, :ka 'yu an 'da-dih-a Nyor-kpalu-a' 'yu, or :korn-a 'kpih dha yao 'zorn, 'do deh⧾-zon⧾-a' dhih-a' bo 'ma-dih-eh bo. Eh-a' dhih, or :wlu-' 'de or bo, or 'dae:, :Sorn-', mu yai', 'duo: :an-a'a: ken 'pehn-deh-' :on 'ye 'de :on 'bli 'gbu mu.
:Yee' 'yu :dao', or :sorn-' 'weh, or mu 'de or 'bli 'gbu.
:Yee' :yeh nyor⧾ :doru' :on :ne-a 'o, on 'ye-a deh :dao', :yee' :fano-a: no-uh. 'De an po Nyorsoa-a' 'nyne ya, :or 'nyi-a :gwlor-nyor⧾ 'kpih-a' :yih :daa.

:Yee' :yeh :Yusu' 'wluh-a 'o :dha 'o, 'de or mu-a, :yee' or 'ye 'yu an 'da-dih-a Matio'. Or-: :dhe dih 'do :gbalie :eh :korn-a 'zorn or za-dih-a 'taa-deh⧾. 'De :Yusu' :wlu 'de or bo, or 'dae:, Zi 'o 'on klei'. 'De Matio' :sorn-', or zi 'o or klei'.

Eh :korn 'we-eh :due', 'de Matio' :pi-dih: :Yusu', 'de or mu deh :di 'da, 'de Matio' 'bli 'gbu. :Yee' 'taa-deh:⧾ :za-nyor:⧾ :dhulu'-: 'dekorn: deh⧾-zon:⧾ :no-nyor:⧾ :dhulu' :noo'-: mo-: 'yle, 'de on 'kpa :Yusu'-: 'dekorn: or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾-: bo, an kpuhba son⧾ ybei'.

:Yee' :yeh :Falasi'i-nyor⧾ 'ye-a deh :daa, :yee' on dhele: or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾-: dih, on 'dae:, :Eh no 'de a-a'a: nyor⧾ deh :torne-nyor :ne 'taa-deh:⧾ :za-nyor⧾-: deh⧾-zon:⧾ :no-nyor:⧾ :noo'-: an kpuhba son⧾ ybei' :eh?

:Yee' :ka or 'worn-ih'-a, :yee' or 'dae:, Nyor⧾ :on se-a puhba:, on se :korn on 'ye kwein: :di-nyor 'kwla⧾-' dih 'bhorn. Jorwor: nyor⧾ :an puhba-a, mo-: :korn :on 'ye kwein: :di-nyor 'kwla⧾-' dih 'bhorn.

Jorwor: deh :daa :eh 'chle-eh 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh 'di, a mu, a 'ye-eh' 'chean', deh :eh :bleh-dih:-a 'i, or 'da, Eh :se 'slaa: :za-dih-deh:⧾ 'on :se-' 'bhorn. Jorwor: nyor⧾-a' :wehlih: 'ye-eh: 'o 'an 'bhorn. 'De mor, 'on :se 'de yi, 'do 'yi 'sleh-nyor⧾-a' dhih bo. Jorwor: deh⧾-zon:⧾ :no-nyor:⧾, mo-: 'on yi 'da 'da, on 'ye an-a' deh⧾-zon:⧾ :no-eh 'bor.

Eh :korn ti :due', 'de nyor⧾ 'ni 'dlu :po :Jororn'-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾ yi 'o :Yusu' bo, on dhele-or dih, on 'da, :Kaa eh no 'de :a :ne :Falasi'i-nyor⧾-a pa 'suehn-', 'de :an-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾-a' no-eh :eh?

:Yeh on dhele-or dih, :yee' or 'da, 'Duhba:⧾ :on mu-a 'nynor nyina: :kpa-gor-', on se 'beh-dih: on 'ye 'zlu, ti 'nynor-a'a: yibeor :ne-a 'o on bo. Jorwor: ti-a mu 'o :nyni, yibeor-a mu 'o on ybei' :za-eh:. :Yee' an mu 'suehn-' :pa.

'De :ka :ne-a :due' 'di, nyor-a' no 'yli-eh: :dele'-a' 'for, 'de or-a' 'pa 'wla soa. Deh no-eh, 'yli-eh: :dele'-a' 'for-a mu :jli-eh:. :Mor or :jli-eh, :yee' or mu 'wla soa-a' 'for⧾ :nee' :chlan, eh 'ye :chlaan-bie: :dao' de dih kpa, 'de eh 'ye 'bie' :klaba' no.

'De nyor-a' po nomor :dele' 'de :zolo-eh :eh :no-dih-eh deh-ku: soa 'di. :Mor or no-eh, :yee' eh mu 'i :wa, 'de nomor 'ye dih 'wla, 'de deh-ku-zolo-eh 'ye 'kor. Jorwor: nomor :dele' :korn or 'ye 'de deh-ku-zolo-eh: :dele' 'di :po-eh:. :Yee' en-' klehkpeh-a mu 'yi dih :nmor.

:Yee' :ka :Yusu' 'si-a 'o deh :daa eh-a' :za 'da, :yee' :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-nyor :due', or-: 'yle, 'de or 'jli dih 'do or 'zorn, or 'dae:, 'An-a: 'nynor-kpao'-yu:, or-: 'meh :kana. Jorwor: 'yle :on 'ye-or' son ken dih tba, :yee' or mu 'kmo-' :ne.
'De :Yusu' :sorn-', 'de or :ne or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾, on zi 'o or klei'.

:Yeh an mu-a, :yee' 'nynor :due', 'nynor-kpao'-weh-a no-a, nyomor-a 'wluh-a 'de yau-' 'do zon⧾-a' :bhue: 'yor 'sororn' 'di, or-: 'wluh-dih: 'de :Yusu' 'kpuh 'i, or-: 'tuh or-a'a: :gba 'vuu-a' 'mla dih :weheh:.
Deh no-eh, or :wlu-' 'de or-a' 'jeh 'di, or 'da, :Mor 'on 'tuh or-a'a: :gba 'vuu: :sloror' dih, :yee' 'an mu 'puh-:.

:Yeh eh no :ao', :yee' :Yusu' 'bili:-'-: dih, or 'ye-or, 'de or 'da, 'An 'yu, :ku-dih: :porluh dih. :An-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh no-eh, 'de :an-a' 'weh 'bor. :Yee' :eh 'wluh-a 'o 'do :dha :due' 'jeh :dao', :yee' or-a' 'weh 'bor-'.
:Yee' :yeh :Yusu' nyni-a 'de nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-nyor: :dao' 'bli 'gbu, or pa-a, 'de or 'ye-a deh⧾ :bla-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ :doru' :an po-a 'viin'-dhlumeh'-:
:yee' or 'dae:, A 'kpa 'o 'zorn. Deh no-eh, 'nynor-kpao'-yu: :daa, or :se-' 'meh, or 'mo-'. :Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' an 'keleh-or'.
:Yee' :yeh nyor⧾ :doru' :dao', on :po-eh: 'o 'zorn, :yee' or pa-', or kpon or-a' son-: dih, 'de or :sorn-'.
:Yee' deh :dao', eh-a' 'nyne :gweh 'o 'for :dao' ken-a' klehkpeh-: 'dlu.
:Yee' :yeh :Yusu' 'wluh-a 'o :dha 'o, :yee' 'doror'-nyor⧾ 'sororn', mo-: zi 'o or klei', :an po 'geh⧾, :an no, :Debe'-a' 'yu, 'ye :a-a' :wehlih.
'De :Yusu' pa 'de 'gbu. :Yee' 'doror'-nyor:⧾ :dao', on yi 'o or bo 'weh, 'de or dhele-uh dih, or 'da, A po-eh-' dhih 'jeh, 'on 'beh-dih: a-a' 'puh-dih-eh 'weh :e? 'De on 'da, Keen', :Gwlor :baa'.
'De or 'tuh an-a' 'yli dih, or 'dae:, A 'nyi, eh :ne :ao', :ka a no-a eh-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh.
:Yee' an-a' 'yli kan-dih: 'i, an 'ye dih. 'De or tli eh-a' wlu-' dih, or 'dae:, Nyor-a' zela:-' deh :daa nyor-beh-nyor-beh :gwluhuh' o.
Jorwor: :yeh :Yusu' zela-uh-a deh :daa :gwluhuh', :yee' on 'si-: 'zorn, 'de on :gweh-dih: 'o or-a' 'nyne, 'do 'for :dao' ken dih 'dlu.
:Yee' :yeh nyor⧾ :dao', an 'si-a 'zorn, :yee' nyor⧾ :ya 'de :Yusu' bo 'yu :due' :or se-a :wlu-a' 'beh-dih:, deh no-eh, 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh: :ne 'o or 'de.
:Yeh :Yusu' za-or 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh 'de, :yee' or 'duo: :wlu-a'-' 'weh. :Yee' nyor⧾ :doru' :dao', eh :florn-dih-uh-: worn, 'de an no, :A 'see deh :daa 'ye dha 'Ezlea-bluhba ken o.
Jorwor: :Falasi'i-nyor⧾ 'dae:, 'Ku :oo', :on no-a 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh: :klaba', mo-: 'nyi-or 'kpih, 'de or za nyor⧾ 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh⧾ 'de.

:Yee' :Yusu'-a na :gwlor⧾ :klaba'⧾-: 'dekorn: :gwlor⧾ :nyene'-: en-' klehkpeh ken dih. Or torne nyor⧾ deh⧾ 'de an-a' 'di :gweh-dih-sla⧾ 'zorn dih. 'De or po tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh :en kor-a Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn 'i. Or 'puh-dih nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on 'ble-a puhba-deh:⧾ 'doror: 'dor-: 'dekorn: :nea-nyor⧾-:.

:Yee' :yeh or 'ye-a :gwlor-nyor:⧾ :doru' :dao', :yee' an-a' :wehlih-a: no-or. Deh no-eh, nyor⧾-a 'beh-dih-uh 'worn dih. 'De an na-dih :gwluhuh' dih, on se-' :za-dih-nyor :korn. On gweh :ka 'blae'⧾ :en se-a 'yli-eh bo 'dhu-nyor :korn 'suh.
:Yee' or 'dae: 'de or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾ bo, 'Vluu'-koo :dhubu:-'. Jorwor: :koan: :no-nyor⧾ se 'i :dhie:.
Eh-a' dhih, a :wlu 'de :Gwlor :baa' bo, :or no-a 'vluu'-gle-a' :kororn-nyor, or 'ye :koan: :no-nyor⧾ 'de or 'bli 'gle dbo, on 'ye :koo: :dao' chehn.

:Yee' :Yusu' 'da or-a'a: bo :na-nyor:⧾ :on :korn-a :bhue: 'yor :ne-a 'sororn' 'do or bo, 'de or 'nyi-uh 'kpih 'do 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh⧾ ken, on 'ye-ih' nyor⧾ 'de :za, 'de jorwor: or 'nyi-uh 'kpih, on 'ye puhba-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: :nea:-nyor⧾-: an-a' klehkpeh 'puh-dih:.

Or-a'a: dboo-nyor:⧾ :on :korn-a :bhue: 'yor :ne-a 'sororn', an-a' 'nyne :wor :dhe dih, :Zai' nor-a' 'nyne :wor Samor', an 'da-dih-a :Piteh'-: :Piteh'-a' dei' Andlu'-: :Zehbehli'-a'a: 'nynuu 'Jeen-: :korn or-a' dei' :Jororn'-:
Felor'-: :Batale'meor-: :Tormor'-: Matio'-: :or no-a 'taa-deh:⧾ :za-nyor, 'Ehfea-a' 'yu 'Jeen-: 'Talior-:
:korn Samor' :or no-a or-a'a: 'bluhba-dlu-a' dhih :vorn-nyor-: 'dekorn: :Juda' :Ehkeh'lior :or plo-a :Yusu'-:.

:Yee' nyor⧾-a' :bhue: 'yor 'sororn' :daa, mo-: :Yusu' 'dhu wlu worn, or dbo-uh deh⧾-' dih, or 'dae:, A-a' :mu-' nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'bluhba⧾ ken o. 'De mor a-a' :pa-dih:-' 'de Sehmeh'la-nyor⧾-a'a: gwlor⧾ 'di dih :ke o.
Jorwor: a :korn a 'ye 'de 'Ezlea-nyor⧾ :on gweh-a 'blae'⧾ :en 'ma-a bo mu.
:Mor a :taa mu, :yee' a po tubo-wlu:⧾ :daa, a 'dae:, Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh 'koan'-: bo.

A 'puh-dih: puhba-nyor⧾, a :ya 'meheh'-nyor⧾ 'noror 'kmo bo deka, a 'puh-dih: nyor⧾ :yuh yau-zon-weh kpon-a, 'de on 'ye :vlehehn'-' :gweh :ka :Mose'-a' 'tele' no-a mu-a'. :Yee' a :za nyor⧾ 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh⧾ 'de dih. A 'ye 'kpih :daa 'weh yaa'e, :yee' a 'nyi-ih nyor⧾ yaa'e :ke.
Nyor-a' :kpa-' 'goo-: 'sebla-: :korn mor 'wlii: :nee'-: 'de or 'paa-dih-'.
:Dha a mu-a, nyor-a' :kpa-' 'tiei 'di :po :gleu', 'de mor nyor-a' :kpa-' 'wla :noror'-: :buhbuh:⧾ :nee'-: 'dekorn: deh⧾ :tba-tu-:. Deh no-eh, nyor :or no-a :koan, or :korn or 'ye eh-a' dii-deh 'ye.

:Yee' :gwlor a mu-a 'di :nyni, :gwlor :klaba'-: :eh beh :gwlor-yu-: a mu 'o a 'ye nyor :or mu-a a dih :kpon dih 'bhorn. :Mor a 'ye eh-a' nyor :dao', :yee' a :ne 'o or bo, eh 'ye 'o a-a' :gwlor-a' 'wluhuh'-ti ken :yeh-dih:.
:Mor a pa 'de 'gbu 'di, :yee' a 'da, :Bhorlie' 'do a bo o.
:Mor nyor⧾ :ne-a 'de 'gbu :dao' 'di, on kpon a dih, :yee' 'nyi a-a' :bhorlie' :sie: 'de on bo 'gbu :dao' 'di. Jorwor: :mor on se a dih kpon, :yee' a kpa a-a' :bhorlie'-wlu de.

:Mor nyor se a dih kpon, 'de :mor on se a-a' wlu :dou'⧾ bo :to, :mor a :taa 'do :gwlor :dao'-: :eh beh 'gbu :dao'-: 'di 'wluh, :yee' a 'gbabo: :buhbuh⧾ 'zorn dih, a 'ye 'o 'wluh, eh 'ye-uh 'i :to-dih: :ka Nyorsoa :za-a an-a' deh son 'di.

Dhih 'jeh, 'an zela a :gwluhuh', :eh :mor 'do Nyorsoa-a' zabe: :zi-we-eh 'di, Nyorsoa-a mu :wehlih 'ye-: 'do nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'de 'Salor-gwlor-: 'dekorn: :Gormor'la-gwlor-: bo, eh 'ye 'o nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'o :gwlor :dao' 'di-' :zi.
A :gbee'e:. 'An dbo a-uh 'weh, :eh gweh-a :ka 'blae'⧾ mu-a 'de ji⧾ 'klu-'. Eh-a' dhih, a 'yaa: :ka sehn :ne-a, :yee' a :kpoehn: 'i :ka pabu' :ne-a.
A 'dhu a-a' 'jeh :dhororn' 'do :gwlor-nyor⧾ bo. Deh no-eh, an mu a 'kwla :za 'de 'koti-', 'de on 'ye a bla 'de an-a' 'di :gweh-dih-sla⧾ 'zorn dih.

An mu a dih 'kla-: 'do 'gomla-nyor⧾-a' nyor⧾ :klaba'⧾-: 'dekorn: 'keen-boi'-: ybei', 'do 'an dhih bo, 'de a 'ye Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh-a' dhih bo zela: 'de on bo-: 'dekorn: 'de nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾ bo-:.

:Mor nyor⧾ kpon a-uh, eh-a' 'beh-dih:-' a-a' :porluh⧾ 'worn dih, 'do deh a mu-a-' :za-: 'dekorn: :ka a mu-a eh-a' :za-a' :no-:. Deh no-eh, :mor eh-a' :zaa-ti :taa 'o nyni, deh a mu-a-' :za, Nyorsoa-a mu-eh a :torne:.
Deh no-eh, eh :se a-a' 'jeh :or :se-' :wlu i. Jorwor: a :Baa' Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu: 'o, mo-: :an mu a-uh' :yi-dih:, :on 'ye :wlu.

:Yee' 'de-di'-a mu or-a' 'de-di' nyor⧾ bo :plo-dih: on 'ye-or' 'dba. :Baa'-a mu deh :due' :dao' :no 'do or-a'a: 'yu bo :ke. 'Nynuu-a mu on 'de-: 'dekorn: :baa'-: worn :bla-dih:, 'de on 'ye-uh' nyor⧾ ya po, on 'ye-uh' 'dba.
:Gwlor-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh, an mu a-uh' 'nyeh-:, 'an dhih. Jorwor: nyor :or se-a sea, 'de ti 'ye-a' 'dlu-' :jla, :yee' or mu 'puh-:.

:Mor on 'ye-dih a 'kle 'do gwlor :due' 'di, :yee' a ple, a mu 'de :gwlor :noror' 'di. Dhih 'jeh, 'an zela a :gwluhuh', a :se-' 'Ezlea-gwlor⧾-a' klehkpeh 'di dih :mu i, 'de 'yu an 'da-dih-a Nyor-kpalu-a' 'yu, or 'ye 'de yi.
Nyor :or 'chean'-a deh, or se 'i 'beh, or se 'o nyor :or torne-or deh-' :zi. 'De mor 'bhoi-yu se 'i 'beh, or se 'o or-a'a: nyor :klaba'-' :zi.

Eh :korn eh 'ye :porluh-a' dih 'pehn-deh no, 'de nyor :or 'chean'-a deh, or 'ye nyor :or torne-or deh gweh. 'De jorwor: 'bhoi-yu 'ye or-a'a: nyor :klaba' gweh. :Mor on :taa 'gbu :baa' :Behzeh'bu :on no-a 'ku 'da-dih, :yee' dha nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'de or 'bli 'gbu, an mu :na-dih: :eh?
:Yee' a-a' :ple-' :gwlor-nyor⧾. Deh no-eh, deh-beh: :eh :kan-eh worn 'i, eh mu ken :nyeh. 'De deh-beh: :eh 'zile-eh, eh mu yubo-eh:.
Deh 'an zela a :gwluhuh' 'de :kule-', a :korn a 'ye-eh' :za 'de zorn-pli-'. 'De deh nyor :pa-dih:-a a 'slan-', a :korn a 'ye-eh' :za 'de 'gbu 'dlu.

A-a' :ple-' nyor⧾ :yuh-a: 'dba-a nyor-a' yau, 'de :on se-a or-a' :zulu-a' 'dba-a' 'beh-dih:. Jorwor: a ple Nyorsoa, :or 'beh-dih:-a :or 'ye-a' nyor-a' :zulu-: yau-: en-a' klehkpeh gbe :zie-dih: 'de 'ku 'bli.
Eh :se 'yalih 'sororn' :en se :plo-eh: 'do 'kaba-yor-eh :due' bo :e? Jorwor: en-' deh :due' :se 'o 'bluhbor 'kpa-: i, :mor eh 'dhu, a :Baa' se-eh ken dih 'worn-dih:.
A-a' 'mii: :sloror' :en :ne-a 'o a 'dlu-a' 'jeh, en-' klehkpeh :zlo-eh:-', 'tene' :kpeen:.
:Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, :fano-a' :no-' a-uh. A 'kpa deh ken 'gabaa, :eh :zi 'o 'yalih :dhulu'-'.
:Yee' nyor-beh: :or 'worn-dih:-a 'an dhih, 'do :gwlor-nyor⧾ ybei', :yee' 'an mu or-a' dhih 'worn-dih: :ke, 'do 'On-ba: :or :ne-a 'de yai' ybei'.
Jorwor: nyor-beh: :or dhobo:-a 'an dhih-' 'do :gwlor-nyor⧾ ybei', :yee' 'an mu or-a' dhih-' dhobo: 'do 'On-ba: :or :ne-a 'de yai' ybei' :ke.

:Yee' :Yusu'-a kpa or-a' wlu 'dlu bo, or 'dae:, A-a' :na-dih-eh' :gwluhuh' dih, :eh :mor 'on yi-: 'de, 'on 'ye 'de wlu-' dih 'worn-eh :ya, dha 'bluhba ken. 'Kei o. 'On :se 'de yi, 'on 'ye 'de wlu-' dih 'worn-eh :ya. Jorwor: :bhla 'jlehn :oo', 'on :ya 'de.

Deh no-eh, 'on yi-: 'de 'on 'ye-eh' no, 'de nyor-kpalu 'ye 'de or :baa' ya 'bili:. 'De 'on 'ye-eh' no, 'de 'nynor-kpao'-yu 'ye 'de or 'de ya 'bili:. 'De 'on 'ye-eh' no, 'de 'nynor 'ye 'de or-a'a: yibeor 'de ya 'bili:.
'De nyor-a' 'jeh 'bli 'gbu 'di, 'do :wor nyor⧾ :an mu-or' 'nyeh-: an mu 'wluh-:.

:Yee' nyor :or :ybeh-a or 'de-: :eh beh or :baa'-: :eh :zi-a 'o 'on-', :yee' or se-eh 'i :bleh-dih:, or 'ye 'de 'an 'for bo :ne. 'De mor nyor :or :ybeh-a or-a'a: nyor-kpalu-yu-: :eh beh or-a'a: 'nynor-kpao'-yu: 'o-: :eh :zi-a 'o 'on-', :yee' or se-eh 'i :bleh-dih:, or 'ye 'de 'an 'for bo :ne.
:Yee' nyor :or se-a or-a'a: 'kle 'ye-eh-a' 'klorse tu ya-' 'duo:, :or 'ye-a' 'o 'on klei' zi, :yee' or se-eh 'i :bleh-dih:, or 'ye 'de 'an 'for bo :ne.
Nyor :or dhe-a or-a' :febeh' dih, :yee' or mu-eh 'ma-dih:. Jorwor: nyor :or 'ma-dih:-a or-a' :febeh' 'do 'an dhih, :yee' eh-a' dih :dhe-eh: 'o or no.
:Yee' nyor :or kpon-a a dih, :yee' 'mor-: 'o or kpon dih. 'De nyor :or kpon-a 'on dih, :yee' nyor :or dbo-a 'on, or-: 'o or kpon dih :ke.

Nyor :or kpon-a Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor dih, or-a' Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor-dhih:, :yee' geli' :za-dih-deh: :korn-a 'be Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor-a mu-a 'ye-: eh-: or mu 'ye-: :ke. 'De jorwor: nyor :or kpon-a 'yi 'sleh-nyor dih, or-a' 'yi 'sleh-nyor-dhih:, :yee' geli' :za-dih-deh: :korn-a 'be 'yi 'sleh-nyor-a mu-a 'ye-: eh-: or mu 'ye-: :ke.

:Yee' nyor-beh: :or 'nyi-a 'an-a: bo :na-nyor⧾-a' nyor :due' :or no-a 'zeehn nor, 'ni :chehbe'-a' 'korbuh :sloror', :ka or 'dhu-a 'an bo :na-nyor-', eh-a' dhih, :yee' dhih 'jeh, 'an zela a :gwluhuh', or mu eh-a' geli' :za-dih-deh 'ye-: :gbor :gbor.

:Yee' :yeh :Yusu' gweh-a or-a'a: bo :na-nyor:⧾ :on :korn-a :bhue: 'yor :ne-a 'sororn', an-a' wlu worn 'dhu-eh: 'i, :yee' or 'wluh 'o :dha 'o 'weh, or mu, or 'ye nyor⧾ deh :torne:, 'de or 'ye Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu⧾ po, 'de :gwlor⧾ :eh :ne-a 'de :Galali'i-bluhba ken 'di.
:Yee' :yeh nyor⧾ 'ni 'dlu :po :Jororn' :or :ne-a :kasue 'di, or 'worn-a deh⧾ or no-a, :yee' or dbo or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾ 'de or bo,
on 'ye-or' dih dhele:, on 'ye :ao', :Mor 'o, :or 'dhu nyor :or mu-a 'de :yi :e? :Ae' :a :fuo: nyor :noror' 'ken ke?
:Yeh on dhele-or dih, :yee' :Yusu' zela-uh-: :gwluhuh', or 'da, A mu deka. :Yee' a zela: :Jororn' :gwluhuh' deh⧾ a 'worn-a-: 'dekorn: deh⧾ a 'ye-a-:.

'Doror'-nyor⧾-a 'ye-: dih. 'De :kloror-nyor⧾-a na. 'De nyor⧾ yau-zon-weh kpon-a, an 'puh, 'de on :gweh :vlehehn'-' :ka :Mose'-a' 'tele' no-a mu-a'. 'De 'suun'-nyor⧾-a 'worn dih. 'De 'meheh'-nyor⧾-a sorn-'. 'De Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh-a po-eh 'de se deh-a' :za-da 'ble-nyor⧾ bo.
:Yee' :bhorlie' 'do nyor :or se-a 'an dhih-' dhobo:, 'do or :porluh ken.

:Yeh :Jororn'-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾-a 'wluh-a 'o :Yusu' bo, :yee' :Yusu' 'kpa 'o or-a' dhih :za 'da 'weh, 'de nyor⧾ :doru' :dao' bo, or 'dae:, Ti a mu-a 'de :Jororn' bo 'de :bhehneh'-bluhba ken, :yee' deh 'i-deh: a mu 'ye 'da :eh? A mu nyor :or gweh-a :peli'-gan: :pobor'-a bla-a, 'ye 'da :e?
:Mor eh se :ao' :ne, :yee' :eh :korn dhih a mu 'de :bhehneh'-bluhba ken :eh? A mu nyor :or pa-a 'tiei: :nmaa'e-' 'ye 'da :e? 'Kei:. Nyor⧾ :on pa-a 'tiei: :nmaa'e, on 'ti 'de 'keen-boi' 'bli 'sla⧾ ya.

:Yee' :eh :korn dhih a mu 'de :bhehneh'-bluhba ken :eh? A mu-', a 'ye Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor 'ye :e? Keen' :mloror' :kpeheh:. Jorwor: 'an zela a :gwluhuh', or :se wele-eh: :po-nyor: 'suh. Or :zi 'o wele-eh: :po-nyor-' 'weh.
Or-: 'o, :or :korn dhih Nyorsoa :za-a-' 'de or-a'a: 'chlee-deh 'di, or 'da, 'An mu 'an-a: tubo-wlu:⧾ :po-nyor :on ybei' :dbo o. Or-: mu :an-a'a: :gwie 'kpa :po 'do :on ybei'.

:Yee' :Yusu'-a kpa or-a' wlu 'dlu bo, or 'dae:, Dhih 'jeh, 'an zela a :gwluhuh', nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh 'nynor⧾-kpao'⧾ 'wluh-a, eh se nyor :korn :or 'ye-a 'i 'beh, :or 'ye-a 'o :Jororn'-' :zi. Jorwor: nyor :or no-a nyor 'zeehn :naa, 'do nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'de Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh 'zorn, :yee' or-a' 'jeh :dao', or-: 'beh 'i, or-: :zi 'o :Jororn'-'.

:Eh 'wluh-a 'o ti :Jororn' 'ye-a' Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu⧾ po, :en kor-a Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh 'i, 'de :eh :yeh-dih:-a 'zean'-we-eh: :daa ken, :yee' 'kulu-nyor⧾-a vorn-eh bo, on 'ye Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh: on :torne: a-uh ya gba.
:Mose'-a' 'tele'-: 'dekorn: Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh-: :eh :yeh-dih:-a :Jororn' ken, an po Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh:, 'de an za Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh-a' dhih-'.
:Mor eh 'dhu, a 'beh-dih: a 'ye-eh' dhih 'jeh-' po, :Jororn' :daa, or-: 'dhu :Ila'yor-', :or mu-a 'de :yi.
Nyor :or 'ble-a :dou'⧾, 'nyi or 'worn-ih.
:Yee' deh 'i-deh: 'on 'beh-dih: 'on 'ye :kana-nyor:⧾ :daa 'i :po-dih: :eh? On gweh 'nynuu: :nyene' :on :dhe-a dih 'do 'doror', 'de :an wele-a on 'bei', :an no-a,
:A bla :tou' 'do a bo. Jorwor: a-a' 'worn, a-a' ye. :A ble nyor-a' 'meheh'-duh:⧾ 'do a bo. Jorwor: a-a' 'worn, a-a' 'zlu.
:Yee' :Yusu'-a kpa or-a' wlu 'dlu bo, or 'dae:, Ti :Jororn' yi-a 'de, :yee' or pa-' 'suehn:, 'de or :se-' nomor 'na, :yee' nyor⧾ 'da, 'Kwla 'ye-dih-deh: :ne 'o or 'de.

:Yeh 'yu an 'da-dih-a Nyor-kpalu-a' 'yu yi-a 'de, or di deh 'weh, 'de or 'na, :yee' nyor⧾ 'da, A :gbee'e:. 'Yu :daa, or no deh :di-nyor-: nomor 'na-nyor-:. 'De or no 'taa-deh:⧾ :za-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: deh⧾-zon:⧾ :no-nyor:⧾ :noo'-: an-a' :ybeh-dih-nyor. Jorwor: deh Nyorsoa-a' :toror' no-a, eh-: :to-dih-eh nyor⧾ 'i, :ka or-a' :toror' 'sleh-a 'i.
:Yee' :Yusu' 'kpa 'o :gwlor⧾ or :no-dih:-a deh⧾ :kolu'⧾ :dhulu' 'di, eh-a' 'bhun dih :wlu-dih: 'da 'weh. Deh no-eh, on :se-' an-a' deh⧾-zon⧾ dih 'tali:, 'de on :se-' dih 'bili: 'de Nyorsoa bo.

Or 'dae:, 'Chlo 'do a :mor :Kola'zin-nyor⧾ bo. 'Chlo 'do a :mor :Behse'la-nyor⧾ bo. Deh no-eh, deh⧾ :kolu'⧾ 'on no-a 'do a bo, :mor 'on no-ih 'do 'Taya-gwlor-: 'dekorn: 'Saedorn-gwlor-: bo :dee', :yee' an mu an-a' deh⧾-zon⧾ dih 'tali:, 'de on 'ye 'de Nyorsoa bo 'bili: :dee' see, 'de on 'ye 'tiei-zon⧾-' pa, on 'ye 'de :bhuhbuh' 'nyne-' dih :dhe, on 'ye-eh' nyor⧾ 'i :to-dih: :ka on 'bili:-a-' dih.
'Do eh-a' dha, 'an zela a :gwluhuh', :yee' 'do Nyorsoa-a' zabe: :zi-we-eh 'di, Nyorsoa-a mu :wehlih 'ye-: 'do nyor⧾ :dao' bo, eh 'ye a-uh' :zi.

:Yee' a :mor :Kapa'nior-nyor:⧾, 'do a bo. A 'bhorn a 'ye a-a' 'jeh 'i 'beh-dih: a 'ye 'de yai' nyni :e? 'Kei:. Nyorsoa-a mu a 'de 'ku 'bli :po. Deh no-eh, deh⧾ :kolu'⧾ 'on no-a 'do a bo, :mor 'on no-ih 'do 'Salor-gwlor bo, :yee' or mu dih :nyna :dee'.
Jorwor: 'an zela a :gwluhuh', :eh :mor 'do Nyorsoa-a' zabe: :zi-we-eh 'di, Nyorsoa-a mu :wehlih 'ye-: 'do :gwlor :dao', or-a' nyor⧾ bo, eh 'ye a-uh' :zi.

:Yee' 'do ti :dao' bo, :Yusu' 'dae:, 'On-ba:, :mor :or 'dhu-a :Gwlor :baa' 'de yai'-: 'dekorn: 'noror 'zorn-: 'on po :on 'zio. Deh no-eh, :on 'zile: deh⧾ :daa, :toror' :korn-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: 'chlee-deh: yubo-nyor⧾-: dih, 'de :on :to-dih-ih 'nynuu: :nyene' 'i.
Keen', 'On-ba:, eh 'pehn-dih: :an-a' :porluh-: dih, :on 'ye-eh' no.

:Yee' or :wlu-' 'de nyor⧾ bo, or 'dae:, 'On-ba 'nyi 'on 'kpih 'weh, 'do deh⧾-a' klehkpeh bo. Eh se nyor :korn, :or 'ye-a Nyorsoa-a' 'Yu yubo:. Jorwor: or :Baa' :due' gbai, or-: yubo-or. 'De eh se nyor :korn, :or 'ye-a or :Baa' yubo:. Jorwor: or-a'a: 'Yu :due' gbai, or-: yubo-or, 'dekorn: :yuh or-a'a: 'Yu-a 'bhorn-a, or 'ye-a or :Baa' 'i :to-dih:.
:Yee' a yi 'noror 'on bo, a-a' klehkpeh :or no-a :koan, 'de :or 'ble-a 'gbeh⧾ :en :ku-a kwa. A yi 'noror 'on bo, a 'ye :forn.
A 'duo: 'an-a: nyor⧾ deh :torne-eh-a' 'gbeh-', a 'ye-eh' ken dih :po. 'De a 'chean' deh 'noror 'on bo. Deh no-eh, 'on :kpoehn: 'i, 'de 'on se 'an 'jeh 'i 'beh-dih:. :Yee' a-a' :porluh⧾-a mu dih :dhe.
Deh no-eh, nyor⧾ deh :torne-eh: 'an 'nyi a-uh, a 'ye-a' no, eh se 'i :kma. 'De mor 'gbeh 'an 'nyi a-uh, eh se kwa :ku.

:Yee' 'do ti :dao' 'di, eh no Nyorsoa-a' :gwlee-we-eh:, :yee' :Yusu'-: 'dekorn: or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾-: an yi-dih 'de deh⧾-yor: an 'da-dih-a 'wii 'nyne-', 'de 'gle. :Yee' 'moeh: no or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾, 'de on 'duo: deh⧾-yor: :dao' en-' :nee'-a' kplan-a', 'de on di-ih.
:Yeh :Falasi'i-nyor⧾ 'ye-eh, :yee' on :wlu-' 'de or bo, on 'dae:, :Gbee'e:. :An-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾-a no deh :eh se-a 'o :a-a'a: 'tele'-a' :gwie 'i :ne, 'do Nyorsoa-a' :gwlee-we-eh 'di.
'De or 'dae:, Deh :Debe' no-a, ti 'moeh 'ye-a' or-: or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾-: no, a :se-eh' zlo :e?

Deh or no-a, eh-: :dhe dih. Or pa 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'gbu 'di, 'de or di 'bhlee: on po-a 'o Nyorsoa ybei' dih, :eh :ne-a gban 'i, :eh or-: or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾-: on se-a :korn on 'ye-a' di, Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor⧾ :due'-a di-a.

:Ae' a :ze-eh' zlo, 'de :Mose'-a' 'tele'-chlee-deh 'di, :eh :mor 'do Nyorsoa-a' :gwlee-we-eh 'di, Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor:⧾ :on :ne-a 'de or-a' 'sla 'di, an wa-a 'tele' :e? Jorwor: on :se-' 'gen :za-eh:.
'An zela a :gwluhuh', :ka deh :neheh' :ne-a :daa, eh 'beh-a 'i, eh :zi-a 'o Nyorsoa-a' 'sla-'.

:Yee' :mor a yubo: deh eh :bleh-dih:-a 'i :dee', :mor Nyorsoa 'da, Eh :se 'slaa: :za-dih-deh:⧾ 'on :se-' 'bhorn. Jorwor: nyor⧾-a' :wehlih: 'ye-eh: 'o 'an 'bhorn, :mor a yubo-eh :dee', :yee' a :se-' nyor⧾ :on se-a eh-a' deh 'i yubo: zabe: :kpon-dih:.
Deh no-eh, 'yu an 'da-dih-a Nyor-kpalu-a' 'yu, or no :Gwlor :baa' 'do Nyorsoa-a' :gwlee-we-eh 'dlu bo.
:Yee' :yeh :Yusu' 'wluh-a 'o :dha 'o, :yee' or pa 'de an-a' 'di :gweh-dih-sla 'zorn.

'Do :wor or :yeh-dih: 'yu :due' :or :korn-a son 'meh-a. 'De on dhele-or dih, on 'da, Eh :ne 'o :a-a'a: 'tele'-a' :gwie 'i 'weh :e, nyor 'ye :gwlor-nyor⧾ 'puh-dih: 'do Nyorsoa-a' :gwlee-we-eh 'di :e? On :za deh :daa-' 'weh, deh no-eh, an 'bhorn :ka on 'ye-a' no, 'de on 'ye-or' 'tele' dih :kpon-dih:, 'do deh-zon: :no-eh bo.

:Yee' or :wlu-' 'de on bo, or 'dae:, :Mor a-a' nyor :due' 'ble 'blae', 'de jorwor: eh 'ye 'de 'bie' :dhorno' 'di 'kpa, 'do Nyorsoa-a' :gwlee-we-eh 'di, :yee' nyor :dao' or :se-eh' :kpon i, 'de or 'ye-eh 'de :za :e?
:Yee' dha :gwlor-nyor-a mu :na-dih: :eh, :or 'kpa-a deh ken :kao', :or :zi-a 'o 'blae'? Eh-: :korn dhih :a-a'a: 'tele' 'worn-dih-eh ken dih, :a 'ye nyor bo 'kpa, 'do Nyorsoa-a' :gwlee-we-eh 'di.
'De or :wlu 'de son-a' 'meheh'-nyor: :dao' bo, or 'da, Slo :an-a' son. 'De or slo-uh. :Yee' or-a' son 'bor-', on 'sleh 'i, :ka on 'be :ne-a.
Jorwor: :yeh :Falasi'i-nyor⧾ 'ye-a deh :dao', :yee' on 'si-: 'zorn, 'de on 'dhu dhih :ka on 'ye-a' :Yusu'-a' 'dba-a' no.
:Yee' :yeh :Yusu' yubo-eh 'i, :yee' or 'wluh 'o :dha 'o 'weh. 'De nyor⧾ :dhulu' zi 'o or klei', 'de or 'puh-dih: puhba-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a 'de on 'klu-'.
:Yee' or 'dhu-uh 'slen, on :ne-eh' no, 'de nyor⧾ :ne-' nyor or 'dhu-eh:-' yubo:.
Or no deh :daa 'weh, 'de Nyorsoa-a' wlu 'ye dhih 'jeh-' 'kpa :ka or-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor: :Azaya' no-a eh-a' :za-a' see, or no-a, Nyorsoa 'da,

'An-a: 'bhoi-yu :wor :dhe dih, :or 'on gan-a, :yor 'on :ybeh-a-', 'de 'an :gwluhuh' 'pehn-dih:-a ken dih. 'An mu 'an :Zulu or ken :po, :yee' or mu 'an 'ton :korn-deh-a' dhih-' :za, 'de 'bluhba⧾-dlu⧾-a' klehkpeh bo.
Or :se-' :jeh i, 'de mor or :se-' 'geh⧾ :po i. Nyor-beh :se-' or-a' wlu 'worn-: i 'do 'kpa :gwie 'i.

Nyor :or gweh-a tu :an 'bhorn-a :jla-a' :dee' see, or :se-or' :jla i. 'De mor nyor :or gweh-a 'nape :eh 'bhorn-a 'mo-a' :dee' see, or :se-or' 'mo-dih: i. Or mu-eh :no :chio'lo:, 'de or-a' 'ton :korn-deh 'ye :glaa' kpa.
:Yee' or-: 'bluhba⧾-dlu⧾-a' klehkpeh-a mu :gwlii' :dhe.

:Yee' nyor⧾ :ya 'de :Yusu' bo 'yu :due' :or 'dor-a, 'de :or se-a :wlu-a' 'beh-dih:, deh no-eh, 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh: :ne 'o or 'de. 'De :Yusu' 'puh-dih-or. :Yee' eh-: no-eh, 'de or 'duo: :wlu-a'-', 'de or 'ye dih.
:Yee' nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a 'o, eh :florn-dih-uh-: worn, 'de an dhele-eh dih, an no, 'Yu :daa, or 'beh-dih: or 'ye :Debe'-a' 'yu no :e?
:Yee' :yeh :Falasi'i-nyor⧾ 'worn-ih'-a, :yee' on 'dae:, :Behzeh'bu: 'o, :on no-a 'ku, 'de :on no-a 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh: :klaba', mo-: 'nyi-or 'kpih, 'de or za nyor⧾ 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh⧾ 'de.

:Yee' :Yusu' yubo: deh an za-a-' 'do on :gwlii' 'weh, 'de or 'da, :Mor 'bluhba-dlu :za an-a' 'jeh 'sororn', 'de on 'ye an-a' 'jeh bo vorn, :yee' 'bluhba-dlu: :dao', an mu gbe :zie:. :Mor gwlor :za or-a' 'jeh 'sororn', 'de mor 'gbu :due' 'di-nyor⧾ 'ye an-a' 'jeh 'sororn' :za, 'de on 'ye an-a' 'jeh bo vorn, :yee' on :se-' dih :nyna i.
:Mor 'ku 'si-dih: 'ku 'zorn, :yee' on :za an-a' 'jeh 'sororn', 'de an vorn an-a' 'jeh bo. :Yee' :kaa an-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh mu dih :nyna-eh :no :eh?

:Yee' :mor eh 'dhu, :Behzeh'bu 'nyi 'on 'kpih, 'on 'ye nyor⧾ 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh⧾ 'de :za, :yee' :or 'nyi a-a'a: nyor⧾ 'kpih, 'de an za nyor⧾ 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh⧾ 'de :ke :eh? :Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, mo-: :an mu a-a' zabe: :zi-nyor⧾ :no.
Jorwor: :mor eh 'dhu, Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu: 'nyi 'on 'kpih, 'on 'ye nyor⧾ 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh⧾ 'de :za, :yee' eh-: za-eh gbor :ka Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh :ne-a 'noror a 'klu-' :naa.

'De mor :neheh', nyor :yoror :or 'beh-dih: :or 'ye :kmuu-nyor-a'a: 'gbu wa, 'de :or 'ye or-a'a: 'tiei-' 'duo: :eh? Jorwor: :mor or 'ye-eh' no, or mu :kmuu-nyor: :dao' :san :weh, 'de or 'ye or-a'a: 'tiei kpa.
Nyor :or se-a 'noror 'an 'for bo :ne, :yee' or vorn 'on bo. :Yee' nyor :or se-a 'on bo 'kpa 'do deh⧾-a' :dha :due' :po-eh bo, :yee' or gboba deh⧾ dih.

:Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, 'an zela a :gwluhuh', nyor⧾-a' deh⧾-zon⧾-a' klehkpeh-: 'dekorn: Nyorsoa-a' 'nyne 'kor-dih-eh-: en mu bo 'ma-dih-eh:. Jorwor: nyor :or 'kor-dih:-a Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu-a' 'nyne, or-a' deh⧾-zon⧾-a' dhih :se-' bo 'ma-dih-eh: i.

Nyor :or mu 'yu an 'da-dih-a Nyor-kpalu-a' 'yu 'bhun dih :wlu-dih:, or-a' deh⧾-zon⧾-a' dhih-a mu bo 'ma-dih-eh:. Jorwor: nyor :or mu-a Gban 'i :ne :Zulu 'bhun dih :wlu-dih:, or-a' deh⧾-zon⧾-a' dhih :se-' bo 'ma-dih-eh: i, :kana-: 'dekorn: 'de 'kmo-a' nya-:.
:Yee' :mor tu no tu 'jeh, :yee' an mu 'bi 'jeh ne :tlo. Jorwor: :mor on no tu-zon, :yee' an mu 'bi-zon⧾ :tlo. Deh no-eh, tu-a' 'bi, me-: nyor⧾-a yubo-dih tu.
A :mor sane-zon⧾-nynuu: :daa, :kaa a :mor, :or 'dhu-a 'kulu-nyor⧾-', a 'ye deh⧾ 'jeh-' :za-a' no :eh? Deh no-eh, deh⧾ :en 'yi-a 'o 'do a-a' :porluh⧾ ken, me-: a-a' worn⧾ za-'.
Nyor 'jeh nor dhe deh⧾ 'jeh dih, 'do :wor or za deh⧾ 'jeh, 'de 'kulu-nyor dhe deh⧾-zon⧾ dih, 'do :wor or za deh⧾-zon⧾.
'An zela a :gwluhuh', :eh :mor 'do Nyorsoa-a' zabe: :zi-we-eh 'di, :gwlor-nyor⧾-a mu bo zela:, 'do wlu⧾ :en yi-a 'o on worn⧾ 'i :due' :due' bo.
Deh no-eh, :an-a' wlu-a mu-eh :no, 'de :on 'ye 'gen :korn, 'de :an-a' wlu-a mu-eh :no, 'de zabe 'ye :on kpon.
:Yee' :Falasi'i-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ 'tele' :torne-nyor⧾-: an-a' nyor⧾ :noo' :wlu 'de :Yusu' bo, on 'dae:, Nyor⧾ deh :torne-nyor:, :a 'bhorn :on 'ye :a 'yi :to-dih-deh 'i :to-dih:.

Jorwor: or :wlu-' 'de on bo, or 'dae:, :Kana-nyor:⧾ :daa, :on no-a deh⧾-zon:⧾ :no-nyor⧾, 'de :an-a' no-a :dhehehn-deh⧾ 'do Nyorsoa bo, an 'bhorn 'yi :to-dih-deh:. Jorwor: 'yi :to-dih-deh :due' an mu-a 'ye-: 'klein', eh-: 'dhu, Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor: :Jona'-a' 'yi :to-dih-deh-'.

Deh no-eh, :ka :Jona' zi-a zorn-we taan-: 'dekorn: glu-we taan-: 'de zimi-eh: :klaba' 'di, :yee' 'ka-: 'yu an 'da-dih-a Nyor-kpalu-a' 'yu-a mu zorn-we taan-: 'dekorn: glu-we taan-: 'de glu :zi-eh :no :ke.

'Do Nyorsoa-a' zabe: :zi-we-eh 'di, 'Neneva-nyor⧾-a mu dih :nyna, 'do :kana-nyor:⧾ :daa ybei', 'de on 'ye-uh zabe :kpon-dih:. Deh no-eh, on 'tali: an-a' deh⧾-zon⧾-: dih, 'de on 'bili: 'de Nyorsoa bo, ti :Jona' po-a Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu⧾ 'de on bo. A :gbee'e:. Nyor :noror' :noror' :ne :daa :naa, or-: 'beh 'i, or-: :zi 'o :Jona'-'.

'Do Nyorsoa-a' zabe: :zi-we-eh 'di, 'keen-nynor: :or 'wluh-a 'de 'bluhba-dlu: :on :ne-a 'de 'yluh-a' 'kwla 'wluh-dih: 'da-a' kona-for bo, or mu dih :nyna, 'do :kana-nyor:⧾ :daa ybei', 'de or 'ye-uh zabe :kpon-dih:. Deh no-eh, or 'wluh :dha :dhorno' or 'ye 'Keen :Salomor'-a' :toror' :korn-eh :dou'⧾ bo :to. A :gbee'e:. Nyor :noror' :noror' :ne :daa :naa, or-: 'beh 'i, or-: :zi 'o :Salomor'-'.

:Yee' :Yusu'-a kpa or-a' wlu 'dlu bo, or 'dae:, :Mor 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh :za-eh 'o nyor 'de, :yee' eh zi-dih-'-: dih, eh na 'de 'kwla⧾-' dih. Eh 'bhorn :dha eh 'ye-a' :forn-dih:. Jorwor: :mor eh se dha 'ye,

:yee' eh 'da, 'An mu 'de 'an-a: 'gbu soa 'di de :mu, :dha 'on 'wluh-a. 'Ka-: 'o eh no, 'de eh yi de. :Yeh eh yi-a de, :yee' eh 'ye eh-a'a: 'gbu soa, on :florn 'di dih, 'de on wobo-eh: 'di dih, on :po-eh: 'kpa.

:Yee' eh mu-', eh :ya 'de 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh:⧾ :nee' :meheh' 'sorn, :en no-a 'kulu-deh⧾, :en :zi-a 'o eh-a' 'jeh-', 'de en pa, en 'ti 'de. :Yee' :mor en gweh 'de or 'di 'dlu, :yee' nyor :dao', or :ne-' 'kmo-zon: :on :zi-a 'o, or-a' :zai' neh-'. :Yee' 'ka-: 'o eh mu :no :ke, 'do :kana-nyor:⧾ :daa :on no-a deh⧾-zon:⧾ :no-nyor⧾ bo.
:Yee' :yeh :Yusu'-a wlu-a 'de nyor⧾ bo :chio'lo:, :yee' or 'de-: 'dekorn: or-a' dei'-nyor⧾-kpalu⧾-: mo-: :nyna dih 'do 'zorn, 'de on dhele: nyor⧾ dih :ka an 'bhorn-a on 'ye-a' 'de or bo :wlu.
'De nyor zela-or :gwluhuh', or 'da, :On 'de-: 'dekorn: :an-a' dei'-boi'-: mo-: :nyna dih 'do 'zorn, :an dhele :on dih. An 'bhorn on 'ye 'de :on bo :wlu.
Jorwor: :Yusu' dhele-or-: dih, or 'dae:, :Or 'dhu 'on-de-' :eh? :Or 'dhu 'an 'de-di'-boi'-' :eh?
'De or slo or-a' son 'de or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾ bo, or 'da, 'On-de-: 'dekorn: 'an 'de-di'-boi'-: mo-: :dhe dih.
Deh no-eh, nyor :or no-a 'On-ba: :or :ne-a 'de yai', or-a' 'ton :korn-deh, or-: 'dhu 'an 'de-di'-boi'-: 'dekorn: 'on-de-:-'.
'Do 'we-eh :due' :dao' 'di, :yee' :Yusu' 'wluh 'de 'gbu 'di, 'de or mu 'de :Galali'i-yobo'-pehnu worn 'i, 'do :wor or :dhe dih.
:Yee' :gwlor-nyor:⧾ :doru', mo-: 'gbo-dih-or 'dlu dih. Eh-: no-eh, 'de or 'kpa 'de 'blagbe 'di, 'do :wor or :dhe dih, 'de an-a' klehkpeh :nyna dih 'do 'kpuhba' 'i.
Or zela-uh deh⧾ :dhulu' :gwluhuh' 'de 'dlan⧾ 'di, or 'dae:, :Yee' 'yu :due' :oo', or-: mu deh⧾-yor: :gba 'da.
:Yeh or gba-ih-a 'de 'gle, :yee' :nee' 'kpa 'o :gwie 'i, 'de neme 'yle, en mla-ih.
:Nee' 'kpa 'o 'bluhba ken, :or :ne-a 'soba 'zorn. :Yeh en 'kpa-a 'o, :yee' en 'dhobo: en 'wluh-'. Deh no-eh, 'bluh :dhulu' se 'o :ne.
Jorwor: :yeh 'yluh :kma-a 'i, :yee' en wlor-'. :Ka en-' buh⧾ se-a :dha :dhorno' mu 'de glu, :yee' en 'klan-'.
'De :nee' 'kpa 'de 'wu⧾-kwla 'nyne-'. :Yeh 'wu⧾ ku-a, :yee' en :mla-dih-ih-: worn.
Jorwor: :nee' 'kpa 'o 'bluhba: 'jeh ken, me-: wa. :Yeh en wa-a, :yee' :nee' po 'yor-a' :kehehn' :due', :nee' po :kwlaa :meheh'lo:, 'de :nee' po :kwlaa taan.
:Yee' :Yusu' 'da, Nyor :or 'ble-a :dou'⧾, 'nyi or 'worn-ih.
:Yee' or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾ yi 'o or bo, 'de on dhele-or dih, on 'dae:, :Eh no 'de :an wlu 'de nyor⧾ bo 'de 'dlan⧾ 'di :eh?
'De or :wlu 'de on bo, or 'dae:, Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh-a' 'slan :za-eh: gbor 'de a :mor :mloror' bo. Jorwor: or :se-' nyor⧾ :dao' 'nyi-eh:.

Deh no-eh, nyor :or 'ye-a deh⧾ :dhulu', or-a'a: deh⧾ :dhulu' or 'ye-a, en mu ken 'kpa-:, 'de or 'ye :doru' 'ble. Jorwor: nyor :or se-a deh 'ye, or-a'a: deh-yu-a' 'jeh or 'ble-a, eh mu-or 'kwa :za-eh:.
Deh-: :korn-a dhih, 'de 'an wlu-dih-a 'de 'dlan⧾ 'di 'de on bo, eh-: 'dhu, an pobo-: dih, jorwor: an-a' 'ye dih. 'De an :to :dou'⧾ 'weh, jorwor: an-a' 'worn dih, 'de mor an-a' 'worn deh-' dih.

:Yee' 'do an-a' dhih bo, deh Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor: :Azaya' :za-a-', eh 'kpa-' dhih 'jeh, or no-a, An mu :dou'⧾ :to :too:, jorwor: on 'se 'ba deh-' dih 'worn, 'de an mu dih pobo: :poboo:, jorwor: on 'se 'ba dih 'ye.

Deh no-eh, nyor⧾ :daa, an-a' 'dlu⧾ 'sun-', 'de on :se-' 'bhorn on 'ye :dou'⧾ :to, 'de on kan 'yli, 'de on :ne-' dih 'ye, 'de on :ne-' dih 'worn, 'de on :ne-' deh-' dih 'worn 'do an-a' :porluh⧾ ken, 'de on :ne-' dih 'bili:, 'de Nyorsoa :ne-uh' 'puh-dih:.
Jorwor: a :mor :mloror', :bhorlie' 'do a-a' 'yli bo. Deh no-eh, en 'ye-: dih. 'De :bhorlie' 'do a-a' :dou'⧾ bo. Deh no-eh, en 'worn-: dih.

Dhih 'jeh, 'an zela a :gwluhuh', Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor:⧾ :dhulu'-: 'dekorn: 'yi 'sleh-nyor:⧾ :dhulu'-: an 'bhorn deh⧾ a 'ye-a, on 'ye-ih' 'ye :dee', jorwor: on :se-ih' 'ye. 'De an 'bhorn deh⧾ a 'worn-a, on 'ye-ih' 'worn :dee', jorwor: on :se-ih' 'worn.
:Yee' a :to :dou'⧾ 'de deh 'yu :or gba-a deh⧾-yor, or-a' 'dlan :daa, or 'dhu-eh:-', a 'ye-eh' yubo:.

Deh⧾-yor: :or 'kpa-a 'o :gwie 'i, or gweh nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on 'worn-a Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh-a' tubo-wlu⧾. Jorwor: on :se-ih' dih 'worn. :Yee' 'ku yi-: 'de, 'de on :za 'o wlu :on :gba-eh 'do on :porluh⧾ ken.
Deh⧾-yor: :or 'kpa-a 'o 'bluhba: :or :ne-a 'soba 'zorn ken, or gweh nyor :or 'worn-a Nyorsoa-a' wlu, 'de :or kpon-uh-a dih, 'do :dha :due' :dao', 'do :porluh-a' dih 'pehn ka 'di.

Jorwor: or se deh-' dih 'worn-eh: 'jeh 'ble 'de or 'di, :yee' or gweh deh⧾-yor: :or :korn-a buh⧾ se-a :dha :dhorno' mu 'de glu, :yee' or-a' :gwle 'o 'do ti :dhorno'⧾ 'di. :Mor 'worn dih 'beh-eh 'yle, 'de 'kle 'ye-eh 'ye 'de yi, 'do Nyorsoa-a' wlu-a' dhih bo, :yee' 'do :dha :due' :dao', or ple-', or 'tali: Nyorsoa-deh-: dih.

Deh⧾-yor: :or 'kpa-a 'de 'wu⧾-kwla 'nyne-', or gweh nyor :or 'worn-a Nyorsoa-a' wlu. Jorwor: 'kmo bo-deh:⧾, me-: 'beh-dih or-a' :porluh 'worn dih. :Ka or 'ye-a' no, 'de or 'ye-a' bhan, eh-: 'da-dih-or 'yi. Deh⧾ :daa, me-: 'yle, :en kpon Nyorsoa-a' wlu :bhluun' 'worn dih, :yee' :ka on 'ye-a' no, 'de on 'ye-a' 'yor po, ka se :ne.

Jorwor: deh⧾-yor: :or 'kpa-a 'o 'bluhba: 'jeh ken, or gweh nyor :or 'worn-a Nyorsoa-a' wlu, 'de :or 'worn-uh-a dih. :Yee' nyor-a' 'jeh :dao', :ka deh⧾-yor: :or po-a 'yor :dhulu', or :ne-a, 'de or-a' :noror' po-a 'yor-a' :kehehn' :due', :noror' po-a 'yor-a' :kwlaa :meheh'lo:, 'de :noror' po-a 'yor-a' :kwlaa taan, :yee' 'ka-: nyor :dao' or :ne :ke.
:Yee' :Yusu' po 'dlan :noror' :neheh', 'de on bo, or 'dae:, Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh gweh :ka nyor-kpalu :due', :or gba-a deh⧾-yor: 'jeh 'de or 'bli 'gle.
Jorwor: ti :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh, an 'mo-a dholo-', :yee' nyor :or 'nyeh-or', or mu 'de 'gle :dao' 'di, 'de or gba :peli'-a' 'yor 'de deh⧾-yor: 'jeh :dao' 'nyne-', 'de or mu.
:Yee' :yeh deh⧾-yor: 'jeh :dao', or me-a, 'de or wa-a 'yor, :yee' :peli' :dao', en me-' :ke.
:Yee' 'yu :or :korn-a gle :dao', or-a'a: 'bhoi-nynuu mu 'de or bo, 'de on 'dae:, Nyor :klaba', eh :se deh⧾-yor: 'jeh, me-: :on se gba 'de :on 'bli 'gle :e? :Yee' dha :peli' :daa, en 'wluh 'da :eh?
'De or 'dae:, Nyor :or 'nyeh-a 'on-' :oo', or-: no deh :dao'. 'De or-a'a: 'bhoi-nynuu 'da, :An 'bhorn :a 'ye mu, :a 'ye :peli' :dao' :za :e?
Jorwor: or 'da, 'Kei:. Nyor se yubo: :mor a :taa :peli' :dao' za, a :ne-' deh⧾-yor: 'jeh :peli' dih :za-dih:.

A 'nyi en-' klehkpeh :ku-dih: :dha :due', 'de eh 'ye deh⧾-yor-a' chehehn-ti no. :Yee' 'do ti :dao' 'di, 'do :wor 'an mu 'an-a: deh⧾-yor: :chehn-nyor⧾ :gwluhuh' zela:, on 'ye :peli' :dao' chehn :zai', on 'ye-ih' 'pu⧾ san, on 'ye-ih' 'yli po, 'de jorwor: on 'ye deh⧾-yor: 'jeh :dao' :dha :due' po, 'do 'on 'bli yai'.
:Yee' :Yusu' po 'dlan :noror' :dele' ka, 'de on bo, or 'dae:, Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh gweh :zlaan'-a' 'yor-eh: :eh 'yu :due' 'duo:-a 'de or gba-a 'de or 'bli 'gle.

:Zlaan'-yor-eh: :dao', eh-: no 'zeehn: neh 'de deh⧾-yor-a' klehkpeh 'nyne-'. Jorwor: :mor eh ku, :yee' eh no :zlaan'-gan: :kolu', :yee' eh 'beh-: 'i, eh :zi 'o gbaa-deh⧾-a' 'yor-a' klehkpeh nyor⧾-a gba-a 'weh, 'de 'dhuu'-deh⧾ 'nyne-', 'de jorwor: neme: :en zi-dih-a-' dih 'de yai', me-: 'yle, 'de en po 'dle⧾ 'do eh-a' 'gabuh⧾ 'nyne-'.

:Yee' :Yusu' po 'dlan :noror' :noror' :dele' ka, 'de on bo, or 'dae:, Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh gweh 'bhlee-a' 'vu-dih-deh:, :eh 'nynor :due' 'duo:-a, 'de or po-a 'bhlee-a' :bhebe' :doru' bo, 'de or zian-dih-a, 'de :eh gweh-a 'bhlee: :bhebe'-a' klehkpeh 'dlu.
:Yee' :Yusu' zela: deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :daa, :gwlor-nyor:⧾ :doru' :gwluhuh', 'de 'dlan⧾ 'di. Or :se 'de nyor⧾ bo :wlu 'de :ka 'sluh 'di, 'dlan⧾ :due', me-: or no, 'de or wlu 'de on bo.

Or no deh :daa 'weh, 'de Nyorsoa-a' wlu 'ye dhih 'jeh-' 'kpa, :ka or-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor no-a eh-a' :za-a' see, or no-a, 'An mu 'de 'dlan⧾ 'di :wlu-dih:. :Yee' 'an mu deh⧾ nyor⧾ se-a yubo: :zai', :en 'zile:-a, :en 'wluh-a 'de 'bluhba-a' glu 'dhu 'da, 'an mu-ih on :gwluhuh' zela:.
:Yee' :yeh :Yusu' 'wluh-a 'do :gwlor-nyor:⧾ :doru' :dao' bo, 'de or pa 'de 'gbu 'di, :yee' or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾ mu 'de or bo, on 'dae:, :Za :peli' :ne 'de 'gle-dlan: :daa gbor 'noror :a bo.
'De or 'dae:, 'Yu :or 'dhu-a deh⧾-yor-a' 'jeh, 'yu an 'da-dih-a Nyor-kpalu-a' 'yu :oo'.
Gle :dao', eh-: 'dhu dha 'bluhba ken-', 'de deh⧾-yor-a' 'jeh :daa, me-: 'dhu nyor⧾ Nyorsoa-a :korn-a wlu 'ken-'. :Peli'-zon:⧾ :dao', me-: 'dhu nyor⧾ :on :korn-a 'de 'ku bo-',

'de nyor :or 'nyeh-or' :or gba-a :peli' :dao', or-: 'dhu 'ku-'. 'Dhuu'-deh:⧾ :dao', en-' chehehn-ti:, eh-: 'dhu 'bluhba-a' 'dlu-' :jla 'da-', :yee' deh⧾-yor: :chehn-nyor:⧾ :dao', mo-: 'dhu 'enjor-nyor⧾-'.
:Ka :peli' :dao', en-' dhih :ne-a, en mu-a :dha :due' :po-eh, en 'ye-a 'yli :po-eh: 'de neh-', 'ka-: 'o eh mu :ne 'do 'bluhba-a' 'dlu-' :jla 'da :ke.

:Yee' 'do ti :dao' 'di, 'yu an 'da-dih-a Nyor-kpalu-a' 'yu-a mu or-a'a: 'enjor-nyor⧾ :dbo, 'de on 'ye deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :en no-eh 'de nyor⧾-a no-a deh⧾-zon⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ :on no-ih-a-: an mu 'de or-a'a: nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh 'nyne-' :za-eh:.
:Yee' or-a'a: 'enjor-nyor⧾-a mu nyor⧾ :dao' 'de neh-' :po, 'do :dha 'vin-a'-: 'dekorn: 'nyne 'i :di-dih-eh-: en mu-a :ne.
:Yee' 'yi 'sleh-nyor⧾-a mu :fan, 'de an-a' dhih-a' 'i 'beh-a' 'di, :ka 'yluh-a no-a fan-a', 'de on :Baa' Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh 'zorn. Nyor :or 'ble-a :dou'⧾, 'nyi or 'worn-ih.

:Yee' Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh gweh bhaan-deh: :eh 'zile:-a 'de 'gle see. 'We-eh :due', 'yu :due', or-: 'tehn-eh dih, 'de or po-eh 'bluh ken :dele' ka. :Yee' 'mona: no-or 'gabaa. Eh-: no-eh, 'de or mu, or plo deh⧾-a' klehkpeh or :korn-a, 'de or dhen gle :dao'.
