:Yee' :Juda' mu 'de 'dhuu'-deh⧾-a' gba-dih-gba :dao' bo 'weh, 'de or kpa 'Wloon-sorye' :noo'-: 'dekorn: Nyorsoa-a' 'sla-a' :poli'si: :noo'-: :yuh Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor:⧾ :klaba'⧾-: 'dekorn: :Falasi'i-nyor⧾-: on dbo-a. An-a' klehkpeh :dao', on kpa :dhali-pu⧾-: 'nape⧾-: 'dekorn: :vorn-dih-deh⧾-: on 'ye :Yusu' kpon.

:Yeh on 'ye :ao' no, :yee' :Yusu' yubo: deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :en mu-a :no-eh, 'do or 'bhun 'weh see. :Yeh or 'ye-uh'-a, :yee' or 'wluh 'de gba-dih-gba 'di 'weh, 'de or 'ya-dih-uh 'i. :Yee' or dhele-uh-: dih, or 'dae:, Nyor a 'bhorn 'kwla⧾-' dih :eh?
'De on 'da, :Yusu' :or 'wluh-a 'Nazla, or-: 'o :a 'bhorn 'kwla⧾-' dih. 'De :Yusu' 'da, 'Mor-: :dhe dih. :Yeh deh⧾ :daa, en mu-a 'dlu bo, :yee' 'do :wor :Juda' :or plo-a :Yusu', or :ne.
:Yeh :Yusu' no-a, 'Mor-: :dhe dih, :yee' nyor⧾ :dao', on :za-dih: ken, 'de an-a' klehkpeh 'ga dih 'do 'bluhbor.
:Yee' or dhele-uh-: dih :neheh', or 'dae:, Nyor a 'bhorn 'kwla⧾-' dih :eh? 'De on 'da, :Yusu' :or 'wluh-a 'Nazla :oo'.
'De or 'da, 'On zela: a :gwluhuh' 'weh, 'on 'da, 'Mor-: :dhe dih. :Mor eh 'dhu 'mor-', a :taa 'kwla⧾-' dih 'bhorn, :yee' a 'tali: nyor⧾ :yuh :daa dih, on 'ye mu. (
Deh :daa, eh :no-eh:-', 'de or-a' wlu or :za-a-', on 'ye dhih 'jeh-' 'kpa, :eh 'dhu-a, 'On-ba:, nyor⧾ :on 'nyi-a 'on, 'on :se-' an-a' nyor :due' 'ma-dih:.)

:Yeh eh no :ao', :yee' Samor' :Piteh' :or 'ble-a :bhla 'jlehn, :yee' or jli-eh 'de kpla-'-: dih, 'de or po-eh, or chehn 'o Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor⧾-a' nyor :klaba'-a'a: 'bhoi-yu-a' :dila-dou'. 'Bhoi-yu: :dao', or-a' 'nyne :wor :Mala'ka:.
Jorwor: :Yusu' :wlu-' 'de :Piteh' bo, or 'da, Po 'de :an-a'a: :bhla 'jlehn 'de kpla-' de. 'Kle 'ye-eh-a' 'korbuh 'On-ba: 'nyi-a 'on, 'on 'ye-a' 'di 'na-dih:, 'on :se-uh' 'di 'na-dih: i :e?
:Yee' sorye' :dao'-: an-a'a: :janbe-: 'dekorn: :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' :poli'si: :dao'-: mo-: kpon :Yusu'. 'De on san-or,
on kpa-or 'de 'yu :due' an 'da-dih-a 'Aneh bo :zai'. 'Aneh no :Kai'fa-a'a: 'nynor :baa'. 'De :Kai'fa no Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor⧾-a' nyor :klaba' 'do zon :dao' 'di.
:Kai'fa-a' 'jeh :dao', or-: 'o, :or :wlu 'de :Jueh'-nyor⧾ bo :dee' see, or 'da, eh :nmor-: 'yi nyor :due' 'ye 'meh 'do :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh-a' dhih bo.

:Yee' Samor' :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: :Yusu'-a'a: bo :na-nyor: :noror'-: mo-: zi 'o :Yusu' klei'. Jorwor: :ka Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor⧾-a' nyor :klaba' yubo:-a bo :na-yu: :dao', :yee' or :due' mu 'o Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor⧾-a' nyor :klaba'-a'a: 'gbu ybei', or zi 'o :Yusu' klei'.

Jorwor: :Piteh' :se 'o mu. Or fuo-uh-: 'ken 'do gba-dih-gba-a' :kpaa' worn 'i, 'noror 'zorn. :Yee' :Yusu'-a'a: bo :na-yu: :dao', Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor⧾-a' nyor :klaba' yubo:-a, or yi-: de, 'de or :wlu 'de 'nynor-kpao'-yu: :or 'dhu-a :kpaa' 'yli-eh bo, 'de or 'worn or 'ye :Piteh' :pa-dih:.
:Yeh :Piteh' pa-a, :yee' 'nynor-kpao'-yu: :dao', or :wlu-' 'de or bo, or 'dae:, :On :se :Yusu'-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾-a' nyor :due' ke :e? 'De :Piteh' 'da, 'Kei:. Eh :se 'mor-:.
'Do ti :dao' 'di, :yee' :chehbe'-a: 'yle. Eh-: no-eh, 'de 'bhoi-nynuu-: 'dekorn: :poli'si: :dao'-: on dhba neh, 'de an 'wona. 'De :Piteh' mu 'o :ke, or 'ye 'wona:.
:Yeh deh⧾ :daa, en mu-a 'dlu bo, :yee' Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor⧾-a' nyor :klaba'-a 'chleh :Yusu', 'do or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: or-a' nyor⧾ deh :torne-eh-: en-' dhih bo.

:Yee' :Yusu' :wlu-' 'de or bo, or 'dae:, :Mor 'on :taa 'de nyor⧾ :on :ne-a dha 'kmo bo wlu, :yee' 'an nyna 'o :gwlor :gwea dih. 'Do ti-a' klehkpeh bo, 'an torne nyor⧾ deh, 'de :a-a'a: 'di :gweh-dih-sla⧾ 'zorn-: 'dekorn: 'do Nyorsoa-a' 'sla ybei'-: :dha :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh, an 'kpa-dih-a :dha :due'. 'On 'see deh-' za, 'de 'gbu 'de.
:Eh :korn dhih, 'de :an 'chleh 'on :eh? Dhele: nyor⧾ :on 'worn-a 'an wlu dih. On yubo: deh 'on :za-a-' 'weh.
:Yeh :Yusu' :za-a deh :daa-', :yee' :poli'si-yu :due', :or :nyna-a 'o or 'bhun dih, or-: po-or 'kpa 'yli, 'de or 'da, 'Ka-: nyor no 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor⧾-a' nyor :klaba' bo :wlu-eh :e?
'De :Yusu' 'da, :Mor 'on :za deh-zon-', :yee' za-eh'. Jorwor: :mor deh⧾ 'on :za-a-', :mor en 'dhu dhih 'jeh-', :yee' :eh :korn dhih, :on po 'on 'kpa 'yli :eh?
:Yee' :ka on no-a or-a' san-a' :chio'lo:, :yee' 'ka-: or :ne, 'de 'Aneh dbo-or 'de :Kai'fa bo, :or no-a Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor⧾-a' nyor :klaba'.

:Yeh deh⧾ :daa, en mu-a 'dlu bo, :yee' 'do :wor Samor' :Piteh' :ne, or 'wona 'gboror:, 'de on dhele-or dih, on 'da, :An-a' 'jeh :daa, :on :se :Yusu'-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾-a' nyor :due' :ke :e? :Yeh on dhele-or dih, :yee' or dhobo-ih' 'weh, or 'da, Keen'. Eh :se 'mor-:.

:Yeh :Piteh' 'da :ao', :yee' Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor⧾-a' nyor :klaba'-a'a: 'bhoi-yu :due', :or :ne 'yu :or :korn-a :dou' :Piteh' chehn-a 'o, on 'wluh-a, or-a' 'jeh :dao', or-: dhele: :Piteh' dih, or 'dae:, Eh :se :mor, 'on 'ye-a 'de 'dhuu'-deh⧾-a' gba-dih-gba 'di, 'do :Yusu' bo :e?
:Yee' :Piteh' dhobo-ih' :neheh' :dele' ka. :Yee' 'do :dha :due' :dao', :soan'-beor zlo-'.

:Yee' :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' nyor⧾ :na-dih-nyor⧾ :za 'de :Yusu' 'de :Kai'fa bo, 'de on kpa-or 'de 'Wloon-gomla-a' nyor :klaba'-a'a: 'sla bo, zorn bo-mlai'. Jorwor: :Jueh'-nyor:⧾ :dao', on :se-' 'bhorn on 'ye :kane' dih :ne. Eh-: no-eh, 'de on :se 'de 'sla :dao' ya 'ya. :Mor on no-eh, :yee' on se 'beh-dih: on 'ye 'Meh-a' :bla-dih: 'dlu dih-gor-a' dii-deh⧾ di.
Eh-: no-eh, 'de Pale' :or no-a 'gomla-nyor⧾-a' nyor :klaba' :dao', or 'si 'noror on bo 'zorn dih, 'de or dhele-uh dih, or 'dae:, Deh 'i-deh: 'yu :daa, or no, 'de a ya-or 'noror 'on bo :eh?
'De on 'da, :Mor or se deh-zon no :dee', :yee' :a :se-or' 'noror :on bo :ya i.
:Yee' Pale' 'dae:, A-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh, a 'duo-or', a 'ye-or' zabe zi, :ka a-a'a: 'tele' no-a mu-a'. 'De on 'da, :A se 'kpih 'ble, :a 'ye nyor wlu 'ken chehn, or 'ye 'meh. (
Deh :daa, eh :no-eh:-', 'de deh :Yusu' :za-a-', 'de eh 'ye dhih 'jeh-' 'kpa, 'do 'meh-a' or mu-a 'meh-:, :ka or :korn or 'ye-a' :ne.)
:Yee' Pale' 'ya 'de or 'bli 'sla ya-: de :neheh', 'de or 'da :Yusu' 'do or bo, or 'dae:, :Mor 'o, :or 'dhu :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'keen-' :e?
'De :Yusu' 'da, Deh :daa, :an dhele-a 'on dih, eh 'wluh 'o :an-a' 'jeh :gwlii' :e? :Ae' nyor⧾ 'sluh⧾ zela: :on :gwluhuh', 'an dhih?

'De Pale' 'da, :Mor :on :taa 'ye, :yee' :on 'da, 'mor :Jueh'-yu :oo' :e? :An-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh-a'a: nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor:⧾ :klaba'⧾-: mo-: :za :on 'kwla 'noror 'on bo. Deh 'i-deh: :on no :eh?

'De :Yusu' 'da, 'An nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh se dha yao 'zorn :korn. :Mor eh 'dhu, eh :korn dha yao 'zorn :dee', :yee' 'an-a: bo :na-nyor⧾-a mu :vorn :dee', on :se-' 'worn-: i, nyor⧾ :se 'de 'on :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' nyor⧾ :na-dih-nyor⧾ 'kwa :po i. Jorwor: 'an nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh se dha yao 'zorn :korn.

:Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' Pale' 'da, :Yee' dhih 'jeh, :mor 'keen :oo' :e? 'De :Yusu' 'da, :Mor :on 'da, 'mor 'keen :oo', :yee' :on :se-' 'gbeh. Eh-a' dhih :oo', 'on 'wluh. 'De mor, eh-a' dhih :oo', 'on yi 'noror yao 'zorn :ke, 'on 'ye dhih-a' 'yor-eh ken dih zela:. Nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a 'noror dhih-a' 'yor-eh-a' 'for bo, mo-: :an 'worn 'an wlu.

:Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' Pale' dhele-or-: dih, or 'da, :Eh 'dhu dhih-a' 'yor-eh-' :eh? :Yeh Pale' :za-a deh :daa-', :yee' or 'si-: 'zorn, or mu 'de :Jueh'-nyor⧾ bo de :dele' ka, 'de or :wlu 'de on bo, or 'dae:, 'On :se-or' deh-zon 'bhun 'ye, :eh 'ye-eh' no, 'de zabe 'ye-or' kpon.

Jorwor: :mor a-a' 'Meh-a' :bla-dih: 'dlu dih-gor-a' ti :taa 'o nyni 'o, zon 'o zon, :yee' 'an za 'de :kasue 'di nyor :due', :yor a 'bhorn-a, :or 'ye-a' 'de 'wluh. A 'bhorn 'on 'ye :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'keen dih 'tali: 'do a bo :e?
:Yeh or dhele-uh-a dih, :yee' on 'wor-', on 'dae:, 'Kei o. :A :se-or' 'bhorn. Jorwor: :Bala'ba:, or-: :a 'bhorn. (:Bala'ba: :dao', an 'bhorn-a, or no 'gomla worn :bla-dih-nyor⧾-a' nyor :due'.)
:Yee' Pale' no-eh', 'de or-a'a: sorye' bla :Yusu'.
'De on gle 'wu⧾-a' 'gbeheh, :ka 'keen :gblaa' :ne-a, eh-: on 'dhu 'o or 'dlu. :Yee' on :pa-dih-or :gba 'vuu: :on :kpe-a gbor.
'De on yi 'o or bo, an no, :Gwle 'kmo o, :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'keen. 'De an po-or 'kpa⧾ 'yli.

:Yee' Pale' 'si-: 'zorn :neheh' :dele' ka, 'de or :wlu 'de :Jueh'-nyor:⧾ :dao' bo, or 'dae:, A :gbee'e:. 'An ya-or 'de a bo 'zorn 'weh, 'de a 'ye-eh' yubo:, :ka 'on se-or deh-zon 'bhun 'ye, :eh 'ye-eh' no, 'de zabe 'ye-or' kpon.
:Yee' :yeh :Yusu' :taa 'zorn 'si, :yee' 'wu⧾-gbla: on 'dhu-a 'o or 'dlu-: 'dekorn: :gba 'vuu: :dao'-: me-: :ne 'o or 'bhun. 'De Pale' 'dae: 'de on bo, A :gbee'e:. 'Yu a 'da-a, or-: :dhe dih.

:Yeh Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor:⧾ :klaba'⧾-: 'dekorn: Nyorsoa-a' 'sla-a' :poli'si-: on 'ye-or, :yee' an po 'geh⧾, an no, :Kor-dih-or 'o tu 'i o. :Kor-dih-or 'o tu 'i o. Jorwor: Pale' 'da, A-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh 'duo-or', a 'ye-or' 'o tu 'i :kor-dih:. 'Mor :mloror', 'on :se-or' deh-zon 'bhun 'ye, :eh 'ye-eh' no, 'de zabe 'ye-or' kpon.
'De on 'da, :A 'ble 'tele'. 'De :ka :a-a'a: 'tele' no-a mu-a', :yee' or :korn or 'ye 'meh. Deh no-eh, or 'da-dih or-a' 'jeh Nyorsoa-a' 'Yu.
:Yeh Pale' 'worn-a deh :daa, :yee' :fano-a: no-or 'gabaa, eh :zi 'o ken dih.
:Yee' or 'ya 'de or 'bli 'sla ya-: de. 'De or dhele: :Yusu' dih, or 'dae:, Dha :on 'wluh :eh? Jorwor: :Yusu' :se-' :wlu.
'De Pale' 'da, :On :se-' :wlu i :e? :On se-eh yubo:, :ka 'on 'ble-a 'kpih, 'on 'ye-a :on dih 'tali: :e, 'de mor 'on 'ble-a 'kpih, 'on 'ye-a 'o :on tu 'i :kor-dih: :e?

'De :Yusu' 'da, :Mor eh 'dhu :an-a' 'kpih se 'de Nyorsoa bo 'wluh, :yee' :on se 'kpih 'ble :on 'ye 'on deh-' :no-dih:. :Yee' eh-a' dhih, nyor :or :za-a 'on 'kwla 'noror :on bo, or-a' deh-zon 'beh-: 'i, eh :zi 'o :an-a' neh-'.

:Yeh Pale' 'worn-a deh :daa, :yee' or 'bhorn :ka or 'ye-a' no, 'de or 'ye-a' :Yusu' dih 'tali:, or 'ye-a' mu. Jorwor: :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a kpa 'geh⧾ :po-eh 'dlu bo, on 'dae:, :Mor eh 'dhu, :on 'tali: 'yu :daa dih, 'ye or 'ye mu, :yee' :on :to-dih-eh :a 'i, :ka :on se-a 'Wloon-nyor⧾-a' 'keen-' :ybeh. Deh no-eh, nyor :or 'da-dih-a or-a' 'jeh 'keen, :yee' or vorn 'Wloon-nyor⧾-a' 'keen bo.

:Yeh Pale' 'worn-a deh on :za-a-', :yee' or 'si-dih: :Yusu'-: 'zorn, 'do :dha on no-a, 'de an 'da-dih-a 'Soba ken. ('De :Hiblu'-wlu 'di, an 'da-dih 'o :Gaba'ta:.) 'Do :wor Pale' :dhe dih, 'de zabe: :zi :kpala' 'di.
:Yee' eh no 'yluh-gbao', 'de eh :sie: 'o 'we-eh :due', eh 'ye 'Meh-a' :bla-dih: 'dlu dih-gor-a' ti no, 'de Pale' :wlu 'de on bo, or 'dae:, A :gbee'e:. A-a'a: 'keen :wor :dhe dih.

:Yee' an po 'geh⧾, an no, 'Dba-or o. 'Dba-or o. :Kor-dih-or 'o tu 'i o. 'De Pale' 'da, A 'bhorn 'on 'ye a-a'a: 'keen 'dba :e? :Yee' Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor:⧾ :klaba'⧾ 'da, :A se 'keen 'ble o. 'Wloon-nyor⧾-a' 'keen :due', or-: 'dhu :a-a'a: 'keen-' o.
:Yee' Pale' za-or-: 'kwla, 'de on bo, or 'ye 'o tu 'i :kor-dih-eh:. :Yee' on kpa :Yusu' 'weh.
'De or 'ble or-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh-a'a: 'klorse tu, or za-uh 'o :gwlor-', or kpa-uh 'o, :dha an 'da-dih-a, Nyor-dlu-kpaa'-tluh ken. ('De :Hiblu'-wlu 'di, an 'da-dih 'o :Gorgor'ta:.)
'Do :wor on :kor-dih-or 'o tu 'i. :Yee' nyor⧾ 'sororn', mo-: :ne or :kor-dih-eh: 'o tu 'i :dha :due'. :Due' :ne 'de or-a' :dila bo, 'de :due' :ne 'de or-a' kona bo. 'De :Yusu' :ne 'o an-a' gwea.
'De Pale' zela: nyor⧾ :gwluhuh', on 'ye 'chlee'-deh⧾ 'chle, 'de on 'ye-ih' 'o 'klorse tu 'i po, :en no-a, :Yusu' :or 'wluh-a 'Nazla. :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'keen.

'Chlee'-deh:⧾ :dao', en 'chle-eh:-' 'de :Hiblu'-wlu 'di-: 'de 'Wloon-nyor⧾-a' wlu 'di-: 'dekorn: 'Glii-nyor⧾-a' wlu 'di-:. :Yee' :Jueh'-nyor:⧾ :dhulu', mo-: :an zlo-ih. Deh no-eh, 'do :dha :Yusu' :kor-dih-eh: 'o tu 'i, 'do 'koan'-dih: 'o :Julu'slehn-: dih.

:Yeh Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor:⧾ :klaba'⧾ zlo-a 'chlee'-deh:⧾ :dao', :yee' on :wlu-' 'de Pale' bo, on 'dae:, :An-a' :no-', :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'keen :oo'. Jorwor: deh :on 'ye-a' 'chle, eh-: 'dhu, :on 'da, 'Yu :daa, or 'dae:, or-: :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'keen :oo'.
:Yeh on 'da :ao', :yee' Pale' 'da, Deh 'on 'chle-a, 'on 'chle-eh' :weh.

:Yeh sorye' :kor-dih-or 'o tu 'i, :yee' on 'duo: or-a'a: paa-tiei-' on za-or dih 'weh, 'de on gble-ih', on za-ih 'dlu⧾-kpor⧾ :nyieh-'. 'De an-a' nyor :due'-a kpa :due', 'de :noror'-a kpa :due'. Deh :due' :eh :sie:-a 'o dih, eh-: 'dhu, or-a'a: 'wla, :or :dba-eh, 'de :or se-a 'i 'dhu-dih-eh:.

'De on 'da, :A-a' :chlan-or'. A 'nyi, :a vorn :nobo, nyor :or mu-eh :kpa, :a 'ye-or' 'ye. Deh :daa, an no-a, eh :no-eh:-', 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh-a' wlu 'ye dhih 'jeh-' 'kpa, :eh no-a, On gble 'an-a: paa-tiei 'weh, 'de an-a' 'jeh 'nyne-', 'de on vorn :nobo, 'do 'an-a: 'wla-a' dhih bo. :Yee' deh :daa, eh-: sorye' :dao', on no.

'Klorse :tu on :kor-dih:-a 'o :Yusu' 'i, 'do on 'bhun, 'do :wor :Yusu' 'de-: or 'de-a' dei'-nynor-kpao'-: :Kleo'pa-a'a: 'nynor :Mehle'-: 'dekorn: :Mehle' :or 'wluh-a :gwlor an 'da-dih-a :Magala'-: on :nyna dih.

:Yeh :Yusu' 'ye-a or 'de-: 'dekorn: or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾-a' nyor :due' or :ybeh-a 'gabaa-: 'de on :nyna-a 'o dih, :yee' or :wlu-' 'de or 'de bo, or 'dae:, 'On-de:, 'duo: 'yu :daa, or 'ye :an-a'a: nyor-kpalu-yu no.
'De or :wlu 'de or-a'a: bo :na-yu: :dao' bo :ke, or 'dae:, :On 'de :wor :dhe dih. :Eh 'wluh-a 'o ti :dao' 'di, :yee' bo :na-yu: :dao', or 'duo: :Yusu' 'de-' 'weh, 'de or kpa-or 'de or 'bli 'gbu.
:Yee' :Yusu' yubo-eh' :ka deh⧾-a' klehkpeh, en :jla-' 'dlu-' 'do :dha 'o. :Yee' :ka deh Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh :za-a-', eh 'ye-a' dhih 'jeh-' 'kpa, :yee' or 'dae:, 'Ni 'na-ton-a: no 'on.
:Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' :yabo' :or 'yi-a 'dli-' :pa-nomor 'di, :or :dhe-a 'o dih, or-: on po :fuu'u bo, on 'dhu-uh 'o tu an 'da-dih-a 'hesor 'i, 'de on 'tuh-uh 'o :Yusu' worn 'i.
:Yeh on 'tuh-uh-a 'o or worn 'i, 'de or 'na-or, :yee' or 'dae:, Deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :jla-'. :Yee' or bla 'dlu glu, 'de or chehn :febeh' 'i.

:Yee' :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' nyor⧾ :na-dih-nyor⧾ bale: Pale' 'weh, or 'ye-uh' 'tele' 'nyi, on 'ye nyor⧾ :on :kor-dih-eh 'o tu 'i, an-a' buh⧾ dih jela:, 'de on 'ye 'dhobo: on 'ye 'meh, 'de on 'ye-uh 'o tu 'i :za. Deh :korn-a dhih, an 'bhorn-a on 'ye-a' deh :daa no, eh-: 'dhu, eh no Nyorsoa-a' :gwlee-we-eh-a' 'tiei-a' 'kpa :po-zorn:, 'de on :se-' 'bhorn Nyorsoa-a' :gwlee-we-eh 'ye 'o nyor⧾ :dao' tu 'i :yeh-dih:. Deh no-eh, :gwlee-we-eh: :dao', :eh yi-a 'de, eh 'kpa deh ken 'gabaa.
'De sorye' mu, on jela: :tehn 'i nor-a' buh⧾ dih :or :ne :Yusu' :kor-dih-eh: 'o 'klorse tu 'i :dha :due'. 'Ka-: on no 'sororn' nor-a' dhih :ke.
Jorwor: :yeh on :yeh-dih:-a :Yusu' ken, 'de on 'ye-or, :ka or 'meh-a, :yee' on :se-' or-a' buh⧾ dih jela:.
Jorwor: sorye'-yu :due', or-: 'duo: 'di-', 'de or tba-eh 'o or 'gben-', :yee' 'do :dha :due' :dao', nyomor-: 'dekorn: 'ni-: me-: 'wluh 'o or gben bo, :en 'si 'zorn.

Nyor :or 'ye-a deh :daa eh-a' dha, or zela-eh ken dih 'weh, 'de deh or zela:-a ken dih, eh no dhih 'jeh. Or-a' 'jeh yubo-eh', :ka or za-a dhih-a' 'yor-eh-'. Eh-: :korn dhih, or zela-eh ken dih, a 'ye-eh' dhih 'jeh-' po.
Deh⧾ :daa, en :no-eh:-', 'de deh Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh :za-a-', eh 'ye dhih 'jeh-' 'kpa, :eh no-a, Or-a' 'kpa :due'-beh :se-' :jla i.
:Yee' eh za-eh' 'weh, 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh 'di :neheh', eh 'da, Nyor on tba-a 'di 'gben-', or-: an mu ya pobo:.

:Yeh deh⧾ :daa, en zi-a, :yee' 'Joseh: :or 'wluh-a :gwlor an 'da-dih-a Amati'a 'di, or-: dhele: Pale' dih, or 'ye :Yusu'-a' 'ku kpa. 'Joseh-a' 'jeh :dao', or no :Yusu'-a'a: bo :na-nyor:. Jorwor: or-a' :nyeh 'i, deh no-eh, or ple :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'yli 'weh. :Yeh or dhele:-a Pale' dih, :yee' Pale' 'nyi-or :Yusu'-a' 'ku 'weh, 'de or kpa-uh.

'Nekodi'ma: :or mu-a 'de :Yusu' bo 'gwie-we-eh :due', or-: zi 'o 'Joseh klei' :ke. 'De or :ya 'de 'mina-: 'dekorn: 'alo-: :en zian-dih:-a, 'de nyor⧾-a po-dih-ih-a 'ku 'kpa, 'de on :sor po-a 'no. Deh⧾-a' 'jeh :dao', en-' kwa :ku-eh gweh :koo-blor 'i.

:Yee' nyor⧾ 'sororn' :dao', on 'duo: :Yusu'-a' 'ku-' 'weh, 'de on po-or deh⧾ :dao' :en po-a 'no 'jeh kle-' dih, 'de on bhian-dih-or 'nena-ylii kle-' dih. 'Ka-: 'o, :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a no nyor dih nma-dih-eh, 'de on 'bli.
:Yee' 'do :dha on :kor-dih:-a 'o :Yusu' tu 'i, :yee' 'dhuu'-deh⧾-a' gba-dih-gba :ne 'o, 'do :wor nma-dih-deh: :dele' :ne, on no-a 'de 'soba 'di, :eh on 'see-a nyor 'di dih nma-dih :zai'.
:Yee' :ka eh no-a Nyorsoa-a' :gwlee-we-eh-a' 'tiei-a' 'kpa :po-zorn, 'de nma-dih-deh: :dao', eh 'koan'-dih:-a 'o dih, eh-: no-eh, 'de on nma-dih: :Yusu' dih 'do mor.

:Yee' 'doror'-dlu-a' :zai'-we-eh: an 'da-dih-a 'Sorle, 'do eh-a' dholo-zorn-mlai' 'di, :yee' :Mehle' :or 'wluh-a :Magala', or mu 'de :Yusu'-a' nma-dih-deh bo. :Yeh or nyni-a 'o eh bo, :yee' or 'ye-eh' :ka sobu' 'wluh-a 'o eh worn 'i.

:Yeh or 'ye-eh, :yee' or kpa ple-a' 'de Samor' :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: :Yusu'-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾-a' nyor :due' or :ybeh-a bo, 'de or zela-uh :gwluhuh', or 'dae:, On :za 'de :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'ku 'de nma-dih-deh 'di 'weh o. 'De :dha on 'dhu-uh-a, :a se 'o yubo: o.
:Yeh on 'worn-ih'-a, :yee' :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: bo :na-yu: :dao'-: :yee' on mu 'de nma-dih-deh bo 'weh.
'De an-a' klehkpeh, an ple. :Yee' bo :na-yu: :dao', or zi :Piteh'-: dih, or nyni 'o nma-dih-deh bo :zai'.
:Yeh or nyni-a 'o eh bo, :yee' or 'jli-: dih, 'de or pobo: 'de eh 'di, or 'ye 'nena-ylii: :dao', :en 'pehn-a dih 'de mor. Jorwor: or :se 'de eh 'di pa.
:Yee' Samor' :Piteh' :or :sie:-a de, or 'si-: dih, 'de or pa 'de nma-dih-deh 'di, 'de or 'ye 'nena-ylii: :dao' :ke,
'dekorn: 'yli-eh: :yeh on bhian-dih:-a :Yusu'-a' 'dlu kle-' dih. Eh :ne 'nena-ylii se :dha :due' :ne. Eh polo-eh: 'i, 'de eh 'pehn 'dor.

:Yee' :Yusu'-a'a: bo :na-yu: :dao', :or nyni-a 'o nma-dih-deh bo :zai', or pa 'de eh 'di 'weh :ke. 'De or 'ye 'ylii: :dao', :en :ne-a 'de. :Yeh or 'ye-ih'-a, :yee' or po-eh-' dhih 'jeh, :ka :Yusu' :sorn-a-'. (
Jorwor: deh Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh :za-a-', :eh no-a, or :korn or 'ye 'de nma-dih-deh 'di 'wluh :gbor :gbor, :yee' on 'see-eh dih 'worn 'gboror:.)
:Yeh eh no :ao', :yee' :Yusu'-a'a: bo :na-nyor:⧾ :dao', on mu on 'bli deh⧾-' dih.
:Yeh :Yusu'-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾ 'sororn' :dao', on mu-a, :yee' :Mehle' :sie: 'o nma-dih-deh worn 'i 'weh, 'de or :nyna 'o dih, or 'vin. :Ka or 'vin-a, 'ka-: or bla 'yli-eh dih 'de eh 'di.
'De or 'ye 'enjor-nyor⧾ 'sororn', :on pa-a 'tiei-plu⧾-'. 'De on :dhe 'o :dha :Yusu'-a' 'ku 'pehn-a dih :dee' dih. :Due' :ne 'de 'dlu bo, 'de :due' :ne 'noror buh⧾ bo.
:Yeh on 'ye-a :Mehle', :yee' on dhele-or-: dih, on 'dae:, 'Nynor, :eh 'vin-dih: :on :eh? 'De :Mehle' 'da, On kpa 'an-a: :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'ku 'weh. 'De :dha on 'dhu-uh-a, 'on se 'o yubo:.
:Yeh or :za-a deh :daa-', :yee' or 'bili:-'-: dih, 'de or 'ye :Yusu', or :nyna dih. Jorwor: or se-or 'i yubo:.

'De :Yusu' dhele-or dih, or 'dae:, 'Nynor, :eh 'vin-dih: :on :eh? Deh 'i-deh-nyor: 'o, :an 'bhorn 'kwla⧾-' dih :eh? :Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' :mor :Mehle' :taa 'ye :dee', :yee' or 'da 'yu :or no-a :koan 'de 'dhuu'-deh:⧾ :dao' 'nyne-', or-: 'o :dee'. 'De :Mehle' :wlu 'de or bo, or 'dae:, Nyor :klaba', :mor eh 'dhu, :on mor-', 'de :on 'ye-or' kpa, :yee' :torne: 'on :dha :on 'dhu-or, 'de 'on 'ye-or' 'duo:, 'on 'ye-or' kpa.

:Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' :Yusu' :wlu-' 'de or bo, or 'dae:, :Mehle'. :Yeh or 'da-a or-a' 'nyne, :yee' :Mehle' 'bili:-'-: dih 'de or bo, 'de or 'wor, 'de :Hiblu'-wlu 'di, or 'dae:, :Wlabo'ni:, :eh :bleh-dih:-a 'i, Nyor⧾ deh :torne-nyor:.

:Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' :Yusu' :wlu-' 'de or bo, or 'dae:, :An-a' :kpon-' 'on dih. Deh no-eh, 'on 'see 'de 'On-ba bo de mu. Jorwor: mu, :on 'ye 'an-a: bo :na-nyor⧾ :gwluhuh' zela:, :ka 'an mu-a 'de 'On-ba-: a :Baa'-: 'dekorn: 'an Nyorsoa-: a-a' Nyorsoa-: bo yai' :mu.

:Yeh :Yusu' :za-a deh :daa-' 'de or bo, :yee' :Mehle' :or 'wluh-a :Magala', or mu 'de :Yusu'-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾ bo, or 'ye-uh :gwluhuh' zela: :ka or 'ye-a :Gwlor :baa'. 'De or zela-uh deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :Yusu' :za-a-' 'de or bo :gwluhuh' :ke.

:Yee' eh no 'doror'-dlu: :dao', an-a' :zai'-we-eh-a' 'gwie-yluh bo, 'do :wor :Yusu'-a'a: bo :na-nyor:⧾ :dao', on 'kpa-dih: :dha :due', 'de on 'gba :kpaa'. Deh no-eh, an ple :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'yli 'weh. :Yeh on :ne-a 'de 'gbu, :yee' :Yusu' 'wluh-dih-uh-: 'i, 'de or :nyna 'o on 'nyne-' dih, or 'dae:, :Porluh-a' dih 'pehn-eh: 'do a bo.
:Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' or :to 'o or-a' :kola⧾-: 'dekorn: 'do or 'gben-'-: on 'ye-ih' 'ye. :Yee' 'mona 'yi-dih-uh-: dih. Deh no-eh, on 'ye an-a'a: :Gwlor :baa' 'weh.
:Yee' :Yusu' :wlu-' 'de on bo :dele' ka, or 'dae:, :Porluh-a' dih 'pehn-eh: 'do a bo. :Ka 'On-ba no-a, 'de or dbo-a 'on, 'ka-: 'o, 'an no :ke, 'de 'an dbo a-uh.
:Yeh or gweh-a deh :daa, eh-a' :za-a' 'i, :yee' or po-uh :pobor' ya, or 'dae:, A 'ye Gban 'i :ne :Zulu o.
:Mor eh 'dhu, nyor-beh no deh-zon, 'de a 'ye eh-a' dhih bo 'ma-dih:, :yee' Nyorsoa-a mu eh-a' dhih bo 'ma-dih: :ke. :Mor a se eh-a' dhih bo 'ma-dih:, :yee' Nyorsoa :se-' eh-a' dhih bo 'ma-dih: i :ke.
Ti :Yusu' 'wluh-dih:-a or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾ 'i, :yee' :Tormor' :or no-a or-a'a: bo :na-nyor:⧾ :on :korn-a :bhue: 'yor :ne-a 'sororn', an-a' nyor :due', an 'da-dih-a 'Gba-yu, :yee' or se 'o 'si.

:Yeh on 'ye-or, :yee' on zela-or-: :gwluhuh', :ka on 'ye-a :Gwlor :baa'. :Yeh on zela-or :gwluhuh', :yee' or :wlu-' 'de on bo, or 'dae:, 'On :se-eh' dhih 'jeh-' :po i, :mor eh 'dhu 'on 'ye 'tulu-a' 'gor, 'de or 'kwa. 'De mor :mor 'on po 'de 'an :jii-eh 'do :dha 'tulu-a' 'gor :ne-a, 'de 'on 'ye 'o or 'gben-' dih 'tuh, 'de jorwor: 'on 'ye-eh' dhih 'jeh-' po.

:Yeh 'doror'-dlu :due' zi-a, :yee' :Yusu'-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾ :gweh-dih: 'de 'gbu 'di :neheh'. :Yee' :Tormor' :ne 'de on 'klu-' 'weh. Keen' :mloror' :kpaa' 'gba-eh:-', jorwor: :yeh an mu-a 'ye-:, :yee' :Yusu' :nyna dih 'de on 'nyne-', or 'dae:, :Porluh-a' dih 'pehn-eh: 'do a bo.

:Yee' or :wlu-' 'de :Tormor' bo, or 'dae:, :Tormor', :gbee'e:. 'Noror 'on 'kwa :wor :dhe dih. 'Kpa 'o :an-a' :jii-eh, :on 'ye 'o dih 'tuh. Slo son, :on 'ye 'o 'do 'on 'gben-' dih 'tuh. :An-a' :porluh 'bor dhobo-eh. Po-eh dhih 'jeh-'.
:Yeh :Yusu' 'da :ao', :yee' :Tormor' :wlu-' 'de or bo, or 'dae:, 'An :Gwlor :baa'. 'An Nyorsoa.
:Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' :Yusu' 'da, :Tormor', deh :on 'ye-a 'on :naa, eh-: no-eh, 'de :on po-eh dhih 'jeh-' :e? :Bhorlie' 'do nyor⧾ :dao' bo, :on se-a 'on 'ye, 'de :on po-eh dhih 'jeh-'.
:Yee' nyor⧾ 'yi :to-dih-deh:⧾ :dhulu' :nee', me-: :Yusu' no, 'do or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾ ybei'. Jorwor: en :se-' 'chle-eh: 'noror 'chlee-deh: :daa 'di.
Jorwor: :yih :daa, en 'chle-eh:-', 'de a 'ye-eh' dhih 'jeh-' po, :ka :Yusu' 'dhu-a Nyorsoa-a' 'Yu or 'tan-a-'. 'De :mor eh 'dhu, a po or-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-', :yee' a mu 'kmo :sie: :febeh' 'ye-:.
:Yeh deh⧾ :daa en zi-a, :yee' :Yusu' 'wluh-dih: or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾ 'i, 'do :Tabi'lor-yobo'-pehnu worn 'i. :Ka or no-a an-a' 'yi 'wluh-dih-eh, eh-: :dhe dih.

Eh :korn 'we-eh :due', :yee' Samor' :Piteh'-: :Tormor' an 'da-dih-a 'Gba-yu-: :Natanio' :or 'wluh-a 'Kena 'de :Galali'i-bluhba ken-: :Zehbehli'-a'a: nyor⧾-kpalu⧾-nynuu-: 'dekorn: :Yusu'-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾-a' nyor⧾ 'sororn' :noo'-: an-a' klehkpeh :dao', mo-: :ne :dha :due'.

:Yeh on :ne-a 'o, :yee' Samor' :Piteh' zela-uh-: :gwluhuh', or 'dae:, 'An mu zimi: 'dba 'da o. :Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' on 'dae:, :A mu 'o :on klei' :zi. 'De on zi 'o or klei', on 'kpa 'de 'blagbe 'di, on 'ye zimi 'dba. Jorwor: 'do glu-we-eh: :dao' 'di, on :se-' deh-beh-deh-beh 'dba.
:Yee' :yeh zorn zen-a, :yee' :Yusu' :nyna dih 'do 'kpuhba' 'i. Jorwor: or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾ se-or 'i yubo:, :ka eh 'dhu-a or mor-'.
'De or 'wor 'de on bo, or 'dae:, :A 'bli-nyor⧾-a:, a kpon deh-beh 'weh :e? 'De on 'da, 'Kei o. :A :se-' deh-beh kpon o.

:Yeh on 'da :ao', :yee' or zela-uh-: :gwluhuh', or 'dae:, A po a-a'a: sor 'de 'blagbe-a' :dila-for bo. :Yee' a mu deh :kpon. 'De on no-eh. :Yeh on no-eh, :yee' zimi 'yi 'de an-a'a: sor 'di 'weh kpan kpan. Eh-: no-eh, 'de on se or-a' jli-a' 'beh-dih:, on 'ye-or 'de 'blagbe 'di po.

:Yeh eh no :ao', :yee' bo :na-yu: :dao' :Yusu' :ybeh-a 'gabaa, or :wlu-' 'de :Piteh' bo, or 'dae:, :Gwlor :baa' :oo'. :Yeh :Piteh' 'worn-ih'-a :ka eh 'dhu-a :Gwlor :baa', :yee' or pa or-a'a: 'tiei: or :za-a dih 'weh, 'de or 'kpa 'o 'nior, or :dle, or mu 'de :Yusu' bo.

:Yee' :Yusu'-a'a: bo :na-nyor:⧾ :yuh :sie:-a 'de 'blagbe 'di, an zi 'o :Piteh' klei', an bli 'blagbe, 'de an jli an-a'a: sor :wleh :wleh, :or 'yi-a zimi 'di. Deh no-eh, on se 'kpuhbuh' bo dih :tehn-dih:. Eh 'beh-dih: eh 'ye po son bo-a' :kehehn' :due' no.
:Yeh on 'si-a 'o 'kpuhba' 'i dih, :yee' on 'ye neh, eh-: :dhba-eh:. 'De on 'ye zimi-: 'dekorn: 'bhlee-: en 'pehn 'o :nane' ken dih.
:Yee' :Yusu' :wlu-' 'de on bo, or 'dae:, Zimi: a 'dba-a :kana, a :ya 'de en-' :nee'.

:Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' Samor' :Piteh' mu 'de 'blagbe 'di-: de, 'de or 'kla sor dih, or ya-or 'o 'kpuhba' 'i. Or 'yi zimi: :klaba'⧾-a' 'bleh 'ble-a' :kehehn' :due' :kwlaa :mm' 'yor taan 'di. Keen' :mloror' or 'yi zimi 'di 'weh, jorwor: or-a' deh :se-' :chlan.
:Yee' :Yusu' 'da-uh', on 'ye deh di. Jorwor: eh se nyor :korn :or 'ye-or dih dhele:, deh 'i-deh-nyor: or 'dhu-eh:-'. Deh no-eh, on yubo-eh', :ka eh 'dhu-a :Gwlor :baa'-'.
:Yee' or 'duo: 'bhlee-: 'dekorn: zimi: :dao'-: 'weh, 'de or 'nyi-ih on, on 'ye-ih' di.
:Yeh :daa :naa, eh-: no eh-a' kpor⧾-a' taan neh, :Yusu' :to-dih: or-a' 'jeh or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾ 'i, :eh 'wluh-a 'o ti or 'wluh-a 'de nma-dih-deh 'di bo.

:Yeh on gweh-a deh :di-eh 'i, :yee' :Yusu' dhele: Samor' :Piteh'-: dih, or 'dae:, :Jororn'-a' 'yu, Samor'. :On :ybeh 'on-' 'weh deh 'jeh, :eh :zi 'o deh⧾ :daa-' :e? 'De :Piteh' 'da, Keen', :Gwlor :baa'. :On yubo-eh', :ka 'on :ybeh-a :on. :Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' :Yusu' :wlu-' 'de or bo, or 'dae:, 'Nyi 'an-a: 'blae'⧾-nynuu dii-deh.

'De :Yusu' dhele-or dih :neheh', or 'dae:, :Jororn'-a' 'yu, Samor'. :On :ybeh 'on-' 'weh deh 'jeh :e? 'De :Piteh' 'da, Keen', :Gwlor :baa'. :On yubo-eh', :ka 'on :ybeh-a :on. :Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' :Yusu' 'dae:, 'Dhu 'an-a: 'blae'⧾ 'yli-eh bo.

:Yee' :Yusu' :wlu-' 'de or bo, 'do kpor⧾-a' taan neh 'di, or 'dae:, :Jororn'-a' 'yu, Samor'. :On :ybeh 'on-' 'weh :e? :Yeh :Yusu' 'da :ao', :yee' eh 'tuh :Piteh'-: dih, deh no-eh, :Yusu' dhele-or-: dih, or no kpor⧾ taan, or 'da, :On :ybeh 'on-' 'weh :e? 'De or :wlu 'de :Yusu' bo, or 'dae:, :Gwlor :baa', :on yubo: deh⧾-a' klehkpeh 'weh. 'De mor :on yubo-eh', :ka 'on :ybeh-a :on. 'De :Yusu' :wlu 'de or bo, or 'dae:, 'Nyi 'an-a: 'blae'⧾ dii-deh.

Dhih 'jeh, 'an zela :on :gwluhuh', ti :on no-a :goba'-yu, :yee' :an pa-dih :an-a' 'jeh deh-' 'weh, 'de :dha :korn-a :on 'ton, 'de :an mu 'o. Jorwor: ti :an mu-a :ne, :yee' :an mu son⧾ :slo, 'de nyor :noror' 'ye :on 'behleh bo 'dhu, 'de :dha :on se-a mu-a' 'bhorn, 'do :wor or mu :on :kpa.

('Meh-a' :Piteh'-a mu-a 'meh-:, :or 'ye-a' Nyorsoa-a' 'nyne 'i 'beh-dih:, or-a' dhih :oo', :Yusu' :za deh :daa-'.) :Yeh or gweh-a deh :daa, eh-a' :za-a' 'i, :yee' or :wlu-' 'de :Piteh' bo, or 'dae:, Zi 'o 'on klei'.

:Yeh :Yusu' 'da :ao', :yee' :Piteh' 'bili:-'-: dih, 'de or 'ye bo :na-yu: :dao' :Yusu' :ybeh-a 'gabaa, or zi 'o on klei'. Bo :na-yu: :dao', or-: 'o, :or :ne 'o :Yusu' 'bhun :dee', ti an di-a 'gwie-deh, :or dhele:-a :Yusu' dih, :or no-a, :Gwlor :baa', or-a' 'nyne :eh, :or mu :on :plo :eh?
Or-a' 'jeh :dao', :yeh :Piteh' 'ye-or, 'de or zi-a 'o on klei', :yee' :Piteh' dhele: :Yusu'-: dih, or 'dae:, :Gwlor :baa', :a 'worn 'de :yor :daa bo :ke.

:Yeh or dhele-a :Yusu' dih, :yee' :Yusu' :wlu-' 'de or bo, or 'dae:, :Mor eh 'dhu, 'an 'bhorn :yor :daa, or 'ye 'kmo-' :ne :chio'lo:, 'de 'on 'ye deka yi, :yee' deh :on po 'de dih :eh? :On :mor :mloror', zi 'o 'on klei'.

Deh :daa :Yusu' :za-a-', eh-: no-eh, 'de or-a' klei' :zi-nyor⧾-a' :dha :dhulu' 'da, or-a'a: bo :na-yu: :daa, or :se-' 'meh-: i :dee'. Jorwor: :Yusu' se :ao', or :se-' 'meh-: i, or 'dae:, :Mor eh 'dhu, 'an 'bhorn or 'ye 'kmo-' :ne :chio'lo:, 'de 'on 'ye deka yi, :yee' deh :on po 'de dih :eh?
:Yee' :Yusu'-a'a: bo :na-nyor-a' 'jeh :dao', or-: 'o, :or zela: deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :daa ken dih, 'de :or 'chle-ih. 'De :a yubo-eh', :ka or-a' wlu :se-a sih.
Deh⧾ :dhulu' :nee', me-: :Yusu' no :ke. :Mor eh 'dhu, en-' klehkpeh 'chle-eh: :dee', :yee' 'on yubo-eh', 'bluhba-a' klehkpeh se :dha 'ble, 'chlee-deh:⧾ :en 'chle-eh, en 'ye-a dih :dhe.

:Yee' nyor :klaba' :Tiofelor', 'mor 'ye :on. 'De 'an-a: :zai'-chlee-deh 'di, 'do :wor 'on 'chle-dih: deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :Yusu' no-a-: 'dekorn: deh⧾-a' klehkpeh or :torne:-a nyor⧾-: :eh 'wluh-a 'o ti or 'dhu-a or-a'a: :koan glu,
'de :eh :yeh-dih:-a ti or 'nyi-a or-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾ or gan-a 'tele', :eh :yi-dih:-a Gban 'i :ne :Zulu, 'de jorwor: Nyorsoa-a mu-or 'de yai' :kpa.

:Eh 'wluh-a 'o ti or 'ye-dih:-a 'kle, 'de or 'meh-a 'di, 'de :eh :yeh-dih:-a 'we-a' :kwlaa :nyieh ken, or :to-dih: or-a' 'jeh or-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾ 'i 'do kpor⧾ :dhulu' 'di. 'De mor deh⧾ 'doror: 'dor or no-a :ke, me-: no-eh, 'de on yubo-eh :ka or :ne-a 'kmo-' 'jeh ka. 'De or :za Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh-a' dhih-' 'de on bo.

:Yee' 'we-eh :due', ti :Yusu' :ne-a 'o or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾ bo 'gboror:, or 'nyi-uh 'tele' :daa, or 'dae:, A-a' 'wluh-:-' :Julu'slehn kele'a:. Jorwor: a :fuo: 'nyii'-deh: :eh :korn-a wlu 'On-ba po-a :dhama'-' 'ken, :eh :korn-a dhih 'on zela: a :gwluhuh'.
:Jororn' po nyor⧾ 'ni 'dlu 'weh :mloror'. Jorwor: :mor 'we-kpor-bei :zi-dih: 'o ken dih, :yee' Nyorsoa-a mu or-a' Gban i :ne :Zulu a 'dlu :po.

:Yee' :yeh :Yusu'-: 'dekorn: or-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾-: on 'kpa-a :dha :due', :yee' on dhele-or-: dih, on 'dae:, :Gwlor :baa', :an mu-eh :no, 'Ezlea-nyor⧾ 'ye an-a'a: 'bluhba-dlu: :daa wlu 'ken :korn :neheh', dha ti :daa 'i :e?
'De :Yusu' 'da, A se :korn a 'ye ti 'On-ba polo:-a deh :daa 'de or-a' 'jeh-a' 'kpih 'di, eh 'ye-a' :no-eh: yubo:.

Jorwor: a mu 'kpih 'ye-: :mor Gban i :ne :Zulu 'yle, 'de on 'ye a-uh' :ne. :Yee' a :mor mu 'an-a: dhih bo zela-nyor⧾ :no, 'de :Julu'slehn-: 'de :Judi'a-bluhba-a' klehkpeh ken-: 'dekorn: Sehmeh'la-bluhba-a' klehkpeh ken-: 'de mor :korn dha 'bluhba-a' klehkpeh yobo' po-a 'de :gle 'gbeheh 'di-:.
:Yeh or gweh-a deh⧾ :daa, en-' :za-a' 'i, :yee' 'do :dha :due' :dao', Nyorsoa kpa-or 'de or 'bli yai' 'do on ybei'. 'De yao-pli 'zile-or, 'de on 'bor or-a' 'ye-a'.
:Yeh or mu-a, :yee' an pobo 'de yai' 'weh 'dhuan :chio'lo:. :Yeh an no :ao', 'de an mu-a 'ye-:, :yee' on 'ye nyor⧾-kpalu⧾ 'sororn', mo-: pa 'tiei-plu⧾-', :on :nyna dih 'do on 'bhun.

:Yee' nyor⧾-kpalu⧾ 'sororn' :dao', on :wlu-' 'de on bo, on 'dae:, A :mor :Galali'i-nyor:⧾ :daa. :Eh :korn dhih a :nyna dih dha :dha :daa :eh, 'de a pobo 'de yai' 'gboror: :eh? :Yusu' :daa :or 'wluh-a dha a bo, :or Nyorsoa kpa-a 'de or 'bli yai', :ka a 'ye-or, or no-a mu-a', 'ka :wor or mu de :ka :yi-eh :no.
:Yeh nyor⧾-kpalu⧾ 'sororn' :dao', on zela-uh-a :gwluhuh', :yee' :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor:⧾ :dao', on 'wluh 'o 'Orle-tluh ken 'weh, 'de on mu :Julu'slehn de, :eh se-a 'de tluh 'bor gweh.

:Yeh on nyni-a :gwlor-', :yee' on pa 'de :chuu: :on :ne-a 'de 'gbu-a' yai' 'di, an 'pehn-a 'di. Nyor⧾ :on pa-a 'de :chuu: :dao' 'di, an-a' 'nyne :wor :dhe dih. :Piteh'-: :Jororn'-: 'Jeen-: Andlu'-: Felor'-: :Tormor'-: :Batale'meor-: Matio'-: 'Jeen-: :or 'dhu-a 'Ehfea-a'a: 'yu-', Samor' :or no-a or-a'a: 'bluhba-dlu-a' dhih :vorn-nyor-: 'dekorn: :Juda' :or no-a 'Jeen-a'a: 'yu-:.

:Yee' dboo-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :daa, mo-: :an 'kpa :dha :due', 'do ti-a' klehkpeh bo, :an wlu 'de Nyorsoa bo. :Yusu' 'de :Mehle'-: 'nynor⧾-kpao'⧾ :noo'-: 'dekorn: :Yusu'-a' dei'-nyor⧾-kpalu⧾-: mo-: :ne 'de nyor⧾ :dao' 'klu-' :ke.
Eh :korn 'we-eh :due', ti :Yusu'-a'a: dhih 'jeh :po-nyor⧾ 'kpa-a :dha :due', :yee' :Piteh' :nyna dih 'de on 'nyne-', :on 'beh-dih:-a :on 'ye-a' nyor⧾-a' :kehehn' :due' :kwlaa 'sororn' no, or 'dae:,

'An 'de-di'-boi'-a:. Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh-a' wlu :korn on 'ye dhih 'jeh-' 'kpa :gbor :gbor, :ka Gban 'i :ne :Zulu no-a eh-a' :za-a' :dee' see, :eh :yi-dih:-a 'de :Debe' 'worn, 'do :Juda'-a' dhih bo, :or kpa-a nyor⧾ on 'ye-a :Yusu' kpon.
:Juda' :daa, or no :a-a' nyor :due' :dee', :or :ne :a no-dih-a :koan :dha :due'. (

:Juda' :korn-a dhih :Piteh'-a za-a-', 'wlii: or 'ye-a 'do 'kulu-deh: or no-a bo, me-: or :dhen-dih: 'bluhba-a' 'kplo. 'Do :wor or :po-dih: 'dlu glu, 'de or-a' 'kwli wa 'i, or-a' 'me-a' klehkpeh 'wla 'zorn.
:Yee' nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a :Julu'slehn, on 'worn dhih :daa 'weh. :Yee' eh-: :korn dhih an 'da-dih 'bluhba-a' 'kplo :dao' :Akade'ma 'de on 'bli-wlu 'di, :eh :bleh-dih:-a 'i, Nyomor-bluhba:.)

:Yee' :Piteh' :wlu-' :neheh', or 'dae:, Eh 'chle-eh:-' 'de :Saan'-chlee-deh 'di, eh 'da, 'Nyi or-a'a: 'gbu :florn 'di dih. Nyor-a' 'ti-:-' 'de on 'di. :Yee' eh 'dae: :neheh', 'Nyi nyor :noror' 'kpa-dih: 'o or 'gor-', or 'ye or-a'a: :koan no.
:Yee' eh-a' dhih, :a :korn :a 'ye nyor⧾-kpalu:⧾ :daa, an-a' nyor :due' gan 'noror :a 'klu-', :on :ne :a mor-: :a na-dih-a :dha :due' :dee' see, ti :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu' :ne-a 'noror :a 'nyne-'.

Nyor :dao', or :korn or 'ye nyor :or :ne-a 'noror :a 'nyne-' no, :eh 'wluh-a 'o ti :Jororn' :po-dih:-a :Yusu' 'ni 'dlu, 'de :eh :yeh-dih:-a ti Nyorsoa :za 'o :Yusu' 'do :a ybei' ken, 'de or kpa-or 'de or 'bli yai' de. :Yee' nyor :dao', or :ne :a mor-: :a :korn :a 'ye :Yusu'-a' 'meheh' :sorn-' dhih bo zela-nyor⧾ no.
:Yeh or jla-a, :yee' on :za nyor⧾-kpalu⧾ 'sororn'. :Due'-a' 'nyne :wor 'Joseh:, an 'da-dih-a :Basa'ba. Or-a' 'nyne :nee' :wor 'Jehtor:. :Yee' nyor-kpalu-a' 'sororn' nor-a' 'nyne :wor :Mata'ya:.

:Yeh on no :ao', :yee' on :wlu-' 'de :Gwlor :baa' bo, on 'dae:, :Gwlor :baa', :on yubo: deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :en :ne-a 'o :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' :porluh⧾ ken 'weh. :Yee' eh-a' dhih, :torne: :a nyor :on gan-a 'noror nyor⧾ 'sororn' :daa 'nyne-',
or 'ye 'o :Juda'-a' 'gor bo 'kpa-dih:, or 'ye :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor no, or 'ye :koan: :Juda' 'tali:-a dih no, ti :Juda' mu-a :dha or :korn-a or 'ye-a' mu.
:Yeh on gweh-a 'de Nyorsoa bo :wlu-eh 'i, :yee' on po :nobo:, 'de :Mata'ya-a'a: :nobo 'wluh, 'de or 'kpa 'o :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾-a' :bhue: 'yor-eh :ne-a :due' :dao' ken.
:Yee' :yeh gor an 'da-dih-a 'Pehnti'kor, or-a' 'we-eh nyni-a 'o, :yee' :Yusu'-a'a: dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh 'kpa :dha :due'.
:Yeh an pobo-a 'o, :yee' an 'worn :dhlumeh' :eh 'wluh 'de Nyorsoa 'bli yai', :eh gweh-a :ka :pobor' :dhulu'-a yi-a 'de, 'de eh gweh 'de 'gbu-a' klehkpeh on :dhe-a 'di dih 'dlu.
:Yee' on 'ye deh⧾ :en gweh-a neh-a' :meo, me-: :gble-eh, :en :dhe 'o an-a' :due' :due' 'dlu dih.
:Yee' an-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a 'o, on 'yi-dih: Gban 'i :ne :Zulu-: dih, 'de on 'kpa 'o wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor :po 'da, :ka Gban 'i :ne :Zulu no-a an-a' 'kpih 'nyi-eh on 'ye-a' :wlu-a' no.
:Yee' 'do ti :dao' 'di, :Jueh'-nyor:⧾ :noo', :on no-a Nyorsoa-nyor:⧾ 'jeh, mo-: 'wluh 'bluhba⧾-a' klehkpeh :en :ne-a dha yao 'zorn ken dih, 'de :on 'ti :Julu'slehn.

:Yeh on 'worn-a :dhlumeh' :daa, :yee' an-a' klehkpeh, on 'kpa :dha :due'. :Yee' eh 'ma-dih: 'de on 'di-: dih. Deh no-eh, :yor :or :korn-a or 'bli-wlu, :yee' or 'worn-uh' 'de :Yusu'-a'a: dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor⧾ 'worn, 'do 'we-eh: :dao' 'di.
:Yeh eh no :ao', :yee' an-a' :porluh⧾ 'ma-', 'de eh :florn-dih-uh worn, an 'chihleh-eh 'i, on 'da, Nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :daa :an wlu-a, on :se :Galali'i-nyor:⧾ ke :e?
:Yee' :kaa eh no, 'de :yor :or :korn-a or 'bli-wlu, 'de or 'worn-uh, 'de on 'worn :eh?
:A-a' nyor⧾ :noo' 'wluh :Patia'-: :noo' 'wluh Midia'-: :noo' 'wluh 'Ilor-: :noo' 'wluh 'Mehsopata'mior-: :noo' 'wluh :Judi'a-: :noo' 'wluh 'Kapado'sia-: :noo' 'wluh 'Pantor-: 'dekorn: 'Esea-:.
'De :noo' 'wluh 'Fleya-: :noo' 'wluh :Panfi'la-: :noo' 'wluh 'Iye-: 'dekorn: 'Lebia-bluhba-a' 'for :or 'koan'-dih:-a :Sali'na dih-:. 'De 'duhba:⧾ :noo' 'wluh 'Wloon :ke,

:yuh :on no-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: :yuh :on 'kpa-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' Nyorsoa-deh-:. Nyor⧾ :noo', mo-: 'wluh 'Klii-: 'dekorn: :Ale'bia-:. Jorwor: :a-a' klehkpeh, :a 'worn :Yusu'-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor:⧾ :daa, an-a' wlu-: dih. :A 'bli-wlu:⧾, me-: an po, 'de an za deh⧾ :klaba'⧾ Nyorsoa no-a, en-' dhih-'.
:Yee' an-a' klehkpeh, an-a' :porluh⧾ 'ma-', 'de on se eh-a' bo dih zela-eh 'beh-dih:. 'De :noo'-a dhele on 'bei' dih, Deh 'i-deh: deh :daa, eh 'dhu-eh:-' :eh?
Jorwor: an-a' :noo'-a wla-dih-uh', on 'da, Nomor on 'na-a, or-: 'o, :or no-uh.

:Yeh on :za-a deh :dao', :yee' :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾-a' :bhue: 'yor-eh :due' :dao', on :nyna dih, 'de :Piteh' 'wor, or :wlu 'de nyor⧾ :dhulu' :dao' bo, or 'dae:, A :mor :or 'dhu-a :a 'bli :Jueh'-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a dha :Julu'slehn-: a :to 'on :dou'⧾ bo 'dhuan, 'de 'on 'ye deh :daa ken dih zela: 'de a bo.
Nyor⧾-kpalu:⧾ :daa, nomor :se-uh' no. :Ka a no-a eh-a' 'ye-a', eh se :ao' :ne. Zorn zen-a :naa, eh 'see 'o gwle.
Jorwor: deh Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor: 'Joeh :za-a-' :dee' see, eh-: 'o, a 'ye :naa, or no-a,

Nyorsoa 'dae:, 'An mu 'an :Zulu 'do nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh ken :po, 'do :de 'bor-dih-we 'di. A-a'a: nyor⧾-kpalu⧾-nynuu-: 'dekorn: 'nynor⧾-kpao'⧾-nynuu-: an mu 'an wele-eh :po. A-a'a: nyor⧾-kpalu⧾-nynuu: :gbolo'⧾-a' 'yli-eh mu deh 'i 'kpa-:. 'De mor :mor a-a'a: nyor⧾ :bholuh⧾ 'kpa 'nyinor-', an-a' 'dlu⧾-a mu deh⧾ 'ye-:.
'De mor 'an-a: 'bhoi-nynuu: :sloror', nyor⧾-kpalu⧾-: 'dekorn: 'nynor⧾-kpao'⧾-: 'an mu 'an :Zulu 'do on ken :po, 'do ti :dao' 'di, 'de on 'ye 'an wele-eh po.
'An mu nyor⧾ 'di dih 'ma-dih-deh⧾ :no 'de yai', 'de 'on 'ye nyor⧾ 'i :to-dih-deh⧾ no dha 'bluhba ken. Nyomor-: neh-: 'dekorn: :daluh' :dhulu'-: me-: nyor⧾-a mu 'ye-:.
:Yee' 'yluh :se-' :fan i deh 'jeh, 'de 'chuh 'yli 'de 'ye 'zoo :ne, :eh gweh-a nyomor 'i, 'de jorwor: :Gwlor :baa'-a' dhih-a' 'i 'beh-we-eh: 'kawehn:, or mu-a 'de :ya, 'de eh 'ye 'o nyni.
'De mor nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on 'da-a :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'nyne, or 'ye-a' 'puh-dih:, or mu-uh 'puh-dih:.

:Yee' :Piteh'-a kpa or-a' wlu 'dlu bo :chio'lo:, or 'dae:, A :mor 'on 'bli 'Ezlea-nyor:⧾. A :to 'on :dou'⧾ bo. Deh⧾ :kolu'⧾-: nyor⧾ 'di dih 'ma-dih-deh⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ 'i :to-dih-deh⧾-: Nyorsoa no-a 'de a 'klu-', :en :yi-dih:-a :Yusu' :or 'wluh-a 'Nazla-gwlor 'di, me-: :to-dih: a 'i :ka :Yusu' 'wluh-a 'de Nyorsoa bo. A-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh yubo-eh'.
Nyorsoa-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh 'worn-dih-eh ken dih :dee' see, 'de a mu :Yusu' :kpon. 'De a no-eh, 'de 'kulu-nyor⧾ :kor-dih-or 'o tu 'i, on 'dba-or.
Jorwor: :yeh a no :ao', :yee' Nyorsoa za-or 'de nma-dih-deh 'di 'weh, or zelie-or' 'do 'meh-a' 'kpih 'zorn. Deh no-eh, 'meh-a' se or-a' wlu 'ken :korn-eh 'beh-dih:.
:Yee' :Debe' :za :Yusu'-a' dhih-' 'weh see, or 'dae:, 'An 'ye :Gwlor :baa' 'weh, dha 'on 'bhun, 'do ti-a' klehkpeh bo. Or :ne 'noror 'an :dila-son bo 'weh. :Yee' :fano: :se-' 'on :no i.
:Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, 'an :porluh 'pehn-: dih. :Mor 'on :taa wlu, :yee' 'mona 'yi-dih: 'on-: dih. :Yee' 'an 'kmo :ne-eh mu deh :gwlii' :dhe-eh 'ble-:.
Deh no-eh, :mor :or 'dhu-a Nyorsoa-', :on :se-' 'worn-: i, 'on :se 'de :gwlebo :sie: i. :On :se-' 'worn-: i, :an-a' Gban 'i :ne-nyor :se 'de nma-dih-deh 'di 'zorn-dih: i.
:On :torne: 'on 'kmo :ne-eh-a' :gwie⧾ 'weh. :Yee' :an mu-eh :no, 'on 'ye 'mona-' dih 'yi-dih:, :mor 'on yi 'o :on ybei'.

:Yee' :Piteh'-a kpa or-a' wlu 'dlu bo, or 'dae:, 'An 'de-di'-boi'-a:. 'Nyi 'on zela: a :gwluhuh' deh 'jeh, 'do :a :bai'-a' :baa' 'Keen :Debe'-a' dhih bo. Or 'meh-', 'de or nma-dih-eh: dih. Or-a' nma-dih-deh :ne :daa :a bo 'weh :naa, 'de eh :yeh-dih: 'we-eh: :daa ken.

'De mor or no Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor:. Or yubo: deh :korn-a wlu Nyorsoa po-a :dhama'-' 'weh. Nyorsoa za-eh' 'weh deh 'jeh, or 'da or mu :Debe' 'di-a' 'yu :due' 'keen-' :no, :ka or no-a :Debe'-a' dhih :ke.

:Debe' sie ti de, or 'ye deh Nyorsoa-a mu-a :no 'noror ybei'. Eh-: :korn dhih or :za Nyorsoa-a' 'taan'-yu-a' nma-dih-deh 'di 'wluh-dhih-'. Or 'da, Nyorsoa :se-' 'worn-: i, or :se 'de :gwlebo :sie: i. 'De mor, Nyorsoa :se-' 'worn-: i, or-a' 'ku :se 'de nma-dih-deh 'di 'zorn-dih: i.
Nyorsoa :za 'de :Yusu' :daa 'de nma-dih-deh 'di 'weh, 'de :a-a' klehkpeh, :a 'ye deh :daa ken dih 'weh.

:Yee' Nyorsoa 'duo-or ya-', 'de or dhe-or dih 'de or-a' :dila-son bo. :Yee' 'do :wor or :Baa' Nyorsoa 'nyi-dih-or or-a' Gban 'i :ne :Zulu, :on :korn-a wlu or po-a :dhama'-'. 'De :Yusu' dbo Gban 'i :ne :Zulu-a' 'jeh :dao' 'noror :a bo. Mo-: 'o :on :korn dhih a 'worn, 'de a-a' 'yli 'ye :naa.

:Debe'-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh :se 'de Nyorsoa 'bli yai' mu. :Yee' eh-a' dhih, eh :se or-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh-a' dhih, or :se-' :za, :mor or 'da, :Gwlor :baa' :wlu-' 'de 'an-a: :Gwlor :baa' bo, or 'da, :Dhe 'o 'an :dila-son bo dih :chio'lo:,
'de 'on 'ye nyor⧾ :on 'nyeh-a :on-' ya :ya, 'de :on 'ye-uh' buh⧾ ken dih tba.
:Yee' eh-a' dhih, a :mor 'Ezlea-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh, a :korn a 'ye-eh' yubo: deh 'jeh, :Yusu' :daa, a :kor-dih:-a 'o tu 'i, or-: 'o Nyorsoa 'tan, 'de or :no-or :Gwlor :baa'-'.

:Yeh nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'o, on 'worn-a deh⧾ :daa, :yee' eh 'tuh an-a' :porluh⧾-: dih 'gabaa, 'de on dhele: :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor:⧾ :yuh :dao'-: dih, on 'dae:, :A 'bli-nyor⧾-a:. Deh :a 'ye no :naa :eh?

'De :Piteh' 'da, A-a' klehkpeh, a 'tali: a-a' deh⧾-zon⧾ dih, a 'ye 'de Nyorsoa bo 'bili:, 'de a 'ye 'ni 'dlu :po, 'de :Yusu' 'Klae-a' 'nyne 'di. :Yee' Nyorsoa-a mu a-a' deh⧾-zon⧾-a' dhih bo 'ma-dih:, 'de or 'ye a Gban 'i :ne :Zulu 'nyi.
:A-a' :Gwlor :baa' Nyorsoa po deh⧾ :daa, en-' wlu :dhama'-' 'weh, 'do nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh or 'da-a :on 'ye-a 'o or klei' zi bo, a mor-: a-a'a: 'nynuu-: 'dekorn: :yuh :on :tehn-a bo-:.
:Yee' :Piteh' :za-' deh⧾ :dhulu' :nee', :en 'ye-uh'-a 'slen 'dhu, or 'dae:, 'An bale a-uh 'weh, a zelie: a-a' 'jeh 'do Nyorsoa-a' 'chehn-yuba: :or yi-a 'de 'do 'kulu-nyor:⧾ :daa bo 'zorn.
:Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' 'do 'we-eh: :dao' 'di, nyor⧾ :on 'beh-dih:-a :on 'ye-a 'wlu taan no, mo-: po Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu⧾ :Piteh' po-a dhih 'jeh-', 'de on :po 'ni 'dlu, on 'kpa 'o on 'bei' ken.

:Yee' nyor⧾ :dao', on 'duo: an-a' ti-a' klehkpeh-', 'de an 'chean' :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾-a' deh⧾, 'de on :ne on 'bei'-a na-dih :dha :due'. An di-dih deh :dha :due', 'de an di-dih :Gwlor :baa'-a' gban 'i :ne-dii-deh :dha :due' :ke, an wlu 'de Nyorsoa bo.
:Yee' nyor⧾ 'di dih 'ma-dih-deh:⧾ :dhulu'-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ 'i :to-dih-deh:⧾ :dhulu'-: :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾ no-a, me-: no-eh, 'de :fano 'kpa 'de nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh 'di.
:Yee' nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on po-a :Yusu'-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-', an nena bo, 'de an kpuhba deh⧾ dih.
'De mor :mor on plo an-a'a: 'bluhba⧾-: 'dekorn: an-a'a: :kororn-deh⧾-: :yee' an po 'wlii: en 'ye-a :dha :due'. :Yee' ti an-a' nyor-a' son :gweh-a, :yee' an 'nyi en-' 'wlii: :nee' or 'weh.

:Yee' an 'gbon-dih :dha :due' 'do ti-a' klehkpeh bo, 'do Nyorsoa-a' 'sla ybei'. 'De on 'bli 'gbu⧾ 'di dih, 'do :wor an di-dih :Gwlor :baa'-a' gban 'i :ne-dii-deh :dha :due', 'de an kpuhba son⧾ ybei', 'de :porluh⧾-a' 'worn :nmor ka 'di-: 'dekorn: 'de :porluh⧾-a' dih 'pehn ka 'di-:,
'de an po Nyorsoa-a' 'nyne ya. Nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a :Julu'slehn, an 'ye-uh' deh. :Yee' zorn 'o zorn nyor⧾ :on 'puh-a, 'ka-: :Gwlor :baa'-a po 'o on ken nyor⧾ :noo'.
:Yee' eh :korn 'we-eh :due', 'de :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: :Jororn'-: an mu 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'sla bo, 'gwie-yluh-gbao', :ka ti-a ne-a 'de nyor⧾-a mu-a 'de Nyorsoa bo :wlu 'da.

:Yeh an mu-a, :yee' 'yu :due' :or 'wluh-dih:-a :klor-a', or-: nyor⧾-a kpa 'o gba-dih-gba-a' :kpaa' 'worn 'i, an 'da-dih-a 'Yi dih :nmor :kpaa'. An kpa-or 'o 'weh 'do 'we-a' klehkpeh 'di, or 'ye nyor⧾ :an pa-a, 'wlii :zlor-dih:.
:Yeh or 'ye-a :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: :Jororn'-: an yi-a pa 'da, :yee' or zlor-uh 'wlii:.
'De :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: :Jororn'-: on pobo-or ya. :Yee' :Piteh' :wlu-' 'de or bo, or 'dae:, Pobo: :a ya.
:Yeh :Piteh' 'da :ao', :yee' or pobo-uh-: ya, or :mor :mloror' or 'da or mu deh 'ye-: :dee' 'de on 'kwa.

'De :Piteh' 'da :neheh', 'On se 'sebla-: 'dekorn: 'goo-: 'ble, 'on 'ye :on 'nyi. Jorwor: deh 'on 'ble-a, eh-: 'an mu :on 'nyi-:. 'De :Yusu' 'Klae :or 'wluh-a 'Nazla-gwlor 'di-a' 'nyne 'di, Mu yai', :on 'ye :na.
:Yeh or :za-a deh :daa-', :yee' or kpon or-a' :dila-son-: dih, 'de or 'duo-or ya-'. :Yee' 'do :dha :due' :dao', or-a' buh⧾-: 'dekorn: or-a' buh⧾-a' 'yi 'dhu-dih-da-: en 'ye 'kpih 'weh.

:Yeh or-a' 'tiei 'ye-a 'kpih, :yee' or :sorn-' 'weh, 'de or :nyna dih :vai:, or na dih. :Yee' or :ne on mor-: on pa 'de gba-dih-gba :dao' 'di. 'De or na dih, or 'bhlun yaa'e, or po Nyorsoa-a' 'nyne ya.
:Yeh or no :ao', 'de :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a 'o, on 'ye-or, 'de or na-a, 'de or po-a Nyorsoa-a' 'nyne ya,

:yee' on yubo-or-: 'i, :ka eh 'dhu-a 'yu :or :dhe-a 'o gba-dih-gba-a' :kpaa' 'worn 'i, an 'da-dih-a 'Yi dih :nmor :kpaa' dih, 'de :or zlor-a :dee'. :Yee' deh :eh :no-eh 'do or bo, eh 'ma-dih: an-a' :porluh⧾-a' klehkpeh 'weh, 'de on :florn worn.

:Yee' 'yu :dao', :or 'puh-a, or kpon :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: :Jororn'-: dih 'weh :chio'lo:. :Yeh nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh, on 'ye-uh'-a, :yee' eh :florn-dih-uh-: worn, 'de on kpa ple-a' 'de on bo, 'do Nyorsoa-a' 'sla-a' :dha an 'da-dih-a :Salomor'-a' :forn-dih: 'da.

:Yeh :Piteh' 'ye-a nyor⧾ :dao', :yee' or :wlu-' 'de on bo, or 'dae:, A :mor 'on 'bli 'Ezlea-nyor:⧾. :Eh :korn dhih 'de deh :daa, eh 'ma-dih: 'de a 'di dih, 'de eh :florn-dih:-a worn :eh? 'De mor :eh :korn dhih a pobo :a ya deh :dao' :eh? :Mor a :taa 'ye, :yee' a 'da 'de :a-a' 'jeh-a' 'kpih 'di-: 'dekorn: :a-a' Nyorsoa-a' :weheh' :za-eh 'de 'yi 'sleh ka 'di-: eh-: no-eh, 'de 'yu :daa, or :sorn-', or na :e?

:A :bai'-a' :bai' 'Eble'hehn-: Ase'-: 'dekorn: 'Jekor-: an-a' Nyorsoa, or-: 'nyi or-a' 'bhoi-yu: :Yusu' dhih-a' 'i 'beh-a'. Jorwor: a :mor za-or 'kwla or 'ye 'meh. 'De a dhobo: or-a' dhih-' 'do Pale' ybei', ti Pale'-a 'bhorn-a or 'ye-or dih 'tali:, or 'ye-a' mu.
:Yor :or :ne-a gban 'i, 'de :or 'sleh-a 'i, or-: :korn dhih a dhobo:-'. :Yee' :yor :or 'dhu-a :nyor⧾ 'dba-nyor-', or-: :korn dhih a dhele: Pale' dih, or 'ye dih 'tali-eh: 'do a bo, or 'ye mu.
A :mor no-eh 'de nyor :or :korn-a 'de bo 'kmo :sie: :febeh' 'wluh-a, on 'dba-or. Jorwor: Nyorsoa za-or 'de nma-dih-deh 'di 'weh. :A-a' 'yor-eh 'ye deh :daa ken dih 'weh.

:Kloror-yu: :daa a 'ye-a, 'de a yubo:-a, :Yusu'-a' 'nyne-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh: 'o, eh-: 'nyi-or 'kpih. :Yusu'-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh:, eh-: no-eh, 'de or 'puh klehkpeh klehkpeh, 'do a-a' klehkpeh ybei'.
:Yee' 'an 'de-di'-boi'-a:, 'on yubo-eh', a mor-: 'dekorn: a-a'a: nyor⧾ :na-dih-nyor⧾-: deh a no-a, a se-eh 'i yubo:.
Jorwor: deh Nyorsoa :za-a-' :dee' see, :eh :yi-dih:-a or-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh-', eh-: 'o :eh 'kpa dhih 'jeh-' :naa, :eh no-a, Or-a' 'taan'-yu :korn or 'ye 'kle 'ye.
:Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, a 'tali: a-a' deh⧾-zon⧾ dih, 'de a 'ye 'de Nyorsoa bo 'bili:, 'de :Gwlor :baa' 'ye a-a' deh⧾-zon⧾-a' dhih bo 'ma-dih:.
:Yee' ti-a mu 'o :nyni :Gwlor :baa'-a mu a 'kpih :dele' 'nyi-:, 'de or 'ye :Yusu' :or 'dhu-a or-a' 'taan'-yu-', or gan-a :dee' see 'do a bo, or 'ye-or 'de a bo dbo.

:Yusu' :korn or 'ye 'de Nyorsoa 'bli yai' dih :dhe :chio'lo:, 'de ti Nyorsoa-a mu-a deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :dele' :po, 'de en 'ye 'o nyni, :ka or no-a eh-a' wlu-a' :dhama'-' :po-eh :dee' see, :eh :yi-dih:-a or-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor⧾-' :on :dhe-dih-eh 'for 'i 'do or bo.

:Mose'-a' 'jeh :ke, or 'dae:, A-a' :Gwlor :baa' Nyorsoa-a mu a-a' nyor⧾-a' nyor :due' dih :nyna-dih:, or 'ye wele-eh: :po-nyor no 'do a bo, :or mu-a 'on :gweh. :Yee' a :to deh⧾-a' klehkpeh or mu-a-' :za, 'de a bo :dou'⧾ bo.
:Yee' nyor-beh-nyor-beh: :or se-a Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor: :dao' :dou'⧾ bo :to, :yee' or mu 'de Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ 'klu-' :za-eh:, 'de or 'ye gbe :zie:.
Keen' 'jeh ka, Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :eh 'wluh-a 'o Sameo'-a' ti bo an-a' klehkpeh sie ti de, 'de on :za deh⧾ :daa :en mu-a 'dlu bo :naa dha ti :daa 'i, en-' dhih-'.

Wlu Nyorsoa po-a :dhama'-', :on :yi-dih:-a or-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor⧾-', on :korn 'de a bo. 'De mor a 'ble 'for 'de kuo Nyorsoa :ne a :bai'-a' :bai' po-a 'di, ti or 'ye-a' :wlu 'de 'Eble'hehn bo, or 'ye :ao', :An-a'a: 'nynuu-a' 'nynuu: mo-: 'an mu-' :yi-dih:, 'de 'on 'ye nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a dha 'bluhba ken, :bhorlie' bo po.

:Yee' :yeh Nyorsoa :nyna-dih:-a or-a'a: 'bhoi-yu: :Yusu' dih, :yee' or dbo-or' 'de a bo :zai', or 'ye a :bhorlie' bo po. :Bhorlie' or mu-a a bo :po, eh-: 'dhu or 'ye-eh' no, 'de a 'ye a-a' deh⧾-zon⧾ 'kpuh ya :to.
:Yeh :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: :Jororn'-: on 'si-a 'o nyor⧾ bo :wlu 'da, :yee' Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor⧾-: or-a' 'sla-a' :poli'si-a' nyor :klaba'-: 'dekorn: :Sayusi'i-nyor⧾-: mo-: yi 'o on bo.
:Yee' on 'kpa-' 'chehn. Deh no-eh, :mor on :taa :Yusu'-a' 'meh :sorn-' dhih-' za, :yee' eh torne nyor⧾ deh :ka 'meheh'-nyor⧾-a mu-a :sorn :neheh'.
'De on kpon-uh, on po-uh :kasue 'di. :Yee' ti zi-' on 'ye-uh' 'de zabe: :zi-gbu 'zorn kpa. Eh-: no-eh, 'de on 'pehn 'de :kasue 'di, 'de zorn zen.
Jorwor: nyor⧾ :dhulu' :on 'worn-a tubo-wlu:⧾ :dao' on po-a, on po-ih' dhih 'jeh. Nyor⧾-kpalu:⧾ :on po-ih-a dhih 'jeh-' :naa, :mor on bele: bo, :yee' on 'beh-dih: on 'ye 'wlu :mm' no.
:Yee' :yeh zorn zen-a, :yee' :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-nyor⧾-: 'bluhba: :korn-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ 'tele' :torne-nyor⧾-: mo-: 'kpa :dha :due' 'do :Julu'slehn.

:Yee' 'do :wor 'Aneh: :or no-a Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor⧾-a' nyor :klaba'-: :Kai'fa-: :Jororn'-: 'Ehleza'na-: 'dekorn: Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor⧾-a' nyor :klaba'-a'a: 'cheh-buh-a' nyor⧾-kpalu:⧾ :noo'-: on :ne.

:Yee' :yeh an-a' klehkpeh, on 'kpa-a :dha :due', :yee' on no-eh', 'de :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: :Jororn'-: on :nyna dih 'do on ybei', 'de on dhele-uh dih, on 'dae:, Deh 'i-deh-kpih: a no, 'de mor :or :korn 'nyne 'di, a 'puh-dih: :kloror-yu: :daa :eh?
:Yee' :Piteh' :or 'yi-dih:-a Gban 'i :ne :Zulu dih, or :wlu-' 'de on bo, or 'dae:, A :mor nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: 'bluhba: :korn-nyor⧾-:.
:Mor eh 'dhu a 'chleh :a 'i 'zean', 'do deh 'jeh :a no-a 'do :kloror-yu: :dao' bo, 'dekorn: :ka or no-a 'puh-a'-:

:yee' a-a' klehkpeh, a :korn a 'ye-eh' yubo:, 'de mor nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a dha 'Ezlea-bluhba ken, on :korn on 'ye-eh' yubo: :ke, :ka 'yu :daa :or :nyna-a dih dha a ybei', 'de :or 'puh-a klehkpeh klehkpeh, :Yusu' 'Klae :or 'ti-a 'Nazla :dee', 'de or-a' 'nyne 'di :oo', 'do :wor or 'puh-dih:. :Yusu' a :kor-dih:-a 'o tu 'i, 'de Nyorsoa :za-a: 'de nma-dih-deh 'di, or-: 'o :or 'puh-dih-or.
:Yusu' no tu, a :mor 'gbu :po-nyor:⧾, a po-a dih :dee'. Tu-a' 'jeh :dao', mo-: no 'gbu-a' :zi-tu :naa.
:Yusu' :due', or-: 'ble 'kpih, :or 'ye nyor⧾ zelie: 'do deh⧾-zon⧾-a' 'kpih 'zorn. Or-a' 'nyne :due', me-: :ne dha yao 'zorn, me-: 'beh-dih: :en 'ye nyor⧾ zelie:.

:Yee' :yeh on 'ye-a :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: :Jororn'-: on se-a :fano :gwlii' :ne, :yee' zabe: :zi-nyor:⧾ :dao', eh :florn-dih-uh-: worn, deh no-eh, on yubo-eh 'i, :ka nyor⧾ 'sororn' :dao', on se-a 'chlee-deh yubo:, 'de mor on se-a deh-' 'dhu-eh:. :Yee' on yubo-eh-: 'i :ka on :na-a :Yusu' bo :naa: :zai'.
Jorwor: :ka on 'ye-a 'yu :or 'puh-a, 'de or :nyna-a dih 'do :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: :Jororn'-: 'bhun, :yee' deh on 'ye-a' :za, eh se :ne.
'De on zela-uh :gwluhuh' on 'ye 'de zabe: :zi-gbu-a' :chuu 'di 'wluh. :Yeh on 'wluh-a 'de, :yee' :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' zabe: :zi-nyor:⧾ :dao', on 'kpa dhih polo-eh-: ken 'de an-a' 'jeh 'nyne-', on 'dae:,

:Kaa :a mu nyor⧾ :daa, an-a' dhih :no :eh? Nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on 'ti-a dha :Julu'slehn, on yubo-eh' :ka eh 'dhu-a on mor-' on no-a nyor⧾ 'di dih 'ma-dih-deh: :klaba' :dao'. 'De mor :a se eh-a' dhih-' dhobo-eh 'beh-dih: :ke.

Jorwor: :mor eh 'dhu :a se 'bhorn nyor⧾ :dhulu' 'ye dhih :daa 'worn, 'de en-' 'nyne :sor gweh 'bluhba 'dlu, :yee' a 'nyi :a 'dhu nyor⧾ :daa 'slen, on :ne 'de nyor bo :wlu, 'de :Yusu'-a' 'nyne 'di :dele' ka.

:Yeh on gweh-a dhih polo-eh 'i, :yee' on 'da-uh' :dele' ka, on 'ye pa. :Yeh on pa-a, :yee' on dhe-uh' 'tele' 'i, on 'dae:, A-a' 'da-:-' :Yusu'-a' 'nyne, 'de mor a-a' :no-' :Yusu'-a' 'nyne, a-a' :torne:-' nyor⧾ deh :dele' ka.

:Yeh on 'da :ao', :yee' :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: :Jororn'-: on :wlu-' 'de on bo, on 'dae:, A-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh:, a polo-eh 'do a :gwlii', eh 'sleh-: 'i 'do Nyorsoa ybei', :a 'ye 'o a-a' 'tele' dih dhe, eh 'ye 'o Nyorsoa-a' neh-' :zi :e?
:A :mor :mloror', :a se 'beh-dih: :a 'ye deh⧾ :a 'ye-a-: 'dekorn: deh⧾ :a 'worn-a-: en-' :za-a' 'bor.

:Yeh :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: :Jororn'-: on 'da :ao', :yee' nyor⧾ :dao', on 'da an mu-uh deh 'bhun :no, 'de on 'tali-uh dih, on mu. :Ka on 'ye-a an-a' 'kle 'ye-eh 'dlu :po-eh no, on se-eh yubo:. Deh no-eh, nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh, an po Nyorsoa-a' 'nyne ya, 'do deh :eh :no-eh bo.
'De mor 'yu on no-a nyor⧾ 'di dih 'ma-dih-deh, 'de :or 'puh-a, or-a' zon⧾ zi :kwlaa :nyieh-: dih.

:Yeh on 'tali:-a :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: :Jororn'-: dih, :yee' 'do :dha :due' 'jeh :dao', on mu 'de on 'bei' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor⧾ bo de. 'De on :za deh⧾-a' klehkpeh Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor:⧾ :klaba'⧾-: 'dekorn: 'bluhba: :korn-nyor⧾-: on :za-a 'weh 'de on bo.

:Yee' :yeh on 'bei' 'worn-a dhih :daa, :yee' an-a' klehkpeh bele: wlu bo, an wlu 'de Nyorsoa bo, on 'dae:, :Gwlor :baa' Nyorsoa, :mor 'o :or no yao-: 'bluhba-: yobo'-: 'dekorn: deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :en :ne-a 'de en 'di-:.

:An-a' Gban 'i :ne :Zulu:, mo-: po-eh 'de :an-a'a: 'bhoi-yu: :Debe' 'worn, :or no-a :a :bai'-a' :baa', 'de or za-eh', or 'dae:, :Eh :korn dhih, 'de nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor:⧾, 'de on 'kpa 'chehn-' 'gabaa :eh? :Eh :korn dhih, 'de nyor⧾-a 'dhu dhih on :se-a' deh 'i 'ye-: i :eh?
'Keen-boi' :on :ne-a dha 'bluhba ken, an po an-a' 'jeh 'kpa, on 'ye vorn 'da mu. 'De nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-nyor⧾ 'kpa :dha :due' :ke, on 'ye :Gwlor :baa'-: 'dekorn: or-a' 'taan'-yu-: bo vorn.

Keen' 'jeh ka. 'Keen :Hehlo'-: 'Pantior: Pale'-: nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: :Jueh'-nyor⧾-: mo-: 'kpa :dha :due' dha :gwlor :klaba' :daa 'di, 'de on 'dhu dhih 'do :Yusu' bo, :or no-a :an-a' gban 'i :ne-bhoi-yu: :on 'tan-a.
:Yee' on no deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :an 'bhorn-a :en 'ye-a' :no-eh: :dee' see 'weh, 'do :on :porluh ken-: 'dekorn: 'de :an-a' 'kpih 'di-:.

:Yee' :kana :naa, :Gwlor :baa', pobo: deh an za-' ya-: e, on no-a, an mu :a deh 'bhun :no. Jorwor: 'nyi :a :mor :or 'dhu-a :an-a' 'bhoi-nynuu 'kpih, :a 'ye :an-a' tubo-wlu⧾ po, 'de :gwluhuh' :ku ka 'di.

'Nyi :an-a' 'kpih :a-uh, :a 'ye nyor⧾-a' puhba-deh⧾ 'puh-dih:. :Yee' 'nyi nyor⧾ 'di dih 'ma-dih-deh⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ 'i :to-dih-deh⧾-: :no-eh:, 'de :an-a' gban 'i :ne-bhoi-yu-a' 'nyne 'di, :or 'dhu-a :Yusu'-'.

:Yee' :yeh on gweh-a 'de Nyorsoa bo :wlu-eh 'i, :yee' 'do :dha on 'kpa-dih:-a :dha :due', 'do-a zi-a 'i. 'De an-a' klehkpeh 'yi-dih: Gban 'i :ne :Zulu-' dih, an po or-a' tubo-wlu⧾, 'de :gwluhuh' :ku ka 'di.

:Yeh eh no :ao', :yee' :Yusu'-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh, on 'ble :porluh :due'-: 'dekorn: 'dlu 'di dih :na-dih-deh :due'-:. An-a' nyor-a' no, 'On :due', 'mor :korn 'an-a: :kororn-deh⧾. An-a' klehkpeh, an kpuhba deh⧾ dih.

:Yee' 'de 'kpih :klaba'⧾ 'di, :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾-a zela-eh ken dih 'weh :chio'lo:, :ka Nyorsoa no-a 'de :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu' 'de nma-dih-deh 'di :za-eh. 'De Nyorsoa po dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh mla :dhulu' bo.

Eh se nyor :korn, :or 'ye-a' 'de nyor⧾ :dao' 'nyne-' :ne, :or 'ye :ao', or se deh :korn. Deh no-eh, 'do kpor :due' :due' 'di, nyor⧾ :on 'ble-a gle⧾-: 'dekorn: 'gbu⧾-: an plo-ih'. :Mor on plo-ih, :yee' an ya 'de en-' 'wlii: on :plo-dih:-a 'weh.
'De an 'nyi-ih :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾. 'De an gble dih nyor⧾ 'yi dih, :on :korn-a son⧾ :gweh-a.
:Yee' 'do ti :dao' bo, 'Joseh: :or 'dhu-a 'Livae-yu-', 'de :or 'wluh-a 'Sapor-bluhba ken, :or :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾ 'dhu-dih:-a :Bana'ba-nyne, :eh :bleh-dih:-a 'i, 'Yu :or po-a 'de nyor⧾-a' 'kpih,
or-: plo or-a'a: gle :due', 'de or :ya 'de eh-a' 'wlii, or 'nyi-ih :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾.
:Yee' 'yu an 'da-dih-a 'Anenaya'-: 'dekorn: or-a'a: 'nynor :Sofaya'-: mo-: plo an-a'a: 'bluhba⧾-a' 'kplo :due'.
:Yee' 'Anenaya' dhe or-a' 'wlii: :nee' dih, 'do or-a' 'jeh bo. Or-a'a: 'nynor yubo: eh-a' deh-: 'i. 'De or kpa :yih :sie:-a 'o :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾.

:Yeh or kpa-a 'wlii-a' kpor :dao', :yee' :Piteh' dhele-or-: dih, or 'da, 'Anenaya', :eh :korn dhih 'de :on :za 'ku 'yli-eh dih, 'de on :korn :an-a' :porluh wlu 'ken, 'de :on 'tmo sih 'de Gban 'i :ne :Zulu bo :eh? 'De 'bluhba-a' 'kplo :on plo-a, :on dhe or-a' 'wlii: :nee' dih 'do :an-a' 'jeh bo :eh?

Ti :on 'see-a 'bluhba-a' 'kplo :dao' plo, :yee' or se 'de :on bo :korn :e? :Ae' :yeh :on plo-or, or-a' 'wlii se 'de :on bo :korn ke? :Yee' :eh :korn dhih, 'de :on po 'o deh :daa :eh :ne :ao', 'do :on :porluh ken :eh? Sih :on 'tmo-a, eh :se 'de :gwlor-nyor⧾ bo, :on :se-ih' 'tmo-dih:. Jorwor: 'de Nyorsoa bo :oo', :on 'tmo-dih-ih.
:Yee' :yeh 'Anenaya' 'worn-a deh :daa :Piteh' :za-a-', :yee' or 'ga-: dih, 'de or 'meh. :Yee' nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on 'worn-a deh :daa :eh :no-eh, :fano 'kpa 'de on 'di 'weh 'gabaa.
:Yee' :yeh or 'meh-a, :yee' 'nynuu: :gbolo'⧾, mo-: 'yle, :on bhian-dih: or-a' 'ku deh⧾ kle-' dih, 'de on kpa-uh 'o 'zorn, on nma-dih-uh dih.
:Yee' :yeh 'yluh-buh⧾ taan 'beh-dih: en 'ye-a 'o ken dih :zi-dih:, :yee' 'Anenaya'-a'a: 'nynor pa 'de 'gbu :Piteh' :ne-a 'di 'weh :ke. Jorwor: or se deh :eh :no-eh yubo:.
'De :Piteh' dhele-or dih, or 'dae:, Zela: 'on :gwluhuh', 'bluhba-a' 'kplo a plo-a, 'wlii-a' klehkpeh a 'ye-a, me-: 'o :en :dhe dih :e? 'De or 'da, Keen', 'wlii: :a 'ye-a, en-' klehkpeh :oo'.

'De :Piteh' 'da, :Eh :korn dhih 'de mor-: 'dekorn: :an-a'a: yibeor-: a 'worn-dih-eh ken dih, 'de a 'dhen :Gwlor :baa' :eh? :Gbee'e:. Nyor⧾-kpalu:⧾ :on nma-dih:-a :an-a'a: yibeor dih, on :ne 'o 'gbu worn 'i 'weh 'gboror:. An mu 'de :on 'zorn :kpa :kana :ke.

:Yeh :Piteh' jla-a, :yee' 'do :dha :due' :dao', or 'ga-: dih 'do :Piteh' ybei', 'de or 'meh. :Yee' :yeh 'nynuu: :gbolo'⧾ :dao', on pa-a 'de 'gbu 'di :neheh', 'de on 'ye-a 'nynor :or 'meh-a, :yee' on 'si-dih: or-a' 'ku-: 'zorn, 'de on nma-dih-uh dih 'do or-a'a: yibeor-a' nma-dih-deh 'bhun.
:Yee' 'chore-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on 'worn-a dhih :daa-: on 'kpa-' :fano: 'gabaa.

:Yee' :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾ no nyor⧾ 'i :to-dih-deh⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ 'di dih 'ma-dih-deh⧾-: 'de :gwlor-nyor⧾ 'nyne-'. :Yee' :Yusu'-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh, an 'kpa :dha :due' 'do ti-a' klehkpeh bo, 'do :dha an 'da-dih-a :Salomor'-a' :forn-dih: 'da.
Jorwor: nyor⧾ 'sluh⧾ :on 'ye-a' 'di dih ku, :on 'ye-a' 'de on 'nyne-' 'kpa, on se :ne. Keen' :mloror' nyor⧾-a 'ye-uh' deh 'gabaa.
:Yee' :yeh eh mu-a 'dlu bo :muu:, :yee' nyor⧾-kpalu⧾-: 'dekorn: 'nynor⧾-kpao'⧾-: mo-: po :Gwlor :baa'-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-', 'de an-a' :dha :dhulu' 'kpa 'o on ken.

:Yee' 'do deh :dao' :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾ no-a bo, eh-: no-eh, 'de nyor⧾-a kpa puhba-nyor⧾ 'de 'kpa :gwie 'i, 'de an 'pehn-dih-uh dih 'do ken 'pehn-deh ken-: 'dekorn: 'do :sleheh'⧾ ken-:. Deh :korn-a dhih an no-a deh⧾ :dao', eh-: 'dhu, an 'bhorn :mor :Piteh' :taa zi, or-a' :yeh beh :or se-uh dih 'tuh, 'de or-a' 'gbu :gwlii' :zulu 'ye 'o, on ken :yi-dih: 'klein', 'de on 'ye 'puh.

:Yee' nyor⧾ :dhulu', mo-: 'wluh :gwlor⧾ :eh :ne-a :Julu'slehn 'de dih 'di, 'de an ya 'de puhba-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ :yuh 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh⧾ :ne-a 'o 'de-: 'do :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾ bo, 'de an-a' klehkpeh 'puh.

:Yeh deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :dao', en mu-a 'dlu bo, :yee' Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor⧾-a' nyor :klaba'-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ :an na-or bo-: :on no-a :Sayusi'i-nyor⧾-a' kpor, :gwlehehn'-: no-uh, 'do :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾-a' deh bo.
'De on kpon-uh, on po-uh 'de :kasue 'di.
Jorwor: dholo-', :yee' :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'enjor :due' yi-: 'de, 'de or :za 'o :kasue-gbu-a' :kpaa', 'de or 'si-dih-uh 'zorn.
'De or 'da, A mu 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'sla ybei', a 'ye dih :nyna 'do :gwlor-nyor⧾ ybei', a 'ye-uh :gwluhuh' zela: 'do 'kmo :ne-eh: :dele' :daa, eh-a' klehkpeh-a' dhih bo.

:Yeh zorn zen-a, :yee' :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor:⧾ :dao', on dhe 'o 'enjor: :dao', or-a' 'tele'-: dih, 'de on mu 'o Nyorsoa-a' 'sla ybei', 'de on 'kpa nyor⧾ deh :torne-eh ken. :Yeh an no :ao', :yee' Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor⧾-a' nyor :klaba'-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ :an na-or bo-: on 'da :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' zabe: :zi-nyor:⧾ :klaba'⧾-: 'dekorn: an-a' 'bluhba: :korn-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh-: 'weh, on 'ye dhih polo:. 'De on dbo nyor⧾ on 'ye 'de :kasue-gbu 'di mu, on 'ye 'de :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor:⧾ :on :ne-a 'de :ya.
Jorwor: :yeh nyor⧾ on dbo-a, on 'si-a dih 'do :kasue-gbu bo, 'de on pobo:-a 'de on 'di, :yee' :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor:⧾ :dao', on se 'de :ne. 'De on mu deka, on po-uh kuna', on 'da,

:Yeh :a :yeh-dih:-a :kasue-gbu ken, :yee' on 'gba-eh: worn 'i 'weh deh 'jeh, 'de :a 'ye nyor⧾ :an 'dhu-uh-a 'yli-eh bo, on :nyna dih 'do an-a' :kpaa' worn 'i. Jorwor: :yeh :a kan-dih:-a 'o 'gbu worn 'i, :yee' :a :se-' nyor 'ye 'de mor.
:Yeh Nyorsoa-a' 'sla-a' :poli'si-a' nyor :klaba'-: 'dekorn: Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor:⧾ :klaba'⧾-: on 'worn-a dhih :daa, :yee' an 'chihleh-eh-: 'i, 'do deh :eh :no-eh 'do :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾ bo.
'De 'yu :due' yi 'o on bo, or zela-uh :gwluhuh', or 'dae:, A :gbee'e:. Nyor⧾ a po-a 'de :kasue 'di, mo-: :ne 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'sla ybei', :an torne nyor⧾ deh 'de mor.

:Yee' 'do :dha :due' :dao', :poli'si-a' nyor :klaba' :dao', or kpa or-a'a: :poli'si 'weh, 'de on :ya 'de :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor:⧾ :dao'. Jorwor: on :se-uh' 'kpih :kpa-dih:. Deh no-eh, an ple :fano:, nyor⧾ :ne-uh' sobu'⧾ dih :tba-dih:.
:Yee' on :pa-dih-uh', 'de on no-eh, on :nyna dih 'do zabe: :zi-nyor⧾ ybei'. 'De Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor⧾-a' nyor :klaba' 'chleh-uh,

or 'dae:, :A :se-' a 'tele' 'i dhe, :eh :mor nyor-a' :no-' :Yusu'-a' 'nyne, :an-a' :torne:-' nyor⧾ deh :dele' ka :e? Jorwor: a :gbee'e:. A pobo: deh a no-a ya-: e. A :gweh-dih: a-a' nyor⧾ deh :torne-eh dha :Julu'slehn 'dlu 'weh. 'De a 'bhorn a 'ye or-a' nyomor 'do :a 'dlu po.
:Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: or 'bei' dboo-nyor⧾-: on 'da, :A :korn :a 'ye 'o Nyorsoa-a' 'tele' dih dhe :gbor :gbor, :eh :zi 'o :gwlor-nyor-a' neh-'.
:Yee' an kpa an-a' wlu 'dlu bo :chio'lo:, on 'dae:, :Yusu' a :kor-dih:-a 'o tu 'i, 'de a 'dba-a, Nyorsoa :or :korn-a :weheh' :a :bai'-a' :bai'-a za-a, or za-or 'de nma-dih-deh 'di 'weh.

:Yeh Nyorsoa za-or 'de nma-dih-deh 'di, :yee' or 'duo-or ya-', 'de or dhe-or dih 'de or-a' :dila-son bo, 'de or no-or :a-a' nyor⧾ :na-dih-nyor-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ 'puh-dih-nyor-:. Or no deh :daa 'weh, 'de 'Ezlea-nyor⧾ 'ye an-a' deh⧾-zon:⧾ :no-eh dih 'tali:, 'de on 'ye 'de Nyorsoa bo 'bili:, 'de or 'ye an-a' deh⧾-zon⧾-a' dhih bo 'ma-dih:.
:A :mor no deh⧾ :daa, en-' dhih bo zela-nyor⧾, 'dekorn: Gban 'i :ne :Zulu: or 'nyi-a nyor⧾ :yuh :an dhe-a 'o or-a' 'tele' dih-: :ke.
:Yeh zabe: :zi-nyor:⧾ :dao', on 'worn-a deh⧾ on :za-a-', :yee' 'chehn 'yi-dih-uh-: dih 'gabaa, 'de an 'bhorn on 'ye-uh' 'dba.

Jorwor: an-a' nyor :due', :or 'dhu-a :Falasi'i-yu-', an 'da-dih-a :Game'la, :or no-a nyor⧾ 'tele' :torne-nyor⧾-a' nyor :due', nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh, an 'dhu-a 'o 'gabaa, or-: :nyna dih 'do zabe: :zi-nyor⧾ ybei', 'de or 'nyi 'tele', on 'ye 'o dboo-nyor:⧾ :dao' 'zorn kpa 'do ti-kpor-bei 'di.
:Yeh on kpa-uh-a 'o 'zorn, 'de or :wlu 'de or 'bei' zabe: :zi-nyor⧾ bo, or 'dae:, A :mor 'Ezlea-nyor:⧾. A no 'neh 'neh, 'do deh a polo-a, a 'ye-a no 'do nyor⧾ :daa 'bhun.

Deh no-eh, 'do ti-kpor-bei: :en zi-a 'di, :yee' nyor-kpalu :due' an 'da-dih-a :Teyu'la, :or 'da-dih-a or-a' 'jeh nyor :klaba', or-: 'yle, :yee' nyor⧾-kpalu:⧾ :on 'beh-dih:-a :on 'ye-a nyor⧾-a' :kehehn' :nyieh no, mo-: zi 'o or klei'. Jorwor: nyor⧾ 'dba-or'. :Yee' or-a'a: nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh, an-a' 'slih 'meh-', 'de on :gba dih.

:Yee' :yeh eh 'wluh-a 'o :neheh', :yee' nyor-kpalu :due' an 'da-dih-a :Juda', :or 'wluh-a :Galali'i-bluhba ken, or-: 'yle, 'do ti an zlo-dih-a nyor⧾ 'i, 'de or no-eh, 'de nyor⧾ :dhulu' zi 'o or klei', on 'ye 'gomla worn :bla-dih:. Jorwor: nyor⧾ 'dba-or' :ke. 'De nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on zi-a 'o or klei', on :gba dih :ke.

:Yee' eh-a' dhih :naa, 'an 'dhu a 'slen, a 'ye :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor:⧾ :daa dih 'tali:, on 'ye mu. Deh no-eh, deh⧾ an 'dhu-a on 'ye-a' no-: 'dekorn: deh⧾ an no-a-: :mor en 'wluh 'o an-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh-a' :porluh⧾ ken, :yee' en mu worn :gweh.

Jorwor: :mor en 'wluh 'de Nyorsoa bo, :yee' a se en-' 'borboa' 'i :po-eh 'beh-dih:, a :ne-eh' no :noo:, 'de a :ne-' Nyorsoa-a' bo :vorn-nyor⧾ no. :Yee' zabe: :zi-nyor:⧾ :dao', on 'worn-dih: deh :Game'la :za-a-' 'weh.

'De on 'da :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾ 'de zabe: :zi-gbu 'zorn :neheh', 'de on bla-uh, on dhe-uh 'tele' 'i, on :ne-' :Yusu'-a' 'nyne 'da :neheh' :dele' ka, :mor on :taa Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu⧾ po. 'De on 'tali-uh dih, on 'ye mu.

:Yee' dboo-nyor:⧾ :dao', :yeh on 'tali-uh-a dih, 'de on 'wluh-a 'de zabe: :zi-gbu 'zorn, :yee' an no 'mona:. Deh no-eh, Nyorsoa 'duo-uh' 'weh, on 'ye deh ken 'kpa-nyor⧾ no, on 'ye yaa'e 'kpa :Yusu'-a' dhih.

:Yee' :eh 'wluh-a 'o ti on za-uh-a 'de :kasue 'di, zorn 'o zorn, on :se-' nyor⧾ deh :torne-eh 'bor :chio'lo:, 'do Nyorsoa-a' 'sla ybei'-: 'dekorn: 'de nyor⧾ 'bli 'gbu⧾ 'di dih-:. 'De mor on :se-' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh-a' po-a' 'bor :ke, :ka :Yusu' 'dhu-a Nyorsoa-a' 'taan'-yu-'.

:Yee' 'do ti :dao' 'di, :yeh :Yusu'-a' klei' :zi-nyor⧾-a 'kpuhba-a ken dih, :yee' :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' :yuh :an po-a 'Glii-wlu, mo-: :an wlu-dih :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' :yuh :an po-a :Hiblu'-wlu 'bhun dih, on 'dae:, :Mor on :taa :dhoba: 'nynor⧾-a'a: dii-deh⧾-' gble, zorn 'o zorn, :yee' an-a' no-a' 'ye deh on :korn on 'ye-a' 'ye.

:Yee' :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor:⧾ :on :korn-a :bhue: 'yor :ne-a 'sororn', on 'da :Yusu'-a' klei' :zi-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :dha :due', 'de on :wlu 'de on bo, on 'dae:, Eh se 'yi dih :nmor, :a 'ye Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ :po-eh 'kpuh ya :to, 'de :a 'ye dii-deh⧾-' gble.

:Yee' :ka eh :ne :ao', :a-a' 'Klae :de-di'-boi'-a:, a :za 'de a 'nyne-' nyor⧾-kpalu⧾ :meheh' 'sorn, :yuh a yubo:-a :on :korn-a :toror', 'de :on 'yi-dih:-a Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu-' dih, :on :korn-a 'de 'kwa, :a 'ye-a deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :daa po.
:Yee' :mor eh :ne :ao', :yee' :a 'beh-dih: :a 'ye :a-a' ti-a' klehkpeh-' 'duo: 'de Nyorsoa bo :wlu-eh bo-: 'dekorn: or-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ :po-eh bo-:.

:Yeh :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾ :za-a deh :dao', :yee' eh 'pehn-dih: or-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh-a' :porluh⧾-: dih, 'de on :za Timi' :or po-a :Yusu'-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' 'gabaa, 'de :or 'yi-dih:-a Gban 'i :ne :Zulu dih. 'De on :za Felor'-: 'Plorkior-: 'Nikanor-: :Timor'-: :Pame'na-: 'dekorn: 'Nakorlor-: :or 'wluh-a :gwlor an 'da-dih-a 'Antior 'di, 'de :or 'kpa-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' Nyorsoa-deh-'.
'De on kpa nyor⧾-kpalu⧾ :meheh' 'sorn :dao' on :za-a, 'de :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾ bo. 'De dboo-nyor:⧾ :dao', on tba-uh son⧾ ken dih, 'de on :wlu 'de Nyorsoa bo, 'do an-a' dhih bo.

:Eh 'wluh-a 'o ti :dao' 'di, :yee' Nyorsoa-a' wlu-a mu 'dlu bo 'weh :chio'lo:. :Yee' :Yusu'-a' klei' :zi-nyor:⧾ :on :ne-a :Julu'slehn, an 'kpuhba ken dih, :bhuh :bhuh. 'De mor Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor:⧾ :dhulu', mo-: po :Yusu'-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' :ke.
:Yee' Nyorsoa po Timi' mla :dhulu' bo. Eh-: no-eh, 'de or 'yi-dih: 'kpih-' dih, or no nyor⧾ 'di dih 'ma-dih-deh:⧾ :klaba'⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ 'i :to-dih-deh:⧾ :klaba'⧾-: 'de nyor⧾ 'klu-'.

:Yee' nyor⧾-kpalu:⧾ :noo' :on no-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' kpor :on 'wluh-a 'de 'di :gweh-dih-sla: an 'da-dih-a Nyor⧾ :on se-a 'de 'gegeye :ne :neheh' 'di, 'de :on no-a :Jueh'-nyor:⧾ :on 'wluh-a :gwlor⧾ an 'da-dih-a :Sali'na-: 'dekorn: 'Ehlezan'dla-: 'de :on :korn-a :noo' 'wluh-a :Sele'sia-bluhba-: 'dekorn: 'Esea-bluhba-: ken, mo-: 'kpa 'o Timi' bo dhobo: 'da.
Jorwor: Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu 'nyi Timi' :toror' :yor :mor or :wlu-a, :yee' nyor se-or 'i :nyna-eh 'beh-dih:.
:Yeh eh no :ao', :yee' on :pa-dih: nyor⧾ 'zorn dih, on 'nyi-uh 'wlii:, on 'ye sih 'tmo, on 'ye :ao', :A 'worn-ih' :ka Timi' :wlu-dih:-a :Mose'-a' 'tele'-: 'dekorn: Nyorsoa-: 'bhun dih 'gabaa.

Deh on :za-a-', eh-: no-eh, 'de nyor⧾ 'bili: 'de Timi' ya, :korn mor 'bluhba: :korn-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ 'tele' :torne-nyor⧾-:. 'De on kpon Timi', on kpa-or 'o :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' zabe: :zi-nyor⧾ ybei'.
:Yee' on :ya 'de nyor⧾ :noo', mo-: 'tmo-dih: Timi' sih ken dih, on 'da, 'Yu :daa, 'do ti-a' klehkpeh bo, or wlu-dih Nyorsoa-a' gban 'i :ne-sla: :daa-: 'dekorn: :Mose'-a' 'tele'-: 'bhun dih.

:Yee' on :wlu-' :neheh', on 'dae:, :A 'worn or-a' wlu, or 'dae:, :Yusu' :dao' :or 'ti-a 'Nazla :dee', or mu Nyorsoa-a' 'sla :daa ya :gba. 'De mor or mu :a 'bli-deh⧾-a' klehkpeh dih :gweh, :en :Mose' 'nyi :a-uh.

:Yeh nyor⧾ :dao', on :za-a deh⧾ :dao', :yee' nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :dhe-a dih 'de :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' zabe: :zi-gbu 'zorn, an-a' 'yli-a' klehkpeh, en :ne 'de Timi' ya. :Yeh an pobo-or ya 'dhuan, :yee' or-a' 'yuba gweh 'enjor-a' 'yuba:, 'de on 'yli-e.
:Yee' :yeh nyor⧾ :dao', on jla-a, :yee' Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor⧾-a' nyor :klaba' dhele: Timi'-: dih, or 'dae:, Deh⧾-a' klehkpeh on po-a 'o :on 'dlu, dhih 'jeh :oo' :e?

:Yee' Timi' :wlu-', or 'dae:, 'An 'de-di'-boi'-a-: 'dekorn: 'on-bai'-a-: a :to 'on :dou'⧾ bo o. Nyorsoa :or :korn-a dhih 'beh-a' 'i, or 'wluh-dih: :a :bai'-a' :baa' 'Eble'hehn-: 'i, ti or :ne-a 'Mehsopata'mior-bluhba ken :dee', 'de jorwor: or mu 'Hala-gwlor 'di 'ti 'da :mu.
:Yee' Nyorsoa :wlu-' 'de or bo, or 'dae:, Sie :an-a'a: 'cheh-: 'dekorn: :an-a'a: 'bluhba-dlu-: 'de :on 'ye 'de 'bluhba-dlu: 'an mu-a :on :torne: ken mu.

:Yee' :yeh Nyorsoa 'da :ao', :yee' 'Eble'hehn 'wluh 'o :Kali'a-nyor⧾-a' 'bluhba ken, 'de or mu, or 'ti 'Hala-gwlor 'di. 'Do :wor or :baa' 'meh-dih:. :Yeh or :baa' 'meh-a, :yee' Nyorsoa za-or 'o 'bluhba: :dao' ken 'weh, 'de or ya-or dha 'bluhba: :daa ken, :or :korn ken a 'ti-a :naa.

Ti or yi-a dha, Nyorsoa :se-or' 'bluhba-yli-eh 'nyi 'do or-a' 'jeh bo. Or :se-or' 'bluhba-a' :dha-yu-beh: or 'ye-a buh dih 'si-dih:-a 'jeh 'nyi :sloror'. Jorwor: Nyorsoa po wlu :dhama'-' 'de or bo, :ka or mu-or 'bluhba-dlu: :daa 'nyi-:, or 'ye-or' :korn, or-: or-a'a: 'nynuu-a' 'nynuu-:, keen' :mloror' or 'see 'yu 'wluh 'do ti :dao' 'i.

:Yee' deh Nyorsoa :za-a 'de 'Eble'hehn bo :neheh', eh-: :dhe dih, or 'dae:, :An-a'a: 'nynuu-a' 'nynuu-a mu 'duhba⧾ :no, 'de 'bluhba: 'sluh ken, 'do :wor an mu 'ge-nynuu deh :no-dih:, 'de on 'ye-uh' dhih-' no 'do zon⧾-a' :kehehn' :nyieh 'di.

Jorwor: 'an mu 'bluhba-dlu: :or :korn-a 'zorn an mu-a 'ge-nynuu deh :no-dih: 'kle 'ye-eh 'dlu :po. :Yee' :mor deh :daa, eh zi, :yee' an mu 'o 'bluhba: :dao' ken 'wluh-:, 'de on 'ye dha :dha :daa deka yi, on 'ye 'an :weheh' :za dha mor.

:Yee' Nyorsoa no-eh', 'de or-: 'dekorn: 'Eble'hehn-: on po :bhlororn' 'meh-eh-a' kuo. :Yee' :yeh eh 'wluh-a 'o, :yee' 'Eble'hehn 'wluh Ase', 'de or 'dba Ase' :bhlororn' 'do 'we-eh-a' :meheh' na neh 'di. 'De Ase' 'wluh 'Jekor, 'de or 'dba 'Jekor :bhlororn' :ke. 'De 'Jekor 'wluh nyor⧾-kpalu⧾-nynuu-a' :bhue: 'yor 'sororn', 'de or 'dba-uh :bhlororn' :ke, :on no-a :a :bai'-a' :bai' 'zean'.

:Yee' 'nynuu: :dao' 'Jekor 'wluh-a, :on no-a :a :bai'-a' :bai', an no an-a' dei' 'Joseh :gwlehehn' bo, 'de on :plo-dih-or nyor⧾ bo, 'de nyor⧾ :dao', on kpa-or 'Iye-bluhba ken, or 'ye 'ge-yu no. Jorwor: Nyorsoa :ne 'o or bo 'weh,

'de or zelie-or, 'do 'kle 'ye-eh-a' klehkpeh :eh :yi-dih-or ya dih 'zorn. Or 'nyi-or :toror'. Eh-: no-eh, 'de 'Iye-nyor⧾-a' 'keen 'worn-dih: 'Joseh-a' dhih ken dih, 'de or no-or nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-nyor-' 'do 'Iye-bluhba ken-: 'dekorn: or-a'a: 'gbu-a' klehkpeh-:.

Ti 'Joseh no-a nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-nyor 'do 'Iye-bluhba ken, :yee' 'moeh: :eh 'kpa-a Ji Kou'-moeh, eh-: 'yle 'do 'Iye-bluhba-a' klehkpeh-: 'dekorn: 'Keneh-bluhba-a' klehkpeh-: ken. :Yeh 'moeh: :dao', eh yi-a 'de, :yee' eh :ya 'de 'kle 'ye-eh: :dhulu' 'de :a :bai'-a' :bai'-a' 'ye dii-deh.
:Yee' 'Jekor 'worn-ih' :ka dii-deh⧾ :ne-a 'Iye-bluhba ken. :Yeh or 'worn-ih'-a, :yee' or dbo or-a'a: nyor⧾-kpalu⧾-nynuu 'weh :on no-a :a :bai'-a' :bai' :naa, eh-: no an-a' :tehn 'i-ti on kpa 'de.
'Sororn' :neh on kpa-a 'de, :yee' 'Joseh :za or-a' 'jeh 'kwla 'de or-a' 'de-di'-boi' bo. Eh-: no-eh, 'de 'keen :dao', or yubo: 'Joseh-a'a: 'cheh.
:Yee' :yeh or 'ye-a 'Joseh-a'a: 'cheh, :yee' 'Joseh dbo wlu 'de or :baa' 'Jekor-: 'dekorn: or-a'a: 'cheh-a' klehkpeh bo-: on 'ye 'de or bo 'Iye yi, :on no-a nyor⧾-a' :kwlaa :meheh' 'sorn 'yor :mm'.
:Yeh 'Jekor 'worn-a tubo-wlu:⧾ :daa, :yee' or mu 'Iye 'weh, 'do :wor or :ne :a :bai'-a' :bai' 'meh-dih:.

'De on :ya an-a' 'ku⧾-a' klehkpeh de, 'do :dha an 'da-dih-a 'Sikan-gwlor: :or :ne-a dha 'Keneh-bluhba ken. 'Do :wor on nma-dih: an-a' klehkpeh dih, 'de nma-dih-deh: :eh no-a wor, 'Eble'hehn dhen-a :dee' see 'di, 'de 'Hemor-a'a: 'nynuu 'kwa :on 'ti-a 'Sikan.
:Yee' deh :korn-a wlu Nyorsoa po-a :dhama'-' 'de 'Eble'hehn bo, eh-a' ti-a 'koan'-dih 'o-: dih, eh 'ye :no-eh:, 'de mor :a-a'a: nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'Iye-bluhba ken, an 'kpuhba ken dih 'gabaa :ke.
:Yee' 'keen :dele', :or se-a 'Joseh-a' deh 'i yubo:, or-: 'kpa 'o 'Iye-bluhba-a' :na-dih: 'da.
'Keen :dao', or :po-dih: :a-a'a: nyor⧾ :bhuli' dih, 'de or no-uh dhih-'. Or :kpa-dih-uh-: 'kpih, 'de on :za an-a'a: 'nynuu: :bleheh'eh:⧾ on 'bli 'gbu⧾ 'di dih, on po-uh 'kwla, on 'ye 'meh.
:Yee' 'do ti-a' 'jeh :dao' 'i, 'do :wor :Mose' 'wluh-dih:. :Mose'-a' 'jeh :dao', or no 'yu :or :nmor-a 'yi dih 'gabaa. :Yeh or 'wluh-a, :yee' or-a'a: 'cheh 'ble-or', 'do 'chuh⧾ taan 'di.
:Yeh 'chuh⧾ taan :dao', en zi-a, :yee' or-a'a: 'cheh za-or 'de 'gbu. :Yee' 'keen-a'a: 'yu-nynor-kpao'-yu 'duo-or' 'weh, or 'ye or-a'a: 'yu no.
'De on :torne-or 'Iye-nyor⧾-a' :toror'-a' klehkpeh. Eh-: no-eh, 'de or-a' noo-deh⧾-: 'dekorn: or-a' :zaa-dhih-: en 'kpa deh ken.
:Yee' :yeh :Mose'-a' zon⧾ nyni-a :kwlaa :nyieh bo, :yee' or polo-eh' 'do or-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh: :gwlii', or 'ye or-a' 'de-di'-boi' 'Ezlea-nyor⧾ 'ye 'da mu.

:Yeh :Mose' mu-a, :yee' or 'ye or-a'a: nyor⧾-a' nyor :due', or-: 'Iye-yu :due' no dhih-', 'de or mu 'Ezlea-yu: :dao' ken :kan-dih: 'da. :Yeh or mu-a, :yee' or 'wluh 'Ezlea-yu: :dao' bo, 'de or 'dba 'Iye-yu-a' 'jeh :dao'.
:Yee' :mor :Mose' :taa 'ye :dee', or 'da or-a'a: nyor⧾-a mu eh-a' 'i yubo-eh :korn :dee', :ka Nyorsoa dbo-or, or 'ye-uh'-a 'de 'gegeye :za. Jorwor: on se eh-a' 'i yubo-eh :korn.

:Yeh zorn :noror' zen-a, 'de or mu-a de :neheh', :yee' or 'ye 'Ezlea-nyor⧾ 'sororn', mo-: :an vorn, 'de or mu-uh 'i zela: 'da, or 'ye-eh' no, on 'ye wlu-' dih 'woorn:, 'de or :wlu 'de on bo, or 'dae:, :A 'bli-nyor⧾-a:. A :gbee'e:. A :mor 'de-di'-boi' :oo'. :Eh :korn dhih, a 'bhorn a-a' nyor 'ye or 'be deh tba :eh?

:Yeh :Mose' :za-a deh :dao', :yee' 'yu-a' 'jeh :dao' :or no-a or 'be dhih-', or 'tun-dih: :Mose' 'for bo, 'de or :wlu 'de :Mose' bo, or 'dae:, :Or no :on nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-nyor-' 'do :a 'dlu :eh? 'De mor :or no :on zabe: :zi-nyor-' 'do :a 'dlu :eh?
:An 'bhorn :on 'ye 'on 'dba, :ka :on no-a 'Iye-yu: :dao', or-a' 'dba-a' zama :e?
:Yeh :Mose' 'worn-a deh 'yu :dao' or :za-a-', :yee' or ple-', or mu 'bluhba: an 'da-dih-a 'Median ken. 'Do :wor or 'ti, 'de or 'wluh nyor⧾-kpalu⧾-nynuu 'sororn' 'de mor.
:Yee' :yeh zon⧾-a' :kwlaa :nyieh zi-a, :yee' 'enjor :due', or-: 'wluh-dih-or 'i, 'de neh-', 'do :dha 'kwla-gan: :yale'-a sin-dih-a, 'de :bhehneh'-bluhba ken, :eh 'koan'-dih:-a 'Sanae-tluh dih.

:Yeh :Mose' 'ye-a neh, 'de eh wan-a, :yee' eh 'ma-dih: 'de or 'di-: dih, 'de or 'koan'-dih: 'o eh bo dih, or 'ye deh :eh mu-a 'dlu bo 'ye, deh 'jeh. :Yeh or 'koan'-dih:-a 'o dih, :yee' or 'worn :Gwlor :baa'-a' wlu, or 'dae:,
'Mor :or no-a :on :bai'-a' :bai' 'Eble'hehn-: Ase'-: 'dekorn: 'Jekor-: an-a' Nyorsoa, 'mor :oo'. :Yeh :Mose' 'worn-a wlu :daa, :yee' :fano-a: no-or, 'de or-a' 'tiei-a tleh, 'de or ple 'de-a' pobo-eh.
:Yee' :Gwlor :baa' :wlu-' :neheh' 'de or bo, or 'dae:, :Za 'de :an-a'a: :buhbuh⧾. Deh no-eh, 'do :dha :on :nyna-a dih, 'do :ne 'i gban.

'On pobo: 'de 'Iye-bluhba ken 'weh, 'de 'on 'ye :ka an no-a 'an-a: nyor dhih-' :no-eh 'weh 'de mor. 'On 'worn an-a' 'viin'-wlu 'weh. Eh-: :korn dhih, 'on 'wluh 'de yai', 'on yi-uh zelie: 'da. 'Yle, 'on 'ye :on 'Iye de dbo.

:Mose' :or :korn-a dhih 'Ezlea-nyor⧾ se-a 'worn-dih:, 'de on no-a, :Or no :on nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-nyor-: 'dekorn: zabe: :zi-nyor-: :eh? Or-: 'o. :Mose'-a' 'jeh :dao', or-: 'o Nyorsoa-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh dbo, or 'ye-uh' wlu 'ken :korn, 'de or 'ye-uh' zelie:, :eh :yi-dih:-a 'enjor: :dao', ti 'kwla-gan: :yale'-a sin-a, 'de or 'ye-a :Mose' 'i 'wluh-dih: 'de or 'di.

Ti :Mose' za-uh-a 'Iye, :yee' or no nyor⧾ 'di dih 'ma-dih-deh⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ 'i :to-dih-deh⧾-: 'de 'Iye-: 'dekorn: 'do Yobo' :zaehn-: worn 'i. 'De or no nyor⧾ 'di dih 'ma-dih-deh⧾ 'de :bhehneh'-bluhba ken :ke, 'do zon⧾-a' :kwlaa :nyieh 'di.
:Mose' :dao', or-: 'o, :or zela: 'Ezlea-nyor⧾ :gwluhuh', :or 'da, Nyorsoa-a mu a wele-eh: :po-nyor bo :dbo, :or mu-a 'de :a-a'a: nyor⧾ 'klu-' 'wluh-:. :Ka 'on :ne-a, 'ka-: 'o or :ne :ke.

:Mose'-a' 'jeh :dao', or :ne 'Ezlea-nyor⧾ 'kpa :dha :due' 'weh 'de :bhehneh'-bluhba ken, :on no-a :a :bai'-a' :bai'. 'Enjor: :or :wlu-a 'de or bo, 'do 'Sanae-tluh ken, or :ne 'o or bo 'weh :ke. 'Enjor-a' 'jeh :dao', or 'nyi-or tubo-wlu:⧾, or 'ye-ih po 'noror :a bo, :en no-a tubo-wlu:⧾ :en 'nyi-a nyor⧾ :febeh'.
Jorwor: :a :bai'-a' :bai' :se-' :Mose'-a' dhih 'worn-dih:, 'de mor an-a' 'worn, an-a' dhe 'o or-a' 'tele' dih. 'De an-a' :porluh⧾-a 'bhorn en 'ye 'Iye de mu.

'De on zela: 'yu an 'da-dih-a Elorn' :gwluhuh', on 'dae:, No :a-a'a: nyorsoa⧾ 'do :a bo, en 'ye 'o :a ybei' :korn, 'de :a 'ye-ih 'de :na. Deh no-eh, :Mose' :yor :daa :mloror', :or :za-a: 'de :a 'Iye-bluhba ken, deh 'ye-or no, :a se-eh yubo:.
:Yee' 'do ti-a' 'jeh :dao' bo :oo', 'do :wor on :ma-dih: deh :eh gweh-a :blii'-yu, 'de on :za 'slaa 'do eh bo, on 'dhu gor 'do deh an-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh-a' son⧾ ma-a bo, 'do eh-a' deh-' 'ye-eh bo.

:Yeh on no-a deh :dao', :yee' eh-: no-eh, 'de Nyorsoa to-uh 'kpuh ya, or za-uh 'yli-eh bo, on 'ye 'chuh-: 'yluh-: 'dekorn: 'chuh :dhlaen-: :en :ne-a 'de yai', en-' :weheh' :za, :ka eh no-a 'chle-eh 'de Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor⧾-a' 'chlee-deh 'di, eh no-a, A :mor 'Ezlea 'di. 'Mor :oo', a 'nyi 'slaa: :za-dih-deh⧾-: 'dekorn: 'nyii'-deh⧾-: 'do zon⧾-a' :kwlaa :nyieh a no-a 'de :bhehneh'-bluhba ken :e?

'Kei:. 'Mornor:-nyorsoa :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' son no-a, or-a' :gbalie :oo' a tele:, 'de mor 'Wlafa:-nyorsoa :or no-a 'chuh :dhlaen-eh: a-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh-a' son no-a, or-: a tele: :ke. Zuu:⧾ :daa, me-: 'o a no, a 'ye :weheh' :za. :Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, 'an mu-eh :no, tuh 'ye a 'bluhba ken :za, 'de on 'ye a :dha :dhorno' kpa, 'de 'Babe'lor-gwlor 'de.

:Yee' ti :a :bai'-a' :bai' :ne-a 'de :bhehneh'-bluhba ken, on 'ble 'taa: 'por :gbalie :eh :to-dih-eh on 'i, :ka Nyorsoa :ne-a 'o on bo. :Ka Nyorsoa no-a :Mose'-a' deh :jii-eh dih :po-eh-: 'dekorn: :ka or no-a eh-a' 'ye-a'-: 'ka :wor or no eh-a' po-a'.

:Yee' :a :bai'-a' :bai' :za 'taa: 'por :gbalie :dao' 'de on :bai' 'kwa, 'de on kpa-eh ti :Jasua'-a na-dih-uh-a :dee', ti on 'ya-a 'bluhba⧾-dlu:⧾ Nyorsoa :za-a 'dawor'⧾ ken dih 'dlu 'do on bo. :Gbalie :dao', on 'ble-eh :chio'lo: dha 'bluhba: :daa ken, 'de eh :yeh-dih: :Debe'-a' 'keen :no-ti ken.
Nyorsoa-a' :porluh 'pehn-: dih 'do :Debe' bo. 'De :Debe' dhele-or dih, or 'ye-eh' ken dih 'worn-dih: or 'ye 'gbu po 'do or bo, :or 'dhu-a 'Jekor-a' Nyorsoa-'.
Jorwor: :Debe'-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh :se-uh' po. :Salomor', or-: po 'gbu :dao' 'do Nyorsoa bo.
Jorwor: 'yi 'beh-Nyorsoa-a' 'ti 'de 'gbu :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' son po-a 'di. 'De mor :ka or-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor no-a eh-a' :za-a', or no-a,

:Gwlor :baa' 'dae:, 'Noror 'on 'bli yai', 'do :wor no 'an-a: 'keen :kpala' 'an dhe ken. 'De dha 'bluhba ken :wor no 'an-a: buh⧾ ken dih :tba-deh. Deh 'i-deh-gbu: a mu :po 'do 'on bo :eh? :A 'ye :dha 'an mu-a dih 'pehn-: 'on 'ye-a :forn 'dee.
Eh :se 'an 'jeh 'yor-eh: :or se deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :daa no :e?

:Yee' Timi'-a kpa or-a' wlu 'dlu bo 'de on bo, or 'dae:, A :mor 'dlu⧾-a' :kmuu-nyor:⧾ :daa, :or :korn-a :porluh⧾-: 'dekorn: :dou'⧾-: :en :kmu-a deh :dao'. A gweh a :bai'-a' :bai', a bla-dih Gban 'i :ne :Zulu worn 'do ti-a' klehkpeh bo.

Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor: :yoror :or a 'beh-dih: a 'ye 'nyne-' 'si, a :bai'-a' :bai' :se-' 'kle 'ye-dih: :eh? On 'dba Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor:⧾ :sloror', :on sie-a ti de, 'de :on :za-a Nyorsoa-a' 'taan'-yu: :or 'sleh-a 'i, or-a' 'de :yi-dhih-' 'weh. Jorwor: :yeh or yi-a 'de, :yee' a plo-or', 'de a 'dba-or.
A :mor 'ye 'tele' 'enjor-nyor⧾ :ya-a: 'de. Jorwor: a-a' no-eh.
:Yee' :yeh :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' zabe: :zi-nyor:⧾ :dao', an to-a Timi'-a' wlu :dou'⧾ bo, :yee' 'chehn-: no-uh 'gabaa, 'de on 'si-dih: 'nyne 'i.
:Yee' Timi' 'yi-dih: Gban 'i :ne :Zulu-: dih, 'de or pobo: 'de Nyorsoa 'bli yai', or 'ye or-a' dhih-a' 'i 'beh-a', 'de or 'ye :Yusu' or :nyna dih 'do Nyorsoa-a' :dila-son bo.
:Yee' or :wlu-', or 'dae:, A :gbee'e:. 'An 'ye 'de Nyorsoa 'bli yai' 'weh, 'de kan-dih: worn. 'De 'yu an 'da-dih-a Nyor-kpalu-a' 'yu, or :nyna dih 'do Nyorsoa-a' :dila-son bo.
:Yeh Timi' :za-a deh :dao', :yee' an-a' klehkpeh, an po 'geh⧾, 'de on kan an-a' :dou'⧾, on :ge-dih-or bo, on kpon-or.

'De on 'kla-or dih, on za-or 'o :gwlor-'. 'De on 'kpa 'o or-a' sobu'⧾ dih :tba-dih: 'da. :Yuh :on po-or dhih 'dlu, on :za an-a'a: 'korlor⧾ dih, 'de on sie-ih 'o :goba'-yu :due' an 'da-dih-a :Soror' bo.
:Yee' :yeh an tba-dih-a Timi' sobu'⧾ dih, :yee' Timi' :wlu-' 'de Nyorsoa bo, or 'dae:, :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu', 'worn-dih: 'an :zulu-a' dhih o.

:Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' or bla 'koor-dlu⧾ 'yi glu, 'de or 'wor, or 'da, :Gwlor :baa', deh⧾-zon:⧾ :daa an no-a, :an-a' :kpon-uh' dih 'do en-' dhih bo o. :Yeh or :za-a deh :daa-', :yee' or 'kpa-' 'nyinor: :klaba'.

:Soror'-a' 'jeh :dao', or 'worn-dih: Timi'-a' 'meheh'-dhih 'weh :ke. :Yee' 'do 'we-eh-a' 'jeh :dao' 'di, nyor⧾ 'kpa 'o 'chore-nyor⧾-a' 'kle 'ye-dih: 'da 'weh 'gabaa, 'de :Julu'slehn. Eh-: no-eh, 'de 'chore-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh gboba: dih, on gweh :Judi'a-bluhba-: 'dekorn: Sehmeh'la-bluhba ken dih 'dlu. Jorwor: :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾ :due', mo-: :se-' ple, on :se-' dih gboba:.
:Yee' Nyorsoa-nyor:⧾ :noo' :on 'sleh-a 'i, mo-: nma-dih: Timi' dih, 'de on 'vin, on 'zlu or-a' dhih 'gabaa.

:Yeh deh⧾ :daa, en mu-a 'dlu bo, :yee' :Soror' vorn or 'ye 'chore ya gba. Or pa 'gbu⧾ 'di dih, or :za 'de :Yusu'-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor:⧾, 'nynor⧾-kpao'⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾-kpalu⧾-: 'de or 'kla-uh dih, or po-uh :kasue 'di.
