:Yee' :Yusu'-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor:⧾ :on gboba:-a dih, 'de :on mu-a deh⧾-' dih, deh⧾ on :ne-a dih, :yee' an po Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh 'de nyor⧾ bo.
:Yee' Felor' mu 'de Sehmeh'la-bluhba-a' :gwlor :klaba' 'di, 'de or :za Nyorsoa-a' 'taan'-yu-a' dhih-' 'de mor.
:Gwlor-nyor:⧾ :dhulu' :on :ne-a 'de, Felor' :wlu-a 'de bo, on to-or :dou'⧾ bo deh 'jeh. Deh no-eh, nyor⧾ 'i :to-dih-deh:⧾ or no-a, me-: on 'ye.
'Kwla 'ye-dih-deh:⧾, me-: po 'geh⧾, en 'wluh 'o an-a' :dha :dhulu' 'de. 'De 'tiei-a' 'meheh'-nyor:⧾ :dhulu'-: 'dekorn: :nea-nyor:⧾ :dhulu'-: on 'puh.
:Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a 'o :gwlor :dao' 'di, an no 'mona: 'gabaa.

:Yee' 'do ti :en zi-a 'di, 'yu :due' an 'da-dih-a Samor', :or 'ti-a 'o gwlor-a' 'jeh :dao' 'di, or-: no 'ylaa: 'yla⧾ :dee', 'de or 'ma-dih: 'de nyor⧾ :ne-a 'o 'di dih. :Yee' or 'beh-dih: or-a' 'jeh-: 'i, or 'da-dih or-a' 'jeh nyor :klaba'.

:Yee' nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a 'o gwlor-a' 'jeh :dao' 'di, 'nyne :korn-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ :on se-a 'nyne :korn-: an-a' klehkpeh, an to-or :dou'⧾ bo 'gabaa, on 'da, 'Yu :daa, or-: 'dhu Nyorsoa-a' 'kpih an 'da-dih-a 'Kpih :klaba'⧾-'.
Deh no-eh, 'de on zi-a 'o or klei', eh-: 'dhu, 'ylaa: 'yla⧾ or no-a, me-: 'ma-dih: 'de on 'di dih, 'do ti :dhorno'⧾ 'di.

Jorwor: :yeh Felor' po-a Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh, 'de or :za-a :Yusu' 'Klae-a' 'nyne-a' dhih-', :yee' on po-ih' dhih 'jeh. :Yeh on po-ih-a dhih 'jeh-', :yee' 'nynor⧾-kpao'⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾-kpalu⧾-: an-a' klehkpeh, on :po 'ni 'dlu.

Samor'-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh po-ih' dhih 'jeh :ke, 'de or :po 'ni 'dlu. :Yee' :dha klehkpeh Felor'-a mu-a :mu, :yee' or zi 'o or klei' 'weh. Or-a' :porluh 'ma-', 'do nyor⧾ 'i :to-dih-deh:⧾ :klaba'⧾-: 'dekorn: deh⧾ :kolu'⧾-: :en :no-eh bo.
:Yee' :yeh :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor:⧾ :on :ne-a :Julu'slehn, on 'worn-ih'-a :ka nyor⧾ :on :ne-a Sehmeh'la, on kpon-a Nyorsoa-a' wlu dih, :yee' on dbo :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: :Jororn'-: 'weh 'de on bo.
:Yeh on 'si-a dih, :yee' on :wlu 'de Nyorsoa bo 'weh 'do an-a' dhih bo, on 'ye Gban 'i :ne :Zulu 'ye.
Deh no-eh, Gban 'i :ne :Zulu 'see 'o an-a' nyor :due' ken yi. 'De :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu'-a' 'nyne 'di, 'do :wor on :po-dih: 'ni 'dlu 'klein'.
:Yee' :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: :Jororn'-: on tba-uh son⧾ ken dih. 'De nyor⧾ :dao', on 'ye Gban 'i :ne :Zulu.
:Yee' :yeh Samor' 'ye-a nyor⧾, 'de an 'ye-a Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu, ti dboo-nyor:⧾ :dao', on tba-uh-a son⧾ ken dih, :yee' or 'nyi-uh 'wlii:, or 'da,
A 'nyi 'on 'kpih :dao' :ke, 'de :mor 'on tba nyor son⧾ ken dih, 'de or 'ye Gban 'i :ne :Zulu 'ye :ke.

:Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' :Piteh' :wlu-' 'de or bo, or 'dae:, 'Nyi mor-: 'dekorn: :an-a'a: 'wlii-: a mu 'de 'ku 'bli neh-'. Deh no-eh, :mor :on :taa 'ye :dee', :yee' :on 'da :an mu Nyorsoa-a' 'nyii'-deh 'wlii :dhen-dih: :e?
:On se deh-: 'dekorn: 'for-: 'ble 'noror :a-a'a: :koan: :daa 'di. Deh no-eh, :an-a' :porluh se 'i 'sleh 'do Nyorsoa ybei'.
'Tali: :an-a' kplen-zon⧾ dih, 'de :on 'ye 'de :Gwlor :baa' bo :wlu. Or mu deh-zon: :eh :ne-a 'o :an-a' :porluh ken, en-' dhih bo 'ma-dih: 'bla.
'An 'ye :gwlehehn'-zon:⧾ :ne-a 'de :on 'di 'weh. 'De :on :ne 'o deh⧾-zon⧾-a' 'gegeye 'zorn.
:Yee' Samor' :wlu-' 'de :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: :Jororn'-: bo, or 'dae:, A :korn 'gen. A :wlu 'de :Gwlor :baa' bo, 'de deh⧾ :daa a 'da-a, en-' deh-beh-deh-beh :ne 'o 'on bo yi.

:Yee' :yeh :Piteh'-: 'dekorn: :Jororn'-: on zela:-a :Gwlor :baa'-a' dhih ken dih, 'de on po-a tubo-wlu:⧾ :en kor-or 'i, :yee' on mu :Julu'slehn de. :Yeh an mu-a de, :yee' an po Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh 'de Sehmeh'la-bluhba-a' :gwlor⧾ :nyene' :dhulu' 'di dih, 'do :gwie 'i.

:Yee' :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'enjor :due', or-: :wlu 'de Felor' bo, or 'dae:, :Sorn-', :on 'ye :gwie: :eh mu-a 'de 'yluh-a' 'kwla 'wluh-dih: 'da-a' kona-for bo kpa, :eh 'wluh-a :Julu'slehn, 'de :eh :yi-dih:-a 'de :bhehneh'-bluhba ken, :eh mu-a :gwlor an 'da-dih-a 'Geza, :on 'ye-eh kpa.

:Yee' Felor' 'kpa 'o 'weh. :Yeh or mu-a, :yee' 'Itio'pa-nyor⧾-a' 'kwi :klaba', :or :korn-a 'de 'keen-nynor-kpao' :or :ne-a 'Itio'pa-bluhba ken, or-a'a: 'wlii-a' klehkpeh-a' dih :dhe 'da wlu bo, or-: :ne 'o :gwie: :dao' 'i. Or 'wluh Nyorsoa :weheh' :za 'da 'de :Julu'slehn, 'de or mu or 'bli de.
Or :dhe dih 'do deh :eh 'ble-a buh⧾ :nyieh, 'de :soo'o⧾-a jli-a ken, 'de or mu or 'bli, or zlo Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor: :Azaya'-a' 'chlee-deh or 'chle-a.
:Yee' Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu zela: Felor' :gwluhuh', on 'dae:, Mu 'de deh :dao', 'yu :dao' or :ne-a 'de 'di bo, :on 'ye-eh' 'worn dih :na-dih:.

:Yee' Felor' ple-', or mu 'de 'weh, 'de or 'worn 'yu :dao', or-a' wlu, or zlo Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor: :Azaya'-a' 'chlee-deh: or 'chle-a. 'De Felor' dhele-or dih, or 'da, Deh :an zlo-a, :an 'worn-eh dih :naa :e?
'De or 'da, :Kaa 'an mu eh-a' dih 'worn-eh :no :eh? :Mor eh 'dhu nyor zela-eh ken dih 'noror 'on bo, 'de 'on 'ye-eh dih 'worn. :Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' or 'da Felor' 'weh, 'de or bo deh 'di.

:Yee' deh or zlo-a 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh: :dao' 'di, eh-: :dhe dih, eh 'da, Or gweh 'blae' an kpa-a 'dba 'da. 'De or gweh 'blae'-yu: :eh-a' 'worn-a, :eh-a' :wlu-a, :mor on :taa 'o eh-a' 'pibi chehn. 'Ka-: or :ne :ke, or :se-' :wlu.
On :no-dih-or dhen, 'de on zi or-a' zabe 'de :bhuli' ka 'di. Or se 'nynuu-a' 'nynuu 'ble, :on :korn-a dhih nyor⧾ 'ye-a' :za. Deh no-eh, or-a' :febeh' :jla-' 'dlu, dha yao 'zorn.

:Yeh or gweh-a deh :dao', eh-a' zlo-a' 'i, :yee' or dhele: Felor'-: dih, or 'dae:, Zela: 'on :gwluhuh', or-a' 'nyne Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor: :daa, or 'da :eh? Or-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh :e? :Ae' nyor :noror' :oo' ke?
'De Felor' tba 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh: :dao' bo dih, 'de or po tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh :en kor-a :Yusu' 'i 'de or bo.
:Yeh an mu-a, 'de deh :dao', eh kpa-uh-a, :yee' on :yeh-dih: 'ni ken. 'De 'kwi :klaba' :dao', or :wlu 'de Felor' bo, or 'dae:, 'Ni :wor :dhe dih. :Eh 'ye 'on 'yi kan 'do 'ni 'dlu :po-eh bo :eh? [

'De Felor' 'da, :Mor :on po-eh dhih 'jeh-', 'do :an-a' :porluh⧾-a' klehkpeh bo, :yee' eh-: 'o. :Yee' :an mu 'ni 'dlu :po-eh:. 'De 'yu :dao', or :wlu, or 'dae:, 'On po-eh-' dhih 'jeh, :ka :Yusu' 'Klae 'dhu-a Nyorsoa-a' 'yu-'.]

:Yee' 'kwi :klaba' :dao', or zela: 'yu :or na-dih-a deh on :ne-a 'de 'di :gwluhuh', or 'ye-eh' dih :nyna-dih:. 'De or :nyna-dih-eh dih. :Yee' Felor'-: 'dekorn: 'kwi :dao'-: on 'si-: 'zorn, on mu 'o 'nior. 'De Felor' po-or 'ni 'dlu 'do 'nior.

:Yeh on 'wluh-a 'o 'nior, :yee' 'yli :a bla-a 'i, :Gwlor :baa'-a' :Zulu 'duo: Felor' 'weh, 'de on kpa-or. 'Kwi :klaba' :dao', or :se-' Felor' 'ye :neheh'. :Yee' or 'kpa or-a'a: :gwie-: 'i :ke, 'de or mu or 'bli, or no 'mona.
:Yee' :yeh on no :ao', 'de Felor'-a mu-a or-a' 'jeh 'ye-:, :yee' or :ne :Azo'ta:, 'de or na, or po Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh gwlor⧾-a' klehkpeh 'di dih. Eh-: or no :noo:, 'de or 'si 'Sehsali'a dih.
:Yee' :yeh deh⧾ :daa, en mu-a 'dlu bo, :yee' :Soror'-a 'da or mu 'Klae-a' klei' :zi-nyor⧾ 'dba-: :gbor :gbor. 'De or mu 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor⧾-a' nyor :klaba' bo,

or 'ye-or 'chlee-deh 'nyi :eh 'ye-eh no, 'de nyor⧾ 'ye-or yubo:, 'de or 'ye 'de :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'di :gweh-dih-sla⧾ 'zorn dih pa, 'de :gwlor an 'da-dih-a :Dama'kor 'di. :Mor or 'ye nyor, :or zi-a 'o :Gwlor :baa'-a' :gwie klei' de mor, or 'ye-or' kpon, or 'ye-or' :Julu'slehn kpa, or 'ye-or' :kasue 'di po, 'nynor⧾-kpao'⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾-kpalu⧾-:.
:Yee' :Soror' 'kpa 'i :gwie:, 'de or mu. :Yeh or mu-a, 'de or 'koan'-dih-a :Dama'kor dih, 'de or mu-a 'ye-:, :yee' zorn-pli:, me-: 'wluh 'de yai', :en 'si 'de or 'yli dih, :en 'dleh-or.
:Yeh en no :ao', :yee' or 'ga-: dih 'do 'bluhbor. :Yee' or 'worn wlu, mo-: 'da, :Soror', :Soror', :eh :korn dhih :an 'ye-dih 'on 'kle :eh?
'De or 'da, :Gwlor :baa', :an-a' 'nyne :eh? 'De wlu :dao', on :za-eh: de :neheh', on 'da, 'Mor :Yusu' :oo', :an 'ye-dih-a 'kle.
Jorwor: :sorn-', :on 'ye :gwlor-' dih 'si. 'Do :wor deh :on :korn :on 'ye-a' no, an mu-eh :on :gwluhuh' zela-dih:.
:Yeh eh no :ao', :yee' nyor⧾ :on :ne :Soror'-a mu-a :dee', on :nyna dih, on se :wlu-a' 'beh-dih:. On 'worn wlu :daa 'weh, jorwor: an-a' 'worn, an-a' 'ye nyor.
:Yee' :Soror' :sorn-' 'weh, or 'wluh 'o 'bluhbor, 'de or behn-dih: 'yli, jorwor: or-a' 'ye dih. Eh-: no-eh, 'de on kpon or-a' son dih, on kpa-or :Dama'kor.
:Yee' 'do 'we taan 'di, or :se-' dih 'ye. 'De mor or :se-' dii-deh-: 'dekorn: 'ni-: 'na.

:Yee' 'de :Dama'kor, 'do :wor :Yusu'-a' klei' :zi-yu :due' an 'da-dih-a 'Anenaya' or :ne. Or-: :korn 'yli-eh 'kpa deh 'i, 'de :Gwlor :baa' :wlu 'de or bo, or 'dae:, 'Anenaya'. 'De 'Anenaya' 'da, :Gwlor :baa', 'mor-: :dhe dih.

'De :Gwlor :baa' zela-or :gwluhuh', or 'da, :Sorn-', :on 'ye 'kpa an 'da-dih-a 'Yi 'sleh-kpa ken mu, 'de :Juda' 'bli 'gbu. :Mor :on mu, :yee' dhele: 'yu :or 'wluh-a 'Tasor, an 'da-dih-a :Soror', or-a' dhih dih. 'Do :wor or :ne, or wlu 'de Nyorsoa bo.
'De :Yusu' 'da :neheh', :Soror'-a' 'jeh :ke, or-a' 'yli-eh 'kpa deh 'i, 'de or 'ye 'yu an 'da-dih-a 'Anenaya', or 'yle, 'de or tba-or son⧾ ken dih, or 'ye dih 'ye :neheh'.
:Yee' 'Anenaya' 'dae:, :Gwlor :baa'. Nyor⧾ :dhulu', mo-: zela: 'on, 'kulu-deh:⧾ :dhulu' or no-a :an-a'a: nyor⧾ 'yi dih, 'de :Julu'slehn en-' dhih, 'on :gwluhuh'.
'De mor deh :korn-a dhih or yi-a dha :Dama'kor, eh-: :dhe dih, Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor:⧾ :klaba'⧾ 'nyi-or 'tele' or 'ye nyor⧾ :an mu-a :an-a' :weheh' :za kpon.
:Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' :Gwlor :baa' 'dae:, Mu. 'On gan-or', or 'ye 'an-a: 'bhoi-yu no, or 'ye-eh' no, 'de nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾-: 'keen-boi'-: 'dekorn: 'Ezlea-nyor⧾-: on 'ye 'an 'nyne yubo:.
'An 'jeh 'yor-eh:, 'an mu-or deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :gwluhuh' zela: :ka or mu-a 'kle 'ye-: 'do 'an dhih bo.

:Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' 'Anenaya' mu-', 'de or pa 'de 'gbu :on :korn-a 'di :Soror' :ne-a. 'De or tba-or son⧾ ken dih, or :wlu, or 'da, 'An 'de-di' :Soror', :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu' :or 'wluh-dih:-a :on 'i 'do :gwie 'i, ti :an yi-a 'de, or-: dbo 'on 'noror :on bo, :on 'ye dih 'ye :neheh', 'de Gban 'i :ne :Zulu 'ye :on-' dih 'yi-dih:.
:Yee' 'do :dha :due' :dao', deh⧾ :en gweh-a zimi-a' 'kon⧾, me-: 'wluh 'de :Soror' 'yli, 'de or 'ye dih :neheh'. 'De or :sorn-', 'de 'Anenaya' po-or 'ni 'dlu.
'De :Soror' di deh. :Yee' or-a' 'kpih yi 'o or 'bhun-: de :neheh'. :Yee' :Soror' :ne 'o :Yusu'-a' klei' :zi-nyor⧾ bo 'weh 'do 'we-bei 'di, 'de :Dama'kor.
:Yeh eh 'wluh-a 'o, :yee' 'do :dha :due' :dao', or mu :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'di :gweh-dih-sla⧾ 'zorn dih, 'de or 'kpa tubo-wlu:⧾ :po-eh ken 'de mor, :ka :Yusu' 'dhu-a Nyorsoa-a' 'Yu-'.

:Yeh or no :ao', :yee' eh :florn-dih: nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on 'worn-a or-a' wlu-: worn, 'de an no, Eh :se 'yu :or :ne-a :Julu'slehn, :or 'ye-dih-a nyor⧾ :an 'da-a :Yusu'-a' 'nyne 'kle 'gabaa :e? Eh :se nyor⧾-a' 'jeh :dao', an-a' dhih, or :se 'de yi, or 'ye-uh kpon, or 'ye-uh 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'slaa: :za-nyor:⧾ :klaba'⧾ bo kpa :e?

Jorwor: :Soror'-a' Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ :po-eh 'kpa-: ken, 'de en :ne 'kpih ken. :Yee' :Jueh'-nyor:⧾ :on 'ti-a :Dama'kor, on se :wlu-a' 'beh-dih:. Deh no-eh, tubo-wlu:⧾ :Soror' po-a, en za-eh: gbor :ka :Yusu' 'dhu-a Nyorsoa-a' 'taan'-yu-'.
:Yeh 'we :dhulu' :zi-dih:-a 'o ken dih, :yee' :Jueh'-nyor⧾ 'dhu dhih, on 'ye-or 'dba.
Jorwor: :yee' or yubo-eh 'i :ka on 'dhu-a dhih, on 'ye-or 'dba. 'Gwie-: :glaa'e-: an fuo-or 'ken 'do gwlor-a' gba-dih-gba worn 'i, on 'ye-or 'dba.
:Yee' 'gwie-we-eh :due', :yee' or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾ po-or 'de :too' 'di, 'de on :ya-dih-or gba-dih-gba 'dlu, on 'si-dih-or dih.

:Yee' :Soror' mu :Julu'slehn:, 'de or 'bhorn :ka or 'ye-a' no, 'de or 'ye-a 'de :Yusu'-a' klei' :zi-nyor⧾ 'nyne-' 'kpa. Jorwor: an-a' klehkpeh, an ple-or'. On :se-eh' dhih 'jeh-' po :ka or 'dhu-a :Yusu'-a' klei' :zi-nyor 'jeh ka.

:Yeh eh :ne :ao', :yee' 'yu :due' an 'da-dih-a :Bana'ba, or-: kpa-or 'de :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾ bo. 'De or zela-uh :gwluhuh' :ka :Soror' 'ye-a :Gwlor :baa' 'do :gwie 'i, 'de :Gwlor :baa' :wlu-a 'de or bo, 'dekorn: :ka or po-a Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'de :Yusu'-a' 'nyne 'di, 'de :Dama'kor, 'de :gwluhuh' :ku ka 'di.
:Yee' :Soror' :ne 'o on bo 'weh 'de :Julu'slehn. 'De or 'kpa-uh bo, an na :Julu'slehn-gwlor ken dih, an po Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'de :gwluhuh' :ku ka 'di, 'de :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'nyne 'di.
:Yee' :Soror'-a wlu 'de :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' :yuh :an po-a 'Glii-wlu bo, 'de on :ne or dhobo. Jorwor: nyor⧾ :dao', an vorn-' on 'ye-or' 'dba.
Jorwor: :yeh or-a' 'Klae :de-di'-boi' 'worn-a deh :daa, :yee' on za-or 'o :gwlor-' 'weh, 'de on kpa-or 'Sehsali'a, on dbo-or 'Tasor.

:Yeh on za-or 'o :gwlor-', :yee' 'chore-nyor:⧾ :on :ne-a :Judi'a-: :Galali'i-: 'dekorn: Sehmeh'la-: nyor⧾ 'bor an-' 'kle 'ye-dih-eh 'weh. 'De on 'ble :Gwlor :baa'-a' :fano: :ple-eh. Gban 'i :ne :Zulu: mo-: 'nyi-uh 'kpih, 'de an 'kpuhba ken dih.
:Yee' :yeh :Piteh'-a mu-a deh⧾-' dih, :yee' or kpa 'we 'de Nyorsoa-nyor:⧾ :on :ne-a :gwlor an 'da-dih-a 'Leda bo,
'do :wor or 'ye-dih: nyor-kpalu :due' an 'da-dih-a :Ehni'a, :or :korn-a 'tiei 'meh-a, 'de :or zi-a 'o 'bluhbor-zon⧾ :meheh' na.
:Yee' :yeh :Piteh' 'ye-or, :yee' or :wlu-' 'de or bo, or 'dae:, :Ehni'a:, :Yusu' 'Klae 'puh-dih: :on 'weh. :Sorn-', :on 'ye :an-a'a: :sleheh' 'fean'. :Yee' 'do :dha :due' :dao', :Ehni'a :sorn-' 'weh.
:Yee' nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on 'ti-a 'Leda-: 'dekorn: :dha an 'da-dih-a 'Sehlor-: :or 'beh-dih:-a :gwluhuh', :yeh on 'ye-a deh :eh :no-eh, :yee' on 'bili:-'-: dih, 'noror :Gwlor :baa' bo.

:Yee' 'de :gwlor an 'da-dih-a 'Japa 'di, 'do :wor 'nynor :due' :ne :or zi-a 'o :Yusu' klei'. Or-a' 'nyne :wor :Tabi'ta:. ('De mor or-a' 'Glii-nyne :wor 'Dorkor:, :eh :bleh-dih:-a 'i kweh.) 'Nynor :dao', or no deh⧾ 'jeh :ne 'do ti-a' klehkpeh bo, 'de or 'kpa nyor⧾ :on se-a deh-a' :za-da 'ble bo.
:Yee' 'do ti-a' 'jeh :dao' 'di, 'do :wor 'o, or kormu-dih:, 'de or 'meh. :Yeh or 'meh-a, :yee' on :dle or-a' 'ku 'weh, 'de on 'pehn-dih-uh dih 'de :chuu: :on :ne-a 'de 'gbu-a' yai' 'di.

:Yee' 'Leda-gwlor se 'Japa-gwlor bo dih :tehn-dih:. :Yee' :yeh :Yusu'-a' klei' :zi-nyor:⧾ :on :ne-a 'Japa, on 'worn-ih'-a :ka :Piteh' :ne-a 'Leda, :yee' on dbo nyor⧾-kpalu⧾ 'sororn' 'de or bo, on 'dhu-uh tubo-wlu⧾ worn, on 'dae:, :Piteh', :on :korn 'gen. 'Dhobo:, yi 'noror :a bo.

:Yeh nyor⧾ 'sororn' :dao' on dbo-a, on zela:-a :Piteh' :gwluhuh', :yee' or :ne on mu-'. :Yeh or 'si-a :gwlor-' dih, :yee' on kpa-or 'de :chuu: :dao' :on :ne-a 'de 'gbu-a' yai' 'di. :Yee' :dhoba: 'nynor⧾-a' klehkpeh, on :nyna dih 'do or 'bhun, 'de an 'vin. 'De an torne-or 'wla⧾-: 'dekorn: paa-tiei: :nee'-: or tba-a 'do on bo, ti or :ne-a 'kmo.

:Yee' :Piteh' po 'o an-a' klehkpeh 'zorn 'weh, 'de or bla 'koor-dlu⧾ 'yi glu, or :wlu 'de Nyorsoa bo. 'De or 'bili: 'de 'nynor-a' 'ku bo, or 'dae:, :Tabi'ta:, :sorn-'. :Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' :Tabi'ta behn-dih: 'yli 'weh. :Yeh or 'ye-a :Piteh', :yee' or :dhe dih.

'De :Piteh' 'kpa-or bo, or kpon or-a' son dih, 'de or 'duo-or ya-', or 'ye dih :nyna. :Yeh or no :ao', :yee' or 'da dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh-: 'dekorn: :dhoba: 'nynor⧾-: 'weh, 'de or :ne 'kmo, or za-or 'kwla 'de on bo.
:Yee' deh :daa :eh :no-eh, eh-a' 'nyne gweh 'Japa-gwlor-a' klehkpeh 'dlu. Eh-: no-eh, 'de nyor⧾ :dhulu' po :Gwlor :baa'-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-'.
:Yee' :yeh eh zi-a, :yee' :Piteh' zi 'Japa 'we :dhulu', 'de 'yu an 'da-dih-a Samor', 'de or 'bli 'gbu, :or no-a deh⧾-ku⧾-a' :koan.
:Yee' 'do :gwlor an 'da-dih-a 'Sehsali'a 'di, 'do :wor 'yu :due' an 'da-dih-a :Korli'nor, or 'ti. Or no nyor :klaba' 'do sorye'-a' kpor :on 'wluh-a 'Etole-bluhba ken bo.

Or-a' 'jeh :dao', or-: 'dekorn: or-a'a: 'cheh-: on no Nyorsoa-nyor:⧾ 'jeh, 'de an za-or :weheh'. Or se 'kwa dih :kmu, or no deh⧾ :dhulu' 'do :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' :yuh :on :korn-a son⧾ se-a 'o nyni bo. 'De or wlu 'de Nyorsoa bo 'do ti-a' klehkpeh bo.
:Yee' 'we-eh :due', :yeh eh no-a 'gwie-yluh-gbao', :yee' or-a' 'yli-eh 'kpa deh 'i. 'De or 'ye Nyorsoa-a' 'enjor :due' deh 'jeh, or yi 'o or bo, or :wlu 'de or bo, or 'dae:, :Korli'nor:.

:Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' :Korli'nor-a pobo-or-: ya 'dhuan, 'de :fano: ka 'di, 'de or :wlu, or 'da, Eh-a' 'nyne :eh? :Gwlor :baa'. 'De 'enjor: :dao', or 'da, Nyorsoa worn :an-a' bale-wlu 'weh, 'de or 'ye :ka :an no-a nyor⧾ :on se-a deh-a' :za-da 'ble deh⧾ 'nyi-eh 'weh :ke.
:Yee' eh-a' dhih, dbo nyor⧾ 'de 'Japa, on 'ye 'yu :due' an 'da-dih-a Samor', :or :korn-a 'nyne :nee' 'dhu-a :Piteh'-', :gwie 'i mu.
Or no 'duhba-yu: 'de Samor' :or no-a deh⧾-ku⧾-a' :koan 'bli 'gbu, 'de :or :korn-a 'gbu :ne-a 'o yobo' worn 'i.

:Yeh 'enjor: :dao', or gweh-a :wlu-a' 'i, :yee' or mu-: de. :Yee' :Korli'nor 'da or-a'a: 'bhoi-nynuu-a' nyor⧾ 'sororn'-: 'dekorn: or-a'a: sorye'-a' nyor :due' :or no-a or-a'a: 'gbeh⧾ 'ble-yu, 'de :or no-a Nyorsoa-nyor: 'jeh :ke.
'De or zela-uh deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :en :no-eh :gwluhuh', 'de or dbo-uh 'Japa. 'De on mu.
:Yee' :yeh zorn zen-a, 'de an 'koan'-dih-a 'Japa dih 'yluh-gbao', :yee' :Piteh' 'ya 'de 'gbu 'dlu, or 'ye 'de Nyorsoa bo :wlu 'do 'yluh-gbao'-we-eh: :dao' 'di.
:Yeh or wlu-a 'de Nyorsoa bo, :yee' 'moeh: no-or :blaa'a:, 'de or 'bhorn deh or 'ye di. :Yeh an 'ye-a dii-deh⧾-a' deh bo dih, :yee' or-a' 'yli-eh 'kpa deh 'i.
'De or 'ye yao, on kan-dih: worn, 'de deh :eh gweh-a 'yli-eh: :klaba', eh-: 'dhle, eh-: yi 'bluhbor :eh gweh-a :ka nyor kpon-a eh-a' 'for⧾ :ne-a :nyieh dih.

:Yee' 'de eh 'di :dao', 'do :wor 'kwla-nimi⧾-: 'dekorn: :gwlor-nimi⧾-: :en se-a goor-dih: :en na-dih-a buh⧾ :nyieh en :ne. Nimi⧾ :or na-dih-a 'bhehleh' :ka sane-a no-a-: 'dekorn: neme: :en zi-dih-a-' dih 'de yai'-:, me-: :ne 'de :ke.
:Yeh or 'ye-a deh⧾ :dao', :yee' wlu, mo-: :wlu 'de or bo, :on 'dae:, :Piteh', :sorn-'. 'Dba-ih, :on 'ye-ih di.
:Yee' :Piteh' 'dae:, :Sago', :Gwlor :baa'. 'On 'see nimi :eh se-a 'yi dih :nmor 'do di-a' bo, 'de :eh no-eh 'de nyor⧾-a ne-a :kane' dih, di :zai'.
:Yee' wlu :dao', on :wlu-' 'de or bo :neheh' 'do kpor⧾-a' 'sororn' neh 'di, on 'dae:, Deh Nyorsoa :za-a :kane' dih, :an-a' :no-', eh se 'yi dih :nmor 'do di-a' bo.
Wlu :dao', on :wlu-' 'do kpor⧾ taan 'di. :Yee' 'do :dha :due' :dao', 'yli-eh: :dao', eh :kpa-eh: yai' de.

:Yee' :yeh :Piteh'-a na-dih-a deh or 'ye-a, deh eh :bleh-dih:-a 'i, eh-a' dhih :gwluhuh' dih, :yee' nyor⧾-kpalu:⧾ :Korli'nor dbo-a, on 'ye :dha Samor'-a'a: 'gbu :ne-a 'weh, 'de on :nyna dih 'do 'gbu-a' gba-dih-gba worn 'i.
'De on dhele: deh dih, on 'da, 'Duhba-yu: or-: :ko-dih: 'de a 'bli 'gbu, an 'da-dih Samor' :Piteh' :e?
:Yee' :yeh :Piteh' 'si-a 'o deh :daa, eh-a' :gwluhuh' dih :na-dih: 'da 'gboror:, :yee' Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu :wlu-' 'de or bo, on 'dae:, Samor', nyor⧾-kpalu⧾ taan, mo-: :an 'bhorn :on 'kwla⧾-' dih.
:Yee' eh-a' dhih, 'dhle, :on 'ye 'zorn 'si. :An-a' :tba 'o wlu, 'do an-a' klei' :zi 'da. Deh no-eh, 'mor-: 'o, :or dbo-uh.
'De :Piteh' 'dhle, or mu 'de on bo. 'De or :wlu 'de on bo, or 'dae:, 'Mor a 'bhorn-a 'kwla⧾-' dih, 'mor :wor :dhe dih. :Eh :korn dhih a yi 'noror :eh?

:Yee' nyor⧾-kpalu:⧾ :dao', on 'da, :Korli'nor: :or no-a sorye'-a' nyor :klaba', or-: dbo :a-uh. Or no nyor :or 'sleh-a 'i, 'de :or za-a Nyorsoa :weheh'. 'De an-a' klehkpeh, an 'ye-or deh-'. Gban 'i :ne-enjor :due', or-: zela-or :gwluhuh', or 'ye :on wlu bo dbo, 'de :on 'ye 'de or 'bli 'gbu yi. 'De deh :an mu-a :za-a-', or 'ye-eh' :dou'⧾ bo :to.

'De :Piteh' kpa nyor⧾ :dao' :on yi-or :gwie 'i, 'gbu bo, on 'ye dih 'pehn. :Yee' :yeh zorn zen-a, :yee' :Piteh' po or-a'a: 'tiei 'kpa, 'de or :ne on 'kpa :gwie 'i, on mu. :Yee' :Yusu'-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor:⧾ :noo', :on :ne-a 'Japa, mo-: :ne or mu :ke.

:Yee' 'do 'we-eh-a' 'sororn' neh 'di, :yee' on 'si-: dih 'do 'Sehsali'a. :Yee' 'do :wor :Korli'nor :ne, or 'da or-a'a: 'wluh-a-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: or 'bei' :on :ne or mu-dih-a 'bli-: :dha :due', 'de an fuo :Piteh' ken 'de or 'bli 'gbu.
:Yee' :yeh :Piteh'-a yi-a 'de 'gbu 'di :pa 'da, :yee' :Korli'nor 'ya-dih-or 'i, 'de or 'jli dih 'do or ybei' 'de deh-' 'ye ka 'di.
Jorwor: :Piteh' no-eh' or 'ye dih :nyna, or 'da, :Nyna dih. 'Mor :gwlor-nyor: 'o :ke, :ka :on :ne-a.
:Yee' :Piteh'-a wlu 'de or bo, 'de an na, an pa 'de 'gbu 'di, 'de :Piteh' 'ye nyor⧾ :dhulu' :on 'kpa-a :dha :due' 'de mor.

:Yeh or 'ye-uh'-a, :yee' or :wlu-' 'de on bo, or 'dae:, A-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh yubo-eh' deh 'jeh, :ka eh se-a 'o :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'tele'-a' :gwie 'i :ne, 'de :Jueh'-yu-: 'dekorn: :yor :or :se-a :Jueh'-yu-: on 'ye-a' bo nena:, 'de mor or 'ye-a :na 'da mu 'de or 'bli 'gbu. Jorwor: Nyorsoa zela: 'on :gwluhuh', :ka 'on se-a :korn, 'on 'ye :ao' nyor :daa, or :ne :kane' dih, 'de mor 'on 'ye :ao', or-: 'mor-: :a se :korn :a 'ye bo nena:.
:Yee' eh-: :korn dhih :oo', :yeh a dbo-a 'on wlu bo, 'de 'on :se 'o wlu tba, 'de 'on 'yle. 'An dhele a dih :naa, :Eh :korn dhih a dbo 'on wlu bo :eh?

:Yee' :Korli'nor 'da, Eh :korn 'we-eh :due', 'an wlu 'de Nyorsoa bo, 'de 'on 'bli 'gbu 'di, :ka ti :ne-a :naa, :yee' 'ka-: ti :ne, 'gwie-yluh-gbao'. :Yeh 'an mu-a 'ye-:, :yee' nyor-kpalu :due', or-: pa 'tiei: :en fan-a-', 'de or :nyna dih 'do 'on ybei', eh-a' 'we :nyieh :naa 'zean'.
'De nyor-a' 'jeh :dao', or :wlu 'de 'on bo, or 'dae:, :Korli'nor:, Nyorsoa 'worn :an-a' bale-wlu 'weh, 'de or 'ye :ka :an no-a nyor⧾ :on se-a deh-a' :za-da 'ble deh⧾ 'nyi-eh 'weh.
:Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, dbo nyor⧾ 'de 'Japa, on 'ye 'yu an 'da-dih-a Samor' :Piteh' :gwie 'i mu, :or :ko-dih:-a 'de Samor' :or no-a deh⧾-ku⧾-a' :koan, 'de or 'bli 'gbu, :on :ne-a 'de yobo' worn 'i.

:Yee' eh-: :korn dhih 'de 'on dbo :on wlu bo, 'do :dha :due' 'jeh :dao'. :Yee' eh :nmor-: 'yi, :ka :on yi-a 'de :naa. :A-a' klehkpeh, :a :ne :daa :Gwlor :baa' Nyorsoa ybei' 'weh :naa. Deh or zela: :on :gwluhuh', :on 'ye-eh :a :gwluhuh' zela:, :a 'ye-eh' 'worn.
:Yeh :Korli'nor 'da :ao', :yee' :Piteh' 'kpa 'o :wlu 'da 'weh, or 'dae:, Jorwor: 'on yubo-eh' :naa, :ka eh 'dhu-a dhih 'jeh-', :ka Nyorsoa-a' :za-a :gwie-for :due'.
Jorwor: nyor-beh-nyor-beh: :or :korn-a or-a' :fano-a' ple-a', 'de :or no-a deh :eh 'sleh-a 'i, 'dawor'-dlu-a' :yuh or mu-a 'i 'wluh-:, :ka eh 'ye eh :ne, Nyorsoa-a mu or-a' dhih 'worn-dih:.
A yubo: tubo-wlu:⧾ Nyorsoa dbo-a 'noror 'Ezlea-nyor⧾ bo :en :ya-a: 'de wlu-' dih 'worn-eh:, 'de :en :yi-dih:-a :Yusu' 'Klae, :or no-a :Gwlor :baa' 'do nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh bo 'weh.
'De mor a yubo: deh :klaba' :eh :no-eh 'de :Judi'a-bluhba-a' klehkpeh ken 'weh. Deh :daa, eh tba :Galali'i dih :chio'lo:, ti :Jororn' gweh-a nyor⧾ 'ni 'dlu :po-eh-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ :po-eh 'i.

'De mor a yubo-eh' :ke, :Yusu' :or 'ti-a 'Nazla :dee', :ka Nyorsoa no-a or-a' gan-a', 'de or no-eh, 'de or-a' Gban 'i :ne :Zulu-: 'dekorn: 'kpih-: en 'yi-dih-or dih, 'dekorn: :ka or no-a deh⧾-' dih :mu-eh, 'de or no-a deh⧾ 'jeh ne-a' no-a', 'de or 'puh-dih:-a puhba-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a 'o 'ku-a' 'kpih 'zorn. Deh no-eh, Nyorsoa :ne 'o or bo 'weh.
Deh⧾-a' klehkpeh or no-a 'de :Julu'slehn-: 'dekorn: 'Ezlea-bluhba-a' klehkpeh ken-: :a :mor dhe-ih ken dih. On bhele-or-: ya 'do tu 'i, 'de on 'dba-or.
Jorwor: Nyorsoa za-or 'de nma-dih-deh 'di 'weh 'do 'we-eh-a' taan neh 'di, 'de or no-eh, 'de nyor⧾ 'ye-or.
Eh :se nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh on :se-or' 'ye. Jorwor: :a :mor dhih bo zela-nyor:⧾ Nyorsoa gan-a, :a :mor 'ye-or. Ti or 'wluh-a 'de nma-dih-deh 'di, or :ne :a mor-: :a kpuhba: son⧾ ybei' 'weh.
Or 'nyi :a 'tele' :a 'ye tubo-wlu⧾ po 'de nyor⧾ bo, 'de :a 'ye-uh :gwluhuh' zela: :ka eh 'dhu-a or mor-' Nyorsoa gan-a, :or 'ye-a zabe: :zi-nyor no, 'do 'kmo :ne-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: 'meheh'-nyor⧾-: bo.
Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh, on :za or-a' dhih-' 'weh, :ka nyor-beh: :or mu-a or-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' :po, :yee' or-a' deh⧾-zon⧾-a' dhih-a mu-a bo 'ma-dih-eh:, 'de or-a' 'nyne 'di.
:Yeh :Piteh' 'si-a 'o wlu 'da, :yee' nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a 'o, 'de :an to-a or-a' wlu :dou'⧾ bo, :yee' Gban 'i :ne :Zulu yi 'o on ken 'weh.

:Yeh eh no :ao', :yee' :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' :yuh :on po-a :Yusu' 'Klae-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-', :on 'wluh-a 'Japa, 'de :on :ne :Piteh' yi-a 'de, :yee' eh 'ma-dih: 'de on 'di-: dih, Nyorsoa 'ye or-a' Gban 'i :ne :Zulu nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾ 'nyi :ke.
Deh no-eh, on 'worn an-a' wlu, an po wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor, :en Gban 'i :ne :Zulu 'nyi-uh-a, on 'ye-a' po. 'De nyor⧾ :dao', an po Nyorsoa-a' 'nyne ya. :Yeh eh no :ao', :yee' :Piteh' :wlu-', or 'dae:,
:Ka :a no-a Gban 'i :ne :Zulu-a' 'ye-a', 'ka-: nyor⧾ :daa, on no :ke. Nyor 'beh-dih: or 'ye-uh 'i kan, 'do 'ni 'dlu :po-eh bo :e?
:Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' or 'nyi 'tele' on 'ye 'ni 'dlu :po 'de :Yusu' 'Klae-a' 'nyne 'di. :Yeh on gweh-a 'i, :yee' on dhele-or-: dih, or 'ye 'o on bo 'we-kpor-bei zi.

:Yee' :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor:⧾ :on :ne-a dha :Judi'a-bluhba-a' klehkpeh :daa ken-: on 'worn-ih' :ka nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor:⧾ an-a' :noo' kpon-a Nyorsoa-a' wlu dih.
:Yee' :Piteh' mu :Julu'slehn:. :Yeh or mu-a, :yee' :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' :yuh :on no-a :bhlororn' 'meh-deh 'kpa deh ken, 'de :on po-a :Yusu'-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' :naa, mo-: :an wlu-dih :Piteh' 'bhun dih,
on 'dae:, Nyor⧾ :on se-a :bhlororn' 'meh, 'de on 'bli 'gbu, 'do :wor :on mu, 'de on :ne :an kpuhba son⧾ ybei'.
:Yeh on :za-a deh :daa-', :yee' :Piteh' zela-uh deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :en :no-eh :gwluhuh' :ka en no-a 'dlu bo :mu-eh :kpeen:, or 'dae:,

Ti 'an wlu-a 'de Nyorsoa bo, 'do 'Japa-gwlor-', :yee' 'an 'yli-eh 'kpa deh 'i. :Yeh 'an mu-a 'ye-:, :yee' 'on 'ye deh :eh gweh-a 'yli-eh: :klaba', eh-: 'wluh 'de yai', eh-: 'dhle, eh-: yi 'noror 'on bo, :eh gweh-a :ka nyor kpon-a eh-a' 'for⧾ :ne-a :nyieh dih.

:Yee' 'on pobo: 'de eh 'di 'weh. 'De 'on 'ye 'kwla-nimi⧾-: 'dekorn: :gwlor-nimi⧾-: :en na-dih-a buh⧾ :nyieh 'do 'bluhbor-: nimi⧾ :en na-dih-a 'bhehleh' :ka sane-a no-a-: 'dekorn: neme: :en zi-dih-a-' dih 'de yai'-: en :ne.
:Yee' 'on 'worn wlu, mo-: 'da, :Piteh', :sorn-'. 'Dba-ih, :on 'ye-ih di.
Jorwor: 'on :wlu-', 'on 'da, :Sago', :Gwlor :baa'. Deh :eh se-a 'yi dih :nmor 'do di-a' bo, 'de :eh no-eh 'de nyor⧾-a ne-a :kane' dih, eh 'see 'o 'on worn 'i 'ye :zai'.
:Yeh 'on 'da :ao', :yee' wlu :dao', :on 'wluh-a 'de yai', on :wlu-' :neheh' 'do kpor⧾-a' 'sororn' neh 'di, on 'dae:, Deh Nyorsoa :za-a :kane' dih, :an-a' :no-', eh se 'yi dih :nmor 'do di-a' bo.
Wlu :daa, on :wlu-' 'do kpor⧾ taan 'di. :Yee' 'yli-eh: :dao', eh-a' klehkpeh, eh :kpa-eh: yai' de.
:Yee' 'do :dha :due' :dao', :yee' nyor⧾-kpalu⧾ taan :Korli'nor dbo-a :on 'wluh-a 'Sehsali'a, :yee' on 'si-: dih 'do 'gbu 'on :ko-dih:-a 'di worn 'i.
:Yee' Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu zela: 'on-: :gwluhuh', :ka 'on :sor tba-a 'o wlu 'do mu 'da. :A-a' 'Klae :de-di'-boi' :meheh'lo: :daa, mo-: :ne 'on mu :ke. 'De :a pa 'de nyor-kpalu: :dao' 'bli 'gbu.
'De or zela: :a :gwluhuh' :ke, :ka 'enjor: :or 'wluh-dih-or 'i 'de or 'bli 'gbu, 'de or :wlu-a 'de or bo, or no-a, Dbo Samor' :Piteh' :or :ne-a 'Japa wlu bo, or 'ye 'de yi.
Or mu tubo-wlu⧾ :po 'de :on bo, :en mu-a mor-: 'dekorn: :an-a'a: 'gbu-a' klehkpeh-: 'puh-dih:.
:Yee' :yeh 'on 'kpa 'o an-a' bo :wlu 'da, :yee' Gban 'i :ne :Zulu yi 'o on ken, :ka on no-a 'o :a ken :yi-eh :dee'.
:Yee' dhih :Gwlor :baa' :za-a-', 'on :po-dih-eh :gwluhuh' bo 'weh, or no-a, :Jororn' po nyor⧾ 'ni 'dlu, jorwor: Gban 'i :ne :Zulu:, mo-: a mu 'dlu :po-eh.

:Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, :mor Nyorsoa 'nyi-uh 'nyii'-deh: :eh :korn-a 'be or 'nyi :a :mor :or po-a :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu' 'Klae-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-', :yee' deh 'i-deh-nyor: 'on 'dhu-eh:-', 'on 'ye Nyorsoa 'borboa' 'i po :eh?

:Yeh :Jueh'-nyor:⧾ :dao', on 'worn-a deh :Piteh' :za-a-', :yee' deh on 'ye-a' 'o :za-dih:, eh se :ne. :Yee' an po Nyorsoa-a' 'nyne ya, an no, :Yee' Nyorsoa 'worn-dih-eh ken dih 'weh, nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor:⧾ on 'ye an-a' deh⧾-zon⧾ dih 'tali:, 'de on 'ye 'kmo :sie: :febeh' 'ble :ke.

:Yee' :Yusu'-a' klei' :zi-nyor:⧾ :on gboba:-a dih, ti :Jueh'-nyor⧾ 'dba-a Timi', 'de on 'ye-uh'-a 'kle 'ye-dih:, an-a' 'jeh :dao', on mu :Feni'sia-: 'Sapor-: 'dekorn: 'Antior-: 'de an po tubo-wlu⧾ :en kor-a :Yusu' 'i, 'de :Jueh'-nyor⧾ :due' bo 'klein'.

Jorwor: :Yusu'-a' klei' :zi-nyor:⧾ :noo', :on no-a nyor⧾-kpalu⧾ :on 'wluh-a 'Sapor-: 'dekorn: :Sali'na-: an-a' 'jeh :dao', mo-: mu 'Antior, 'de on :wlu 'de nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾ bo :ke, on po Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh :en kor-a :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu' 'i, 'de on bo.
:Gwlor :baa'-a' 'kpih :ne 'o on bo 'weh, 'de nyor⧾ :dhulu' po-eh dhih 'jeh-', 'de on 'bili: 'de or bo.
:Yee' deh :daa, eh-a' 'nyne nyni 'de 'chore :eh :ne-a 'de :Julu'slehn bo 'weh. Eh-: no-eh, 'de on dbo :Bana'ba, or 'ye 'de mu.

:Yeh or 'si-a dih, 'de or 'ye-a :ka Nyorsoa no-a nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'de, an-a' mla bo :po-eh, :yee' or-a' :porluh 'pehn-: dih, 'de or po 'de an-a' 'kpih, on 'ye :Gwlor :baa'-' :ne, :ka ti-a mu-a 'dlu-' :tehn, 'do an-a' :porluh⧾-a' klehkpeh bo.

:Bana'ba-a' 'jeh :dao', or no nyor 'jeh :nor, :or 'yi-dih:-a Gban 'i :ne :Zulu-: dih, 'de :or :korn-a dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh 'beh-a 'i. 'De or no-eh, 'de nyor⧾ :dhulu' po :Gwlor :baa'-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-'.
:Yeh eh no :ao', :yee' or mu 'de 'Tasor-gwlor 'di, or 'ye :Soror' 'kwla⧾-' dih 'bhorn.

:Yeh or 'ye-or, :yee' or ya-or 'Antior:. :Yee' 'do zon :due' 'di, :Bana'ba-: 'dekorn: :Soror'-: on :ne 'chore-a 'gbon-dih-' 'do ti-a' klehkpeh bo, 'de an torne nyor⧾ :dhulu' deh. 'Do 'Antior :oo', on 'da-dih: :Yusu'-a' klei' :zi-nyor⧾ 'Klae-a' nyor⧾ :zai'.
'Do ti-a' 'jeh :dao' 'di :oo', Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor:⧾ :noo' 'wluh-dih: :Julu'slehn, 'de on mu 'Antior.

:Yeh on :ne-a 'o, :yee' an-a' nyor :due' an 'da-dih-a :Aga'ba, or-: :sorn-', :or :nyna dih, 'de or :wlu 'de Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu-a' 'kpih 'di, or sie ti de, or :za 'moeh: :klaba' :eh 'kpa-a Ji Kou'-moeh: :eh mu-a 'de :yi dha 'bluhba⧾-a' klehkpeh 'Wloon-nyor⧾ :korn-a wlu 'ken bo, eh-a' dhih. 'Moeh: :daa or 'da-a, eh yi-: 'de, 'do 'keen Klordior'-a' ti 'i.

:Yee' eh-a' dhih, :Yusu'-a' klei' :zi-nyor:⧾ :on :ne-a 'Antior, on polo-eh' 'de an-a' 'jeh 'nyne-', on 'ye an-a' 'Klae :de-di'-boi' :on 'ti-a :Judi'a-' :za-dih:, 'do deh an-a' nyor :due' 'beh-dih:-a or 'ye-a' dbo, or 'ye-eh' dbo.
:Yeh on polo-eh, :yee' on 'worn-dih-eh', 'de on 'nyi an-a'a: 'nyii'-deh:⧾ :Bana'ba-: 'dekorn: :Soror'-: on 'ye-ih 'chore-nyor:⧾ :klaba'⧾ kpa. 'De on kpa-ih.
:Yee' 'do ti :dao' 'i, 'do :wor 'o 'Keen :Hehlo' :kpon-dih: 'chore-nyor:⧾ :noo', or 'ye-uh' 'kle 'ye-dih:.
:Yee' or 'nyi nyor⧾ 'tele', 'de on no :bhla 'jlehn, on 'dba :Jororn'-a' dei' 'Jeen.
:Yeh or 'ye-a deh or no-a, eh 'pehn-dih:-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' :porluh⧾ dih, :yee' or mu-' :neheh', or dbo nyor⧾, 'de on kpon :Piteh' :ke. Deh :daa, eh :no-eh:-' 'do Se 'vu-bhlee-a' gor-'.

:Yeh nyor⧾ or dbo-a on kpon-a :Piteh', :yee' or po-or :kasue 'di. 'De or po-or 'de sorye'-a' 'dlu⧾ :nyieh 'kwa, :on 'ble-a sorye' :nyieh :nyieh 'de on 'di, on 'ye-or 'yli-eh bo 'dhu, or :ne-' ple. :Hehlo'-a 'bhorn :mor 'Meh-a' :bla-dih: 'dlu dih-gor zi, 'de or 'ye-or zabe zi 'do :gwlor :gwea.
:Yee' :yeh on kpon-a :Piteh' ken dih, 'de :kasue 'di :chio'lo:, :yee' 'chore-nyor⧾-a po 'de 'kpih, 'de an wlu 'de Nyorsoa bo deh 'jeh 'do or-a' dhih bo.

:Yee' glu-we-eh: :mor zorn zen-a, 'de :Hehlo' 'ye-a :Piteh'-a' zabe zi, :yee' :Piteh'-a 'mo-' 'do sorye' 'sororn' 'nyne bo, 'de on :san-dih-or 'chen-dubu'⧾ 'sororn'. 'De sorye' :noo' :ne 'o :kasue-gbu-a' :kpaa' worn 'i, :an 'dhu :kasue-gbu 'yli-eh bo.

:Yeh or mu-a 'ye-:, :yee' :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'enjor :due', or-: 'wluh-dih-or 'i, 'de zorn-pli-a fan 'de :kasue-gbu-a' :chuu: :Piteh' :ne-a 'de 'di. 'De or bla :Piteh' ken, or za-or 'nyinor-', 'de or 'da, 'Dhobo:, :sorn-'. :Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' 'chen-dubu'⧾ on :san-dih-or, en 'wluh 'de or son⧾-' 'weh, 'do :dha :due' :dao'.
:Yee' or :wlu-' 'de :Piteh' bo, or 'dae:, 'Dba :an-a'a: 'behleh 'i. :Yee' 'dhu :an-a'a: :buhbuh⧾ buh⧾-'. 'De or no-eh. 'De or 'da, Pa :an-a'a: 'korlor-', :on 'ye 'o 'on klei' zi.
'De :Piteh' zi 'o or klei', an 'wluh 'de :kasue-gbu 'di. Jorwor: deh 'enjor: :dao', or no-a, :Piteh' se eh-a' 'i yubo-eh :korn. :Mor or :taa 'ye :dee', :yee' or 'da, or-a' 'yli-eh 'kpa deh 'i.

'De an 'wluh 'de :kasue-gbu 'di, on zi :dha :zai'-sorye' :an 'dhu-or 'yli-eh bo, on :ne-a. 'De on zi 'o :dha 'sororn' no :ne-a :ke. 'De on nyni 'o gba-dih-gba-a' nene: :kpaa' worn 'i, 'do :dha nyor⧾-a yi-dih-a, 'de an 'si-a :gwlor-' dih. :Yeh on nyni-a 'o, :yee' :kpaa' :dao', or kan-dih: worn 'do or-a' 'jeh bo, 'do an-a' dhih bo, 'de on zi. :Yeh on :na-a 'kpa-a' 'kplo beh ken dih :weh-beh:, :yee' 'yli :a bla-a 'i, 'enjor: :dao', or 'wluh 'o :Piteh' klei' 'weh.

:Yeh eh no :ao', :yee' :Piteh' yi or-a' 'jeh-: bo, 'de or :wlu, or 'da, Jorwor: 'on yubo: deh :eh mu-a 'dlu bo :naa deh 'jeh. :Gwlor :baa' :oo', or-: dbo or-a'a: 'enjor, or 'ye 'on :Hehlo'-a' 'kpih-: 'dekorn: deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a 'bhorn-a on 'ye-a 'on-' :no-dih:, or 'ye-ih 'o 'on ken :za.
:Yee' :yeh or yubo:-a deh :daa 'i, :yee' or mu :Mehle' :or 'wluh-a :Jororn' an 'da-dih-a 'Make :ke, 'de or 'bli 'gbu. 'Do :wor :gwlor-nyor:⧾ :dhulu' 'kpa-dih: :dha :due', 'de an wlu 'de Nyorsoa bo.
:Yeh or nyni-a 'o, :yee' or bla gba-dih-gba-a' :kpaa' 'weh. 'De 'nynor-kpao'-yu: an 'da-dih-a 'Wlola, :or no-a 'bhoi-nynor-kpao'-yu, or-: yi 'o :kpaa' bo.

Jorwor: :yeh or yubo:-a :Piteh'-a' wlu 'i, :yee' 'mona: 'yi-dih-or-: dih 'gabaa, 'de or :se 'o :kpaa'-a' 'jeh :za. 'De or ple, or mu de, or mu nyor⧾ :gwluhuh' zela: 'da :ka :Piteh' :ne-a 'o :kpaa' ken.

:Yeh 'nynor-kpao'-yu: :dao', or zela-uh-a :gwluhuh', :yee' on 'da, Sena-a: no :on ke :e? Jorwor: :yeh or 'neh-eh ken, or za-ih-a 'gboror:, :yee' on 'da, Eh gweh, or-a'a: 'enjor: :or :korn-a 'de or bo, or-: 'o, or 'ye 'bla.
:Yeh an no-a deh :dao', :yee' :Piteh'-a bla :kpaa' 'weh :chio'lo:. :Yeh on :za-a 'o :kpaa', 'de on 'ye-or, :yee' eh :florn-dih: an-a' klehkpeh-: worn.

:Yee' or 'ga-dih-uh' :kola 'i, on 'ye 'dhuan no, 'de or zela-uh deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :gwluhuh', :ka :Gwlor :baa' no-a 'de or-a' :kasue 'di :za-eh. 'De or zela-uh :gwluhuh', on 'ye 'Jeen-: 'dekorn: 'Klae :de-di'-boi' :yuh :sie:-a 'o-: :gwluhuh' zela:. :Yeh or no :ao', :yee' or 'wluh 'o on bo 'weh, or mu :dha 'sluh.
:Yeh zorn zen-a, :yee' sorye' :an 'dhu-a :kasue-nyor⧾ 'yli-eh bo, on :ne-a' ple, an no mu 'noror yi 'noror, 'do deh :eh :no-eh 'do :Piteh' bo, eh-a' dhih.

:Yee' :Hehlo' no-eh', on 'ye-or 'kwla⧾-' dih 'bhorn. Jorwor: :dha or :ne-a, on se 'o yubo:. :Yeh eh no :ao', :yee' or dhele: sorye' :dao'-: dih, or-a' dhih, 'de or 'nyi 'tele' on 'ye-uh' 'dba. :Yeh :Hehlo' no :ao', :yee' or 'wluh :Judi'a-bluhba ken 'weh, 'de or kpa 'we, 'de 'Sehsali'a-gwlor 'di.

:Yee' nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'Taya-: 'dekorn: 'Saedorn-: :Hehlo' 'kpa-dih-uh 'chehn 'gabaa. :Yeh or no :ao', :yee' an-a' klehkpeh 'kpa :dha :due', 'de on mu 'de or bo, on mu-or 'ye 'da. :Yeh on nyni-a 'o :gwlor-', :yee' 'yu :due' an 'da-dih-a 'Blator, :or :Hehlo' dhe-a :gwlii', 'de or po-a 'de or-a'a: deh⧾-a' klehkpeh 'kwa, or-a' 'jeh :dao', or-: on :wlu 'de bo, on 'ye :Hehlo' 'ye, or :ne on 'ye wlu-' dih 'woorn:. Deh :korn dhih on no-a deh :dao', eh-: 'dhu, 'de :Hehlo' 'bli 'bluhba ken, 'do :wor an-a'a: dii-deh⧾-a 'wluh.
:Yee' :Hehlo' pa-' or-a'a: :gba 'vuu: :nmaa'e:, 'do 'we-eh: on :korn on 'ye-or ken :yeh-dih: 'di, 'de or :dhe dih 'do or-a'a: 'keen :kpala' ken, or :wlu 'de nyor⧾ :dao' bo, 'do :gwlor :gwea.
:Yeh or :wlu-a, :yee' an po 'geh⧾, an no, Eh :se :gwlor-nyor:, :or-a' :wlu. Nyorsoa :noror' :oo', or-: wlu.
:Yee' 'do :dha :due' :dao', :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'enjor :due', or-: 'tuh-or dih, 'de :samu'⧾ pa-or', en di-or, 'de or 'meh. Deh no-eh, or :se-' Nyorsoa dhih-a' 'i 'beh-a' 'nyi.
Jorwor: Nyorsoa-a' wlu-a mu 'dlu bo :chio'lo:, 'de on gweh deh⧾-a' klehkpeh 'dlu.
:Yee' :yeh :Bana'ba-: 'dekorn: :Soror'-: on gweh-a :koan: on mu-a bo 'i 'de :Julu'slehn, :yee' on mu 'Antior de. 'De on kpa :Jororn' :or :korn-a 'nyne :nee' 'dhu-a 'Make-' :ke.

:Yee' 'de 'chore :eh :ne-a 'de 'Antior-gwlor 'di, 'do :wor Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ deh :torne-nyor⧾-: on :ne. An-a' 'nyne :wor, :Bana'ba-: 'Simior: an 'da-dih-a Nyor-yle-: 'Lusior: :or 'wluh-a :Sali'na-: 'Manior: :or :ne :Hehlo' :or no-a nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-nyor, on :ku-dih:-a :dha :due'-: 'dekorn: :Soror'-:.

:Yee' ti an za-a :Gwlor :baa'-a' :weheh', 'de an pa 'suehn-', :yee' Gban 'i :ne :Zulu :wlu-' 'de on bo, on 'dae:, A :za :Bana'ba-: 'dekorn: :Soror'-: 'do 'on bo, on 'ye :koan: :or :korn-a dhih 'on 'da-uh'-a, on 'ye-or' no.
:Yee' :yeh on gweh-a 'suehn-' :pa-eh 'i, 'de on :wlu-a 'de Nyorsoa bo, :yee' on tba-uh son⧾ ken dih, on 'worn-dih: an-a' dhih, 'de on dbo-uh.

:Yee' Gban 'i :ne :Zulu dbo mo-: :ne-a 'sororn' 'weh, 'de on 'kpa :gwie 'i, on mu :Silu'sia 'de yobo' worn 'i. 'De on chehn 'o :dhie', on 'kpa 'de 'ni ken-meheh 'di, 'de on mu 'Sapor-bluhba ken, :or no-a yobo'-a' dubeh-'.

:Yeh on 'si-a 'o :gwlor an 'da-dih-a :Sala'mi dih 'do 'Sapor-bluhba ken, :yee' an po Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'de :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'di :gweh-dih-sla⧾ 'zorn. :Jororn' an 'da-dih-a 'Make, or-: :ne on mu, 'de or :za-dih-uh :ke.

'De on :na 'bluhba-dlu: :dao', or-a' klehkpeh ken dih, on chehn 'o or ken :dhie', 'de on mu 'Pefor. 'Do :wor on :yeh-dih: :Jueh'-yu :due', an 'da-dih-a Ba-Yusu', :or no-a 'ylaa: 'yla⧾, 'de :or no-a sih 'tmo :wele-eh: :po-nyor.

'Yu-a' 'jeh :dao', or no 'gomla-nyor: :klaba', an 'da-dih-a 'Sorya: 'Palor:, or-a' bo :na-yu :due'. 'Gomla-nyor: :klaba' :dao', or no nyor :or :korn-a :toror'. Or-a' 'jeh :dao', or-: dbo :Bana'ba-: 'dekorn: :Soror'-: wlu bo. Deh no-eh, or 'bhorn or 'ye Nyorsoa-a' wlu 'worn :ke.
Jorwor: 'yu :dao', :or no-a 'ylaa: 'yla⧾, 'Glii-nyor⧾-a 'da-dih-or :Ehli'mor:, or vorn-eh-: bo, or 'ye-eh' no, 'de 'gomla-yu: :dao', or :sor po :Yusu'-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-'.
:Yee' :Soror' :or :korn-a 'nyne :nee' 'dhu-a :Poror', or 'yi-dih: Gban 'i :ne :Zulu-: dih, 'de or pobo: :Ehli'mor ya 'dhuan, or :wlu 'de or bo, or 'dae:,

:Mor 'ku-a' 'yu :oo'. :On 'nyeh deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :en no-a dhih 'jeh-' 'weh. :On 'yi-dih: nyor⧾ dih :bo-dih-eh-: 'dekorn: :bhuli' :doru'-: dih. 'Do ti-a' klehkpeh bo, :an no-eh', :Gwlor :baa'-a' dhih 'jeh 'ye sih-' 'kpa.

:Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, or mu :on 'ye-:. :An mu 'dor-:, :on :se-' dih 'ye-: i. :On :se-' 'yluh-a' zorn-pli 'ye-: i 'do ti-kpor-bei 'di. :Yeh :Soror' 'da :ao', :yee' 'do :dha :due' 'jeh :dao', :kule-kpan: or-: :yi-dih: 'o :Ehli'mor 'yli ken. 'De or dua-' dih, or 'bhorn nyor :or 'ye-a or-a' son dih kpon.
:Yeh 'gomla-yu: :dao', or 'ye-a deh :eh :no-eh, :yee' or po :Yusu'-a' dhih-' dhih 'jeh. Deh no-eh, or-a' :porluh 'ma-', 'de eh :florn-dih-or worn, 'do :Gwlor :baa'-a' dhih an torne-a nyor⧾ bo.

:Yeh on no :ao', :yee' :Poror'-: 'dekorn: or-a'a: bo :na-nyor⧾-: on 'kpa 'de 'ni ken-meheh 'di 'weh, 'de on 'wluh 'Pefor, 'de jorwor: on mu 'Pehka 'de :Panfi'la-bluhba ken. 'Do :wor :Jororn' an 'da-dih-a 'Make, or sie-uh, 'de jorwor: or mu :Julu'slehn de.

:Yeh on 'wluh-a 'Pehka, :yee' on zi-' :neheh', on mu 'Antior: 'de :Pasi'la-bluhba ken. :Yeh on 'si-a dih, :yee' on pa 'de :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'di :gweh-dih-sla 'zorn, 'do Nyorsoa-a' :gwlee-we-eh 'di, 'de on :dhe dih 'de mor.

'De nyor zlo deh 'de :Mose'-a' 'tele'-chlee-deh 'di-: 'dekorn: 'de Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor⧾-a' 'chlee-deh 'di-:. :Yeh or gweh-a eh-a' zlo-a' 'i, :yee' nyor⧾ :klaba'⧾ :on :korn-a 'de 'di :gweh-dih-sla: :dao', or-a' wlu bo, on 'da :Soror' 'i 'weh, on 'dae:, 'De-di'-boi'-a:, :mor a 'ble tubo-wlu⧾ :en 'ye-a 'de nyor⧾-a' 'kpih po, :yee' a po-ih.

:Yeh on 'da :ao', :yee' :Poror' :sorn-' 'weh, 'de or :to son yai', 'de or 'kpa 'o :wlu 'da, or 'dae:, 'On 'bli 'Ezlea-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: a :mor nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾-: 'de :an za-a Nyorsoa :weheh', a :to 'on :dou'⧾ bo.
'Ezlea-nyor⧾-a' Nyorsoa, or-: gan :a :bai'-a' :bai', 'de or no-eh, 'de an-a' dhih 'beh 'i, ti on :ne-a 'Iye-bluhba ken. Or-a' dhih-a' 'i 'beh-kpih:, me-: or no, 'de or za-uh 'de.
'De or ku 'di dih :chio'lo: 'do an-a' kplen bo, 'do zon⧾ :en 'beh-dih:-a :en 'ye-a :kwlaa :nyieh no 'di, 'de :bhehneh'-bluhba ken.
Or gba 'dawor'⧾-dlu⧾ :meheh' 'sorn ya de 'Keneh-bluhba ken, 'de or 'nyi or-a'a: nyor⧾ 'bluhba:⧾ :dao', on 'ye-ih' :korn.

Deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :daa, :en mu-a 'dlu bo, en 'beh-dih: en 'ye :no-eh: 'do zon⧾-a' :kehehn' :nyieh :kwlaa :mm' 'di. :Yeh deh⧾ :daa, en zi-a, :yee' Nyorsoa 'nyi-uh zabe: :zi-nyor:⧾, mo-: :na-dih-uh 'de jorwor: eh :yeh-dih: or-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor: Sameo'-a' ti ken.

'Do ti-a' 'jeh :dao' 'i, 'do :wor 'o, 'Ezlea-nyor⧾ 'yba-dih: 'keen. 'De Nyorsoa 'nyi-uh 'keen an 'da-dih-a :Soror', :or 'dhu-a 'Kee-a' 'yu-', :or 'wluh-a 'o 'Behnjemeh-a' 'cheh-dlu 'i. Or-: :na-dih-uh 'do zon⧾-a' :kwlaa :nyieh 'di.

:Yee' :yeh Nyorsoa :za-a 'o :Soror' 'do kpala' 'i, :yee' or no :Debe' 'keen-'. 'De mor or zela: or-a' dhih bo dih 'weh, or 'da, 'On 'ye-eh' :ka :Debe' :or 'dhu-a 'Jehsi-a'a: 'yu-', 'de or 'dhu-a nyor-' :or no-a 'an :porluh, 'de :or mu-a deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :en :korn-a 'on 'ton :no.
'De or-a'a: 'nynuu-a' 'nynuu 'nyne :oo', 'do :wor Nyorsoa :za nyor⧾ 'puh-dih-nyor: :Yusu' 'do 'Ezlea-nyor⧾ bo, :ka or no-a eh-a' wlu :dhama'-' :po-eh.
:Yeh :Yusu' 'ye-a 'de yi, :yee' :Jororn' po Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'de 'Ezlea-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh bo, on 'ye an-a' deh⧾-zon⧾ dih 'tali:, 'de on 'ye 'de Nyorsoa bo 'bili:, 'de on 'ye 'ni 'dlu :po.

:Yeh :Jororn'-a' :koan yi-a 'dlu-' :jla 'da, :yee' or dhele-uh-: dih, or 'da, Deh 'i-deh-nyor: a-a' :porluh⧾ 'da, 'on 'dhu-eh:-' :eh? 'On :se nyor :yor a fuo-a 'ken o. Jorwor: nyor-a' 'jeh :dao', or mu 'on ken dih :yi, :or :korn-a :buhbuh⧾-a' dubu'⧾ 'on se-a deh-' 'dhu-eh:, 'on 'ye-a' bhehn-dih: :sloror'.

'An 'de-di'-boi'-a:. A :mor 'Eble'hehn-a' 'di-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾-: :on :ne-a 'noror a 'klu-', :an za-a Nyorsoa :weheh', tubo-wlu:⧾ :daa :en :ya-a: 'de 'puh-a', me-: :dbo-eh: 'noror :a bo.

Nyor⧾ :on 'ti-a :Julu'slehn-: 'dekorn: an-a'a: nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-nyor⧾-: on se eh-a' 'i yubo-eh :korn nyor :Yusu' 'dhu-eh:-'. Jorwor: on chehn-or wlu 'ken, or 'ye 'meh. :Mor on :taa :ao' no, :yee' Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor⧾-a' wlu, an zlo-a 'do Nyorsoa-a' :gwlee-we-eh 'di, 'do ti-a' klehkpeh bo, mo-: :oo', an no-eh, :on 'ye dhih 'jeh-' 'kpa.
Deh :Yusu' no-a, :eh :korn-a dhih on no-a or 'ye-a' 'meh, eh se 'nyne :korn. Jorwor: on zela: Pale' :gwluhuh' 'weh, or 'ye :Yusu'-a' 'meheh'-deh wlu 'ken chehn 'gboror:.
Deh⧾-a' klehkpeh an mu-a :Yusu' 'bhun :no, :en :korn-a dhih Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh :za-a-', :yeh on no-ih-a, :yee' on za-or 'o tu 'i 'weh, 'de on po-or 'de nma-dih-deh 'di.
Jorwor: Nyorsoa za-or 'de nma-dih-deh 'di 'weh.
:Yee' nyor⧾ :ne or 'wluh-a :Galali'i, 'de :an mu-a :Julu'slehn, on 'ye-or' 'do 'we :dhulu' 'di. :Yee' nyor⧾ :dao', mo-: no or-a' dhih ken dih zela-nyor⧾ 'de :a-a'a: nyor⧾ bo :naa.
:Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, :a :ne :daa 'weh, :a 'ye a Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh :gwluhuh' zela:. Deh :korn-a wlu or po-a :dhama'-' 'de :a :bai'-a' :bai' bo,

eh-: or no, :eh 'kpa dhih 'jeh-' 'do :a bo, :a :mor 'dhu-a an-a' 'nynuu-'. Deh-a' 'jeh :daa, eh-: 'dhu, :Yusu'-a' nma-dih-deh 'di :za-eh-', :ka eh no-a 'chle-eh 'de :Saan'-a' 'chlee-deh-a' 'dlu⧾ 'sororn' 'di, Nyorsoa no-a, :Mor no 'an-a: 'Yu. 'De :eh 'wluh-a dha 'zean'-zorn: :daa 'bli, 'mor no :on :Baa'.

Nyorsoa za-or 'de nma-dih-deh 'di 'weh, 'de mor or :se-' 'meh-: i :neheh', :ka Nyorsoa no-a eh-a' :za-a' :kpeheh:, or no-a, :Bhorlie' :eh :korn-a wlu 'on po-a :dhama'-' 'de :Debe' bo, :eh no-a :gwlii' :dhe-deh, eh-: 'an mu a 'nyi-: 'de gban 'i :ne ka 'di.
'De eh 'chle-eh:-' 'de 'chlee-deh: :ne-a :due' 'di, 'do eh-a' 'for :noror' bo, eh 'da, :On :se-' 'worn-: i, :an-a' Gban 'i :ne-nyor :se 'de nma-dih-deh 'di 'zorn-dih: i.
:Debe' no Nyorsoa-a' 'ton :korn-deh 'weh, 'do or-a' ti 'i, 'de or 'meh. 'De on nma-dih-or dih 'do or :bai'-a' :bai' bo. Jorwor: or-a' 'ku 'zorn-'.
Jorwor: :yor Nyorsoa :za-a: 'de nma-dih-deh 'di, or-a' 'ku :se-' 'zorn.
:Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, 'an 'de-di'-boi'-a:, 'an 'bhorn a 'ye-eh' yubo: :ka eh 'dhu-a :Yusu'-' :or no-eh, 'de a-a' deh⧾-zon⧾-a' dhih 'ma-dih-eh: bo. Eh-: :a zela a :gwluhuh'.
A :korn a 'ye-eh' yubo: :ka nyor :yor :or po-a or-a' dhih dhih 'jeh, :yee' or mu-a 'puh-:, or 'ye-a 'o deh⧾-zon⧾ 'zorn 'wluh, :en :korn-a 'zorn :Mose'-a' 'tele' se-a nyor :za-eh 'beh-dih:.
:Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, a 'wla :gwluhuh' dih, 'de deh Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor⧾ :za-a-', eh :ne-' :no-eh: 'do a bo, :eh no-a,

A :gbee'e:, a :mor :or 'wluh-dih-a deh Nyorsoa :za-a-' :goba'-dhih ken dih. 'Nyi eh 'ma-dih: 'de a 'di dih, a 'ye gbe :zie:. Deh no-eh, 'an mu deh :no 'do a-a' ti 'i, :yeh a :se-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po i, nyor-a' :yeh zela: a :gwluhuh' :sloror', a :se-eh' dhih 'jeh-' :po i.

:Yeh :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Bana'ba-: an 'wluh-a 'de 'sla :dao' 'zorn, :yee' nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'de, on :wlu 'de on bo 'weh, on 'ye deka yi :neheh', 'do Nyorsoa-a' :gwlee-we-eh: :eh mu-a 'de :yi 'di, 'de :Poror' 'i 'ye-uh deh⧾ :daa en-' :nee' on :gwluhuh' zela:.

:Yeh :gwlor-nyor:⧾ :dao', on :gba-a dih, 'de :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Bana'ba-: an mu-a, :yee' :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' :dha :dhulu'-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ :on 'kpa-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' Nyorsoa-deh-: 'de :on chehn-a 'de eh bo, mo-: zi 'o on klei'. :Yee' nyor⧾ :dao', on :wlu-' 'de on bo, on 'neh-uh ken, on 'ye 'de Nyorsoa-a' mla 'zorn dih :na.
:Yee' 'do :gwlee-we-eh-a' 'sororn' neh 'di, eh 'beh-dih: eh 'ye :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a 'o :gwlor :dao' 'di no, mo-: 'kpa :dha :due', on 'ye tubo-wlu:⧾ :en kor-a :Gwlor :baa' 'i 'worn.
:Yee' :yeh :Jueh'-nyor⧾ 'ye-a :gwlor-nyor:⧾ :dhulu' :dao', :yee' :gwlehehn'-a no-uh, 'de an po 'jlei, an wlu-dih deh :Poror'-a za-a-' 'bhun dih.

Jorwor: :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Bana'ba-: on :se-' 'dlu deh 'i 'neh-dih:, 'de on :wlu 'de on bo, on 'dae:, :A :korn :a 'ye Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu⧾ po 'de a bo :zai' :gbor :gbor, 'de :a no-eh. Jorwor: :ka a se-ih-a dih kpon, 'de a se-a a-a' 'jeh deh 'da-dih: 'do 'kmo :sie: :febeh'-a' dhih bo, :yee' eh-: :korn dhih :a 'tali a dih, 'de :a 'bili 'de nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾ bo.

:Yee' deh :Gwlor :baa' zela:-a :a :gwluhuh', :a 'ye-a' no, 'de or-a' 'chlee-deh 'di, eh-: :dhe dih, 'On no-eh', 'de :on no zorn-pli 'do nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾ bo, 'de 'bluhba-a' klehkpeh 'ye :on-' :yi-dih:, on 'ye 'puh.

:Yeh nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor:⧾, on 'worn-a deh :daa, :yee' an-a' :porluh⧾ 'pehn-: dih, 'de an po :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'nyne ya, 'do tubo-wlu:⧾ :dao', on 'worn-a, en-' dhih bo, 'de nyor⧾ or gan-a :on 'ye-a 'kmo :sie: :febeh' 'ye, mo-: po-eh dhih 'jeh-'.
:Yee' tubo-wlu:⧾ :en kor-a :Gwlor :baa' 'i, en gweh 'o 'bluhba-a' 'for :dao', or-a' klehkpeh ken-: 'dlu.

Jorwor: :yeh eh no :ao', :yee' :Jueh'-nyor⧾ 'dhu-dih: 'nynor⧾-kpao'⧾ worn :yuh :on :korn-a 'nyne nyor⧾ yubo:-a, 'de :an za-a Nyorsoa :weheh'-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ :klaba'⧾ :on :ne-a 'o :gwlor :dao' 'di-:. 'De on 'dhu-dih: nyor⧾ worn, on 'ye :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Bana'ba-: 'kle 'ye-dih:. 'De on no-uh dih, on za-uh 'o on 'bli 'bluhba ken.

:Yee' :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Bana'ba-: :yeh on 'ye-a 'o :gwlor :dao' 'di 'wluh, :yee' on 'gbabo: an-a' :buhbuh⧾ 'zorn-: dih, eh 'ye-uh 'i :to-dih: :ka Nyorsoa :za-a an-a' deh son 'di. :Yeh on no :ao', :yee' on mu :gwlor an 'da-dih-a :Iko'nia 'di.
:Yee' :Yusu'-a' klei' :zi-nyor:⧾ :on :ne-a 'Antior, 'mona: 'yi-dih-uh-: dih, 'de Gban 'i :ne :Zulu 'yi-dih-uh-: dih :ke.

:Yee' :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Bana'ba-: on mu 'de :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'di :gweh-dih-sla 'zorn 'de :Iko'nia, :ka on no-a 'de 'Antior :ke. 'Do :wor on :wlu-dih: :neheh' 'gabaa. Eh-: no-eh, 'de :Jueh'-nyor:⧾ :dhulu'-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾-: on po :Yusu'-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-'.

:Yeh eh no :ao', :yee' :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' :yuh :on se-a :Yusu'-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' :po-dhih 'worn-dih:, on po nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor:⧾ wlu⧾ :dou'⧾-', 'de on 'bili: 'de :Yusu'-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor⧾ ya.

:Yee' eh-: no-eh, 'de :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Bana'ba-: on :gwle 'o :gwlor :dao' 'di 'do ti :dhorno'⧾ 'di. On :za :fano :gwlii', 'de on po tubo-wlu:⧾ :en kor-a :Gwlor :baa' 'i. 'De :Gwlor :baa' :to-dih-eh nyor⧾ :dao' 'i :ka or-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ an po-a, :en kor-a or-a' mla 'i, en :se-a sih, 'do 'kpih or 'nyi-uh-a bo, on 'ye-a nyor⧾ 'i :to-dih-deh⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ 'di dih 'ma-dih-deh⧾-: no.
:Yeh deh :daa, eh :no-eh, :yee' nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'o :gwlor :dao' 'di, on :gble-eh:-' 'weh. :Noo' :ne 'de :Jueh'-nyor⧾ 'de, 'de :noo' :ne 'de :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾ 'de.

:Yee' nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: :Jueh'-nyor⧾-: :korn mor an-a'a: nyor⧾ :na-dih-nyor⧾-: an 'dhu dhih, on 'ye :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾ dhih-' no, on 'ye-uh sobu'⧾ dih :tba-dih:, on 'ye 'meh.

Jorwor: :yeh :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor:⧾ :dao', on yubo-eh 'i, :yee' on ple-', on 'wluh 'o :gwlor :dao' 'di 'weh. 'De on mu :gwlor⧾ an 'da-dih-a 'Lesla-: 'dekorn: 'Dorbi-: :en :ne-a 'de 'Lekao'nia-bluhba ken, :korn mor en-' :gbalie⧾ bo dih-:.
'Do :wor on mu, 'de an kpa Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh-a' :po-eh 'dlu bo.
:Yee' 'de 'Lesla-gwlor 'di, 'do :wor 'yu :due' :or 'wluh-dih:-a :klor-a', 'de :or 'see-a na :zai', or :ne. 'We-eh :due', :yee' 'yu-a' 'jeh :dao', or :dhe dih,
'de or to :Poror' wlu :dou'⧾ bo ti :Poror'-a wlu-a. 'De :Poror' pobo-or ya 'dhuan. :Yee' or yubo-eh' :ka 'yu :dao', or po-eh dhih 'jeh-', :ka :Yusu' 'beh-dih:-a or 'ye-eh' no, or 'ye-a' 'puh.
'De or 'wor, or 'da, :Sorn-', :on 'ye dih :nyna. :Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' 'yu :dao', or wan 'o 'bluhbor-: dih, 'de or :na 'do :dha :due' :dao'.

:Yeh nyor⧾ :dhulu' :dao' :on :ne-a 'o, on 'ye-a deh :Poror' no-a, :yee' on 'kpa 'geh⧾ :po-eh-: ken, 'de an po on 'bli 'Lekao'nia-wlu, an no, Nyorsoa⧾ :za-dih:-' :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' nyior-tu:, 'de on yi 'noror :a bo yao 'zorn.
:Yee' on 'dhu-dih: :Bana'ba 'Zuza: nyorsoa-a' 'nyne. 'De on 'dhu-dih: :Poror' 'Hormi: nyorsoa-a' 'nyne, deh no-eh, or no dhih-' :za-nyor:.

:Yee' 'yu :or za-a 'Zuza: nyorsoa-a' 'slaa, :or :korn-a 'sla :nyna-a 'o :gwlor 'worn 'i dih, or-a' 'jeh :dao', or-: :ya 'de :blii'⧾-gblor⧾-: 'dekorn: 'gborn⧾-: 'do gwlor-a' gba-dih-gba worn 'i. Deh no-eh, or :ne nyor⧾ :dhulu' :dao' an 'bhorn on 'ye 'slaa :za 'do :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Bana'ba-: bo.

Jorwor: :yeh :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Bana'ba-: on 'worn-a deh nyor⧾ :daa, an 'bhorn-a on 'ye-a' no, :yee' on 'fa-dih: an-a'a: paa-tiei-'-: dih, 'de on ple, on :ge-dih: 'de nyor⧾ :dhulu' :dao' 'nyne-', an po 'geh⧾, an no,

:A 'bli-nyor⧾-a:. :Eh :korn dhih a no deh⧾ :daa :eh? :A-a' 'jeh :ke, :a :mor :gwlor-nyor:⧾ 'o, :ka a :ne-a :ke. Tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh, me-: :a :ya a-uh, 'de a 'ye 'o deh⧾ :daa :en se-a deh ken 'kpa 'zorn 'wluh, a 'ye dih 'bili: 'noror 'kmo :ne-Nyorsoa bo, :or no-a yao-: 'bluhba-: yobo'-: 'dekorn: deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :en :ne-a 'de en 'di-:.
'Do ti :en zi-a 'di, Nyorsoa :za 'dawor'⧾-dlu⧾-a' klehkpeh 'yli-eh dih, en 'ye en-' 'jeh-a' 'ton :korn-deh no.

Jorwor: or :to-dih: or-a' 'jeh nyor⧾ 'i 'weh 'do deh⧾ 'jeh or no-a bo. Or 'nyi a dbaa-ni: :eh 'wluh-a 'de yai', 'de or 'nyi a 'dhuu'-deh⧾ 'do en-' :noror' 'i. 'De or 'nyi a dii-deh:⧾ :dhulu', or 'yi-dih: a-a' :porluh⧾ 'mona-' dih.
Jorwor: :yeh :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Bana'ba-: on :za-a deh :daa-' 'gboror:, :yee' an-a' 'worn, 'de on 'ye 'kle 'do nyor⧾ :dao', an-a' 'borboa' 'i :po-eh bo, on :ne-' 'slaa :za 'do on bo.

:Yee' :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' nyor⧾ :noo', mo-: 'wluh 'Antior-: 'dekorn: :Iko'nia-: mo-: :pa-dih: nyor⧾ :dhulu' :dao' 'zorn dih, 'de an-a' :porluh⧾ 'bili:-' dih. On :tba-dih: :Poror' sobu'⧾ dih, 'de on 'kla-or dih, on za-or 'o :gwlor-'. :Mor on :taa 'ye :dee', :yee' on 'da or 'meh-'.

:Yeh on za-or 'o :gwlor-', :yee' :Yusu'-a' klei' :zi-nyor⧾ 'gola-or 'de dih, 'de or :sorn-', or mu :gwlor-' de. :Yee' :yeh zorn zen-a, :yee' or-: 'dekorn: :Bana'ba-: on 'wluh 'o :gwlor :dao' 'di 'weh, 'de on mu 'Dorbi.

:Yee' :yeh on nyni-a 'o, :yee' on po Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh 'do :gwlor :dao' 'di, 'de on no-eh, 'de nyor⧾ :dhulu' po :Yusu'-a' dhih dhih 'jeh. :Yeh on no :ao', :yee' on chehn 'o :dhie', 'de on mu 'Lesla-: :Iko'nia-: 'dekorn: 'Antior-: gwlor⧾ 'di de.

:Yee' an po 'de :Yusu'-a' klei' :zi-nyor⧾-a' 'kpih, 'de an zela-uh :gwluhuh', on 'ye :Yusu'-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh 'dlu bo kpa. 'De an zela-uh :gwluhuh' :ke, an no, :A :korn :a 'ye 'de 'kle 'ye-eh: :dhulu' 'di :yi-dih:, 'de jorwor: :a 'ye 'de Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh 'zorn pa.

'Chore :yeh :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Bana'ba-: on mu 'di, :yee' an tba nyor⧾ :jii-eh: :on 'ye-a nyor⧾ :klaba'⧾ no 'de mor. :Mor on 'ye-uh' :jii-eh tba, :yee' an pa-' 'suehn:, 'de an wlu 'de Nyorsoa bo, 'de an po 'de nyor⧾ :klaba'⧾ :dao', 'de :Gwlor :baa' 'kwa, on dhe-a :gwlii'.
:Yee' on mu :Pasi'la-bluhba ken. :Yeh on gweh-or 'dlu, :yee' on zi-', on mu :Panfi'la-bluhba ken.
'Do :wor on :po-dih: Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu⧾ 'de 'Pehka-gwlor 'di. 'De on mu :gwlor an 'da-dih-a :Ati'lia 'di, 'de yobo' worn 'i.

:Yeh on 'wluh-a :Ati'lia, :yee' on 'kpa 'de 'ni ken-meheh 'di, 'de on mu 'Antior de, 'do :dha on :po-dih-uh-a 'de Nyorsoa 'kwa, 'do :koan: on mu-a no 'da bo. :Koan: :dao', or-: on gweh 'i :naa, 'de on yi 'o de.

:Yeh on 'si-a :gwlor-' dih, :yee' on po 'chore-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :dha :due', 'de on zela-uh :gwluhuh', deh⧾-a' klehkpeh Nyorsoa no-a :en :yi-dih-uh-a-', 'dekorn: :ka or no-a :gwie 'i kan-dih-eh 'do nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾ bo, 'de on po-a :Yusu'-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-'.
:Yeh on no :ao', :yee' on :gwle 'o :Yusu'-a' klei' :zi-nyor⧾ bo 'weh, 'de an mu :mu.

:Yee' nyor⧾-kpalu:⧾ :noo', mo-: 'wluh :Judi'a-bluhba ken, 'de on mu 'Antior, 'de an torne :Yusu'-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor:⧾ :on :ne-a 'de deh, on 'dae:, :Mor nyor se :bhlororn' 'meh, :ka :Mose'-a' 'tele' 'da-a, :yee' or se 'beh-dih: or 'ye 'puh.

:Yee' :yeh nyor⧾ :dao', on :za-a deh :daa-', :yee' :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Bana'ba-: on :se-eh' 'worn-dih: klehkpeh klehkpeh, 'de on :ne an dhobo. Eh-: no-eh, 'de 'chore-nyor⧾ :za :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Bana'ba-: 'dekorn: :Yusu'-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor:⧾ :noo'-: on 'ye :Julu'slehn mu, on 'ye :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: 'chore-a' nyor⧾ :klaba'⧾-: on 'ye-uh dih dhele: 'do deh :daa, eh-a' dhih bo.

'De on dbo-uh, 'de on 'kpa :gwie 'i. :Yee' on :yi-dih: :Feni'sia-: 'dekorn: Sehmeh'la-: 'de an zela :Yusu'-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor:⧾ :on :ne-a 'de :gwluhuh' :ka nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor:⧾ on 'bili:-a-' dih 'de Nyorsoa bo. :Yeh dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor:⧾ :on :ne-a 'de, on 'worn-ih'-a, :yee' 'mona 'yi-dih-uh-: dih 'gabaa.

:Yee' :yeh :Poror' 'i 'si-a :Julu'slehn dih, :yee' 'chore-nyor⧾-: :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: 'chore-a' nyor⧾ :klaba'⧾-: on kpon-uh-: dih. 'De :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Bana'ba-: on zela-uh deh⧾-a' klehkpeh Nyorsoa :yi-dih-uh-a-', 'de :en :no-eh :gwluhuh'.

:Yee' :Yusu'-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor:⧾ :noo' :on :ne-a 'de :Falasi'i-deh 'di, mo-: :wlu, on 'da, Nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor:⧾, on :korn on 'ye :bhlororn' 'meh :gbor :gbor. :Yee' on :korn on 'ye 'o :Mose'-a' 'tele' dih dhe :ke.
:Yeh on 'da :ao', :yee' :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: 'chore-a' nyor⧾ :klaba'⧾-: on 'kpa :dha :due', on 'ye 'de dhih :daa 'di pobo:.

:Yeh on dhobo:-a :dhoboo:, :yee' :Piteh' :sorn-' 'weh, 'de or :wlu, or 'dae:, 'An 'de-di'-boi'-a:. A yubo-eh', 'do ti-kpor-bei: :en zi-a 'di, Nyorsoa tba 'on :jii-eh: 'de a 'nyne-', 'on 'ye or-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh po, 'de nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾ bo, on 'ye-ih 'worn, 'de on 'ye-ih dhih 'jeh-' po.
Nyorsoa :or 'ye-a 'o nyor⧾ :porluh ken dih, or-: :to-dih-eh nyor⧾ 'i, :ka or 'worn-dih-a an-a' dhih ken dih, 'do an-a' Gban 'i :ne :Zulu: 'nyi-eh bo, :ka or no-a :a-a' 'nyi-a' :ke.
Mo-: 'dekorn: :a mor-: or :se-' :a-uh dih zela:. :Ka :a no-a 'de :a-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh no-eh, 'de :a-a' :porluh⧾ :gweh-a :vlehehn'-', 'ka-: on no :ke.
:Yee' :eh :korn dhih :oo' :naa, 'de a 'dhen Nyorsoa, 'do 'gbeh⧾ :a :bai'-a' :bai'-: 'dekorn: :a-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh-: :a se-a kpa-a' 'beh-dih:, 'de a po-ih 'o :Yusu'-a' klei' :zi-nyor⧾ 'dlu :eh?
'Kei:. Eh se :korn eh 'ye :ao' :ne. :A po-eh' dhih 'jeh, :ka eh 'dhu-a :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu'-a' mla-' :or no-eh, 'de :a 'puh-a, 'ka-: on :ne :ke.

:Yee' :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Bana'ba-: an po kuna', :ka Nyorsoa :yi-dih-uh-a-', 'de on no-a nyor⧾ 'i :to-dih-deh⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ 'di dih 'ma-dih-deh⧾-: 'de nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾ 'nyne-'. :Yeh an po-a kuna', :yee' :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :gweh-dih:-a 'o, on no 'dhuan, 'de an to-uh :dou'⧾ bo.
:Yeh on gweh-a :wlu-a' 'i, :yee' 'Jeen :wlu-', or 'dae:, A :to 'on :dou'⧾ bo, 'an 'de-di'-boi'-a:.

Samor' :wlu-' :kana, or zela-eh ken dih 'weh, :ka Nyorsoa no-a 'de nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor:⧾, an-a' bo :yi-eh :zai', 'de or 'kpa-a 'de on 'nyne-' son, 'de or :za-a: 'de nyor⧾ or tba-a :jii-eh 'do or-a' 'jeh bo.
Deh Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor⧾ :za-a-', eh-: 'o, eh :gweh-dih: 'i :kpeheh:, :ka eh no-a 'chle-eh, eh no-a,

:Gwlor :baa' 'dae:, 'De ybei'-a' ybei', 'an mu de :yi, 'on 'ye :Debe'-a' 'gbu :on blu-a :po :dele' ka. Or-a'a: 'gbu :on :gba-a ya, an-a' 'tiei: :en 'pehn-a 'o an-a' :gbaan' ken dih, 'an mu-ih-' 'duo:, 'on 'ye-uh po :dele' ka, 'on 'ye-uh dih :ku-dih: :neheh'.
Eh-: mu-eh :no, 'de nyor⧾ :yuh :on :sie:-a 'o, on 'ye 'on 'kwla⧾-' dih 'bhorn, 'de mor nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor:⧾ 'on 'da-a 'de on 'ye 'an-a: nyor⧾-' 'dhu-eh:.
Deh :daa, eh-: :Gwlor :baa' :za-a-', :or no-eh, 'de :a yubo:-a deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :daa, :en :za-eh :dee' see.

:Yee' 'Jeen-a kpa or-a' wlu 'dlu bo, or 'dae:, :Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, deh :yeh :ne-a 'o 'on :gwlii', eh-: 'dhu, nyor⧾ :daa :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor:⧾ 'de :an 'bili-a-' dih 'noror Nyorsoa bo, :a-a' 'beh-dih:-uh' 'worn dih.

Deh :due' :a 'ye-a' no, :a 'chle-uh bo, :a 'ye-uh' :gwluhuh' zela:, on :ne-' dii-deh:⧾ :en 'dhu-dih-eh zuu⧾ gban 'i di. :A mu-uh :gwluhuh' zela:, on :ne-' 'tmeor:⧾ :korn-eh buh 'di po. 'De on :ne-' :gwlor-nimi-: 'dekorn: 'kwla-nimi-: nyor⧾ 'dba-a, :en se-a nyomor-' 'wluh, 'de :en :dhe-dih:-a nyomor-' dih di, 'dekorn: nyomor 'na-a'-:.
Deh no-eh, :Mose'-a' 'tele'-a zlo-eh-' 'de :a-a' 'di :gweh-dih-sla⧾ 'zorn, 'do Nyorsoa-a' :gwlee-we-a' klehkpeh 'di, 'de mor eh-a' tubo-wlu⧾-a po-eh-' gwlor⧾ 'di dih :dee' see.

:Yee' :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾-: 'chore-a' nyor⧾ :klaba'⧾-: 'dekorn: 'chore-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh-: mo-: polo: dhih, on 'ye nyor⧾-kpalu⧾ :za 'de on 'klu-', 'de nyor⧾-a' 'jeh :dao', mo-: :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Bana'ba-: on 'ye 'Antior mu. Nyor⧾ 'sororn' on :za-a, an-a' 'nyne :wor :Juda' an 'da-dih-a :Basa'ba, 'dekorn: :Salor'-: :on no-a :Yusu'-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor⧾-a' nyor⧾ :na-dih-nyor⧾-a' nyor⧾ 'sororn'.

:Yee' on 'chle 'chlee-deh:, eh-: on 'nyi-uh, on 'ye kpa. 'Chlee-deh-a' 'jeh :daa, eh-a' wlu 'da, :A :mor :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: 'chore-a' nyor⧾ :klaba'⧾-: :a :mor :or no-a a-a' 'Klae :de-di'-boi', :a :mor 'ye a-uh, a :mor :or 'dhu-a :a-a' 'Klae :de-di'-boi'-' :on 'ti-a 'Antior-: 'Silia-: 'dekorn: :Sele'sia-: :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor:⧾.
:A 'worn-ih' :ka nyor⧾ 'wluh-a 'noror :a 'nyne-', :a se-a 'tele' 'nyi, 'de on yi-a 'de a bo, 'de deh⧾ on :za-a-' 'de a bo, en 'beh-dih-a a 'worn dih, 'de en po-a a-a' :porluh⧾ 'zorn.
:Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, :a 'worn-dih-eh ken dih 'weh, :a 'ye nyor⧾-kpalu:⧾ :noo' :za, on :ne :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Bana'ba-: :on no-a :a-a' :dhih :kma-nyor⧾, on 'ye 'de a bo yi,
:on 'ma-dih:-a an-a' 'meheh'-dhih bo, 'do :a-a' :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu' 'Klae-a' dhih bo.
:Yee' eh-: :korn dhih, :a dbo :Juda'-: 'dekorn: :Salor'-: on 'ye-a deh⧾ :a 'chle-a 'de 'chlee-deh: :daa 'di, on 'ye wlu no, on 'ye a :gwluhuh' zela:, :ka en 'dhu-a dhih 'jeh-'.
:A mor-: 'dekorn: Gban 'i :ne :Zulu-: :a 'worn-dih-eh ken dih 'weh, :a 'ye 'o 'gbeh⧾-a' :yih :daa, 'do a 'dlu po 'klein', :en no-a,

A-a' :di-' dii-deh:⧾ :en 'dhu-dih-eh zuu⧾ gban 'i. A-a' 'na-:-' nyomor. 'De mor a-a' :di-' :gwlor-nimi-: 'dekorn: 'kwla-nimi-: nyor⧾ 'dba-a, :en se-a nyomor-' 'wluh, 'de :en :dhe-dih:-a nyomor-' dih. A-a' :po-' 'tmeor:⧾ :korn-eh buh 'di. :Mor eh 'dhu, a :tehn-dih: deh⧾ :daa bo dih, :yee' eh mu 'yi dih :nmor 'do a bo. :A 'ye 'ye-dih: o.
:Yee' on dbo dboo-nyor:⧾ :dao' 'weh, 'de on mu 'Antior. :Yeh on 'si-a dih, :yee' on po 'chore-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :dha :due', 'de on :za 'chlee-deh: :dao' 'kwla.
:Yeh nyor⧾ :dao', on zlo-a 'chlee-deh: :dao', :yee' 'mona 'yi-dih-uh-: dih. Deh no-eh, eh no 'de nyor⧾-a' 'kpih :po-chlee-deh:.
:Yee' :Juda'-: 'dekorn: :Salor'-: :on :korn-a 'jeh 'yor-eh: no-a Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor⧾, mo-: :za deh⧾ :doru' :en 'ye-uh'-a 'kpih bo po, 'de on 'ye-a dih ku.
:Yeh on zi-a 'o ti-kpor-bei 'do on bo 'de 'Antior, :yee' an-a' 'Klae :de-di'-boi' :on :ne-a 'o, on po-uh :bhorlie' bo, 'de on dbo-uh 'de :yuh :on dbo-uh-a de bo. [
Jorwor: :Salor' polo-eh' 'do or-a' 'jeh :gwlii', or 'ye 'de :sie:.]
Jorwor: :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Bana'ba-: on :sie: 'Antior 'weh, 'de mo-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ :dhulu' :noo'-: an torne nyor⧾ deh, 'de an po tubo-wlu:⧾ :en kor-a :Gwlor :baa' 'i.

:Yee' :yeh 'we-kpor-bei :zi-dih:-a 'o ken dih, :yee' :Poror' :wlu-' 'de :Bana'ba bo, or 'dae:, 'Nyi :a mu de, 'de gwlor⧾-a' klehkpeh :a :yi-dih:-a 'di dih, :eh :korn-a 'de 'di :a :po-dih:-a :Gwlor :baa'-a' tubo-wlu⧾, :a 'ye :a-a' 'Klae :de-di'-boi'-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a 'de 'ye, :a 'ye 'de on bo dih 'worn.
:Yeh or :za-a deh :daa-', :yee' :Jororn' an 'da-dih-a 'Make :ke, or-: :Bana'ba-a 'bhorn or 'ye kpa :ke.
Jorwor: :Poror' :se-eh' :toror' 'di 'ye, on 'ye-or' kpa. Deh no-eh, ti on mu-a :zai', or :ne on :se-' :koan 'dlu-' jla, or sie-uh :koan kwa dih 'de :Panfi'la, 'de or yi de.
Eh-: no-eh, 'de mo-: :ne-a 'sororn', on 'ya-ih'-a wlu ken dih, 'de on :gble-eh:-'. 'De :Bana'ba 'duo: 'Make-', 'de mo-: :ne-a 'sororn', on 'kpa 'de 'ni ken-meheh 'di, on mu 'Sapor.
'De mor :Poror' 'duo: :Salor'-' :ke, 'de on mu. :Yeh on 'ye-a' mu, :yee' an-a' 'Klae :de-di'-boi' po-uh 'de :Gwlor :baa' 'kwa, 'de jorwor: an mu :mu.
:Yeh :Poror' :taa mu, :yee' or :yi-dih: 'Silia-bluhba-: 'dekorn: :Sele'sia-bluhba-: ken, 'de or po 'chore-nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'de 'kpih bo.

:Yee' :Poror' 'i mu 'Dorbi:. 'De on zi, on mu 'Lesla, 'do :dha :Yusu'-a' klei' :zi-yu an 'da-dih-a :Timehte', or 'ti-a. Or 'de no :Yusu'-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nynor: :ke, 'de or no :Jueh'-nynor. Jorwor: or :baa' no 'Glii-yu:.
'Klae :de-di'-boi'-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a 'Lesla-: 'dekorn: :Iko'nia-: an 'tmo :Timehte'-a' 'nyne 'jeh :ne.
:Poror' 'bhorn or 'ye :Timehte' kpa. Eh-: :korn dhih or 'dba-or :bhlororn'. Deh no-eh, :Jueh'-nyor:⧾ :on 'ti-a 'o 'do :dha 'o-a' klehkpeh, on yubo-eh' :ka or :baa' 'dhu-a 'Glii-yu-'.
:Yeh an no-a 'wluh gwlor 'di, mu gwlor 'di, :yee' 'tele' :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: 'chore-a' nyor⧾ :klaba'⧾-: on po-a 'de :Julu'slehn, :yee' on za-eh-: 'kwla 'de on bo, on 'ye-eh' 'o dih dhe.
:Yee' 'chore-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh ku-: dih 'de an-a' :Yusu'-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh 'di, 'de an 'kpuhba ken dih zorn 'o zorn.
:Yee' :Poror' 'i :yi-dih: 'Fleya-bluhba-: 'dekorn: :Gale'tia-bluhba ken-:. Jorwor: Gban 'i :ne :Zulu :se-' 'worn on 'ye Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu⧾ po 'de 'Esea-bluhba ken.
:Yeh on nyni-a 'o 'Mesea-bluhba-a' 'dhuna 'i, :yee' an 'bhorn on 'ye 'de :Behfi'nia-bluhba ken mu. Jorwor: :Yusu'-a' :Zulu :se-' 'worn, on 'ye-eh' no.
Eh-: no-eh, 'de on zi 'Mesea dih, 'de on mu :gwlor an 'da-dih-a 'Tloa 'di.
:Yee' :yeh glu gor-a, :yee' :Poror'-a' 'yli-eh 'kpa deh 'i, 'de or 'ye 'Masordo'nia-yu :due', or-: :nyna dih, 'de or bale-or, or 'da, Yi 'noror :a bo 'Masordo'nia, :on 'ye :a bo 'kpa.

:Yeh deh :daa, eh :no-eh 'do :Poror' bo, :yee' :a 'bhorn :ka :a 'ye-a' no, 'de :a 'ye-a' 'Masordo'nia mu 'do :dha :due' :dao'. Deh no-eh, :a 'worn-dih-eh ken dih 'weh, :ka Nyorsoa 'da-a :a-uh, :a 'ye-a or-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh po, 'de nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'de bo.
:Yee' :a 'kpa 'de 'ni ken-meheh 'di, 'de :a 'wluh 'Tloa, :a mu 'o yobo'-a' dubeh: an 'da-dih-a :Samor'tle ken :dhehehn:. :Yeh zorn zen-a, :yee' :a mu :Nia'poli:.

:Yeh :a 'wluh-a 'o :neheh', :yee' :a mu :gwlor an 'da-dih-a :Fele'pa, :or no-a 'Masordo'nia-bluhba-a' 'for :dao', or-a' :gwlor :klaba', :or 'Wloon-nyor⧾ 'ya-a ken, 'de on :korn-a wlu 'ken. 'De :a zi 'o :gwlor :dao' 'di 'we-kpor-bei.

:Yee' :yeh :a :ne-a 'o, 'de Nyorsoa-a' :gwlee-we-eh nyni-a 'o, :yee' :a 'wluh 'o gwlor-a' 'yor-eh 'weh, 'de :a mu 'de 'ni :klaba' :eh :ne-a 'o worn 'i, 'do :dha :a dhe-a :gwlii', :a mu-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾ 'ye-dih: on 'ye-a' 'de Nyorsoa bo :wlu. 'Do :wor :a :dhe dih, 'de :a :wlu 'de 'nynor⧾-kpao'⧾ :on 'kpa-a :dha :due' 'do mor bo.

'Nynor⧾-kpao'⧾ :on :dhe-a 'o dih, 'de :an to-a :Poror' :dou'⧾ bo, an-a' nyor :due' :wor 'Ledia, :or 'wluh-a :Taya'ta, :or za-a Nyorsoa :weheh'. Or plo 'ylii: :nmaa'e: :en :kpe-a gbor, 'de :en 'kpa-a deh ken. Or-a' 'jeh :dao', or-: :korn :porluh: :Gwlor :baa' 'tuh dih, or 'ye dhih :Poror' :za-a-' dih kpon.

:Yee' or-: 'dekorn: or-a'a: nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a 'de or 'bli 'gbu-:, on :po-eh: 'ni 'dlu. :Yeh on gweh-a 'ni 'dlu :po-eh 'i, :yee' or 'da :a 'weh 'de or 'bli 'gbu, or 'dae:, :Mor a :zlo-dih: 'on :Gwlor :baa'-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor, :yee' a 'yle, a 'ye 'noror 'on 'bli 'gbu :ko-dih:. :Yeh or 'neh-a :a ken, :yee' :a 'worn-'.

Eh :korn 'we-eh :due', :yee' :a mu 'o :dha :ne-a :due', :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a wlu-dih-a 'de Nyorsoa bo. :Yeh :a mu-a 'o, :yee' 'nynor-kpao'-yu: :or no-a 'ge-yu, 'de :or 'ble-a 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh 'do or 'de, 'de :eh no-eh, 'de or zi-a de, or-: :a :yeh-dih: ken. 'Nynor-kpao'-yu-a' 'jeh :dao', or no 'wlii: :dhulu' 'do de :zi-eh bo, 'do or-a'a: nyor⧾ :on korn-or wlu 'ken bo.

:Yeh 'nynor-kpao'-yu: :dao', or 'ye-a :a mor-: 'dekorn: :Poror'-: :yee' or zi 'o :a klei' 'weh, 'de or po 'geh⧾, or no, Nyor⧾-kpalu:⧾ :daa, on no Nyorsoa :or no-a 'yi 'beh-Nyorsoa, or-a' 'bhoi-nynuu: :an zela :a :gwluhuh' :ka :a 'ye-a' no, 'de :a 'ye-a' 'puh.

Deh :dao', eh-: or no :noo:, 'do 'we :dhulu' 'di. :Yee' :Poror' sea :blaa'a:, 'de or 'bili:-' dih, 'de or :wlu 'de 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh bo, or 'dae:, 'De :Yusu' 'Klae-a' 'nyne 'di, 'an zela :on :gwluhuh', 'wluh 'o or 'de. :Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' 'do :dha :due'-a' 'jeh :dao', eh 'wluh 'o or 'de 'weh.

:Yeh nyor⧾ :on :korn-a 'nynor-kpao'-yu: :dao' wlu 'ken, on 'ye-a deh :Poror' no-a, 'de on yubo-eh :ka or kan-a an-a'a: 'wlii: 'ye :gwie 'i, :yee' on kpon :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Salor'-: 'weh, 'de on 'kla-uh dih, on kpa-uh 'de 'koti-', 'do 'doror'.
'De on kpa-uh 'o 'kwi⧾ :klaba'⧾ ybei', :yee' on 'da, Nyor⧾-kpalu:⧾ :daa, mo-: :Jueh'-nyor:⧾ 'o. Mo-: :ya 'de :zaa'za dha :a 'bli :gwlor-'.
Mo-: :an torne nyor⧾ on 'bli-deh⧾ :en se-a 'o :a :mor 'Wloon-nyor:⧾ :a-a'a: 'tele'-a' :gwie 'i :ne, 'de an 'bhorn :a 'ye-ih' 'worn-dih:, :a 'ye-ih' no.

:Yee' nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a 'o, on 'kpa nyor⧾ :yuh :dao' bo, 'de an po :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Salor'-: dhih 'dlu :ke. 'De 'kwi⧾ :klaba'⧾ :dao', on chena: :Poror' 'i-a' paa-tiei dih, 'de on chehn 'kpanua', 'de on 'nyi nyor⧾ 'tele' on 'ye-uh' bla.
:Yeh on bla-uh-a :blaa:, :yee' on kpa-uh', 'de on po-uh :kasue 'di, 'de on zela: 'yu :or :korn-a 'de :kasue-gbu-a' wlu bo :gwluhuh', or 'ye-uh' 'yli-eh bo 'dhu deh 'jeh, on :ne-' ple.
:Yee' :yeh or 'worn-a tubo-wlu:⧾ :dao', :yee' eh-: no-eh, 'de or po-uh 'de :kasue-gbu-a' :chuu: :on :ne-a 'de 'di ka 'di, 'de or po-uh :gbolo-eh buh⧾-'.

:Yeh eh 'koan'-dih-a 'o glu-a' gwea dih, :yee' :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Salor'-: an wlu 'de Nyorsoa bo, 'de an ble or-a' 'zio :po-duh⧾ 'do or bo. :Yee' nyor⧾ :on :ne on :ne-a 'de :kasue 'di, an to an-a' wlu :dou'⧾ bo.

:Yeh an mu-a 'ye-:, :yee' 'bluhba-a tleh-' 'gabaa. Eh-: no-eh, 'de 'do :dha :kasue-gbu :nyna-a dih, 'de 'do-a tleh. :Yee' 'do :dha :due' :dao', :kasue-gbu-a' :kpaa'⧾-a' klehkpeh kan-dih: worn, 'de 'chen-dubu'⧾ :en :ne-a 'de an-a' klehkpeh buh⧾-', 'de en bhehn-dih:.

:Yeh eh no :ao', :yee' 'yu :or :korn-a 'de :kasue-gbu-a' wlu bo, or 'wluh 'nyinor:, 'de or :sorn-'. :Yeh or 'ye-a :kasue-gbu-a' :kpaa'⧾ :florn-a worn, :yee' or jli 'de or-a'a: :bhla 'jlehn kpla-'-: dih, or 'ye or-a' 'jeh 'dba. :Mor or :taa 'ye :dee', :yee' or 'da :kasue-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh, on ple-'.
Jorwor: :yee' :Poror' 'wor-', or 'da, 'Bor, 'bor, :an-a' :tba-' :an-a' 'jeh deh. :A-a' klehkpeh, :a :ne :daa 'weh.

:Yeh :Poror' 'da :ao', :yee' 'yu :dao', or 'da nyor⧾ on 'ye-or :dhali-pu⧾ :ya. :Yeh on ya-ih-a 'de, :yee' or ple, or :ge-dih: 'de :kasue-gbu 'di 'weh. 'De or 'jli dih 'do :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Salor'-: ybei', or-a' 'tiei-a tleh.
:Yee' or 'si-dih-uh-: 'zorn, 'de or dhele-uh dih, or 'dae:, Nyor⧾ :klaba'⧾-a:. :Kaa 'on 'ye no, 'de 'on 'ye 'puh :eh?
'De on 'da, Po :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu'-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-'. :Yee' :an mu 'puh-:, mor-: 'dekorn: :an-a'a: 'gbu-a' klehkpeh-:.
'De on :za :Gwlor :baa'-a' dhih-' 'de or bo-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a 'de or 'bli 'gbu bo-:.
'Do glu-we-eh: :dao' 'di, or 'duo: :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Salor'-: 'weh, 'de or :dle an-a' sene'eh⧾-a' :momae. 'De or-: 'dekorn: or-a'a: 'cheh-a' klehkpeh-: on po 'ni 'dlu, 'do :dha :due' :dao'.

:Yeh or no :ao', :yee' or kpa-uh 'de or 'bli 'gbu 'di, 'de or 'nyi-uh dii-deh⧾ on 'ye di. :Yee' or-a'a: 'cheh-a' klehkpeh, on 'yi-dih: 'mona-'-: dih. Deh no-eh, an-a' klehkpeh, on po Nyorsoa-a' dhih dhih 'jeh :naa.
:Yee' :yeh zorn zen-a, :yee' 'kwi⧾ :klaba'⧾ :dao', on dbo an-a'a: :poli'si 'weh, 'de :kasue-gbu-a' wlu 'ken :korn-nyor bo, on 'dhu-uh wlu worn, or 'ye :Poror' 'i dih 'tali:.

:Yeh or 'worn-a tubo-wlu:⧾ :daa, :yee' or zela: :Poror'-: :gwluhuh', or 'dae:, :A-a'a: 'kwi⧾ :klaba'⧾ dbo wlu 'noror 'on bo, on 'da, 'on 'tali: a dih, a 'ye mu. A 'kpa 'o, a 'ye mu :naa, 'de :porluh-a' dih 'pehn ka 'di o.

:Yeh or 'da :ao', :yee' :Poror' :wlu-' 'de :poli'si: :on :dbo-eh bo, or 'dae:, 'Kwi⧾ :klaba'⧾ :daa, on :se-' :a-a' zabe zi, 'de on bla :a-uh 'do :gwlor :gwea. Keen' :mloror' :a :mor 'Wloon-nyor⧾-a' nyor⧾ :oo', jorwor: on bla :a 'weh, 'de on po :a :kasue 'di. :Yee' jorwor: an 'bhorn on 'ye :a dih 'tali: :weheh:, :a 'ye mu 'de 'zile: ka 'di :naa :e? 'Kei:. :A :se-' 'worn. 'Nyi an-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh 'yle, on 'ye 'de :a :kasue 'di :za 'do :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh ybei'.
:Yee' :poli'si: :dao', on mu-: de, 'de on po kuna' 'de 'kwi⧾ :klaba'⧾ :dao' bo. :Yee' :yeh on 'worn-ih'-a :ka :Poror' 'i 'dhu-a 'Wloon-nyor⧾-a' nyor⧾-', :yee' :fano: 'kpa 'de on 'di 'weh 'gabaa.
Eh-: no-eh, 'de on mu 'de on bo 'de :kasue 'di, on bale-uh, on za-uh 'de :kasue 'di. 'De an bale-uh on 'ye 'o :gwlor-' 'wluh.

:Yee' :yeh :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Salor'-: on 'wluh-a 'de :kasue 'di, :yee' on mu 'de 'Ledia 'bli 'gbu. 'Do :wor on :ne 'Klae :de-di'-boi' 'gbon-dih:, 'de :Poror' 'i :wlu 'de on bo, 'de deh on :za-a-' 'de on bo, eh po 'de an-a' 'kpih. :Yeh on no :ao', :yee' on mu-'.
:Yee' :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Salor'-: on :yi-dih: :gwlor⧾ an 'da-dih-a :Anfi'poli-: 'dekorn: 'Apolo'nia-: 'de jorwor: on mu 'Tehsolo'nika-gwlor 'di, 'do :dha :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'di :gweh-dih-sla :ne-a.

:Yeh on 'si-a 'o dih, :yee' deh :Poror'-a no-a 'do ti-a' klehkpeh bo, eh-: or no. Or mu 'de 'sla :dao' 'zorn :ke. Or no 'de-a' mu-a' kpor⧾ taan 'do :gwlee-we-eh-a' 'dlu⧾ kpor⧾ taan 'di. 'De or :ne on mor-: an 'chleh 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh 'di dih.

'De or zela: Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh-a' dhih ken dih, 'de or zlo eh-a' :dha eh :za-dih-eh gbor :ka Nyorsoa-a' 'taan'-yu :korn or 'ye-a' 'kle 'ye :gbor :gbor, 'de jorwor: or 'ye-a' 'de nma-dih-deh 'di 'wluh. 'De or zela-uh :gwluhuh', or 'da, :Yusu' :daa, or-: :korn dhih :oo', 'an za-a-' 'de a bo, or-: 'dhu Nyorsoa-a' 'taan'-yu-'.

:Yeh :Poror' :za-a deh :dao', :yee' :Jueh'-nyor:⧾ :noo', mo-: po deh or :za-a-' dhih 'jeh-', 'de on 'kpa-uh bo. 'Ka :wor 'Glii-nyor:⧾ :dhulu' :an za-a Nyorsoa :weheh'-: 'dekorn: 'nynor⧾-kpao'⧾ :klaba'⧾ :noo'-: on no :ke.

:Yeh eh no :ao', :yee' :gwlehehn' 'kpa 'de :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' :yuh :on se-a :Yusu'-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' po 'di 'weh. 'De on mu 'o 'doror', on po nyor⧾ :an na-a 'o yaa'e :on se-a noo-deh :korn, 'de :an no-a deh⧾-zon⧾ :dha :due'. Mo-: :za 'kpunu: 'kpun 'blo 'do :gwlor-'. 'De on :ge-dih: 'de 'Jesorn 'bli 'gbu, on mu :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Salor'-: 'kwla⧾-' dih 'bhorn 'da, on 'ye-uh 'noror :gwlor-nyor⧾ 'nyne-' :ya.

Jorwor: :yeh on se-uh-a 'ye, :yee' on kpon 'Jesorn-: 'dekorn: 'Klae :de-di'-boi' :noo'-: 'weh, 'de on 'kla-uh dih, 'do gwlor-a' 'kwi⧾ :klaba'⧾ ybei'. 'De an po 'geh⧾, an no, Nyor⧾-kpalu:⧾ :daa, :an 'chlin-dih-a 'bluhba⧾-a' klehkpeh 'i, mo-: 'o :on yi :daa :a 'bli 'bluhba ken :naa.
An-a' 'jeh :dao', mo-: 'o 'Jesorn kpon-dih 'de or 'bli 'gbu 'di. 'De an-a' klehkpeh, an vlehn 'Wloon-nyor⧾-a' 'keen-a' 'tele', on 'da, 'Keen :noror', or-: :ne :daa, or-: :korn 'nyne 'dhu :Yusu'-'.
:Yee' :yeh gwlor-a' 'kwi⧾ :klaba'⧾ :dao'-: 'dekorn: :gwlor-nyor:⧾ :dhulu' :on :ne-a 'o-: :yeh on 'worn-a deh :dao', :yee' on 'kpa 'o :dhlumeh' :po 'da 'weh.
:Yee' gwlor-a' 'kwi⧾ :klaba'⧾ :dao', on 'da 'Jesorn 'i :ya 'de :dhama'-wlii. :Yeh on :to-a 'o 'wlii: :dao', :yee' on 'tali-uh-: dih, 'de on mu.

:Yee' :yeh glu gor-a, :yee' 'Klae :de-di'-boi' :on :ne-a 'o, on dbo :Poror'-: 'dekorn: :Salor'-: 'de :gwlor an 'da-dih-a :Behli'a 'di. :Yeh on 'si-a :gwlor-' dih, :yee' on mu 'de :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'di :gweh-dih-sla 'zorn.

Jorwor: nyor⧾ :on :ne-a :Behli'a, an-a' :porluh⧾ :florn ken dih, :eh :zi 'o nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'Tehsolo'nika. 'De Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ :Poror' po-a, on kpon-ih-: dih :glii:, 'de :porluh-a' dih 'pehn ka 'di. 'De mor 'gwie-: :glaa'e-: an 'chleh 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh 'di-: dih, on 'ye-eh' yubo: :eh beh dhih :Poror'-a za-a-', dhih 'jeh :oo'-:.
:Yee' :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' :dha :dhulu', mo-: po :Yusu'-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-'. 'Ka :wor 'Glii-nynor⧾-kpao'⧾ :noo' :on :korn-a 'nyne nyor⧾ yubo:-a-: 'dekorn: 'Glii-nyor⧾-kpalu:⧾ :dhulu'-: on no :ke.

Jorwor: :yeh :Jueh'-nyor:⧾ :on :ne-a 'Tehsolo'nika, on 'worn-ih'-a :ka :Poror'-a po-a Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu⧾ 'de :Behli'a, :yee' on mu 'de 'weh :ke, on 'ye nyor⧾ :dhulu' :dao' :on :ne-a 'de, worn 'dhu-dih:, eh 'ye an-a' :porluh⧾ ya gba, on :ne-' :Poror' :dou'⧾ bo :to.
Jorwor: 'do :dha :due' :dao', :yee' 'Klae :de-di'-boi' :dao', on dbo :Poror' 'de yobo' worn 'i. Jorwor: :Salor'-: 'dekorn: :Timehte'-: on :sie: 'de :Behli'a 'weh.

Nyor⧾-kpalu:⧾ :on kpa-a :Poror' :gwie 'i, on kpa-or :chio'lo:, 'de on :nynia-dih-or 'de 'Atehn, 'de jorwor: an mu de :yi. :Yeh an yi-a de, :yee' or tubo-uh', :Salor'-: 'dekorn: :Timehte'-: on 'ye 'dhobo: on 'ye-or ken dih yi.
:Yee' :yeh :Poror'-a fuo-uh-a 'ken 'do 'Atehn-gwlor 'di, :yee' or-a' :porluh 'kpa-: 'zorn 'gabaa, or 'ye zuu⧾ 'ye en 'ye :ao' :dhie: 'do :gwlor :dao' 'di.

:Yee' eh-: no-eh, 'de or :ne :Jueh'-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: 'Glii-nyor:⧾ :an za-a Nyorsoa :weheh'-: 'de an dhobo 'de :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'di :gweh-dih-sla 'zorn, 'dekorn: 'do 'doror' zorn 'o zorn, nyor⧾ or yeh-dih-a 'o, mo-: :ne or dhobo :ke.

:Yee' 'Ehpikoli'-nyor⧾-a' kpor-: 'dekorn: :Soto'i-nyor⧾-a' kpor-: :an torne-a nyor⧾ deh, mo-: 'kpa 'o or-a' bo dhobo: 'da :ke. An-a' nyor⧾ :noo' dhele-eh-: dih, on 'dae:, Deh 'i-deh: 'yu :daa, :or 'chean'-a :wlu-a' or :za-a-' :eh? Nyor⧾ :noo' 'da, Eh gweh, deh or za-a-', or 'bhorn nyor⧾ 'ye 'o nyorsoa⧾ :nee' klei' zi :deh. Deh :korn-a dhih on :za-a deh :daa-', eh-: 'dhu, :Poror' po tubo-wlu:⧾ :en kor-a :Yusu'-: 'dekorn: or-a' nma-dih-deh 'di 'wluh-dhih 'i-:.

:Yee' on 'da :Poror' 'weh, 'de or :ne on mu 'o 'Alea'pa-nyor⧾-a' 'gbon-dih: 'da, 'do :dha an zi-dih-a zabe. 'Do :wor on dhele-or dih, on 'da, Deh :dele' :daa :an torne-a nyor⧾, deh eh 'dhu-eh:-' :a 'bhorn :a 'ye-eh' yubo:.
Deh no-eh, deh⧾ :an za-a-', :a 'see-ih 'worn :tehn 'i. :Yee' eh-a' dhih, :a 'bhorn deh⧾ en :bleh-dih:-a 'i, :a 'ye-ih yubo:.

Deh :korn-a dhih on :za-a deh :daa-', eh-: 'dhu, 'Atehn-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh-: 'dekorn: 'duhba:⧾ :on 'ti-a 'o-: an 'duo an-a' ti-a' klehkpeh-', an za dhih :dele'-', 'dekorn: dhih :dele'-a' :dou'⧾ bo :to-eh-:.

:Yee' :yeh on :ne :Poror' 'gbon-dih:-a 'do mor, :yee' or :sorn-' 'weh, 'de or :nyna dih 'do on ybei'. 'De or :wlu 'de on bo, or 'dae:, A :mor 'Atehn-nyor⧾-kpalu:⧾. 'On yubo-eh' :ka a chehn-a 'de nyorsoa⧾ 'doror: 'dor :weheh' :za-eh bo 'gabaa.

Deh no-eh, :yeh 'on yi-a dha a 'bli :gwlor-', 'de 'on :na-a dih :naa:, 'de 'on pobo:-a deh⧾ a za-a :weheh' ya, :yee' 'chlee'-deh:⧾ :daa :en no-a, Eh :korn 'de Nyorsoa :a se-a yubo: bo, me-: 'on 'ye 'do a-a'a: nyorsoa⧾-a' 'slaa ken :za-dih-deh⧾-a' deh :due' 'bhun. :Yee' nyorsoa :dao' a se-a yubo:, 'de a za-a :weheh', or-: :korn dhih 'an yi-' :za 'da :naa 'de a bo.

Nyorsoa :or no-a 'bluhba-: 'dekorn: deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :en :ne-a dha 'bluhba ken-: or-: 'dhu :Gwlor :baa' :or :korn-a 'de yai'-: 'dekorn: dha yao 'zorn-: wlu 'ken. 'De mor or-a' 'ti 'sla⧾ :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' son⧾ po-a 'di dih.
'De mor or :se-' deh 'bhorn 'de :gwlor-nyor⧾ 'kwa, :eh 'ye-or' :za-dih:. Deh no-eh, or-: no :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh, 'de or 'nyi-uh :febeh'-: 'dekorn: deh⧾-a' klehkpeh-:.

'Do :gwlor-nyor :due' ken :oo', or tba-dih 'de or no 'dawor'⧾-dlu⧾-a' klehkpeh :en :ne-a dha yao 'zorn, on 'ye 'bluhba⧾-a' klehkpeh yobo' po-a 'de :gle 'gbeheh 'di ken dih 'ti, 'de on 'ye-ih :korn. Or :due' :dao', or-: chehn ti 'dawor'⧾-dlu⧾-a' klehkpeh mu-a dha yao 'zorn-a' :gwle-a' :no, 'de or po 'dhuna⧾ dih :ka on 'ye-a' 'ti-a' no.
Nyorsoa no deh :daa 'weh, 'de :gwlor-nyor⧾ 'ye-or 'kwla⧾-' dih 'bhorn, 'de on 'ye dih boleh: 'bla, on 'ye-or ken :yeh-dih:, on 'ye-or 'ye. Or se :a bo dih :tehn-dih:.
'De mor, 'de or-a' 'kpih 'di, 'do :wor :a :ne-dih: 'kmo-', 'de :a na-dih, :a no :gwlor-nyor⧾. 'Ka-: a-a' deh 'chle-nyor:⧾ :noo' no eh-a' :za-a' :ke, on 'da, :A :mor or-a' 'nynuu: 'o.

:Yee' eh-a' dhih, :ka :a 'dhu-a or-a' 'nynuu-', :yee' :a-a' :na-dih-eh:-' :gwluhuh' dih, :eh :mor Nyorsoa gweh zuu:⧾ :gwlor-nyor⧾ no-a 'sleh, on ma-a, en-' deh, :en no-a 'goo: :kpuan'⧾-: 'sebla: :kpuan'⧾-: 'dekorn: sobu'⧾-:.

:Tehn 'i :dee', ti :gwlor-nyor⧾ se-a deh 'i yubo:, 'de an no-a deh⧾ :dao', :yee' Nyorsoa :se-eh' deh 'da-dih:. Jorwor: :kana :naa, or zela: nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a deh⧾-a' klehkpeh-: dih :gwluhuh', on 'ye an-a' deh⧾-zon⧾ dih 'tali:, 'de on 'ye 'de or bo 'bili:.

Deh no-eh, or :dhe-dih: 'we-eh 'for 'i, or mu-a nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a dha yao 'zorn, an-a' zabe :zi-dih:, 'de 'yi 'sleh ka 'di. Nyor-kpalu: :or mu-a zabe: :dao' :zi, or tba-or :jii-eh 'weh. 'De or za-eh gbor 'de :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh bo, 'do nyor-kpalu-a' 'jeh :dao', or-a' nma-dih-deh 'di :za-eh bo.

:Yee' :yeh on 'worn-a deh :Poror' :za-a-' :eh 'dhu-a 'meh 'wluh 'de-deh-', :yee' an-a' nyor⧾ :noo'-a wla-dih-or'. 'De :noo' 'da, :A 'bhorn :on 'ye deh :on :za-a-', de :za :neheh' 'do ti :nee' 'di, :a 'ye-eh 'worn.
:Yeh on no :ao', :yee' :Poror' 'wluh 'de on 'nyne-' 'weh, 'de or mu.

Nyor⧾ :noo' 'kpa-or bo, mo-: po :Yusu'-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-'. Nyor⧾ :dao' :on po-a :Yusu'-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-', 'de on 'nyne-', 'do :wor 'yu :due' an 'da-dih-a 'Dayorne'sia :or no-a 'Alea'pa-nyor:⧾ :dao', an-a' nyor :due', 'do :wor or :ne, 'dekorn: 'nynor :due' an 'da-dih-a :Dama'na, :korn mor nyor⧾-a' kpor :noo'-:.
:Yeh eh no :ao', :yee' :Poror' 'wluh 'o 'Atehn 'weh, 'de or mu 'o :gwlor an 'da-dih-a 'Korli 'di.

'Do :wor or :yeh-dih: :Jueh'-yu :due' an 'da-dih-a :Akwi'la, :or 'wluh-dih:-a 'Pantor-bluhba ken. Or-: 'dekorn: or-a'a: 'nynor :Plosi'la-: on 'wluh-a 'Etole-bluhba ken, eh 'see 'o gwle. Deh no-eh, 'de on 'wluh-a 'o, eh-: 'dhu, 'Wloon-nyor⧾-a' 'keen Klordior' 'da or :se-' :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'ye-a' 'bhorn 'de 'Wloon-gwlor-'. :Yeh on yi-a 'de, :yee' :Poror' mu-uh 'ye 'da.
'De or :dhe 'o on bo dih, or 'kpa-uh bo, an dba 'taa: 'por⧾ nyor⧾-a po-dih-a :gbalie⧾. Deh no-eh, or no 'taa: 'por⧾ :dba-nyor: :ke.

'Do Nyorsoa-a' :gwlee-we-a' klehkpeh bo, :mor on 'gbon-dih: 'de :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'di :gweh-dih-sla 'zorn, :yee' :Poror' :ne :Jueh'-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: 'Glii-nyor⧾-: an dhobo-'. Or vorn-', or 'ye-eh' no, on 'ye dhih or za-a-', dhih 'jeh-' po.

:Yeh :Salor'-: 'dekorn: :Timehte'-: on 'wluh-a 'Masordo'nia, 'de on 'si-a dih, :yee' :Poror' 'duo: or-a' ti-a' klehkpeh-', 'de or po Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu⧾ 'de :Jueh'-nyor⧾ bo, :ka :Yusu' 'dhu-a Nyorsoa-a' 'taan'-yu-'.

Jorwor: dhih :Poror' :za-a-', on :se-ih' 'worn-dih:, 'de an 'jle-dih-or. :Yeh on no :ao', :yee' or 'gbabo: or-a'a: 'tiei: or pa-a-'-: dih, eh 'ye-uh 'i :to-dih: :ka Nyorsoa :za-a an-a' deh son 'di. 'De or :wlu 'de on bo, or 'dae:, :Mor a 'ma, :yee' nyor-a' :kpa-ih' nyor 'i. A kpa-ih a-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh 'i. 'On :se-' ka 'da o. :Eh 'wluh-a dha ti :daa 'i, nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor:⧾, mo-: :korn 'de bo, 'an mu :mu.

:Yee' :yeh :Poror' 'wluh-a 'o on bo, :yee' or mu 'de nyor-kpalu :due' an 'da-dih-a 'Tisior: 'Jehtor 'bli 'gbu 'di, :or za-a Nyorsoa :weheh'. Or-a'a: 'gbu :ne 'o :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' 'di :gweh-dih-sla: :dao' 'bhun.

:Yee' 'yu :due' an 'da-dih-a 'Klepor, :or :korn-a 'de 'di :gweh-dih-sla: :dao' wlu bo, or-: 'dekorn: or-a'a: 'gbu-a' klehkpeh-: on po :Gwlor :baa'-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-'. 'De nyor⧾ :dhulu' :noo' :on :ne-a 'Korli-gwlor-', :on 'worn-a Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ :Poror' po-a, :yee' on po-ih' dhih 'jeh :ke, 'de on :po 'ni 'dlu.
Glu-we-eh :due', :yee' :Poror'-a' 'yli-eh 'kpa deh 'i, 'de :Gwlor :baa' :wlu 'de or bo, or 'dae:, :An-a' :ple-' :fano. :Ka :an no-a :wlu-a' :chio'lo:, 'ka :wor :on 'ye no. :An-a' :sea:-'.
'On :ne 'o :on bo 'weh :chio'lo:. Eh se nyor :korn :or 'ye-a 'de :on ya 'kpa, :or 'ye-a :on deh tba dha :gwlor :daa 'di. Deh no-eh, 'on 'ble nyor⧾ :dhulu' dha mor.
:Yeh eh no :ao', :yee' :Poror' :ne 'o :gwlor :dao' 'di 'weh 'do zon :due' :gbor :tile 'di. Or torne nyor⧾ Nyorsoa-a' wlu.
:Yee' ti 'yu :due' an 'da-dih-a 'Galior, or no-a 'Wloon-nyor⧾-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-nyor 'do :Ehki'a, 'do :wor :Jueh'-nyor⧾ 'kpa-dih: :dha :due', 'de on kpon :Poror', on kpa-or 'de 'koti-'.
'De on 'da, 'Yu :daa, or-: 'bili: :a-a' nyor⧾-a' 'dlu⧾ dih, 'de on 'ye Nyorsoa :weheh' :za-eh: :eh se-a 'o :a-a'a: 'tele'-a' :gwie 'i :ne no.

:Yeh :Poror'-a yi-a :wlu 'da, :yee' 'Galior :wlu-' 'de :Jueh'-nyor⧾ bo, or 'dae:, :Mor zabe: :daa :en :korn-a :jii-eh: a :ya-a: 'de, en 'dhu deh 'kor-dih-zabe-', 'de mor, :mor en 'dhu 'kulu-deh: :no-zabe-', :yee' 'an mu :porluh dih :kpon, 'de 'on 'ye a :dou'⧾ bo :to.
