'Mor 'ye :Plosi'la-: 'dekorn: or-a'a: yibeor: :Akwi'la-: :on no-a 'on 'bei' :koan: :no-nyor⧾ 'do :Yusu' 'Klae-a' dhih bo.
On :na 'de 'meh-a' 'worn dih, 'an dhih. Eh :se 'on :due' :se-uh' 'zio po, jorwor: nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾, an-a' 'chore-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh, an po-uh 'zio 'weh :ke.
'Mor 'ye 'chore :eh 'gbon-dih-a 'de on 'bli 'gbu. 'Mor 'ye 'an :dhih :kma-nyor: 'Ehpehni'tor, :or no-a :zai'-nyor :or 'bili-a-' dih 'de 'Klae bo, 'do 'Esea-bluhba ken.
'Mor 'ye :Mehle' :or no-a 'yi :kma :koan 'gabaa, 'do a bo.

'Mor 'ye 'Andlorni'kor-: 'dekorn: :Junia'-: :on no-a 'on 'bei' :Jueh'-nyor⧾, :on :ne 'on :po-dih-eh :kasue 'di :dha :due'. On no 'nyne :korn-nyor:⧾, 'de :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾ 'klu-', 'de on yubo-or :zai', 'do 'on ken.
'Mor 'ye 'Aplia'ta, :or no-a 'an :ybeh-dih-nyor 'de :Gwlor :baa'-a' deh 'di.
'Mor 'ye :Orba'nor :or no-a :a 'be :koan: :no-nyor 'do 'Klae-a' dhih bo, 'dekorn: 'an :dhih :kma-nyor: :Sita'kor:.
'Mor 'ye :Apeh'lor, :or :korn-a 'Klae-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh :to-dih-eh nyor⧾ 'i deh 'jeh. 'Mor 'ye nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'de 'Alitor'bior 'bli 'gbu.
'Mor 'ye :Hehlo'nior, :or no-a 'on 'be :Jueh'-yu. 'Mor 'ye :yuh :on :ne-a 'de :Nase'sa 'bli 'gbu, :on yubo:-a :Gwlor :baa'.

'Mor 'ye :Tlifi'na-: 'dekorn: :Tlofo'sa-: 'nynor⧾-kpao'⧾ :dao', :on no-a 'yi :kma :koan 'gabaa, 'do :Gwlor :baa'-a' dhih bo. 'Mor 'ye 'an :dhih :kma-nyor: 'Pehsor, :or no-a 'nynor :noror' :ke :or no-a 'yi :kma :koan 'gabaa 'do :Gwlor :baa'-a' dhih bo.
'Mor 'ye 'Wlufor, :or no-a nyor 'de :Gwlor :baa'-a' deh 'di, 'dekorn: or 'de :or pobo-a 'o 'on bo dih, :eh gweh-a 'on-de :ke.
'Mor 'ye :Asin'klitor-: 'Flehgorn-: 'Hormi-: :Patloba'-: 'Horma-: 'dekorn: 'Klae :de-di'-boi' :noo' :on :ne-a 'de on bo :ke.
'Mor 'ye 'Filolo'gor-: :Julia'-: :Nilior'-: 'dekorn: or-a'a: 'de-di'-nynor-kpao'-: 'dekorn: :Olinpa'-: 'dekorn: Nyorsoa-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on :ne-a 'de on bo-:.
A 'kpa 'de a 'bei' :bhluun'⧾-' :due' :due', a 'ye-uh' :gble-dih: 'de :porluh⧾-a' :vlehehn'-' :gweh ka 'di. 'Klae-a' 'chore-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh 'da, mo-: 'ye a-uh.

:Yee' 'an 'Klae :de-di'-boi'-a:, 'an bale a 'weh, a 'dhu a-a' 'jeh :dhororn', 'do :yuh :an ya-a 'de nyor⧾-' :gble-eh, :an vorn-a deh⧾ 'on :torne: a-uh bo, 'de :an no-eh, 'de nyor⧾-a 'tali:-a 'Klae-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh dih. A :tehn-dih: nyor⧾ :dao' bo dih.

Deh no-eh, nyor⧾ :on :ne :ao', eh :se :a-a' :Gwlor :baa' 'Klae-a' 'bhoi-yu-deh:, on :se-' no. Jorwor: an-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh-a' 'bhororn'-deh:⧾ 'o an no. Worn :nmor-wlu⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ 'sleh dih :po-dih-eh-: me-: an no, 'de an bo-dih nyor⧾ dih :on :korn-a :porluh:⧾ :se-a dih ku.

Nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh yubo-eh', :ka a dhe-a 'o Nyorsoa-a' wlu dih. Eh-: no-eh, 'de 'on 'yi-dih: 'mona-' dih, 'do a-a' dhih bo. Jorwor: 'an 'bhorn a 'ye :toror' :korn-nyor⧾ no, 'do deh 'jeh neh bo. 'De 'on :se-' 'bhorn deh⧾-zon⧾ 'ye a dih :bo-dih:, 'de a 'ye-ih' no.
Nyorsoa :or 'nyi-a :a wlu-' dih 'worn-eh, or :se 'o :gwle i, or 'ye-eh' no, a 'ye 'ku dih :wa-dih: 'de a-a' :buhbuh⧾ 'zorn. 'Nyi :a-a' :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu'-a' mla :ne 'o a bo.
:Timehte' :or no-a 'on 'be :koan: :no-nyor, or 'da, or-: 'ye a-uh, 'dekorn: 'Lusior-: 'Jesorn-: :korn :Sosepa'tor-: :on no-a 'on 'bei' :Jueh'-nyor⧾.
'Torsior: :or 'chle-a 'chlee-deh: :daa 'do 'on bo, or 'da, or-: 'ye a-uh, 'de :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'nyne 'di.

'Geyeh: :or :korn-a 'bli 'gbu 'di, 'on :dhe-a dih, 'de 'chore-a' klehkpeh 'gbon-dih-a 'de, or 'da, or-: 'ye a-uh. :Ila'tor: :or no-a 'kwi :gwlor :daa, or-a' 'wlii-a' dih :dhe-nyor, 'dekorn: :a-a' 'Klae :de-di'-nyor-kpalu: 'Kwator-: on 'da, mo-: 'ye a-uh :ke o. [
'Nyi :a-a' :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu' 'Klae-a' mla :ne 'o a-a' klehkpeh bo o. 'Ka-: eh 'ye :ne.]

A 'nyi :a 'nyi Nyorsoa dhih-a' 'i 'beh-a', :or 'beh-dih-eh :or 'ye-eh' no, 'de a 'ye-a' dih :nyna deh 'jeh, 'do tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh 'on po-a bo, :en kor-a :Yusu' 'Klae 'i. Tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh :daa, me-: no 'slan :or 'zile:-a :dee' see, 'de :or :to-dih-eh: :a 'i :naa.

:Kana :naa eh :to-dih-eh: :a 'i, 'de Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor⧾-a' 'chlee-deh⧾ 'di. 'De mor 'kmo :sie: Nyorsoa 'nyi 'tele', 'de 'dawor'⧾-dlu⧾-a' klehkpeh 'ye-eh' yubo:, 'de on 'ye or-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' po, 'de on 'ye 'o or-a' 'tele' dih dhe.
A 'nyi :a 'nyi :a-a' :toror' :korn-Nyorsoa :due' :daa, dhih-a' 'i 'beh-a', :eh :yi-dih:-a :Yusu' 'Klae-', :ka ti-a mu-a 'dlu-' :tehn. 'Ka-: eh 'ye :ne.
'Mor :Poror' :or Nyorsoa 'da-a, :or 'ye-a :Yusu' 'Klae-a'a: dboo-nyor no, 'de or-a' 'ton :korn ka 'di. 'Mor-: 'dekorn: :a-a' 'Klae :de-di' an 'da-dih-a 'Sortehneh-: :a :mor 'ye a-uh,

a :mor :or 'dhu-a Nyorsoa-a' 'chore :eh :ne-a 'Korli-gwlor-', :yuh Nyorsoa 'da-a, :on 'ye-a or-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh-a' nyor⧾ no, :eh :yi-dih:-a :Yusu' 'Klae-', 'dekorn: nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on yobo' po-a 'de :gle 'gbeheh 'di, :on :ne :a mor-: :a za-a :a-a' :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu' 'Klae-a' :weheh', 'de :ka :ne-a :due' 'di.
Mla-: 'dekorn: wlu-' dih 'worn-eh-: 'do a bo, :en 'wluh-a 'de Nyorsoa :or no-a :a :Baa'-: 'dekorn: :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu' 'Klae-: bo.
'Do ti-a' klehkpeh bo, 'ka-: 'an po 'an Nyorsoa-a' 'zio, 'do a-a' dhih bo, 'do mla or po a bo, :or :yi-dih:-a :Yusu' 'Klae-' or-a' dhih.
Deh no-eh, 'do a-a' :Yusu'-a' klei' :zi-eh bo, a :korn mla 'de deh⧾-a' klehkpeh 'di, :en no-a :ka a no-a :wlu-a'-: 'dekorn: a-a' deh-' dih 'worn-eh-:.
Tubo-wlu:⧾ :a po-a 'de a bo, :en kor-a 'Klae 'i, me-: a kpon dih :glii:.
:Yee' eh-a' dhih, a se Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu-a' :bhorlie'-a' deh-beh-deh-beh bo dih :tehn-dih:, :ka a fuo-a ti Nyorsoa-a mu-a :a-a' :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu' 'Klae :a 'i :to-dih:,
:or mu-a a-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh dih :ku-dih: :chio'lo: :eh mu-a ti-a' 'dlu-' :jla 'da. 'De Nyorsoa :ne-' a dhih 'bhun 'ye-dih:, 'do 'we-eh: :a-a' :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu'-a mu-a 'de :ya 'di.
Nyorsoa :or 'da-a a-uh, 'de a :ne or-a' 'Yu :Yusu' 'Klae :or no-a :a-a' :Gwlor :baa', a 'ye-a' :dha :due' :na-dih:, or no :dhehehn-nyor:.

:Yee' 'an 'Klae :de-di'-boi'-a:, 'an bale a-uh 'weh, 'de :a-a' :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu' 'Klae-a' 'nyne 'di, 'de a-a' klehkpeh, a 'ye deh :due' ken dih 'worn-dih:, 'de deh-' :gble-eh :ne 'de a 'nyne-' 'kpa. A kpon-dih: ken dih deh 'jeh, 'de deh a polo:-a 'do a :gwlii', a 'ye-eh' no.
:Yee' a :mor no-a 'an 'Klae :de-di'-boi', nyor⧾ :noo' :on 'wluh-a 'de 'Kloa 'bli 'gbu, mo-: po 'on kuna', on 'dae:, A jeh-' 'de a-a' 'jeh 'nyne-'.
Deh 'an za-a-', eh-: 'dhu, A-a' nyor⧾ :noo' 'da, an zi 'o :Poror' klei'. 'De :noo' 'da, an zi 'o :Apor'lor klei'. 'De :noo' 'da, an zi 'o :Piteh' klei'. 'De :noo' 'da :neheh', an zi 'o 'Klae klei'.
'Klae-a' 'jeh :daa, or :gble-eh:-' 'weh ke :e? 'Mor :or 'dhu-a :Poror'-', 'mor-: 'o, :or :kor-dih-eh: 'o tu 'i 'do a-a' dhih bo :e? :Ae' 'de 'an 'nyne 'di :oo', a :po-dih-eh: 'ni 'dlu ke?
'On po Nyorsoa-a' 'zio, :ka 'on 'see-a a-a' nyor-beh 'ni 'dlu po, 'on :za 'o 'Klepor-: 'dekorn: 'Geyeh-: 'on po-a 'ni 'dlu, an-a' dheh.
'De a-a' nyor-beh :sor no-a, 'de 'an 'nyne 'di :oo' or :po-dih-eh: 'ni 'dlu.

A 'bor, eh 'kpa 'on :gwlii' 'weh :naa, 'on po :Tehfa'nor-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'de or 'bli 'gbu-: 'ni 'dlu 'weh :ke. Jorwor: :mor 'on po nyor :noror' 'ni 'dlu 'do 'for 'i, :yee' 'on se 'beh-dih: 'on 'ye-eh' :gwluhuh' bo :po-dih: :naa.

'Klae :se-' 'on dbo, 'on 'ye nyor⧾ 'ni 'dlu po. Jorwor: or dbo 'on 'weh, 'on 'ye Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh po. Or :se-' 'on dbo, 'on 'ye 'an 'jeh 'yor-eh-a' :toror' no, 'on 'ye tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh :daa po. :Mor 'on no-eh, :yee' 'Klae-a' 'klorse tu 'i 'meh-dih-eh no deh :forbuh:, 'do nyor⧾ :an mu-a 'on :dou'⧾ bo :to bo.

:Yee' nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'o gbe :zi-eh-a' :gwie 'i, :mor on 'worn 'Klae-a' tu 'i 'meh-dih-tubo-wlu⧾, :yee' en se deh-' 'dhu-eh:, en no :bobo-deh:⧾ 'do on bo. Jorwor: :a :mor :yor 'puh-a, tubo-wlu:⧾ :daa, en :to-dih: :a 'i, :ka Nyorsoa 'ble-a 'kpih.

:Ka eh no-a 'chle-eh 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh 'di, or no-a, 'An mu nyor⧾ :on dhe-a an-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh-a' :toror' :korn-eh :gwlii', an-a' :toror' ya :gba, 'de or 'ye 'o on :gwlii' dih 'ma-dih:. 'De 'an mu-eh :no, 'de 'chlee-deh yubo-nyor⧾-a' deh-' dih 'worn-eh 'ye :ao', eh se deh-' 'dhu-eh:.

Dha :toror' :korn-nyor⧾ :ne :naa :eh? Dha 'chlee-deh yubo-nyor⧾ :ne :naa :eh? Dha nyor⧾ :an dhobo-a nyor⧾ bo dha 'bluhba ken, on :ne :naa :eh? Eh :se Nyorsoa, or-: se-eh :a 'i :to-dih: :ka :toror' :korn-eh: :eh :ne-a dha 'bluhba ken, 'de eh 'dhu-a :bobo-deh⧾-' :e?

'De Nyorsoa-a' :toror' :korn-eh 'di, or no-eh', 'de nyor⧾ :on :ne-a dha yao 'zorn, on se 'beh-dih: on 'ye-or 'i yubo: 'de an-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh-a' :toror' :korn-eh 'di. Jorwor: Nyorsoa-a' :porluh 'pehn-: dih 'do tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh :a po-a 'de nyor⧾ bo, :yih nyor⧾ :noo' :an zi-a 'o 'kmo bo-noo-deh⧾ klei', an 'da-dih-a :bobo-deh⧾, 'de or 'ye-eh' no, 'de nyor⧾ :on po-ih-a dhih 'jeh-', on 'ye 'puh.
:Jueh'-nyor⧾ 'da, an 'bhorn nyor⧾ 'i :to-dih-deh:⧾. 'De nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor:⧾, on 'da, an 'bhorn :toror' 'de deh :daa 'di.
Jorwor: :a :mor :mloror', :a za-a-' 'Klae-a' tu 'i 'meh-dih-dhih: :en no-a :zolo' :or 'gbele-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾, 'de :en no-a :bobo-dhih 'de nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾ 'yli 'de.
Jorwor: nyor⧾ Nyorsoa 'da-a, :on 'ye-a or-a' nyor⧾ no, :Jueh'-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾-: on po-eh-' dhih 'jeh :ka 'Klae 'dhu-a Nyorsoa-a' 'kpih-: 'dekorn: or-a' :toror'-:-'.

Deh no-eh, :mor Nyorsoa gweh :bobo-nyor 'de :gwlor-nyor⧾ 'yli 'de, :yee' or-a' :bobo-a' :dao', or :ne :toror' 'di, or :zi 'o :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' :noror'-' 'weh. 'De mor, :mor Nyorsoa gweh 'kpih-a' :chehehn-nyor 'de :gwlor-nyor⧾ 'yli 'de, :yee' or-a' 'kpih-a' :chehn-a' :dao', or :zi 'o :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' 'kpih-' :ne-eh 'weh.

:Yee' 'an 'Klae :de-di'-boi'-a:, a :gbee'e:. A :na-dih: a-a' :tehn 'i-deh :gwluhuh' dih, ti Nyorsoa 'ye a 'da, a 'ye-a or-a' nyor⧾ no. 'Do ti :dao' 'i, :yee' 'kmo bo nyor⧾-a 'da-dih a-a' :dha :dhulu' se :gwluhuh' dih :florn-nyor:⧾ :dee'. 'De mor a-a' :dha :dhulu' se 'kpih 'ble-nyor:⧾. 'De mor a-a' :dha :dhulu' :se 'nyne :korn-nyor:⧾ :ke.

Jorwor: Nyorsoa 'duo: nyor⧾ 'kmo-a 'da-dih-a :bobo-nyor⧾-' 'weh, eh 'ye :gwluhuh' dih :florn-nyor⧾ dhen-' dih po. 'De mor Nyorsoa 'duo: nyor⧾ 'kmo-a 'da-dih-a 'kpih-a' :chehehn-nyor⧾-' 'weh, eh 'ye :kmuu-nyor⧾ dhen-' dih po.

Nyorsoa 'duo: nyor⧾ 'kmo-a 'da-dih-a se deh ken 'kpa-nyor⧾-: nyor⧾ :yuh nyor⧾-a vlehn-a-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ :yuh 'kmo no-a, :on se deh-' 'dhu-eh-: or 'duo-uh' 'weh, eh 'ye-eh' no, 'de or 'ye nyor⧾ 'kmo-a 'da-dih-a deh ken 'kpa-nyor⧾, on 'ye :ao', on se deh-' 'dhu-eh:.
:Yee' eh-: mu-eh :no, 'de nyor-beh-nyor-beh :se-' or-a' 'jeh 'i 'beh-dih: i 'do Nyorsoa ybei'.

Nyorsoa :oo', or-: po a mor-: 'dekorn: :Yusu' 'Klae-: :dha :due'. :Yusu' or-: Nyorsoa :yi-dih:-', 'de or :no-dih: :a :toror' :korn-nyor⧾-: 'yi 'sleh-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: :vlehehn'-' :gweh-nyor⧾-:. 'De or zelie: :a-uh.
:Yee' eh-a' dhih, :ka eh no-a 'chle-eh 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh 'di, eh no-a, Nyor :or mu-a or-a' 'jeh 'i 'beh-dih:, 'nyi or 'beh-dih: or-a' 'jeh 'i, 'do deh :Gwlor :baa' no-a, eh-a' dhih bo.
:Yee' 'an 'Klae :de-di'-boi'-a:, ti 'on yi-a 'de a bo, 'de 'on 'ye-a' Nyorsoa-a' 'slan-a' dhih-' :za, 'on :se-' worn dih :nmor :manua bla, 'de mor eh :se 'an deh 'i yubo-eh: :ke, 'on :se 'de :ya.

Ti 'on :ne-a 'de a bo, deh :due' 'on :na-dih:-a :gwluhuh' dih, 'on 'ye-a' no, eh-: 'dhu, 'on 'ye deh⧾-a' klehkpeh 'for 'i :po-dih:, 'de 'on 'ye :Yusu' 'Klae-a' tu 'i 'meh-dih-dhih-a' tubo-wlu⧾ :due' ken 'neh.
Ti 'on yi-a 'de a bo, :yee' 'an 'kpih-a: chehn, 'de 'an 'tiei-a tleh, 'de :fano: :ple-eh 'di.

'An nyor⧾ deh :torne-eh-: 'dekorn: 'an Nyorsoa tubo-wlu:⧾ :po-eh 'di-: 'on :se 'de wlu⧾ :klaba'⧾-: 'dekorn: worn :nmor-wlu⧾-: 'di dih :wlu-dih:. Jorwor: Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu-a' 'kpih, me-: za-eh gbor :ka dhih 'an za-a-', 'de en no-a dhih-a' 'yor-eh,
'de a-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh :ne-' :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' :toror' :gwluhuh' :kpa-dih:. Jorwor: Nyorsoa-a' 'kpih, me-: no-eh, 'de a po-eh dhih 'jeh-'.

Jorwor: tubo-wlu:⧾ :en :ne-a :toror' 'di, me-: :a po 'de nyor⧾ :on ku-a dih, 'de Nyorsoa-deh 'di bo. Jorwor: :toror' :daa, eh :se 'kmo-a' :toror', 'de mor eh :se :yor :or 'kmo-a nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-nyor⧾ 'ble-a, 'de :or yi-a 'worn :gweh 'da :naa.

:Toror' :or :korn-a dhih 'an za-a-', or no Nyorsoa-a' 'slan :or 'zile-eh :gwlor-nyor⧾ dih. Jorwor: :toror'-a' 'jeh :dao', or :dhe-dih-or 'for 'i :dee' see, 'do :a-a' dhih-a' 'i 'beh-a' bo, 'de jorwor: 'bluhba-a mu :no-eh.

Eh se nyor :korn :or 'ye-a 'kmo-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-nyor⧾ no, :or 'ye-a :toror' :daa dih 'worn. Deh no-eh, :mor eh 'dhu, on 'worn-eh dih :dee', :yee' on :se-' :Gwlor :baa' :or :korn-a dhih 'beh-a' 'i 'do tu 'i :kor-dih: i :dee'.

:Ka Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh no-a eh-a' :za-a', eh no-a, Deh Nyorsoa-a dhe-a dih, 'do nyor⧾ :on ybeh-or' bo, 'yli-eh 'see-eh 'ye, 'de :dou'⧾ 'see-eh 'worn, 'de nyor-beh 'see-eh :gwluhuh' dih na-dih :eh :mor eh mu :no-eh:.
Jorwor: Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu za-eh-: gbor 'de :a bo. :Zulu-a' 'jeh :dao', mo-: 'worn deh⧾-a' klehkpeh-' dih, 'de mor :korn :yih :en 'zile-eh 'de Nyorsoa bo.

Nyor :yoror :or 'beh-dih: :or 'ye dhih :en :ne-a 'de nyor 'di yubo: :eh? Eh :se or-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh-a' :porluh:, mo-: se :mleheh' no-a' 'beh-dih: :e? 'De :ka :ne-a :due' 'di, nyor se dhih :en :ne-a 'de Nyorsoa 'di yubo:. Or-a' :Zulu :due', mo-: yubo-ih.

:Zulu: :on :ne-a, :a :mor 'Klae-a' nyor⧾-', on :se 'kmo-a' :no. Jorwor: :Zulu: :on :ne-a :a-uh, on 'wluh 'de Nyorsoa bo. :Zulu-a' 'jeh :dao', mo-: no-eh, 'de :a 'worn deh⧾-a' klehkpeh Nyorsoa 'nyi :a-uh yaa'e dih.

:Yee' eh-a' dhih, eh-: :korn dhih, 'de deh⧾ :a za-a-' 'de a bo, en se :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' :toror' :or no-a 'cheaan'-deh dha 'bluhba ken. Jorwor: deh⧾ :a zela-a a :gwluhuh', Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu:, mo-: :an torne :a-uh. :A zela or-a' :Zulu-a' 'yi 'sleh-deh⧾-a' dhih ken dih, 'de :yuh or-a' :Zulu: :dao', on :ne-a-' bo.

Nyor :or Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu se-a-' :ne, or se 'beh-dih: or 'ye deh :eh 'wluh-a 'de Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu bo dhih 'jeh-' po. Deh no-eh, eh no :bobo-deh: 'do or bo. 'De mor or se 'beh-dih: or 'ye-eh'-' dih 'worn. Deh no-eh, nyor Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu :ne-a-', or-: 'worn-ih' dih.

Nyor :or Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu :ne-a-', or 'beh-dih: or 'ye deh⧾-a' klehkpeh bo dih zela:, :en no-a deh⧾ 'jeh-: deh⧾-zon⧾-:. Jorwor: :yor :Zulu se-a-' :ne, or se 'beh-dih: or 'ye :yor on :ne-a-', or-a' zabe zi.

:Ka Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh no-a eh-a' :za-a', eh no-a, :Or yubo: deh :Gwlor :baa'-a na-dih-a :gwluhuh' dih :eh? :Or 'beh-dih: or 'ye-or' 'slen 'dhu :eh? Jorwor: :a :mor :mloror', :ka 'Klae-a no-a deh :gwluhuh' dih :na-dih-eh, 'ka-: :a no eh-a' :gwluhuh' dih :na-dih-eh :ke.

:Yee' 'an 'Klae :de-di'-boi'-a:, 'on se 'beh-dih: 'on 'ye 'de a bo :wlu, :ka 'on no-a 'de nyor⧾ :on Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu :ne-a-' bo :wlu-eh. Jorwor: 'on :korn 'on 'ye 'de a bo :wlu :eh gweh-a :ka nyor⧾ wlu-a 'de nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'de 'kmo bo 'gboror:, 'de :on gweh-a 'nynuu: :bleheh'eh⧾ 'de 'Klae-a' deh 'di.
Eh-: :korn dhih, deh⧾ 'on :torne: a-uh, eh gweh :ka 'nynor :or 'nyi-a or-a' 'yu nyene-ni. 'On :se-' a dii-deh:⧾ :en :kmu-a 'nyi. 'De mor :kana :naa, a 'see 'o en-' ti ken nyni 'gboror:.

Deh no-eh, :ka nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'de 'kmo bo, on no-a 'kmo :ne-eh, 'ka-: a :ne 'gboror:. :Yeh :gwlehehn'-: 'dekorn: jeh-a'-: en :ne-a 'de a 'klu-', :yee' eh po kuna' 'weh, :ka a :ne-a 'de 'kmo bo 'gboror:. 'De mor deh⧾ 'kmo bo-nyor⧾-a no-a, me-: a no :ke.
:Mor a-a' nyor⧾ :noo' 'da, an zi 'o :Poror' klei', 'de :noo' 'ye :ao', an zi 'o :Apor'lor klei', :yee' eh :se deh⧾ 'kmo bo-nyor⧾-a no-a, a se no :e?

Eh-a' 'jeh :daa, :or 'dhu :Apor'lor :eh? 'De mor :or 'dhu :Poror' :eh? :A :mor Nyorsoa-a' 'bhoi-nynuu: 'o 'klein', :a :mor 'o, :or no-eh 'de a po-eh dhih 'jeh-'. :A-a' klehkpeh, :koan: :a-a' :Gwlor :baa' 'nyi :a-uh, :a 'ye-a' no :due' :due', or-: 'o :a no.
'Mor :or 'dhu-a :Poror'-', 'mor-: 'dhu 'dhuu'-deh⧾-a' 'yor. 'De :Apor'lor po-ih 'ni ken. Jorwor: Nyorsoa, or-: no-eh, 'de en ku.
:Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, nyor :yor :or 'dhu-a deh⧾-a' 'yor-: 'dekorn: nyor :yor :or po-ih-a 'ni ken-: on se deh ken 'kpa klehkpeh. Nyorsoa :or no-eh 'de en 'ye-a ku, or-: 'o :or 'kpa deh ken.
Nyor :yor :or 'dhu-a deh-: 'dekorn: :yor :or po-ih-a 'ni ken-: :koan: :ne-a :due' :oo' an no. Jorwor: :ka an no-a :koan-a' no-a', 'ka :wor Nyorsoa-a mu an-a'a: geli' :za-eh :no :due' :due'.
'Mor-: 'dekorn: :Apor'lor-: :a no :koan: :ne-a :due' 'do Nyorsoa bo, 'de or 'bli 'gle. 'De mor a :mor 'dhu or-a'a: gle. 'De a no or-a'a: 'gbu :ke.

:Yee' mla Nyorsoa po-a 'on bo, or-: no-eh, 'de 'on po 'gbu glu :eh gweh-a 'sleh :korn-nyor 'i. 'De nyor :noror'-a kpa 'gbu :dao', an-a' po-a' 'dlu bo. Jorwor: 'nyi nyor :or kpa-a 'gbu :dao' an-a' po-a' 'dlu bo, or 'wla :gwluhuh' dih 'do an-a' po-a' bo.
Deh no-eh, :Yusu' 'Klae, or-: 'dhu 'gbu :dao', an-a' glu 'dhu 'da. 'De mor 'gbu-a' 'jeh :dao', an-a' glu 'dhu 'da :noror' se 'o 'for 'i :ne.
:Mor nyor-beh kpa 'gbu :on 'dhu-eh glu, an-a' po-a' 'dlu bo, 'de or 'ye 'goo-: 'sebla-: sobu'⧾ :en 'kpa-a deh ken-: tu⧾-: :peli'-: 'dekorn: :koo: :kpalu⧾-: no, 'de or 'ye-uh' po,

:yee' :koan: or no-a, Nyorsoa-a mu-or nyor⧾ 'i :to-dih: :ka or :ne-a. Deh no-eh, 'we-eh: :Yusu'-a mu-a 'de :ya, or mu :koan: :dao' 'do zorn-pli-' :ya. 'Do 'we-eh: :dao' 'di, neh eh-: or mu :no, 'de or 'ye :koan-a' klehkpeh nyor⧾ no-a 'dhen, 'de Nyorsoa 'ye-or' bo dih yubo:.
:Mor eh 'dhu 'gbu or po-a, on se sin, :yee' Nyorsoa-a mu-or geli' :za-dih-deh 'nyi-:.

Jorwor: :mor on sin, :yee' or-a' :koan-a' klehkpeh 'kpa 'nior:. Nyor-a' 'jeh :dao', or mu 'puh-:, :eh gweh-a :ka nyor ple-a, 'de or 'wluh-a 'de neh 'klu-', :or 'puh-a, 'de or-a' deh⧾-a' klehkpeh sin-a.
A se-eh yubo: ke :e, :ka a 'dhu-a Nyorsoa-a' 'sla-' :e? 'De mor :ka Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu :ne-a a-uh' :e?
:Mor nyor-beh-nyor-beh gba Nyorsoa-a' 'sla :daa ya, :yee' Nyorsoa-a mu-eh :no, nyor :dao', or 'ye gbe :zie: :ke. Deh no-eh, Nyorsoa-a' 'sla :ne 'i gban, 'de mor a :mor 'dhu 'sla :dao'.

A 'bor a-a' 'jeh-a' dih :bo-dih-eh. :Mor eh 'dhu a-a' nyor-beh-nyor-beh 'da or :korn :toror' :or 'kmo bo-nyor⧾-a 'da-dih-a :toror', :yee' 'nyi or no :bobo-nyor :eh 'kmo bo-nyor⧾-a 'da-dih-a :bobo-a'. :Mor or no-eh, :yee' or mu nyor Nyorsoa 'da-dih-a :toror' :korn-nyor⧾ :no.

Deh no-eh, :toror' :korn-eh: :eh :ne-a dha 'kmo bo, eh no :bobo-deh: 'do Nyorsoa ybei', :ka eh no-a 'chle-eh 'de or-a' 'chlee-deh 'di, eh no-a, :Toror' :korn-nyor⧾-a' :toror' :dao', or-: Nyorsoa no, 'de or ya-uh 'kle 'ye-eh bo.
'De eh 'da :neheh', :Gwlor :baa' yubo: :ka deh⧾ :en :ne-a 'o :toror' :korn-nyor⧾ :gwlii', en se-a deh-beh 'di :ne 'weh.
:Yee' eh-a' dhih, nyor-a' 'beh-dih:-' or-a' 'jeh 'i, 'do :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' noo-deh⧾ bo. Deh no-eh, deh⧾-a' klehkpeh-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh-: on :korn 'de a bo.
:Eh :mor :Poror' o, :Apor'lor o, :Piteh' o, dha yao zorn o, :febeh' o, 'meh-a' o, ti :a :ne-a ken :kana o, 'dekorn: ti :yih :en mu-a 'de :yi o, an-a' klehkpeh :korn 'de a bo.
'De a :korn 'de 'Klae bo, 'de mor 'Klae :korn 'de Nyorsoa bo :ke.
:Yee' :gwlor-nyor⧾ :korn on 'ye 'mor-: 'dekorn: 'on 'bei' :koan: :no-nyor⧾-: :a 'dhu, :ka :a 'dhu-a 'Klae-a' 'bhoi-nynuu-', 'de Nyorsoa po-a 'de or-a' 'slan 'de :a 'kwa.
Nyor Nyorsoa po-a deh⧾ :daa 'kwa, deh :due' or 'bhorn-a or 'ye-a 'ye 'de or ya, eh-: 'dhu, or 'ye :dhehehn-nyor no.
:Yee' eh-: :korn dhih :oo', :fano se 'o 'on :gwlii' :ne, 'an zabe 'ye :zi-eh: 'do a ybei'-: 'dekorn: 'do :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh ybei'-:. 'De mor 'on :se-' 'an 'jeh-a' zabe 'i chehn.

'De mor 'an :porluh :se-' 'on zabe :kpon-dih: 'do 'an noo-deh⧾ bo :ke. Jorwor: eh :se-eh' nyor⧾ 'i :to-dih: :eh :mor zabe se 'on kpon. :Gwlor :baa' :due' 'i-a' :due', or-: 'dhu nyor-' :or zi 'an zabe.

:Yee' eh-a' dhih, a-a' :zi-' a 'bei'-a' zabe, 'de ti 'ye 'o nyni. A :fuo: ti :Gwlor :baa'-a mu-a de :yi 'ken. Or mu deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :en 'zile:-a 'de :kule-' 'do zorn-pli-' :ya. :Yee' deh⧾ :en :ne-a 'o :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' :porluh⧾ ken, en mu ken :nyeh. :Mor ti :dao' en nyni 'o, :yee' nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh, an mu dhih bo :po-eh: :eh 'wluh-a 'de Nyorsoa bo, 'de :eh :korn-a 'de on bo 'ye-:.

:Yee' 'an 'Klae :de-di'-boi'-a:, deh⧾ :daa 'an za-a-' 'de a bo, 'do 'mor-: 'dekorn: :Apor'lor-: a-a' dhih bo, 'an za-ih' 'weh, en 'ye 'yi :to-dih-deh no 'do a bo, 'de a 'ye 'o :a-a' 'gor klei' zi. 'De a 'ye-ih' 'chean' 'de :a 'kwa, deh en 'dhu-eh:-', 'de a-a' noo-deh⧾ :ne 'o 'doror' :ne, 'do :yih :en 'chle-eh ken. A-a' 'dhu-:-' 'o nyor :noror', 'de a-a' :vlehn-' :noror' :noror'.

:Or :no-dih: :on deh ken 'kpa-nyor-' 'de :on 'bei' 'nyne-' :eh? Deh 'i-deh: :on 'ble, Nyorsoa :se-' :on 'nyi :eh? :Mor eh 'dhu Nyorsoa-', :or 'nyi-eh :on, :yee' :eh :korn dhih :an 'beh-dih :an-a' 'jeh 'i, :eh gweh-a :ka or se-eh :on 'nyi :eh?

'On yubo-eh', a 'da, deh⧾-a' klehkpeh a 'bhorn-a, a 'ye-ih' :naa. 'De a no bhaan-nyor⧾ :weh. 'De a 'da, a no 'keen-boi' :naa, 'do a-a' 'jeh bo. Jorwor: 'an 'bhorn a 'ye 'keen-boi' no 'jeh ka, 'de a :ne :a mor-: :a 'ye 'keen-boi'-deh :dha :due' :no-dih:.

'Do 'on :gwlii', eh gweh :ka Nyorsoa po-a 'de :a :mor :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾ 'de dubu'-a' :gborluh' bo, :eh gweh-a nyor⧾ on chehn-a wlu 'ken on 'ye-a' 'dba 'do :gwlor :gwea. :A :ne 'o 'bluhba ybei'. 'Enjor-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: :gwlor-nyor⧾-: an-a' klehkpeh an pobo :a ya.

Keen' :mloror' :gwlor-nyor⧾-a 'ye :a :bobo: ka 'do 'Klae-a' dhih bo. Jorwor: a :mor :mloror' a 'da a :korn :toror' 'de 'Klae-a' deh 'di. :Ao. :A 'worn-', :a :mor :korn 'kpih-a: chehn. 'De a no :kmuu-nyor⧾. A :mor an 'dhu 'o, 'de an po :a yaa'e :neheh' :e?

:Eh 'wluh-a 'de eh-a' glu 'dhu 'da, 'de :eh :yeh-dih:-a ti :daa ken, 'moeh-: 'dekorn: 'ni 'na-ton-: me-: no :a-uh. Keen', :a se deh-a' :za-da 'ble, 'de :a pa 'wla⧾-zon⧾-' :naa, 'de nyor⧾-a bla :a-uh 'gabaa, 'de :a se :dhe-da 'ble.
:A no :a-a' son⧾-a' 'kpih, 'de :a pobo-' :a-a' 'jeh bo dih. :Mor nyor⧾ 'jle-dih: :a-uh, :yee' :a po-uh :bhorlie' bo. An 'ye-dih :a 'kle, 'ka :wor eh :ne :chio'lo:, 'de :a nyna-eh 'i.

:Mor nyor⧾ 'jle-dih: :a-uh, 'ka-: :a 'pehn dih wlu dih :chio'lo: 'de on bo. :Eh yi-a 'de :chio'lo:, 'de :eh :yeh-dih:-a 'zean'-we-eh: :daa ken, nyor⧾ 'duo: :a-' 'weh :a 'ye 'kuo-: :gbehne: nyor⧾-a po-a 'kwla-: 'dekorn: 'zororn'-deh-: gweh.
'On :se-' a deh⧾ :daa bo 'chle en 'ye a dhen-' dih po. Jorwor: 'on no-eh', eh 'ye a 'slen 'dhu, :eh gweh-a :ka nyor :or 'dhu-a or-a' 'di :za-nynuu 'slen.

:Mor a-a' :yeh 'ble nyor⧾-a' 'wlu :bhue on :taa deh torne 'do :Yusu' 'Klae-a' klei' :zi-eh bo, a se :bai' :dhulu' 'ble 'gboror:. Deh no-eh, Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh 'on po-a, me-: no-eh, 'de 'on 'dhu a :baa' 'de :Yusu' 'Klae-a' deh 'di.
:Yee' eh-a' dhih, 'an bale a 'weh, a 'ye 'o 'an 'gor klei' zi.

Eh-: :korn dhih :oo', 'an dbo :Timehte' :or no-a 'an-a: :dhih :kma-yu-: 'dekorn: :dhehehn-nyor-: 'de :Gwlor :baa'-a' deh 'di. Or-: mu 'an noo-deh⧾-a' klehkpeh a-uh :gwluhuh' bo :po-dih: 'de :Yusu' 'Klae-a' deh 'di. Eh :due' :dao', eh-: 'on :torne: 'chore-a' klehkpeh :eh :ne-a deh⧾-' dih.
A-a' nyor⧾ :noo', mo-: :an 'beh-dih an-a' 'jeh 'i, :mor on :taa 'ye :dee', :yee' on 'da 'on :se 'de a bo :yi i.

Jorwor: :mor eh 'dhu :Gwlor :baa' 'worn-dih-eh ken dih, :yee' 'on :se 'o :gwle i, 'on 'ye 'de a bo yi. :Mor 'on 'yle, :yee' deh⧾ a-a' :noo'-a za-a-' :en :korn-a dhih an 'beh-dih-a an-a' 'jeh 'i, eh :se en :due'-a' dhih 'on :se 'de :yi i, jorwor: 'kpih on 'ble-a, me-: :korn dhih 'an mu 'de :yi :ke, 'on 'ye-ih 'ye.
Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh se wlu-a' 'i kor. Jorwor: eh kor or-a' 'kpih 'i.
Deh a 'bhorn 'on 'ye no :naa :eh? 'On 'ble sene'eh kwa, 'on 'ye 'de a bo yi :e? :Ae' 'on 'yle 'de nyor⧾-' :ybeh ka-: 'dekorn: 'yi :kpoehn: ka-: 'di?

:Yee' keen' 'jeh ka, eh-a' kuna' :yeh-dih: 'on-: ken, :ka 'tmeor:⧾ :korn-eh :ne-a 'de a 'nyne-'. Eh-a' :yeh :ne-a 'de a 'nyne-', eh se 'de nyor⧾ :on se-a Nyorsoa yubo: 'nyne-' :ne-a' 'jeh. 'On 'worn-ih' :ka a-a' nyor :due' :ne or :baa'-a'a: 'nynor-a 'tmo-a.

:Yee' :kaa eh no 'de a 'beh-dih a-a' 'jeh 'i 'suh :eh? A-a' :porluh⧾ :korn en 'ye 'zorn 'kpa :dee', 'do deh-zon:, nyor :dao' or no-a bo. A :korn a 'ye-or' 'o 'zorn po, or 'ye 'de a 'nyne-' 'wluh :dee'.
Keen' :mloror' 'an 'jeh 'yor-eh-a' nyior-tu se 'de a bo :ne, jorwor: 'an :porluh⧾-a' klehkpeh :ne 'de a bo 'weh. 'De mor 'on chehn nyor :dao' or-a' zabe 'i see, :eh gweh-a :ka 'on :ne-a 'o.
:Mor a 'kpa :dha :due' 'de :a-a' :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu'-a' 'nyne 'di, 'de 'an :porluh⧾-a' klehkpeh 'ye 'de a bo :ne, 'de :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu'-a' 'kpih 'ye 'de a bo :ne :ke,
:yee' a :za nyor :dao' 'kwla 'de 'ku 'kwa, 'de 'ku 'ye or-a' yau 'kor-dih:. Eh-: mu-eh :no, 'de or 'ye 'o or-a' 'jeh bo yi, 'de :mor :Gwlor :baa' yi de, 'de or-a' :zulu 'ye 'puh.
Eh-a' dhih, eh se 'yi dih :nmor, a 'ye a-a' 'jeh 'i 'beh-dih:. A se-eh yubo: :ka deh⧾ :en 'vu-dih-a 'bhlee, en-' :bhebe' deh⧾-bei:, me-: 'vu-dih 'bhlee: :kpuan'-a' klehkpeh :e?

:Yee' a 'tali: a-a' deh⧾-zon:⧾ :en gweh-a deh⧾ :en 'vu-dih-a 'bhlee dih, 'de a 'ye 'bhlee: :eh se-a 'vuu'-deh⧾ bo :ne gweh. 'De 'on yubo-eh, 'ka-: a :ne 'jeh ka. Deh no-eh, 'Klae :or no-a :a-a' 'Meh-a' :bla-dih: 'dlu-dih-blae'-yu, or 'dhu-dih-eh: gban 'i :weh see, 'do :a bo.

:Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, :a-a' 'dhu-:-' gor :or gweh-a 'bhlee: :eh :ne-a 'vuu'-deh:⧾ soa bo, :en 'dhu-a 'galo: :korn-eh-: 'dekorn: deh⧾-zon:⧾ :no-eh-:. Jorwor: a 'nyi :a 'dhu gor :daa 'de :vlehehn'-' :gweh ka-: 'dekorn: dhih-a' 'yor-eh-: 'di :eh gweh-a :ka 'bhlee: :eh se-a 'vuu'-deh⧾ bo :ne.
'Chlee-deh: 'on 'chle-a a bo :zai', 'on zela: a :gwluhuh' 'weh :eh :mor 'tmeor:⧾ :korn-nyor⧾ :ne a-a' nena:-' bo.

Deh 'an za-a-' :naa, 'on :se-' 'kmo bo-nyor⧾ 'da, :on no-a 'tmeor:⧾ :korn-nyor⧾-: deh⧾-a' 'klan :korn-nyor⧾-: 'ylii'-nyor⧾-: 'dekorn: zuu⧾-a' :weheh' :za-nyor⧾-:. :Mor 'on :taa :mloo' 'da :dee', :yee' a :korn a 'ye dha 'kmo bo 'wluh klehkpeh klehkpeh.

Deh 'an za-dih-a dhih-' dih, eh-: :dhe dih. Nyor :or 'da-dih-a or-a' 'jeh 'Klae-a' klei' :zi-nyor, 'de :or :ne-dih:-a 'tmeor:⧾ :korn-eh-: deh⧾-a' 'klan :korn-eh-: zuu⧾-a' :weheh' :za-eh-: nyor⧾ 'bhun dih :wlu-eh-: nomor 'na-eh-: 'dekorn: 'yli-a'-: 'kmo. Eh-a' nyior-tu: :ne :ao', or :ne a-a' nena:-' bo, 'de on :ne a-a' kpuhba:-' son⧾ ybei' :sloror'.
Deh 'on po 'de dih :eh, 'de 'on 'ye nyor⧾ :on se-a 'noror 'chore-' :ne, an-a' zabe zi :eh? Nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'noror 'chore-', mo-: :korn zabe: a :korn a 'ye zi.

Nyorsoa-a mu :yuh se-a 'noror 'chore-' :ne, an-a' zabe :zi. :Yee' a :mor 'ye :yuh :ne-a 'de 'chore-', an-a' zabe zi, :ka Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh no-a eh-a' :za-a', eh no-a, A :za 'de deh⧾-zon:⧾ :no-nyor⧾ 'noror a 'nyne-'.
:Eh :za a :fano :gwlii', 'de :mor a-a' nyor 'ble zabe 'do or 'be 'Klae-a' nyor 'bhun, 'de or kpa-ih 'de nyor⧾ :on se-a Nyorsoa deh-' 'ye bo 'koti-' :eh? 'De or-a' kpa-ih 'de Nyorsoa-nyor⧾ bo :eh?
A se-eh yubo: :ka eh 'dhu-a Nyorsoa-nyor⧾-' an mu-a 'bluhba-a' zabe :zi :e? :Yee' :mor a mu 'bluhba-a' zabe :zi, :yee' a :mor se zabe: :nyene' :daa, en-' zi-a' 'beh-dih: :e?
A se-eh yubo: :ka :a mu-a 'enjor-nyor⧾-a' zabe :zi :e? :Yee' a yi :zaa-dhih: :nyene' :en :ne-a dha 'kmo bo 'ye.
:Yee' eh-a' dhih, :mor a 'ble :zaa-dhih: :en :ne :ao', en 'bei' 'noror a 'nyne-', a-a' :kpa-ih' 'de nyor⧾ :on se-a 'noror 'chore-' :ne bo.
Deh⧾ a no-a, en :korn en 'ye a dhen-' dih po. Eh-: :korn dhih 'an za-ih'. Nyor se 'de a 'nyne-' :ne :or 'ye-a :toror' :korn deh 'jeh, 'de :or 'ye-a zabe: :en :ne :ao', 'Klae-a' nyor⧾ 'nyne-' zi :e?
Jorwor: a :to :mleheh' 'kpuh ya, 'de a kpa a 'bei' 'koti-' dih, 'do nyor⧾ :on se-a 'Klae-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' po ybei'.

:Yee' :mor a :taa deh⧾ :daa no, :yee' eh-: :to-dih-eh nyor⧾ 'i, :ka a-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh no-a deh 'plo. Eh mu 'yi dih :nmor, :mor nyor no :on deh-zon-', :on 'ye :porluh dih kpon, :eh :zi 'o :on 'ye kpa :za. Eh mu 'yi dih :nmor, :mor nyor :di-dih: :on :kleheh' :kleheh' dih, :on 'ye :porluh dih kpon, :eh :zi 'o :on 'ye kpa :za.

Jorwor: a :sea-dih: :mleheh' no-a' 'weh, 'de a-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh di-dih nyor⧾ :kleheh' :kleheh' dih, 'de a no nyor⧾ deh⧾-zon⧾ bo dih. Eh :se nyor⧾ 'sluh⧾ a-a' no-ih'. Nyor⧾ :on :ne a zi-a 'o :Yusu' klei', mo-: 'o a no-ih'.

A se-eh yubo: :ka nyor⧾ :an no-a deh⧾-zon⧾, on se-a 'beh-dih: on 'ye-a 'de Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh 'zorn pa :e? A 'bor, a-a' :bo-dih:-' a-a' 'jeh dih. Nyor⧾ :an korn-a 'tmeor⧾-: :yuh :an za zuu⧾-a' :weheh'-: :yuh :an no-a 'nyne :zaan'-: nyor⧾-kpalu:⧾ :an no-dih-a an-a' 'jeh 'nynor⧾-' 'wlii-dhih-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾-kpalu:⧾ :an po-a on 'bei'-nyor⧾-kpalu⧾ 'nynor⧾-: eh-a' nyor⧾-tu: :dao', on :se 'de Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh 'zorn :pa i.

'De mor 'ylii'-nyor⧾-: deh⧾-a' 'klan :korn-nyor⧾-: nomor 'na-nyor⧾-: nyor⧾ :an wlu-dih-a on 'bei' 'bhun dih-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ :an 'yli-a on 'bei' ken-:. An-a' nyor-beh:, or-: :se 'de Nyorsoa-a' nyor⧾ wlu 'ken :korn-eh 'zorn :pa i :ke.

A-a' nyor⧾ :noo' :noo', mo-: :ne :ao' :zai'. Jorwor: :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu' 'Klae-: 'dekorn: :a-a' Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu-: mo-: worlor: a-a' deh⧾-zon⧾-a' klehkpeh, 'de a :dhe-dih-eh 'for 'i 'do Nyorsoa bo, 'de or 'da-dih a 'yi 'sleh-nyor⧾.

A-a' nyor⧾ :noo'-a mu :ao', 'on :bleh-dih-eh: 'i, 'on 'ye deh⧾-a' klehkpeh no. Keen' :mloror', jorwor: eh :se deh⧾-a' klehkpeh, me-: :nmor 'yi dih 'do a bo :deh. 'De 'on :se-eh' ken dih 'worn-dih: i deh 'ye 'on 'ge-yu-' no.

Nyor⧾ :noo'-a mu :ao', Dii-deh :korn 'de 'kwli 'di, 'de 'kwli :korn 'de dii-deh bo :ke. Keen'. Jorwor: Nyorsoa-a mu en-' klehkpeh :daa 'borboa' 'i :po. Nyorsoa :se-' :a yau: :daa 'nyi, :a 'ye-uh 'tmeor:⧾ :korn-dih:. Jorwor: or 'nyi-uh' :a 'weh, :a 'ye :Gwlor :baa' :weheh' :za-dih:. 'De mor :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'jeh :dao', or-: :korn 'de :a-a' yau-a' deh bo.
Nyorsoa :or :za-a: 'de :Gwlor :baa' 'de nma-dih-deh 'di, or mu or-a' 'kpih :due' :dao' :no, or 'ye 'de :a nma-dih-deh 'di :za :ke.
A se-eh yubo: :ka a-a' yau 'dhu-a 'Klae-a' yau-a' 'for-' ke :e? 'On 'beh-dih: 'on 'ye 'Klae-a' 'for 'duo:, 'on 'ye-uh :bhaa'-nynor 'nyi :e? 'Kei:. Eh se-eh 'beh-dih:.

A se-eh yubo: :ka nyor-kpalu: :or :ne :bhaa'-nynor: :dao' 'tmo-a, :yee' or :ne or 'gba-a yau :due' :e? 'Ka :wor Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh no eh-a' :za-a', eh 'da, Mo-: :on :ne-a 'sororn', an mu nyor :due' :no.
Jorwor: nyor :or 'nyi-a or-a' 'jeh :Gwlor :baa', :yee' or-: :Gwlor :baa'-: on 'ble :porluh :due'.

A :tehn-dih: 'tmeor:⧾ :korn-eh bo dih. Deh⧾-zon⧾-a' klehkpeh nyor⧾-a no-a, :en :sie:-a 'o, en se 'o yau 'bhun :ne. Jorwor: :mor eh 'dhu :on :taa 'tmeor⧾ :korn, :yee' :an-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh-a' yau :oo' :an no deh-zon 'bhun.
A se-eh yubo: ke :e, :ka a-a' yau 'dhu-a Gban 'i :ne :Zulu-a' 'sla-' :e, or 'nyi-a a-uh, :on :ne-a a-uh'? A se 'de a-a' 'jeh bo :korn, jorwor: a :korn 'de Nyorsoa bo.
Deh no-eh, Nyorsoa :po-dih: :Yusu' 'Klae-a' nyomor 'pehluh', 'de or dhen a-uh. :Yee' eh-: :korn dhih :oo', a 'ye a-a' yau no, a 'ye Nyorsoa dhih-a' 'i 'beh-a' 'nyi.
:Yee' :kana :naa, deh a 'chle-a 'on bo, eh-: :korn dhih 'an mu ken dih :wlu-dih:. Eh mu 'yi dih :nmor :dee', :mor nyor-kpalu se 'nynor :korn.

Jorwor: deh no-eh, 'tmeor:⧾ :korn-eh :ne-a 'de eh 'di, eh-: :korn dhih :oo', nyor-kpalu :korn or 'ye or-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh-a' 'nynor 'i :glehn, 'de mor 'nynor-kpao' :korn or 'ye or-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh-a' yibeor 'i :glehn :ke.
:Yee' nyor-kpalu se :korn or 'ye 'o or-a'a: 'nynor dih dhe. 'De mor :ke 'nynor-kpao' se :korn or 'ye 'o or-a'a: yibeor dih dhe. 'Nyi mo-: :ne-a 'sororn', on 'pehn-dih: on 'bei'-a' :porluh dih.

Deh no-eh, 'nynor-kpao' se or-a' 'jeh-a' 'yor-eh-a' yau wlu 'ken :korn. Jorwor: or-a'a: yibeor: 'o, or-: :korn yau: :dao' wlu 'ken. 'De :ka :ne-a :due' 'di :ke, nyor-kpalu se or-a' 'jeh-a' 'yor-eh-a' yau wlu 'ken :korn. Jorwor: or-a'a: 'nynor :oo', or-: :korn yau: :dao' wlu 'ken.

'Nynor-a' 'tonor:-' or-a' 'jeh ken 'do or-a'a: yibeor bo. 'De mor yibeor-a' 'tonor:-' or-a' 'jeh ken 'do or-a'a: 'nynor bo. :Mor eh 'dhu a :mor :ne-a 'sororn', a 'worn-dih-eh ken dih, 'de a 'ye-eh' no, :yee' a no-eh 'do ti-kpor-bei 'di, 'de a 'ye a-a' ti-a' klehkpeh-' 'duo: 'do Nyorsoa bo :wlu 'da. :Yee' :mor eh :jla 'dlu-', :yee' a 'kpa :dha :due' :dele' ka, 'de 'ku :ne-' a dih 'dhen, :mor a se a-a' 'jeh wlu 'ken :korn-eh 'beh-dih:.
'An po 'o Nyorsoa bo :wlu-deh: :daa 'do a ybei'-: dih, 'de deh a 'ye-a' no, 'de a 'ye-eh' yubo:. Jorwor: eh :se 'tele', 'on :se-' po.

:Mor 'on :ne :due' :dee', :yee' 'on 'da :ka 'on :ne-a, 'on se-a 'nynor 'ble, 'ka-: :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh 'ye :ne :dee'. Jorwor: :a :mor Nyorsoa no-a :a se goor-dih:, 'de or 'nyi :a 'nyii'-deh:⧾ 'doror: 'dor.

A :mor :yuh se-a nyina 'ti-: :yuh se-a 'nynor⧾ :korn-: 'dekorn: :dhoba: 'nynor⧾-: deh 'an 'bhorn-a, a 'ye-a' no, eh-: :dhe dih. Eh mu 'yi dih :nmor :mor a se 'bli 'ti-dih:. 'De :ka 'on :ne-a, a 'ye :ao' :ne.

Jorwor: :mor nyor-kpalu-deh-: 'dekorn: 'nynor-deh-: eh 'yi 'o 'do a :porluh⧾ ken 'gabaa, 'de a 'ye :ao', a se a-a' 'jeh-a' wlu 'ken :korn-eh 'beh-dih:, :yee' 'nyi nyor-kpalu 'ble or-a' 'jeh-a'a: 'nynor, 'de 'nynor 'ye or-a' 'jeh-a'a: yibeor 'ble :ke. Deh no-eh, eh mu 'yi dih :nmor a 'ye 'bli 'ti-dih:, :eh :zi 'o a-a' :porluh⧾ 'ye sin, :dha :due' 'pehn-dih-dhih.
Nyor⧾ :on 'ti-dih:-a 'bli, an-a'a: 'tele' :wor :dhe dih. Eh :se 'mor-: :or :se-eh' po. Jorwor: :Gwlor :baa' :oo', or-: po-eh. 'Nynor se :korn or 'ye or-a'a: yibeor dih 'tali:.

Jorwor: :mor eh 'dhu or no-eh, :yee' or 'bor nyina: 'ti-eh 'klein'. :Mor or se-eh 'worn 'i 'beh-dih:, :yee' or mu 'de or-a'a: yibeor bo de, on 'ye wlu-' dih 'woorn-dih:, or 'ye de 'gbu mu. 'De :ka :ne-a :due' 'di, nyor-kpalu se :korn or 'ye or-a'a: 'nynor 'kwla :za.

:Yee' deh :neheh', 'an yi-a :za 'da, 'de :yuh :sie:-a 'o bo, eh-: :dhe dih. Eh se :Gwlor :baa' zela: 'on :gwluhuh' :deh. Jorwor: eh 'wluh 'o 'an 'jeh :porluh ken. :Mor eh 'dhu 'Klae-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor 'ble 'nynor :or se-a 'Klae-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' po, 'de 'nynor-a' 'jeh :dao' or 'ye-eh ken dih 'worn-dih: 'gboror: or :ne or 'ye 'bli 'ti-dih:, :yee' or 'bor 'nynor :dao' 'kwla :za-eh.

'De :ka :ne-a :due' 'di :ke, :mor 'Klae-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nynor 'ti nyor-kpalu: :or se-a 'Klae-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' po 'bli :dee' see, 'de nyor-kpalu-a' 'jeh :dao', or 'ye-eh ken dih 'worn-dih: 'gboror: or :ne 'nynor :dao' 'ye 'bli 'ti-dih:, :yee' or 'bor nyor-kpalu: :dao', or-a' dih 'tali-eh:.

Deh no-eh, nyor-kpalu: :or se-a 'Klae-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' po, or-a'a: 'nynor-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-dhih: 'o, eh-: no-eh, 'de or gweh nyor :or :korn-a dhih Nyorsoa 'worn-dih:-a ken dih. 'De :ka :ne-a :due' 'di, 'nynor :or se-a 'Klae-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' po, or-a'a: yibeor-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-dhih: 'o, eh-: no-eh, 'de or gweh 'nynor :or :korn-a dhih Nyorsoa 'worn-dih:-a ken dih :ke. :Mor eh se-eh :mor :dee', :yee' a-a'a: 'nynuu :se-' Nyorsoa-nyor⧾ :gweh i :dee'. Jorwor: :yeh eh :ne-a :naa, Nyorsoa 'worn-dih: a-a'a: 'nynuu-a' dhih 'weh :naa.

Jorwor: nyor :or se-a 'Klae-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' po, :mor or 'bhorn or 'ye nyor :or po-a 'Klae-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' dih 'tali:, :yee' 'nyi or no-eh. 'Klae-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor-kpalu-: 'dekorn: 'nynor-kpao'-: nyor :se-uh' :san-dih: 'do :yeh :dao' :mleheh' bo. Deh no-eh, Nyorsoa 'da :a 'weh, wlu-' dih 'worn-eh: 'ye 'o 'nynor-: 'dekorn: yibeor-: 'nyne bo :ne.

:Mor :or 'dhu-a 'nynor-', :kaa :on no eh-a' yubo-eh, :eh :mor :an mu :an-a'a: yibeor-' dih 'bili: 'noror 'Klae bo :eh? 'De mor :mor 'dhu-a yibeor-' :ke, :kaa :on no eh-a' yubo-eh, :eh :mor :an mu :an-a'a: 'nynor-' dih 'bili: 'noror 'Klae bo :eh?

:Yee' deh :korn-a dhih :Gwlor :baa' 'da-a nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh on 'ye-a' 'kmo-' :ne-dih:, ti or 'da-uh'-a, on 'ye-a or-a' klei' :zi-nyor⧾ no, :yee' 'nyi on :ne-dih-eh 'kmo. Eh-: no 'tele' 'an torne 'chore-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh.
:Mor nyor-kpalu 'meh :bhlororn' 'de Nyorsoa 'ye-or 'da, :yee' 'ka-: eh 'ye :sie:. 'De mor :mor nyor-kpalu se :bhlororn' 'meh, 'de Nyorsoa 'ye-or 'da, :yee' 'ka-: or 'ye :ne, or 'ye 'de yi.
Deh no-eh, :bhlororn' 'meh-eh-: 'dekorn: se :bhlororn' 'meh-: :mlee' se :kma. Deh :due' :eh 'dhu-a :kmaa-deh-', eh-: 'dhu Nyorsoa-a' 'tele' dih :dhe-eh-'.
:Ka nyor :ne-a 'de Nyorsoa 'ye-or 'da, 'ka-: or 'ye :ne :chio'lo:.
:Mor eh 'dhu :on no 'ge-yu, 'de Nyorsoa 'ye :on 'da, :mleheh' 'beh-dih:-' :an-a' :porluh 'worn dih. :Dhe 'de eh 'di dih. Jorwor: :mor eh 'dhu, :on 'ye ti :on 'ye 'ge-deh 'wluh, :yee' no-eh.

:Mor eh 'dhu nyor no 'ge-yu, 'de :Gwlor :baa' 'ye-or 'da, :yee' or 'wluh 'de 'gegeye 'weh 'do :Gwlor :baa' bo ka. 'De deh :ne-a :due' 'di, nyor :or se-a 'ge-yu no, 'de or 'ye-a' 'da, :yee' or-: 'Klae-a' 'ge-yu: 'o.
Nyorsoa no 'Klae-a' nyomor, 'de or po a-a' 'pehluh', or dhen a-uh. :Yee' eh-a' dhih, nyor-a' 'worn-:-', nyor-a' :no-dih:-' a 'ge-yu 'do deh⧾-zon:⧾ :gwlor-nyor⧾-a 'bhorn-a a 'ye-a' no bo.
:Yee' 'an 'Klae :de-di'-boi'-a:, 'nyi a :za Nyorsoa-a' :weheh' :ka a :ne-a :chio'lo: 'de or mu-a a-a' :due' :due' 'da-:.

:Yee' 'nynor-kpao'-: 'dekorn: nyor-kpalu-: :on 'see-a 'bli 'ti-dih, :on 'see-eh 'ye, 'on :se-' 'tele' 'ye, eh :se 'de :Gwlor :baa' bo 'wluh, 'do an-a' dhih bo. Jorwor: deh :daa, 'an mu-a-' :za, eh 'wluh 'o 'an 'jeh :porluh ken, 'mor :or :Gwlor :baa'-a' :wehlih: :korn-eh no-eh, 'de nyor⧾ 'beh-dih:-a on 'ye-a :gwlii' dhe.
'Kle 'ye-eh: :daa :a :ne-a ken :naa, eh-a' dhih, eh-: :korn dhih 'on 'da eh :nmor-: 'yi, a 'ye 'o :dha a :ne-a dih kpon.
:Mor :korn 'nynor, :yee' 'bor or-a' 'kwla :za-eh-a' :gwie⧾-a' :za-a'. :Mor se 'nynor :korn, :yee' 'bor 'nynor :korn-eh-a' :gwie:⧾ :za-eh.

Jorwor: :mor :on 'da :an mu 'nynor :korn :gbor :gbor, eh se deh-zon:. 'De mor :mor 'nynor-kpao'-yu 'ti nyina, eh :se deh-zon: or :se-' no :ke. Jorwor: deh :due' 'an 'ye-a 'de eh 'di, eh-: 'dhu, nyor⧾ :on 'ti-dih:-a 'bli, an mu 'kle 'ye-eh: :dhulu' 'ye-: 'de an-a' 'kmo :ne-eh 'di. 'De 'an 'bhorn 'on 'ye a zelie: 'do eh 'zorn.

:Yee' 'an 'Klae :de-di'-boi'-a:, deh 'an za-dih-a dhih-' 'de a bo, eh-: :dhe dih. Ti :en :sie:-a 'o, 'de ti 'ye-a' 'dlu-' :jla, en se 'i :tehn. :Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, :eh 'wluh-a dha :dha :daa :naa, 'de :eh mu-a 'dlu bo, nyor⧾-kpalu:⧾ :on :korn-a 'nynor⧾, 'nyi an-a' 'kmo :ne-eh gweh :ka nyor⧾ se-a 'nynor⧾ :korn, an-a' :dhe-' 'nynor⧾ :korn-deh :due'-a' 'dlu yai' 'suh.
:Yee' nyor⧾ :an 'vin-a, an-a' :dhe-' 'viin'-deh-a' 'dlu yai', nyor⧾ 'mona-a no-a :naa, an-a' :dhe-' 'mona: :no-eh-a' 'dlu yai'. Nyor⧾ :an dhen-a deh⧾, an-a' :dhe-' en-' :kororn-deh-a' 'dlu yai'.
Nyor⧾ :an 'ye-a 'kmo bo-deh⧾ deh 'i, an-a' :dhe-' eh-a' 'dlu yai'. Deh no-eh, 'kmo-a gweh 'de :a 'kwa-: dih, :yeh on :ne-a ken :naa.

'On :se-' 'bhorn :porluh-a' 'worn dih 'beh-eh 'ye 'o a bo yi. Deh no-eh, nyor-kpalu: :or se-a 'nynor :korn, deh :due' or na-dih-a :gwluhuh' dih, eh-: 'dhu, :Gwlor :baa'-a' dhih-', :ka or 'ye-a no, 'de or 'ye-a or-a' :porluh dih 'pehn-dih:.
Jorwor: nyor-kpalu: :or :korn-a 'nynor, deh :due' or na-dih-a :gwluhuh' dih, eh-: 'dhu, 'kmo bo-deh⧾-' :ka or 'ye-a' no, 'de or 'ye-a or-a'a: 'nynor-a' :porluh dih 'pehn-dih:.

:Yee' nyor-kpalu: :dao', or-a' :gwluhuh' :gble-eh:-' 'weh, 'do deh⧾ 'sororn' 'nyne bo. :Yee' 'nynor :or se-a nyina 'ti-: :eh mor 'nynor-kpao'-yu: :or se-a nyor-kpalu-dhih yubo:-: deh :due' or na-dih-a :gwluhuh' dih, eh-: 'dhu, :Gwlor :baa'-a' dhih-'. Deh :due' or 'bhorn or 'ye-a' no, eh-: 'dhu, or-a' yau-: 'dekorn: or-a' :porluh⧾-a' klehkpeh-: en 'ye 'de :Gwlor :baa' bo :korn. Jorwor: 'nynor :or 'ti-a nyina, deh :due' or na-dih-a :gwluhuh' dih, eh-: 'dhu 'kmo bo-deh⧾-', :ka or 'ye-a' no, 'de or 'ye-a or-a'a: yibeor-a' :porluh dih 'pehn-dih:.

A-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh-a' dhih :oo', 'an za dhih :daa-'. Eh :se 'tele' :oo', 'an vorn 'on 'ye po 'do a bo :deh. Jorwor: 'an 'bhorn a 'ye 'kmo 'jeh no 'kmo-' :ne-dih:, 'de a-a' :porluh⧾ :ne-' :gble-eh:, 'de a 'ye a-a' ti-a' klehkpeh zi 'de :Gwlor :baa' bo.

:Mor nyor yubo-eh 'i 'do or-a' 'jeh bo, :eh :mor deh⧾ or no-a 'do 'nynor-kpao'-yu: or 'dhu-a 'sehn 'dlu bo, 'de en 'ye :ao', en se 'o :gwie 'i :ne, 'de mor or-a' :porluh 'ye sin, or :ne or 'ye dih 'pehn, 'de noo :ka :noror' 'ye :ao', or se :ne, 'de or 'bhorn or :ne or mor-: on 'ye 'bli 'ti-dih:, :yee' a :ya or-a'a: 'nynor nyina, or 'ye-or' :korn. Deh-zon se 'de eh 'di :ne.

Jorwor: nyor-kpalu: :or polo-eh 'do or-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh :gwlii', 'de nyor se-a 'dlu 'tun-dih:, 'de or :korn-a or-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh-a' wlu 'ken, 'de or polo-eh 'do or-a' 'jeh :gwlii' :eh :mor or :se-a' 'nynor-kpao'-yu: :dao' or 'dhu-a 'sehn 'dlu :korn i, nyor-kpalu-a' 'jeh :dao', or no deh 'jeh :neh :ke.

:Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, :mor nyor-kpalu 'da, or mu 'nynor or-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh 'dhu-a 'sehn 'dlu, :korn, or no deh 'jeh :neh. Jorwor: :mor or 'da, or :se-or' :korn i, :yee' or no deh 'jeh :neh, :eh :zi 'o or 'ye-or' :korn.

'Nynor :or 'ti-a nyina, or se :korn or 'ye or-a'a: yibeor dih 'tali: :ka eh mu-a 'dlu-' :tehn, or :ne-a 'kmo. Jorwor: :mor eh 'dhu or-a'a: yibeor 'meh, :yee' or :florn ken dih, or 'ye nyor or 'bhorn-a 'bli 'ti. Jorwor: nyor or mu-a 'bli 'ti-:, 'nyi or no :Gwlor :baa'-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor :gbor.
Jorwor: :ka 'on no-a eh-a' 'ye-a', or mu 'mona dih 'yi-dih: :mor or se nyina 'ti :neheh'. Eh gweh Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu: 'o, on po 'o 'on deh :daa :gwlii' 'bla.

:Yee' :kana :naa, dii-deh:⧾ on 'dhu-dih:-a zuu⧾ gban 'i, me-: :korn dhih 'an yi a :gwluhuh' zela: 'da. :A yubo-eh' :ka a-a' nyor⧾ :noo' no-a, :a :mor :or 'dhu-a :Yusu'-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor⧾-' :a :mor no deh 'i yubo-nyor⧾. Deh 'i yubo-eh:, eh-: no-eh, 'de nyor⧾-a 'beh-dih an-a' 'jeh 'i. Jorwor: :ybeh-dih-eh:, eh-: no-eh, 'de nyor⧾-a ku-dih 'de Nyorsoa-deh 'di.
Nyor :or no-a or yubo: deh 'i 'gabaa, or-a' 'jeh :dao', or :korn or 'ye deh 'chean' 'gboror:.
Jorwor: nyor :or :ybeh-a Nyorsoa-', or-: 'o Nyorsoa yubo:.

:Yee' dii-deh:⧾ on 'dhu-dih:-a zuu⧾ gban 'i, jorwor: 'on :yeh-dih: en-' dhih ken :naa. :A yubo-eh' :ka zuu:⧾ :daa, en se-a deh-' 'dhu-eh: dha yao 'zorn. 'De mor nyorsoa :noror' se-a 'o Nyorsoa :or :ne-a 'de yai' 'bhun :ne.

Keen' :mloror' deh⧾ :nee', me-: :ne 'o yao :gwlii'-: :eh beh 'noror 'zorn-: me-: nyor⧾ :noo'-a 'da-dih an-a' nyorsoa⧾. Keen' 'jeh ka, on po-ih dhih 'jeh :ka deh⧾ :daa an 'da-dih-a nyorsoa⧾-: 'dekorn: :gwlor :bai'-: en :ne-a dha 'kmo bo.

Jorwor: :a :mor :mloror' :a 'ble Nyorsoa :due' 'i-a' :due' gbai, or-: 'dhu :a :Baa'. Or-: no deh⧾-a' klehkpeh, 'de or-a' :weheh' :za-dhih:, :a :ne 'kmo. 'De mor :neheh' :ke, :a 'ble :Gwlor :baa' :due' gbai, or-: 'dhu :Yusu' 'Klae-'. Or-: deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :yi-dih:, 'de en mu :no-eh, 'de mor or-: 'nyi :a :febeh', 'de :a :ne 'kmo-'.

Jorwor: eh :se nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :on po-a 'Klae-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-', mo-: yubo: deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :daa :deh. Nyor⧾ :noo' yubo: zuu:⧾ deh :daa 'i :dee' see, 'de an mu :Yusu'-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' :po, :yee' eh-: no-eh, 'de :mor on di dii-deh:⧾ :dao', :yee' deh :due' an na-dih-a :gwluhuh' dih, eh-: 'dhu, on 'dhu-dih: dii-deh:⧾ :dao' zuu⧾ gban 'i. :Yee' :ka on se-a deh-zon-: deh 'jeh-: en-' bo dih zela-eh yubo: deh 'jeh, :yee' :mor on :taa 'ye :dee', :yee' on 'da on no deh-zon: 'do Nyorsoa ybei'.
Jorwor: dii-deh se 'beh-dih: eh 'ye :a Nyorsoa dih 'koan'-dih:. :Mor :a se-eh di, eh :se deh :a :se-' 'ma-dih:. 'De mor :mor :a di-eh, :a :se-eh' deh 'i 'ye-: i.
:Yee' a 'wla :gwluhuh' dih, dii-deh:⧾ :en 'wla-a 'de dih, a di-a, en :ne-' :zolo' no, en :ne-' nyor⧾ :on se-a deh-zon-: deh 'jeh-: en-' bo dih zela-eh yubo: deh 'jeh 'gbele:.

:Mor eh 'dhu deh-', 'de nyor :or se-a deh-zon-: deh 'jeh-: bo dih zela-eh yubo: deh 'jeh, 'de or 'ye :mor :or no-a :or 'worn deh-' dih 'ye, 'de zuu⧾-a' 'sla 'zorn, :on 'ye 'de deh :di-dih:, :an-a' :gwluhuh' 'da, nyor :dao', eh :se-or' 'kpih bo :po i, or 'ye dii-deh:⧾ nyor⧾ 'dhu-dih:-a zuu⧾ gban 'i, di :e?

:Mor eh 'dhu :on no :ao', :yee' :an-a' deh-' dih 'worn-eh: :dao' :on 'ble-a, eh-: no-eh, 'de :an-a' 'Klae :de-di' :or se-a deh-zon-: deh 'jeh-: bo dih zela-eh yubo: deh 'jeh, 'de or :zie: gbe, :or :korn-a dhih 'Klae 'meh-a.

:Mor a :taa deh :dao' no, :yee' a no deh-zon: 'do a-a' 'Klae :de-di'-boi' bo, :yee' a :mor no-eh, 'de nyor⧾ :on se-a deh-zon-: deh 'jeh-: bo dih zela-eh yubo: deh 'jeh, 'de an-a' :porluh⧾ kpon-dih-uh zabe 'do Nyorsoa ybei', 'de a no deh-zon: 'do 'Klae bo :ke.

:Yee' eh-a' dhih, :mor eh 'dhu dii-deh:⧾ 'on di-a, 'de en 'ye-eh' no, 'de 'an 'Klae :de-di' 'ye deh-zon no, :yee' :mor eh :ne :ao', 'on :se-' eh :bo-dii-deh-tu: :dao' :di i :neheh', 'de 'on :ne-eh' no, or :ne-' deh-zon no.

:Yee' 'an 'jeh :daa, 'on se-eh 'i :bleh-dih: 'on 'ye deh 'an 'bhorn-a, 'on 'ye-a' no, 'on 'ye-eh' no :e? :Ae' 'on se :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor: ke? :Ae' 'on :se-' :a-a' :Gwlor :baa' :Yusu' 'ye? Eh :se :koan: 'on no-a, or-: se-eh no, 'de a se :Gwlor :baa'-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' po :e?

Keen' :mloror' nyor⧾ :noo' :se-' 'on :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor 'da-dih:. Jorwor: a :mor :mloror', 'mor :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor: 'o 'do a bo. Deh no-eh, a :mor no 'yi :to-dih-deh 'do :gwlor-nyor⧾ ybei', :ka 'on 'dhu-a :Gwlor :baa'-a' dboo-nyor-'.
:Mor nyor⧾ :za-dih: 'on dhih-zon⧾ 'bhun dih, :yee' 'ka-: 'an no :aa 'an 'jeh dhih ken :za-eh.
'Mor :or 'dhu-a :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor-', 'on se-eh 'i :bleh-dih:, 'on 'ye :koan: :daa 'an no-a, 'on 'ye-or dii-deh-: 'dekorn: 'naa'-ni-: 'di 'ye :e?
'An 'jeh :daa, 'on se-eh 'i :bleh-dih:, 'on 'ye 'Klae-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nynor :korn, 'on 'ye-or :gwele kpa, :ka 'on 'bei' dboo-nyor⧾-: :Gwlor :baa'-a' dei'-boi'-: 'dekorn: :Piteh'-: an no-a :e?
'Mor-: 'dekorn: :Bana'ba-: :a :due' 'klein', :or 'ye Nyorsoa-a' :koan no, 'de :or 'ye :koan: 'sluh no 'do 'for 'i, 'de :or 'ye 'o 'or-a' 'jeh bo dih pobo: :e?

:Or no sorye'-yu 'de :or :za or-a' 'jeh geli' :eh? Dha nyor 'wluh :or no gle, 'de dii-deh:⧾ :en 'wluh-a 'de eh 'di, 'de or :se-' en-' deh-beh worn 'dhen :eh? :Or no 'blae'⧾-a' 'yli-eh bo 'dhu-nyor, 'de :or-a' 'na en-' nyene-ni :eh?
Deh⧾ :daa 'an za-a-', eh :se :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' :porluh⧾-a' :gwluhuh' dih :na-dih-deh :due' :oo' :deh. Eh :se deh⧾ :Mose' 'chle-a 'de or-a' 'tele'-chlee-deh 'di :ke :e?

Eh 'chle-eh:-' 'de or-a' 'tele'-chlee-deh 'di, :eh no-a, A 'bor :blii'-a' worn :san-eh, :mor eh :taa deh⧾-yor sonor 'do a bo. :Yeh :daa :naa, :mor a :taa 'ye, :yee' a 'da :blii' 'jeh neh-a' dhih :oo', Nyorsoa zi :e?

Eh :se :a :mor :gwlor-nyor:⧾, or se 'da :e? Keen' 'jeh ka, deh :daa, eh 'chle-eh:-' 'do :a-a' dhih bo. Deh no-eh, nyor :or 'beleh-a gle-: 'dekorn: :yor :or sonor-a :koo-: :on 'wluh-a 'de gle :dao' 'di-: mo-: :on :ne-a 'sororn', on :korn on 'ye-eh' :gwlii' dhe, :ka an mu-a :koan: :dao' deh 'di 'ye-:.

:A po Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'de a bo, :eh gweh-a :ka nyor tba-a deh⧾-yor: :en no-a Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu-a' 'yor. :Yee' :a :korn :a 'ye 'o deh 'ye 'de :a 'ye 'kmo :ne :ke. Eh se-eh 'i :bleh-dih: :a 'ye deh 'ye, 'de a 'kwa :e?

:Mor nyor⧾ :noo' :bleh-dih-eh 'i on 'ye-eh' :gwlii' dhe, a 'ye-uh' :za-dih:, :yee' :a :mor :mloror', :a-a' neh se 'o ken dih :zi ke :e? Jorwor: :a :se-eh' no, 'de eh :yeh-dih: ti :daa ken. Jorwor: :a ku 'di dih :chio'lo: 'do deh⧾-a' klehkpeh bo. Deh no-eh, :a :se-' 'bhorn, :a 'ye deh no, 'de eh :ne-' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh :en kor-a 'Klae 'i, en-' :gwie 'i kan.

A se-eh yubo: :ka nyor⧾ :an no-dih-a 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'sla 'zorn :koan, eh 'dhu-a 'de mor-' an-a' dii-deh⧾-a 'wluh-a :e? 'De mor :yuh :an no-dih-a 'o deh an za-dih-a 'slaa ken :koan, deh nyor⧾-a ya-a 'o eh ken, an za-dih-a 'slaa, eh :se-eh :mor, an se 'o 'kplo za, an se-uh 'nyi, eh-: :se an-a'a: dii-deh: ke :e?
:Yee' 'de :ka :ne-a :due' 'di, :Gwlor :baa' 'nyi :a 'tele', or 'dae:, Nyor⧾ :an po-a Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh, tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh :daa an po-a, 'do :wor an-a'a: dii-deh mu 'wluh-:.

Jorwor: deh⧾ :daa 'on :bleh-dih:-a 'i, 'on 'ye-a' no, 'on 'see en-' deh-beh no :chio'lo:, 'de eh :yeh-dih: ti :daa ken. 'De mor eh :se 'on dhe-eh :gwlii' a mu deh :daa :no 'do 'on bo, eh-: :korn dhih 'an 'chle a bo :deh. :Mor eh 'dhu :mleheh', :yee' 'nyi 'on 'meh, :eh :zi 'o nyor 'ye 'on deh 'nyi, 'de eh 'ye 'an 'jeh 'i 'beh-dih-deh: :daa 'on 'kwa :za.
:Mor 'on :taa tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh :daa po, 'on se-eh 'i :bleh-dih:, 'on 'ye 'an 'jeh 'i 'beh-dih:. Deh no-eh, 'on :korn 'on 'ye-eh' no :gbor :gbor. 'Chlo 'do 'on bo, :mor 'on se-ih po.

:Mor 'an :porluh 'worn-dih-eh ken dih, 'on 'ye-ih' po, 'an mu eh-a' geli' :za-dih-deh 'ye-:. :Mor 'an 'jeh se-eh ken dih 'worn-dih:, 'an mu-eh :no :gbor :gbor. Deh no-eh, Nyorsoa, or-: po-ih 'de 'on 'kwa, 'on 'ye-ih' po.

:A 'ye geli' :za-dih-deh: 'an 'ye-a' 'o 'dee. 'An-a: geli' :za-dih-deh :wor 'dhu, 'on 'ye tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh :daa po, :eh :se-a 'wlii-eh-deh:. Deh 'on :bleh-dih:-a 'i, :mor 'on :taa-ih po, 'on 'ye-a' no, 'an-a' 'worn, 'an-a' no-eh.

'On :se 'ge-yu:. 'De mor 'on se 'de nyor bo :korn. Jorwor: 'on no-eh' 'de 'on no 'ge-yu 'do :gwlor-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh bo, 'on 'ye ka 'ye, 'on 'ye nyor⧾ :dhulu' 'on 'beh-dih:-a 'on 'ye-a dih 'bili: 'noror 'Klae bo, 'on 'ye-uh' dih 'bili:.

:Mor 'on :ne 'de :Jueh'-nyor⧾ 'nyne-', :yee' 'an na :Jueh'-nyor⧾-a' deh, eh 'ye-eh' no, 'on 'ye-uh dih 'bili: 'noror 'Klae bo. :Mor 'on :yeh-dih: nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'o :Mose'-a' 'tele' 'zorn ken, :yee' :ka an no-a na-a', 'ka-: 'an no na-a' :ke, keen' :mloror' 'on se 'o :Mose'-a' 'tele' 'zorn :ne. Jorwor: 'an no-eh' 'suh, 'on 'ye nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'o :Mose'-a' 'tele' 'zorn dih 'bili: 'noror 'Klae bo.

:Mor 'on :yeh-dih: nyor⧾ :on se-a :Mose'-a' 'tele' 'ble ken :ke, :yee' :ka an no-a na-a', 'ka-: 'an no na-a' :ke, eh 'ye-eh' no, 'de 'on 'ye nyor⧾ :on se-a :Mose'-a' 'tele' 'ble, dih 'bili: 'noror 'Klae bo, keen' :mloror' 'on :ne 'o 'Klae-a' 'tele' 'zorn 'weh, jorwor: 'on se 'o Nyorsoa-a' 'tele' 'zorn 'wluh 'gboror:.

:Mor 'on :yeh-dih: nyor⧾ :on :korn-a 'Klae-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh se-a dih ku ken, :yee' :ka an no-a na-a', 'ka-: 'an no na-a' :ke, eh 'ye-eh' no, 'de 'on 'ye-uh dih 'bili: 'noror 'Klae bo deh 'jeh. Nyor :yor 'on mu 'o bo, :yee' :ka or :ne-a, 'ka-: 'on :ne, 'de :ka :yor 'on 'beh-dih:-a, 'on 'ye-a' no, 'de 'on 'ye-eh' no, 'on 'ye an-a' :noo' dih 'bili: 'noror 'Klae bo deh 'jeh.
Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh-a' dhih :oo', 'an no deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :daa, 'de 'on 'ye :bhorlie' :eh :ne-a 'de eh 'di 'ye :ke.

A se-eh yubo: :ka nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :an dhobo-a dih 'do ple-a' bo, :mor an-a' klehkpeh ple, :yee' nyor :due' 'wluh-a 'de on 'nyne-', or du-uh-a, 'de or 'ye-a geli' :za-dih-deh :e? A-a' ple-a' a mu-a :ple, a ple deh 'jeh neh, 'de a 'ye geli' :za-dih-deh 'ye.

Nyor⧾ :an dhobo-a dih, 'do deh-a' dhih bo, an torne-uh deh 'weh deh 'jeh, on 'ye an-a' 'jeh wlu 'ken :korn. An no-eh', 'de on 'ye :gale' :kornu:⧾ :gblaa' 'ye, :or :se-a' 'o :gwle i, :or 'ye-a' 'kor. Jorwor: :a-a' :neh :mleheh', :a no-eh', :a 'ye 'kmo :sie: :gblaa' 'ye.
:Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, 'an-a' 'worn, 'an-a' ple :eh gweh-a :ka nyor :or ple-a dih zeh zeh. 'An-a' 'worn, 'an-a' vorn :eh gweh-a :ka nyor :or vorn-a 'gbu :gwlii' :zulu bo.

Jorwor: 'on 'ye-dih: 'an 'jeh-a' yau 'kle, 'de mor 'on korn-uh wlu 'ken :ke. Deh no-eh, :mor 'on gweh Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu⧾-a' po-a' 'i 'de nyor⧾ bo, 'de or :ne-' 'on 'zorn sie, 'do 'an-a: geli' :za-dih-deh bo.
:Yee' 'an 'Klae :de-di'-boi'-a:, 'an 'bhorn a 'ye-eh' yubo: ti :a :bai'-a' :bai'-a 'wluh-a 'Iye-bluhba ken, 'ni-kpan: or-: 'yli an-a' klehkpeh 'dlu :chio'lo:, 'de on 'dhan Yobo' :zaehn :pehleh'peh:.
'Ni-kpan-: 'dekorn: Yobo' :zaehn-: on :yi-dih:-a 'de 'di, eh-: no 'ni 'dlu :po-eh, 'de eh no-eh, on no :Mose'-a' klei' :zi-nyor⧾.
An-a' klehkpeh, on di dii-deh :due' :eh 'wluh-a 'de Nyorsoa bo.

An-a' klehkpeh, on 'na 'ni :due' :eh 'wluh-a 'de Nyorsoa bo. Deh no-eh, on 'na 'ni :dao' Nyorsoa dbo-a :eh 'wluh-a 'de 'soba: or 'nyi-uh-a 'di. 'De 'soba: :dao', or :ne an na-dih :dha :due', an mu. 'De mor 'soba-a' 'jeh :dao', or-: 'dhu 'Klae-'.
Jorwor: Nyorsoa-a' :porluh :se-' dih 'pehn 'do an-a' :dha :dhulu' bo. Eh-: :korn dhih, 'de an-a' :dha :dhulu' 'meh 'de :bhehneh'-bluhba ken.
Deh :daa :eh :no-eh, eh-: 'dhu :a 'slen, 'de :a-a' :porluh⧾ :ne-' 'de deh⧾-zon⧾ bo :ne, :ka on no-a.

A-a' :za-' zuu⧾-a' :weheh', :ka an-a' nyor⧾ :noo' no-a, :ka Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh no-a eh-a' :za-a', eh no-a, An 'dhu gor, 'de an di-dih-or deh 'zorn, an 'na-dih-or nomor 'zorn, 'de an korn-dih-or 'tmeor⧾ 'zorn.
A 'nyi :a 'tali: 'tmeor:⧾ :korn-eh dih. Eh-: 'jeh :dao', eh-: an-a' nyor⧾ :noo' no :dee', 'de an-a' 'wlu-a' :kwlaa 'sororn' 'wlu taan 'meh 'do 'we-eh :due' 'di.
:A 'bor :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'dhen-a', :ka an-a' :noo' no-a, 'de sane :nmua-dih-uh-a dih, 'de on 'meh-a 'de :bhehneh'-bluhba ken.
A-a' :jeh-dih:-' worn dih, :ka an-a' :noo' no-a :dee', ti 'enjor: :or 'dba-a nyor⧾, or 'ye-a an-a' :noo' 'dba.
Deh⧾ :daa, en :no-eh:-' 'do on bo, en 'ye :a 'i :to-dih-eh:. 'De on 'chle-ih, en 'ye :a 'slen 'dhu :ka :a 'ye-a 'kmo :ne-eh no. Deh no-eh, :a :ne 'noror :de 'bor-dih-ti 'di.
:Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, nyor :or no-a, 'On :kmu-' deh 'jeh, deh se 'on 'beh-dih:, :yee' eh-a' nyior-tu: :dao', or 'wla :gwluhuh' dih, 'de or :ne-' dih 'ga.

Eh se dih 'dhen-eh :korn, :eh 'ye-a 'o nyor bo yi, :eh 'ye :ao', :eh 'see-a 'o nyor :noror' bo mu :zai'. 'De Nyorsoa no :dhehehn-nyor:. 'De dih 'dhen-eh: :on se-a worn 'i 'beh-dih:, Nyorsoa se 'beh-dih: or 'ye-eh 'yli-eh dih :za, eh 'ye 'o :on bo yi. Jorwor: :mor eh 'dhu, dih 'dhen-eh yi 'o :on bo, or mu :ka :noror' 'bhorn-: :chio'lo: :on 'ye-eh 'yi :nyna-a' 'beh-dih:.
:Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, :a 'bli-nyor⧾-a:. A 'nyi a :tehn-dih: zuu⧾-a' :weheh' :za-eh bo dih.
'An wlu 'de a bo :ka nyor-a wlu-a 'de :toror' :korn-nyor⧾ bo. Deh 'an za-a-', a pobo: 'de eh 'di 'do a-a' 'jeh bo.

'Korbuh :a 'na-dih-a 'glee-nomor 'di, :mor :a :taa :Gwlor :baa'-a' gban 'i :ne-dii-deh di, :on :korn-a dhih :a po-a Nyorsoa-a' 'zio, :yee' 'Klae-a' nyomor :oo', :a :ne :a 'bei'-a gble-'. 'De mor 'bhlee: :a :chehn-dih:-a dih, :mor :a di-eh, :yee' 'Klae-a' yau: 'o, :a :ne :a 'bei'-a gble-'.
Deh no-eh, 'bhlee: :yor-eh no :kpuan' :due', 'ka-: eh :ne :ke, :a :dhie: 'i :mloror' :kpeheh:, jorwor: :a no yau :due'. Deh no-eh, 'bhlee: :kpuan' :due' :oo', :a gble-'.
A pobo: 'Ezlea-nyor⧾ ya, a 'ye deh 'ye. :Mor on :taa deh :eh :za-dih-eh 'slaa 'do 'slaa ken :za-dih-deh ken di :dha :due', :yee' eh se Nyorsoa an se :weheh' za :dha :due' :e?
Deh 'an za-a-', 'on se :ao', deh an za-dih-a 'slaa 'do zuu bo, eh-: 'kpa deh ken. De mor 'on se :ao', zuu-a' 'yor-eh, mo-: 'kpa deh ken.

Deh 'an za-dih-a dhih-' dih, eh-: :dhe dih. Nyor⧾ :on se-a Nyorsoa yubo:, 'slaa: an za-a, an za-or 'de 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh⧾ bo. Eh :se 'de Nyorsoa bo. 'De mor 'on :se-' 'bhorn a-a' 'for 'ye 'de 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh⧾ bo :ne.

A se :korn a 'ye :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'korbuh 'di 'na-dih: 'de a 'ye 'o 'wluh, a 'ye 'de 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh⧾-a'a: 'korbuh 'di 'na-dih: :ke. 'De mor a se :korn a 'ye 'o :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'tebo ken deh :di-dih:, 'de a 'ye 'o 'wluh, a 'ye 'kwla 'ye-dih-deh⧾-a' 'tebo ken deh :di-dih: :ke.
A 'bhorn a 'ye-eh' no, 'de :Gwlor :baa' 'ye :gwlehehn' :no-nyor no :e? :Ae' :a-a' :gwluhuh' 'da :a :kmu-', :a zi-or-' ke?

A-a' nyor⧾ :noo'-a mu :ao', 'on :bleh-dih-eh: 'i, 'on 'ye deh⧾-a' klehkpeh no. Keen' :mloror', jorwor: eh :se deh⧾-a' klehkpeh, me-: :nmor 'yi dih 'do a bo :deh. 'De eh :se en-' klehkpeh, me-: ku-dih :a-a' 'Klae-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh dih :deh.
Nyor-a' :zi-' or :due'-a' dhih. Jorwor: 'nyi :a zi :a 'bei'-a' dhih :ke.
:Mor a 'ye nimi 'do 'doror', a dhen-eh, a 'ye-eh' di. Nyor-a' dhele:-' deh dih. 'Tele' se 'de eh 'di :ne. A-a' 'worn-:-', a-a' :porluh⧾-a' :kpon-dih:-' a zabe.
Deh no-eh, Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh za-eh' 'weh, eh 'da, 'Bluhba-: 'dekorn: deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :en :ne-a dha or ken-: en :korn 'de :Gwlor :baa' bo.

:Mor nyor :or se-a 'Klae-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' po, or :pi-dih: :on, 'de :an 'bhorn :on 'ye-ih' di, :an-a' dhele:-' deh dih, di deh or mu-a 'o :on ybei' :ya. A-a' 'worn-:-', a-a' :porluh⧾-a' :kpon-dih:-' a zabe.

Jorwor: :mor nyor zela: :on :gwluhuh' :eh :mor eh 'dhu-dih-eh: zuu gban 'i, :yee' 'bor eh-a' di-a'. Deh no-eh, 'yu :or zela:-a :on :gwluhuh', or-a' dhih-: 'dekorn: or-a' :porluh :ne-' or zabe :kpon-dih: eh-a' dhih-: eh-: :korn dhih :on 'ye eh-a' di-a' 'bor.

'On :se-' :an-a' dhih zi. Jorwor: :yor :or zela: :on :gwluhuh', or-: :korn dhih 'an zi, or-a' :porluh :ne-' or zabe :kpon-dih:. :Mor nyor :noror'-a' :porluh kpon-dih-or zabe, 'do deh-a' no-a' bo, :yee' :eh :korn dhih, eh 'ye 'on 'i kan :eh, :mor 'an :porluh se 'on zabe :kpon-dih: 'do eh bo?
Deh 'on di-a, :mor 'on po Nyorsoa-a' 'zio 'do eh bo, :yee' :eh :korn dhih an wlu-dih 'on 'bhun dih, 'do deh :eh :korn-a 'zio 'on po-a Nyorsoa, eh-a' dhih :eh?
Deh :due' 'on 'ye-a' :za 'de a bo, eh-: 'dhu. A-a' :yeh di deh :o, A-a' :yeh 'na :o. Deh-beh-deh-beh: a mu-a :no :o, a no-eh, eh 'ye Nyorsoa-a' 'nyne dhih-a' 'i 'beh-a' 'nyi.
A-a' :po 'o deh :gwie 'i, eh :ne-' nyor 'gbele:, :eh beh :Jueh'-nyor:⧾ 'o-: :eh beh nyor⧾ :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor:⧾ 'o-: :eh beh nyor⧾ :on :ne-a 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'chore-' 'o-:.

:Ka 'on no-a, 'de 'on vorn-a, 'on 'ye-a nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh, an-a' :porluh⧾ dih 'pehn-dih:, 'ka-: a 'ye no :ke. 'On :se-' 'an 'jeh 'yor-eh-a' dhih zi. Jorwor: nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh-a' :ne, me-: 'an zi, eh 'ye-eh' no, on 'ye 'puh.
A zi 'o 'an 'gor klei', :ka 'on no-a 'o 'Klae-a' 'gor klei' :zi-eh :ke.
'On po a dhih bo 'do 'an dhih-a' :gwluhuh' bo :po-dih-eh bo, 'do deh⧾-a' klehkpeh 'on :torne: a-uh, en-' dih :kpon-eh bo. :Ka 'on no-a en-' :zi-dih-eh 'de a bo, 'ka-: a no en-' dih kpon-a'.

:Yee' 'an 'bhorn a 'ye deh :daa dih 'worn, :ka 'Klae no-a nyor :klaba' 'do nyor⧾-kpalu⧾-a' klehkpeh 'dlu. 'Ka :wor nyor-kpalu no :ke, 'de or no nyor :klaba' 'do 'nynor-kpao' 'dlu bo. 'De Nyorsoa no nyor :klaba' 'do 'Klae 'dlu bo :ke.
:Yee' nyor-kpalu-a' :yor :or mu-a 'de Nyorsoa bo :wlu 'de 'chore-', :eh beh or po Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh-: 'de or 'ye deh 'dlu 'dhu, :yee' or :se-' 'Klae :or :ne-a 'o or 'dlu bo deh-' 'ye.

'De mor 'nynor-a' :yor :or mu-a 'de Nyorsoa bo :wlu, :eh beh or po Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh-: 'de 'chore-', 'de or 'ye :ao', or se deh 'dlu bla, :yee' or :se-' or-a'a: yibeor: :or :ne-a 'o or 'dlu bo deh-' 'ye. :Yee' or gweh 'nynor :or :korn-a 'dlu on 'kploror:-a, eh 'ye-or' dhen dih po.
:Mor eh 'dhu 'nynor se deh 'dlu bla, :yee' 'nyi or chehn or-a' 'dlu :dueh'leh:. :Mor eh no dhen-deh 'nynor 'ye or-a' 'dlu chehn, 'de or 'ye or-a' 'dlu 'kploror:, :yee' 'nyi or bla deh 'dlu 'da.

Nyor-kpalu se :korn or 'ye deh 'dlu 'dhu 'de 'chore-'. Deh no-eh, nyor-kpalu :ne 'de Nyorsoa-a' tu-', 'de or :to-dih: Nyorsoa-a' dhih-a' 'i 'beh-a' nyor⧾ 'i. Jorwor: 'nynor, or-: :to-dih: nyor-kpalu-a' dhih-a' 'i 'beh-a' nyor⧾ 'i.
Deh no-eh, eh :se 'o 'nynor-kpao' 'bhun Nyorsoa :se-' deh :za, 'de or :se-' nyor-kpalu no. Jorwor: 'do nyor-kpalu 'bhun :oo', or :za deh, 'de or no 'nynor-kpao'.
'De mor eh :se 'nynor-kpao'-a' dhih nyor-kpalu :se-' :no-eh:. Jorwor: nyor-kpalu-a' dhih :oo', 'nynor-kpao' :no-eh:.
Eh-: :korn dhih 'nynor-kpao' :korn or 'ye deh 'dlu bla, 'enjor-nyor⧾-a' dhih, 'de eh 'ye-eh' nyor⧾ 'i :to-dih: :ka or-a'a: yibeor :ne-a 'o or 'dlu.
Jorwor: 'de :Gwlor :baa'-a' deh 'di, 'nynor-kpao' se 'beh-dih: or 'ye 'o or 'bli dih :nyna, 'de mor nyor-kpalu se 'beh-dih: or 'ye 'o or 'bli dih :nyna :ke.
Deh no-eh, :ka 'nynor 'wluh-a 'o nyor-kpalu 'bhun, 'de or :no-eh, 'ka-: 'nynor-kpao' no, 'de or 'wluh nyor-kpalu :ke. 'De deh⧾-a' klehkpeh 'wluh 'de Nyorsoa bo.
A :na-dih-eh :gwluhuh' dih 'do a-a' 'jeh-a' :porluh⧾ ken. Eh :nmor-: 'yi 'nynor-kpao' 'ye :ao' or se deh 'dlu bla, 'de or 'ye 'de Nyorsoa bo :wlu 'do :gwlor-nyor⧾ ybei' :e?
Eh :se :ka Nyorsoa no-a :gwlor-nyor-buo no-a' 'de or-a' 'kmo-' 'di, eh-: se a deh :torne: :eh :mor, :mor nyor-kpalu 'ble 'mii: :dhorno'⧾, :yee' eh no dhen-deh :e?
Jorwor: :mor 'nynor-kpao' 'ble 'mii: :dhorno'⧾, :yee' eh no or-a' 'yi dih :nmor-eh:. Deh no-eh, Nyorsoa 'nyi-or 'mii: :dao' 'weh, or 'ye or-a' 'dlu 'zile:.
:Yee' :mor eh 'dhu deh 'on :za-a-', nyor se-eh ken dih 'worn-dih:, :yee' :a mor-: 'dekorn: Nyorsoa-a' 'chore-nyor⧾-: :a se deh :neheh' 'ble :a 'ye 'o :no-dih:.

:Yee' deh 'an yi-a-' :za 'da, 'on :se-' a dhih bo :po i. Deh no-eh, a-a' 'gbon-dih-eh: a 'gbon-dih-a, 'de a za-a :Gwlor :baa' :weheh', eh-a' 'worn, eh-a' :za-dih: a-uh', jorwor: eh 'kor-dih a-uh 'weh.
Deh no-eh, :zai'-deh:, :mor a 'gbon-dih: 'do 'chore bo, :yee' 'on 'worn-ih' :ka deh-' :gble-eh :ne-a 'de a 'nyne-'. 'On yubo-eh' en-' klehkpeh :se sih.
:Yee' 'on yubo-eh' deh-' :gble-eh :korn eh 'ye 'de a 'nyne-' :ne, nyor⧾ :on no-a :dhehehn-nyor⧾ 'de a 'nyne-', 'de nyor⧾ 'ye-uh' yubo:.
:Mor a 'gbon-dih: :dha :due', :yee' :Gwlor :baa'-a' gban 'i :ne-dii-deh:, a 'da, a di-a, a-a' di-eh, 'de :ka 'jeh nor 'di.
Deh no-eh, :mor a :taa-eh di, a-a' :fuo: a 'bei' ken. :Yee' :noo'-a' 'ye dii-deh. 'De :noo' 'na, 'de nomor-a no-uh.

Eh :korn dhih :oo' :eh? A se a-a' 'jeh-a'a: 'gbu⧾ 'ble a 'ye-a' deh 'di :di-dih: :e? 'De mor a 'ye-a' 'di 'na-dih: :e? :Yee' a vlehn Nyorsoa-a' 'chore 'weh :e? A 'bhorn a 'ye nyor⧾ :on se-a deh-a' :za-da 'ble dhen :no-dih: :e? :Yee' :kaa 'on 'ye 'da 'de a bo :eh? 'On po a dhih bo :e? 'On se-eh 'beh-dih:.
:Yee' nyor⧾ deh :torne-eh: 'on :za-a: 'de :Gwlor :baa' bo, :eh 'on :torne: a-uh :ke, eh-: :dhe dih. 'Do glu-we-eh: on :plo-dih-or 'di, 'do :wor or 'duo-dih: 'bhlee-'.

:Yee' :yeh or gweh-a Nyorsoa-a' 'zio :po-eh 'i, :yee' or :chehn-dih-eh-: dih, 'de or 'kwa, or 'da, 'Bhlee: :daa, 'an yau: :on :za-dih-eh 'slaa 'do a-a' dhih bo, mo-: 'o. A di-eh, 'do 'an dhih-a' :gwluhuh' bo :po-dih-eh bo.

'De :ka :ne-a :due' 'di, :yeh on gweh-a 'gwie-deh: :daa, eh-a' di-a' 'i, :yee' or 'duo: 'korbuh :on 'yi-a 'glee-nomor 'di 'weh, or 'da, 'Korbuh :daa, on no kuo :dele', 'do a mor-: 'dekorn: Nyorsoa-: 'nyne bo, kuo 'an nyomor no-eh, 'de :or :ne-a 'kpih ken. :Yee' ti-a' klehkpeh bo, a mu-or 'na-:, a no-eh, 'do 'an dhih-a' :gwluhuh' bo :po-dih-eh bo.

:Yee' :Poror' kpa or-a' wlu 'dlu bo, or 'da, Ti-a' klehkpeh bo, a mu-a 'bhlee: :daa :di, 'de a 'ye-a nomor :ne-a 'noror 'korbuh :daa 'di 'na, :yee' :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'meheh'-wele-eh: 'o a po :chio'lo:, eh 'ye or-a' de :yi-ti ken :yeh-dih:.

:Yee' eh-a' dhih, nyor :yor :or mu-a :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'bhlee: :daa :di, 'de :or 'ye-a nomor :or :ne-a 'noror 'korbuh :daa 'di 'na, 'de se or-a' deh-' 'ye ka 'di, :yee' or no deh-zon: 'do :Gwlor :baa'-a' yau-: 'dekorn: or-a' nyomor-: bo.
:Yee' :mor nyor 'ye 'bhlee: :daa di, 'de or 'ye 'korbuh :daa 'di 'na-dih:, :yee' 'nyi nyor :dao' or pobo: 'do or-a' 'jeh :porluh ken deh 'jeh, :mor deh-zon se 'o :ne :weh, 'de or 'ye-ih' 'duo:.

Deh no-eh, nyor :or mu-a 'bhlee: :daa :di, 'de :or 'ye-a' 'korbuh :daa 'di 'na-dih:, 'de :or 'ye :ao' :or se-a deh :Gwlor :baa'-a' yau :bleh-dih:-a 'i yubo:, :yee' or :ya 'de Nyorsoa-a' zabe: :zi-eh: 'do or-a' 'jeh bo.
Eh-: :korn dhih, 'de a-a' :dha :dhulu'-a kormu, 'de an-a' 'kpih-a chehn, 'de :noo' 'meh.
Jorwor: :mor :a pobo 'o :a-a' 'jeh :porluh ken :zai', :mor deh-zon se 'o :ne, :yee' Nyorsoa-a' zabe :se-' :a :kpon i.
Jorwor: :mor :Gwlor :baa' zi :a-a' zabe, :yee' or 'dhu-dih: :a kplen 'jeh. Deh no-eh, or :se-' 'bhorn :mor or :taa 'kmo-a' zabe 'i chehn, 'de or :ne-' :a :dha :due' po.
:Yee' 'do eh-a' dha, 'an 'Klae :de-di'-boi'-a:, :mor a 'gbon-dih: 'do :Gwlor :baa'-a' gban 'i :ne-dii-deh-a' di 'da, :yee' a :fuo: a 'bei' ken.

:Mor 'moeh :taa a-a' nyor no, :yee' 'nyi or di deh 'de or 'bli 'gbu, 'de or :ne 'o Nyorsoa-a' zabe: :zi-eh 'zorn pa, 'do a-a' 'gbon-dih: 'da. :Yih :en :sie:-a 'o, :mor 'on 'yle, :yee' 'an mu-ih 'kpa :po.
:Yee' 'do Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu-a' 'nyii'-deh⧾ 'bhun, 'an 'Klae :de-di'-boi'-a:, 'on :se-' 'bhorn en 'ye 'de a 'di dih :kpe-dih:.
A yubo-eh', ti a se-a Nyorsoa yubo: :zai', :yee' a :bo-dih-eh: dih, 'de :ka :dhulu' 'di, 'de a za zuu:⧾ :en se-a :febeh' 'ble en-' :weheh'.

:Yee' eh-a' dhih, 'an 'bhorn a 'ye-eh' yubo:, nyor :or Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu-a na-dih-a, or se 'beh-dih: or 'ye :Yusu' 'chlo bo po. Nyor Gban 'i :ne :Zulu-a na-dih-a, or :due', or-: 'beh-dih: :or 'ye-eh' :za 'de or 'worn :ka :Yusu' 'dhu-a :Gwlor :baa'-'.
Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu-a' 'nyii'-deh⧾ :ne 'doror: 'dor. Jorwor: Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu: :ne-a :due' mo-: 'o 'gboror:.
Nyorsoa-a' :koan-a' no-a' :ne 'doror: 'dor. Jorwor: :Gwlor :baa' :ne-a :due' :oo' 'gboror:.
Nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh, on 'ble 'kpih 'doror: 'dor 'do Nyorsoa-a' :koan: :no-eh bo. Jorwor: Nyorsoa :ne-a :due', or-: 'o, :or 'nyi nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh 'kpih 'doror: 'dor, 'do an-a' :koan: :no-eh bo.
Nyorsoa 'nyi nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh or-a' :Zulu-a' 'nyii'-deh:⧾ :due' :due', eh 'ye-eh' no, eh 'ye 'chore-a' klehkpeh-' :za-dih:.
Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu-a 'nyi nyor :noror' tubo-wlu:⧾ :en :ne-a :toror' 'di. 'De mo-: :ne-a :due' an 'nyi :noror' tubo-wlu:⧾ :en 'ble-a deh-' dih 'worn-eh: 'de en 'di.
:Zulu: :ne-a :due', mo-: :an 'nyi nyor :noror' dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh: 'de or no nyor⧾ 'di dih 'ma-dih-deh⧾. 'De mo-: :ne-a :due' :neheh', an 'nyi :noror' 'kpih :en 'puh-dih-a puhba-nyor⧾.

:Zulu: :ne-a :due', mo-: :an 'nyi nyor :noror' 'kpih or 'ye nyor⧾ 'di dih 'ma-dih-deh⧾ no. 'De an 'nyi nyor :noror' Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-eh. 'De an 'nyi :noror' 'kpih or 'ye deh⧾ :en 'wluh-a 'de on bo-: 'dekorn: :yih :en se-a 'de 'wluh-: or 'ye-ih' dih zela:. An 'nyi nyor :noror' 'kpih or 'ye wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor po :en Gban 'i :ne :Zulu 'nyi-or, or 'ye-a' po. 'De an 'nyi nyor :noror' 'kpih or 'ye wlu⧾ :dao' gbor :za.
Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu: :ne-a :due' mo-: 'o :an no deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :daa. :Ka an 'bhorn-a 'ka-: 'o on no nyor⧾ 'nyii'-deh:⧾ 'doror: 'dor :daa en-' 'nyi-a' :due' :due'.
'Klae gweh yau: :on 'ble-a deh⧾ :doru' 'do on 'bhun. Jorwor: on no deh :due'. Keen' :mloror' deh⧾ :doru', me-: 'dhu-dih-uh 'i.

:Yee' 'de :ka :ne-a :due' 'di, :Jueh'-nyor⧾-: :yuh :on :se-a :Jueh'-nyor⧾-: 'ge-nynuu-: :yuh :on :se-a 'ge-nynuu-: 'de Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu :due' 'di :oo', 'do :wor :a-a' klehkpeh :a :po-dih-eh: 'ni 'dlu, 'de :a-a' klehkpeh, :a no yau :due', 'de Nyorsoa 'nyi :a-a' klehkpeh or-a' :Zulu: :ne-a :due' 'do :a-a' :porluh⧾ ken.
Deh no-eh, eh :se deh :due' :eh :se-' yau no. Jorwor: deh⧾ :dhulu' me-: :po-eh: :dha :due' me-: no yau.
:Yee' :mor eh 'dhu buh 'da, :Ka 'on :se-a son, :yee' 'on :se yau-a' deh, :mleheh' :se-uh' yau-deh-' :zai' 'gboror:.
'De mor :mor :dou' 'da, :ka 'on :se-a 'yli-eh:, :yee' 'on :se yau-a' deh, :mleheh' :se-uh' yau-a' deh-' :zai' :ke.
:Yee' :mor yau-a' klehkpeh 'dhu 'yli-eh-' :dee', :yee' :kaa an mu :no, 'de on 'ye dih 'worn :eh? 'De mor :mor an-a' klehkpeh 'dhu :dou'-', :yee' :kaa an mu :no 'de on 'ye deh⧾-a' 'no 'worn :eh?
Jorwor: :ka on :ne-a :naa, Nyorsoa po-uh deh⧾ 'doror: 'dor 'bhun dih, :ka or 'bhorn-a on 'ye-a' :ne.
:Mor yau-a' klehkpeh no 'kplo :due' :dee', :yee' yau :se-' :ne i :dee'.
Jorwor: :ka on :ne-a :naa, deh⧾ :doru' me-: 'dhu-eh: 'o on 'bhun, jorwor: yau :due' :oo'.
:Yee' eh-a' dhih, 'yli-eh se 'beh-dih: eh 'ye :ao', Son, 'on se :korn 'on 'ye :on 'ble. 'De mor, 'dlu se 'beh-dih: on 'ye :ao' 'da :ke 'de buh⧾ bo.
Keen', yau-a' 'for :on :a no-a on se 'kpih ken :ne, an-a' 'jeh :dao', mo-: :a :korn :a 'ye 'ble :gbor :gbor.

:Yee' yau-a' 'for⧾-' :yih :a no-a en se deh-' 'dhu-eh: deh 'jeh, en-' 'jeh :dao', me-: :a 'ye deh-' deh 'jeh. 'De yau-a' 'for⧾-' :yih :a se-a 'o :gwlor :gwea :to-eh 'beh-dih:, me-: :a pa-dih 'wla⧾-' deh 'jeh.

Jorwor: yau-a' 'for⧾-' :yih :a to-a 'o :gwlor :gwea, :a se :korn :a 'ye-a 'o en-' bo dih pobo-eh no deh :dao'. Nyorsoa-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh: po yau :dha :due' 'de :ka :noror' 'di, 'de deh-' 'ye-eh: :klaba' 'ye 'for⧾-' :yih nyor⧾ se-a zlo 'nyi-eh:.
Nyorsoa no deh :daa 'weh, 'de deh-' :gble-eh :ne 'o yau 'bhun :ne. An-a' 'for⧾-a' klehkpeh 'ye en 'bei'-a' deh bo :korn.
:Mor yau-a' 'for :taa 'kle 'ye, :yee' :yih :en :sie:-a 'o, en 'ye 'kle :ke. :Mor 'for :due' :po-eh: dhih bo, :yee' 'for⧾ :yih :sie:-a 'o, en gble or-a' 'mona: :dao' 'weh :ke.
:Yee' a-a' klehkpeh a no 'Klae-a' yau:, 'de a no an-a' 'for⧾ :due' :due'.

:Yee' 'de 'chore :ke, Nyorsoa 'dhu deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :dhe-da:. :Tehn 'i-deh:, or po 'o :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor:⧾, :yee' 'sororn' :neh, or-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor:⧾, taan :neh, nyor⧾ deh :torne-nyor:⧾. :Yee' nyor⧾ :on 'kpih 'nyi-eh :on 'ye-a deh⧾ :kolu'⧾ :kolu'⧾ no, nyor⧾ :on 'kpih 'nyi-eh :on 'ye-a puhba-nyor⧾ 'puh-dih:, mo-: kor 'o dih, :korn nyor⧾ :an za-dih-a nyor⧾-: :korn nyor⧾ :on yubo:-a 'o deh bo dih pobo-eh-: 'dekorn: :yuh :an po-a wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor Gban 'i :ne :Zulu 'nyi-uh-a, on 'ye-a' po.

An-a' klehkpeh, an-a' no :koan :due'. Eh :se an-a' klehkpeh, mo-: :an no :koan :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾-a no-a :deh, :korn mor Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-eh-: nyor⧾ deh :torne-eh-:. 'De mor eh :se nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh, mo-: 'ble 'kpih :en no-a deh⧾ :kolu'⧾ :kolu'⧾ :deh.

Eh :se nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh on se 'kpih :en 'puh-dih-a puhba-nyor⧾ 'ble, :korn mor wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor :po-eh-: :en Gban 'i :ne :Zulu 'nyi-uh-a, on 'ye-a' po. 'De mor eh :se nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh, mo-: yubo: en-' gbor :za-eh :ke :deh.
'Nyii'-deh:⧾ :en no-a 'nyii'-deh⧾ :en 'kpa-a deh ken, 'do :wor a 'ye a-a' :porluh⧾ po. Jorwor: en-' :gwie: :eh 'sleh-a 'i, 'de :eh :zi-a 'o deh⧾-a' klehkpeh, 'an mu-eh a :torne:.

:Yee' :mor eh 'dhu 'on po :gwlor-nyor-wlu, :korn mor 'enjor-a' wlu, jorwor: :mor 'on se :ybeh-dih-eh 'ble, :yee' dhih 'an za-a-', en gweh :ka nyor bla 'kpole-eh-: 'dekorn: 'gea-: :en po-a :dhlumeh' :dhulu', 'de dhih en za-a-', nyor-a' 'worn-ih'-a' dih.

'An :yeh 'ble 'kpih, 'on 'ye Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh po, 'an :yeh 'ble deh-' dih 'worn-eh-a' klehkpeh, 'de 'on 'ye 'slan⧾-a' klehkpeh-' dih 'worn, 'de 'on 'ye dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh-a' klehkpeh :eh :korn-a :eh 'ye-a tluh :gwliin' :za-dih: 'ble, jorwor: :mor 'on se :ybeh-dih-eh 'ble, :yee' 'on se deh-' 'dhu-eh:.

'De mor :mor 'on 'nyi 'an-a: deh⧾-a' klehkpeh 'on 'ble-a se deh-a' :za-da 'ble-nyor⧾, 'de 'on 'ye 'an yau-a' klehkpeh 'kwla :za on 'ye 'yli :po-eh:, :mor 'on se :ybeh-dih-eh 'ble, en-' klehkpeh :se 'o 'on deh po 'gboror:.
:Porluh-a' dih :kpon-eh-: an-a' 'yi dih :nmor-eh-: me-: 'dhu :ybeh-dih-eh. :Ybeh-dih-eh se :gwlehehn'-: :an-a' 'jeh dhih bo :po-eh-: 'dekorn: 'jeh 'i 'beh-dih-eh-: 'ble.
:Ybeh-dih-eh-a' po nyor⧾ yaa'e dih. Eh-a' zi eh-a' 'jeh 'yor-eh-a' :due'-a' dhih. Eh-a' 'dhobo:, eh-a' 'kpa 'chehn-'. Eh-a' 'ble-dih: dhih 'di dih.
Nyor⧾ :on 'ble-a :ybeh-dih-eh, an-a' no 'mona :mor nyor no deh-zon. Jorwor: dhih-a' 'yor-eh:, me-: :korn dhih an no 'mona.
:Ybeh-dih-eh 'ble 'di dih :ku-eh: 'do nyor⧾ bo. Eh 'ble nyor⧾-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh-: an-a' :gwlii' :dhe-eh-: 'dekorn: :porluh-a' dih :kpon-eh-: 'do on bo.

:Ybeh-dih-eh se 'dlu-' :jla 'da :korn. Jorwor: Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-eh mu dih :gweh. Wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor :po-eh: :en Gban 'i :ne :Zulu 'nyi-a nyor⧾, on 'ye-a' po, en mu dih :gweh. Deh 'i yubo-eh: :eh no-a 'nyii'-deh: Nyorsoa 'nyi :a-uh, eh mu dih :gweh.

Deh no-eh, deh 'i yubo-eh: :eh no-a 'nyii'-deh: Nyorsoa 'nyi :a-uh, :a se eh-a' klehkpeh 'zorn gweh, 'de mor :a se 'nyii'-deh: :eh no-a tubo-wlu:⧾ :en Nyorsoa 'nyi :a-uh, en-' wele-eh: :po-eh-a' klehkpeh 'zorn gweh :ke.
Jorwor: :mor ti deh :eh gweh-a :vlehehn'-', eh mu-a 'de :yi, :yee' :yih :en se-a 'de :gweh, en mu :zi.

:Yee' ti 'on no-a 'yu-yu, :yee' :ka 'yu-yu-a no-a :wlu-a', 'ka-: 'an no :wlu-a'. :Ka 'yu-yu-a no-a :gwluhuh' dih :na-dih-eh, 'ka-: 'an no :ke. :Ka or no-a deh-' dih 'worn-eh, 'ka-: 'an no. Jorwor: :yeh 'on no-a nyor-kpalu :naa, :yee' 'on 'tali: 'yu-yu-deh⧾-a' klehkpeh-: dih.

:Yee' :kana :naa, deh⧾ :a 'worn-a dih 'de Nyorsoa-deh 'di :naa, en gweh :ka nyor :or pobo-a 'de 'ni :eh se-a 'yli zelie: bo. Jorwor: or :ne :a mor-: :a mu ybei' dih dhele: 'de ybei'. :Kana :naa 'on 'see Nyorsoa-a' yubo-eh 'zorn gweh. Jorwor: 'de ybei', 'an mu-or dih 'worn-: deh 'jeh, :ka or no-a 'an dhih-' dih 'worn-eh deh 'jeh :naa.
:Yee' deh⧾ taan :daa, en :se-' dih :gweh i, dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh-: deh :gwlii' :dhe-eh-: 'dekorn: :ybeh-dih-eh-:. Jorwor: :ybeh-dih-eh:, eh-: no en-' klehkpeh-a' 'dlu.

:Yee' :ybeh-dih-eh:, eh-: 'ye deh no, a 'ye 'kwla⧾-' dih 'bhorn. 'Nyi a-a' :porluh⧾ sin 'gabaa, a 'ye Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu-a' 'nyii'-deh⧾ 'ble. :Yee' 'de Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-eh bo, 'do :wor a-a' :porluh⧾ 'ye :sin-dih: 'gabaa, eh 'ye 'o dih :zi.

Deh no-eh, nyor :or po-a wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor :en Gban 'i :ne :Zulu 'nyi-or, or 'ye-a' po, or :se 'de nyor bo :wlu, jorwor: 'de Nyorsoa bo :oo' or wlu. Deh no-eh, nyor-a' 'worn deh or za-a-' dih. Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu-a' 'kpih, me-: or no, 'de or za Nyorsoa-a' 'slan⧾-a' dhih-'.
Jorwor: nyor :or po-a Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh, or wlu 'de :gwlor-nyor⧾ bo. 'De or ku-dih-uh dih, or po 'de an-a' 'kpih, 'de or dhe-uh :porluh⧾ 'di dih.
Nyor :or po-a wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor :en Gban 'i :ne :Zulu 'nyi-or, or 'ye-a' po, or ku-dih or-a' 'jeh :due' dih 'klein'. Jorwor: nyor :or po-a Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh, or ku-dih 'chore-a' klehkpeh dih.

Eh mu 'on 'ton :korn, a-a' klehkpeh, a 'ye wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor po :mloror' :kpeheh:. Jorwor: eh mu 'on 'ton :korn deh 'jeh, a 'ye Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh po. Deh no-eh, nyor :or po-a Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh, or-: 'kpa deh ken 'gabaa, or-: :zi 'o :yor :or po-a wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor-'. :Mor eh 'dhu nyor :ne 'o, or 'ye wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor or po-a gbor :za, 'de 'chore 'ye dih ku, :yee' 'on :se-' :mleheh' 'da.

:Yee' 'an 'Klae :de-di'-boi'-a:, :mor 'on yi 'o a bo, 'de 'on 'ye wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor po :poo:, :yee' 'mo :za-dih-eh-' :yeheh 'on :za-dih: a-uh' :eh? :Mor eh 'dhu 'on :ya 'de tubo-wlu:⧾ Nyorsoa :to-dih:-a 'on 'i-: :eh beh deh-' dih 'worn-eh-: Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-eh-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ deh :torne-eh-:, :yee' 'on :se-' :mleheh' 'da.

'De :ka :ne-a :due' 'di, :mor blaa-deh:⧾ :en se-a :febeh' 'ble :en 'kpa-a :dholo-: 'dekorn: 'solo' :wepe'-: :mor nyor :or bla-ih-a, or se en-' wlu-' dih zela:, :yee' :kaa nyor⧾-a mu deh an bla-a eh-a' dih 'worn-a' :no :eh?
:Yee' :mor 'yu :or bla-a tuh :vuwor', or se or-a' wlu-' dih zela: deh 'jeh, :yee' nyor :yoror :or mu ta-tiei dih 'dhu-' :eh?
:Yee' 'de :ka :ne-a :due' 'di, :kaa nyor⧾-a mu deh a za-a-' dih 'worn-a' :no :eh? :Mor a-a' tubo-wlu⧾-a' po-a' klehkpeh :ne 'de wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor 'di? A-a' wlu-a mu 'o 'ploba-' dih 'kpa-:.
'Dawor'⧾-wlu:⧾ 'doror: 'dor, me-: :ne dha yao 'zorn. Eh se wlu :korn, :on 'ye :ao' :on se deh 'i :bleh-dih:.
Jorwor: :mor 'on se wlu on po-a yubo:, :yee' nyor :or po-uh-a, or no 'dawor'-yu: 'do 'on bo, 'de 'on no 'dawor'-yu 'do or bo :ke.
:Yee' eh-a' dhih, :ka a-a' :porluh⧾-a sin-a, a 'ye-a Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu-a' 'nyii'-deh⧾ 'ble, :yee' a vorn a 'ye 'nyii'-deh:⧾ :en ku-dih-a 'chore dih, a 'ye-ih' :koan :no-dih: 'gabaa.
:Yee' eh-a' dhih, nyor :or po-a wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor, 'nyi or dhele: Nyorsoa dih, or 'ye-or' 'kpih 'nyi, or 'ye deh or :za-a-', eh-a' gbor :za-eh 'beh-dih:.

Deh no-eh, :mor 'on :taa 'de Nyorsoa bo wlu, 'de wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor 'di, :yee' or-a' :Zulu: mo-: :an yi-dih 'on-', :an wlu 'de or bo. Jorwor: 'an 'dlu 'di dih :na-dih-deh se 'o deh 'ye. Deh no-eh, 'an-a' 'worn deh-' dih.

:Yee' deh 'an mu-a :no, eh-: 'dhu, 'an mu Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu-a' wlu :po, 'on 'ye 'de or bo :wlu, 'de 'on 'ye 'an :gwlor-nyor-wlu no, :on 'wluh-a 'de 'an 'dlu 'di dih :na-dih-deh bo, 'on 'ye 'de or bo :wlu :ke. :Yee' 'an mu or-a' :Zulu-a' wlu :no, 'on 'ye 'duh ble, 'de 'on 'ye 'an :gwlor-nyor-wlu no, :on 'wluh-a 'de 'an 'dlu 'di dih :na-dih-deh bo, 'on 'ye 'duh ble :ke.

:Yee' :mor :on po Nyorsoa-a' :Zulu-a' wlu, 'de :on 'ye or-a' 'zio po 'klein', :yee' :kaa nyor⧾ :on se-a Nyorsoa-a' deh-' dih 'worn deh 'jeh, 'de :on :ne-a 'de a bo 'chore-', :kaa an mu :an-a' bo 'worn-dih-eh :no :eh, 'do :an-a' Nyorsoa-a' 'zio :po-wlu bo :eh?
:Mor :an-a' Nyorsoa-a' 'zio :po-wlu-a' :yeh :nmor 'yi dih, jorwor: :on 'be :yor :ne-a 'o, or :se-' :za-dih-eh:.
'On po Nyorsoa-a' 'zio, 'on 'ye wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor po :en Gban 'i :ne :Zulu 'nyi-a 'on, 'on 'ye-a' po, 'on 'ye 'o a-a' klehkpeh-' :zi.

Jorwor: eh mu 'yi dih :nmor, 'on 'ye wlu⧾-a' 'yor :mm' po, :en nyor⧾ 'beh-dih:-a on 'ye-a' dih 'worn, 'do an-a' deh :torne: 'da, :eh :zi 'o 'on po wlu⧾-a' 'wlu :wlu 'wlu 'de wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor 'di, 'de nyor :se 'o deh 'worn.

:Yee' 'an 'Klae :de-di'-boi'-a:, a 'bor :gwluhuh' dih :na-dih-eh, :ka 'nynuu: :nyene'-a no-a. Jorwor: a gweh 'nynuu: :bleheh'eh:⧾ :on se-a deh-zon-a' deh 'i yubo:. A 'nyi a-a' :gwluhuh' dih :na-dih-eh gweh :ka nyor⧾ :on ku-a dih, 'de Nyorsoa-deh 'di.

Eh 'chle-eh:-' 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh 'di, eh 'da, :Gwlor :baa' 'da, 'An mu nyor⧾ :an po-a 'dawor'⧾-wlu:⧾ 'sluh⧾ :no, 'on 'ye 'de 'an nyor⧾ bo :wlu. 'An mu 'duhba⧾ wlu 'worn :po on 'ye 'an tubo-wlu⧾ po. Jorwor: 'an nyor⧾ :se-' 'on :dou'⧾ bo :to i 'gboror:.

:Yee' wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor :po-eh :en Gban 'i :ne :Zulu 'nyi-a nyor⧾, on 'ye-a' po, en :se 'yi :to-dih-deh: 'do nyor⧾ :on po-a 'Klae-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' bo. Jorwor: nyor⧾ :on se-a or-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' po, mo-: :korn 'yi :to-dih-deh: 'o. 'De :ka :ne-a :due' 'di, Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-eh se 'yi :to-dih-deh: 'do nyor⧾ :on se-a 'Klae-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' po bo. Jorwor: en no 'yi :to-dih-deh: 'do nyor⧾ :on po-a or-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' bo.

:Yee' :mor eh 'dhu 'chore-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh 'gbon-dih: :dha :due' 'de nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh on 'ye wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor :po-eh ya-' 'duo:, 'de nyor⧾ :on se-a Nyorsoa-a' deh-' dih 'worn deh 'jeh-: 'dekorn: nyor⧾ :on se-a 'Klae-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' po-: 'de on 'ye pa, on se 'beh-dih: on 'ye :ao' sena-: no a-uh :e?

Jorwor: :mor nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh :taa wlu⧾ :en 'wluh-a 'de Nyorsoa bo en-' wele-eh po, 'de nyor⧾ :on se-a 'Klae-a' dhih dhih 'jeh-' po-: :yuh :on se-a Nyorsoa-a' deh-' dih 'worn deh 'jeh-: 'de on 'ye pa, :yee' an mu-eh 'i yubo: :ka on 'dhu-a deh⧾-zon:⧾ :no-nyor⧾-' 'do deh on 'worn-a bo. An-a' :porluh⧾-a mu-uh dhih :yeh-dih:, 'do deh⧾-a' klehkpeh on 'worn-a bo.

:Yee' deh⧾ :en 'zile:-a 'do on :porluh⧾ ken, en mu gbor :za-eh:. :Yee' an mu dih 'jli-: on 'ye Nyorsoa-a' :weheh' :za, 'de on 'ye-eh' :za 'de on 'worn, on 'ye :ao', Dhih 'jeh, Nyorsoa :ne 'noror a 'nyne-' 'weh 'jeh ka.

:Yee' eh :nmor-: 'yi, 'an 'Klae :de-di'-boi'-a:, :mor a 'kpa :dha :due' a 'ye Nyorsoa-a' :weheh' :za, :yee' nyor⧾ :noo' ble Nyorsoa-a' 'zio :po-duh, :noo' :torne: nyor⧾ deh, :noo' po tubo-wlu:⧾ Nyorsoa :to-dih-uh-a 'i, :noo' po tubo-wlu⧾ 'de wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor 'di :en Gban 'i :ne :Zulu 'nyi-uh-a, on 'ye-a' po. :Yee' deh :eh :za-eh 'de wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor 'di, :noo' za-eh gbor. A no deh⧾-a' klehkpeh :daa, 'de eh 'ye-eh' no, 'de 'Klae-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-nyor⧾ 'ye :za-dih-eh:, 'de on 'ye ku.
:Yee' :mor nyor mu wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor :po 'de 'chore-', 'nyi nyor⧾ 'sororn', nyor⧾ taan no-eh, 'nyi on 'tola: 'de, an-a' :wlu-dih:-' :dha :due'. :Yee' 'nyi nyor :noror' :za dhih on :za-a-' gbor.
Jorwor: :mor nyor se 'o :ne, or 'ye-ih' gbor :za, :yee' nyor :or po-a wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor :dao', 'nyi or no 'dhuan, 'nyi or :wlu 'do or-a' 'jeh-a' :porluh ken-: 'dekorn: 'de Nyorsoa bo-:.
:Mor Nyorsoa 'nyi nyor⧾ wele-eh: :on 'ye-eh' po, :yee' nyor⧾ 'sororn', nyor⧾ taan, mo-: :on 'ye-eh' no. 'De :yuh :on :sie:-a 'o, on 'ye 'de dhih :en :za-eh:-' 'di pobo:.
Jorwor: :mor nyor :ne 'de a 'nyne-', 'de or 'ye dih :dhe, 'do a-a' 'gbon-dih: 'da, 'de Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu⧾ 'ye-or' 'nyi-eh:, :yee' 'nyi nyor :or 'si-a 'o :wlu 'da, or no 'dhuan.
A-a' klehkpeh, a 'beh-dih: a 'ye Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh po :due' :due' 'de a 'bei' bo, 'de an-a' klehkpeh 'ye deh 'chean', on 'ye 'kpih 'ye.
'Nyi nyor :or po-a Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh, or :korn or-a' 'nyii'-deh: :dao' wlu 'ken.

Deh no-eh, Nyorsoa 'bhorn deh⧾-a' klehkpeh 'ye 'o :dhororn' 'i :ne, 'de a 'ye wlu-' dih 'worn-eh 'ble. Or :se-' deh⧾ ya :gba-eh 'bhorn 'de a 'nyne-'. :Yee' :ka eh no-a :ne-eh 'de Nyorsoa-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh-a' 'nyne-',
'nyi 'nynor⧾-kpao'⧾ no 'dhuan 'de a-a' 'gbon-dih: 'da. On :se-' 'tele' 'nyi-eh: on 'ye :wlu. 'Nyi on :ne 'o nyor⧾ 'zorn, :ka :Mose'-a' 'tele' 'da-a.

:Mor eh 'dhu an 'bhorn on 'ye deh-' dih 'worn, :yee' :mor on mu :gwlor-', :yee' on dhele: an-a' yibeor-boi' dih, 'de on 'bli 'gbu⧾ 'di dih. Eh no dhen-deh: 'nynor 'ye :wlu 'de 'chore-a' 'gbon-dih: 'da.
'De a bo :oo', Nyorsoa-a' wlu tba-dih ke :e? :Ae' a :due' 'dhu nyor⧾-' en yi 'de bo ke?

:Yee' :mor nyor 'da or no Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh: :po-nyor: 'de mor or 'ye :ao' or 'ble or-a' :Zulu-a' 'nyii'-deh: 'jeh ka, :yee' or mu-eh yubo: :ka deh⧾ 'an 'chle-a 'de a bo, 'de en 'dhu-a :Gwlor :baa'-a' 'tele'.
Jorwor: :mor nyor se-ih :dou'⧾ bo :to, :yee' nyor-a' :to-or' :dou'⧾ bo :ke.
:Yee' 'an 'Klae :de-di'-boi'-a:, 'nyi a-a' :porluh⧾ sin, a 'ye Nyorsoa-a' wele-eh po. Jorwor: nyor-a' :po-' wlu⧾ 'doror: 'dor :en Gban 'i :ne :Zulu 'nyi a-uh, a 'ye-a' po, en-' po-a' 'borboa' 'i :ke.
Jorwor: a no deh⧾-a' klehkpeh 'de 'yi dih :nmor ka 'di, 'de en 'ye 'o :dhororn' 'i :ne.

:Yee' 'an 'Klae :de-di'-boi'-a:, 'an 'bhorn 'on 'ye-a Nyorsoa-a' tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh 'on po-a 'de a bo, en-' dhih a :gwluhuh' bo :po-dih:, :yih a kpon-a dih, 'de a-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh :nyna-a 'o ken dih.

Tubo-wlu:⧾ 'jeh :daa, me-: no-eh, 'de a 'puh, :mor eh 'dhu a kpa en-' dih :kpon-eh 'dlu bo, :ka 'on no-a en-' po-a' 'de a bo. Jorwor: :mor a se :ao' en-' dih :kpon-eh no, :yee' a-a' dhih 'jeh-' :po-eh no deh 'plo.
Tubo-wlu⧾-a' :yih :en 'kpa-a deh ken 'gabaa, me-: 'on kpon-dih, 'de 'on :zi-dih-ih 'de a bo, :en 'dhu-a, 'Klae 'meh-' 'do :a-a' deh⧾-zon⧾-a' dhih bo, :ka Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh no-a eh-a' :za-a'.
'De on nma-dih-or dih, 'de or no 'we taan 'de mor. 'De Nyorsoa za-or 'de nma-dih-deh 'di. Deh :eh 'chle-eh 'de Nyorsoa-a' 'chlee-deh 'di, eh-: 'o, :eh 'kpa dhih 'jeh-'.
Or 'wluh-dih: :Piteh' 'i :zai'. 'De or 'wluh-dih: or-a'a: bo :na-nyor:⧾ :on :korn-a :bhue: 'yor :ne-a 'sororn' 'i.
'De or 'wluh-dih: or-a' klei' :zi-nyor:⧾ :noo' 'i, :on zi-a :kehehn' :mm' dih, 'do :dha :due'. An-a' :dha :dhulu' mo-: :ne 'kmo-' :naa, keen' :mloror' an-a' :noo' 'meh.
:Yeh or 'wluh-a 'o :neheh', :yee' or 'wluh-dih: 'Jeen 'i, 'de or 'wluh-dih: or-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾-a' klehkpeh 'i :ke.
:Yee' :yeh 'bor-dih:-a 'o klehkpeh, eh-: 'dhu, or 'wluh-dih: 'an 'jeh 'yor-eh 'i :ke. Keen' :mloror' 'on gweh nyor :or se-a ti 'jeh 'i 'wluh-dih:.
Deh no-eh, 'mor no :Yusu'-a'a: dboo-nyor⧾-a' 'zeehn. 'On se-eh 'i :bleh-dih:, 'on 'ye or-a'a: dboo-nyor 'da-dih-eh: :sloror'. Deh no-eh, 'on 'ye-dih: Nyorsoa-a' 'chore 'kle :zai'.
